ENGLISH: It does not have joy in injustice, but has joy with the truth.
QUENYA: It does not have joy in injustice, but has joy with the truth.

ENGLISH: It bears everything, it believes everything, it has hope in everything, it endures everything.
QUENYA: It bears everything, it believes everything, it has hope in everything, it endures everything.

ENGLISH: Love does not ever fall away. If they are words of prophets, they will be put away; if they are tongues, they will cease; if it is knowledge, it will be put away.
QUENYA: Love does not ever fall away. If they are words of prophets, they will be put away; if they are tongues, they will cease; if it is knowledge, it will be put away.

ENGLISH: For our knowledge is in part, and we speak as prophets in part,
QUENYA: For our knowledge is in part, and we speak as prophets in part,

ENGLISH: but when the perfect shall come, that which exists in part will be put away.
QUENYA: but when the perfect shall come, that which exists in part will be put away.

ENGLISH: When I was a babe, I spoke as a babe, I thought like a babe, I judged like a babe; but now that I am a man, I have put away the things of the babe.
QUENYA: When I was a babe, I spoke as a babe, I thought like a babe, I judged like a babe; but now that I am a man, I have put away the things of the babe.

ENGLISH: Now we see as if in a mirror, obscurely, but then we shall see from face to face. Now I know in part, but then I shall know fully, as I am also known.
QUENYA: Now we see as if in a mirror, obscurely, but then we shall see from face to face. Now I know in part, but then I shall know fully, as I am also known.

ENGLISH: But now remain faith, hope, love – these three – but the greatest among them is love.
QUENYA: But now remain faith, hope, love – these three – but the greatest among them is love.

ENGLISH: Pursue love, and yet with a burning spirit seek the gifts of the spirit , above all that you will be able to speak like prophets.
QUENYA: Pursue love, and yet with a burning spirit seek the gifts of the spirit , above all that you will be able to speak like prophets.

ENGLISH: For who speaks in a tongue speaks, not to men, but to God, for is no one listening, but he speaks secrets by the spirit.
QUENYA: For who speaks in a tongue speaks, not to men, but to God, for is no one listening, but he speaks secrets by the spirit.

ENGLISH: But who speaks as a prophet builds up and urges and comforts men with his speech.
QUENYA: But who speaks as a prophet builds up and urges and comforts men with his speech.

ENGLISH: who speaks in a tongue builds himself up, but who speaks as a prophet builds up a congregation.
QUENYA: who speaks in a tongue builds himself up, but who speaks as a prophet builds up a congregation.

ENGLISH: I wish that all among you will speak in tongues, but is better if you will speak as prophets. that speaks as a prophet indeed is greater than that speaks in tongues – if he does not tell what his speech means, thus allowing the congregation to receive upbuilding.
QUENYA: I wish that all among you will speak in tongues, but is better if you will speak as prophets. that speaks as a prophet indeed is greater than that speaks in tongues – if he does not tell what his speech means, thus allowing the congregation to receive upbuilding.

ENGLISH: But now, brothers, if I were going to come to you speaking in tongues, how was that beneficial for you if I am did not speak to you with a revelation or with knowledge or with the word of a prophet or with a teaching?
QUENYA: But now, brothers, if I were going to come to you speaking in tongues, how was that beneficial for you if I am did not speak to you with a revelation or with knowledge or with the word of a prophet or with a teaching?

ENGLISH: If also things without life that give sound, like a harp or a flute, cannot make the musical sounds different, how will one know what is played with the flute or the harp?
QUENYA: If also things without life that give sound, like a harp or a flute, cannot make the musical sounds different, how will one know what is played with the flute or the harp?

ENGLISH: Indeed who will prepare himself for fighting if the trumplet gives an obscure sound?
QUENYA: Indeed who will prepare himself for fighting if the trumplet gives an obscure sound?

ENGLISH: In the same way you as well: If you do not with your tongue talk in a speech that people can understand, how will anyone know what is being said? Indeed you will speak into the air!
QUENYA: In the same way you as well: If you do not with your tongue talk in a speech that people can understand, how will anyone know what is being said? Indeed you will speak into the air!

ENGLISH: Although are many kinds of languages in the world, does not exist a single kind that means nothing.
QUENYA: Although are many kinds of languages in the world, does not exist a single kind that means nothing.

ENGLISH: If I do not know what the language means, I will be foreign to who speaks, and he will be foreign to me.
QUENYA: If I do not know what the language means, I will be foreign to who speaks, and he will be foreign to me.

ENGLISH: So you as well, since with a burning spirit you want the gifts of the spirit: seek to have them in abundance, in order to build up the congregation.
QUENYA: So you as well, since with a burning spirit you want the gifts of the spirit: seek to have them in abundance, in order to build up the congregation.

ENGLISH: Therefore it is necessary for the one who speaks in a tongue to pray that he will know tell what that means.
QUENYA: Therefore it is necessary for the one who speaks in a tongue to pray that he will know tell what that means.

ENGLISH: For if I am praying in a tongue, my spirit is praying, but my mind does not give fruit.
QUENYA: For if I am praying in a tongue, my spirit is praying, but my mind does not give fruit.

ENGLISH: What am I to do? I will pray by the spirit, but I will also pray with my mind.
QUENYA: What am I to do? I will pray by the spirit, but I will also pray with my mind.

ENGLISH: For if you give praise by spirit, how will the man that is sitting in the place of the ordinary person say “amen” when you give thanks, since he does not understand what you are saying?
QUENYA: For if you give praise by spirit, how will the man that is sitting in the place of the ordinary person say “amen” when you give thanks, since he does not understand what you are saying?

ENGLISH: You indeed give thanks in a good manner, but the other man is not being built up.
QUENYA: You indeed give thanks in a good manner, but the other man is not being built up.

ENGLISH: I thank God, I speak in tongues more numerous than all among you speak !
QUENYA: I thank God, I speak in tongues more numerous than all among you speak !

ENGLISH: And yet in the congreation I want to speak five words with my mind above ten thousand words in a tongue.
QUENYA: And yet in the congreation I want to speak five words with my mind above ten thousand words in a tongue.

ENGLISH: Brothers, do not be children in understanding, but be babes in evil; and yet be perfect in understanding.
QUENYA: Brothers, do not be children in understanding, but be babes in evil; and yet be perfect in understanding.

ENGLISH: In the Law is written: “With the tongues of strangers and with foreign people's lips I will speak to this people, and even then they will not listen to me, says the Lord.”
QUENYA: In the Law is written: “With the tongues of strangers and with foreign people's lips I will speak to this people, and even then they will not listen to me, says the Lord.”

ENGLISH: Thus tongues are a sign, not to that believe, but to that do not believe; but speaking as a prophet is not for that do not believe, but for that believe.
QUENYA: Thus tongues are a sign, not to that believe, but to that do not believe; but speaking as a prophet is not for that do not believe, but for that believe.

ENGLISH: Therefore, if the entire congregation assembles in one place, and all among them speak in tongues, but people that lack knowledge or do not believe come in, will they not say that you are out of your mind?
QUENYA: Therefore, if the entire congregation assembles in one place, and all among them speak in tongues, but people that lack knowledge or do not believe come in, will they not say that you are out of your mind?

ENGLISH: But if all among them speak like prophets, and a person who does not believe or who lacks knowledge comes in, he is being shamed by all, he is being examined by all,
QUENYA: But if all among them speak like prophets, and a person who does not believe or who lacks knowledge comes in, he is being shamed by all, he is being examined by all,

ENGLISH: the secrets of his heart are being revealed, and so, falling upon his face, he will worship God and openly say: “God is indeed among you!”
QUENYA: the secrets of his heart are being revealed, and so, falling upon his face, he will worship God and openly say: “God is indeed among you!”

ENGLISH: Then what are we to do, brothers? When you assemble, one person has a holy song, one person has a revelation, one person has a tongue, one person knows to tell what a tongue means. It is necessary that everything is to happen in order to build up.
QUENYA: Then what are we to do, brothers? When you assemble, one person has a holy song, one person has a revelation, one person has a tongue, one person knows to tell what a tongue means. It is necessary that everything is to happen in order to build up.

ENGLISH: And if people speak in tongues, it is necessary that they are not more than two or – as the highest permissible number – three. Let them speak one after the other, and it is necessary that there is a person who tells what their speech means.
QUENYA: And if people speak in tongues, it is necessary that they are not more than two or – as the highest permissible number – three. Let them speak one after the other, and it is necessary that there is a person who tells what their speech means.

ENGLISH: But if there is not anyone to give the meaning, it is necessary for him to be silent in the congreation and speak to himself and to God.
QUENYA: But if there is not anyone to give the meaning, it is necessary for him to be silent in the congreation and speak to himself and to God.

ENGLISH: And let two or three prophets give their words, and let the others judge what they are saying.
QUENYA: And let two or three prophets give their words, and let the others judge what they are saying.

ENGLISH: But if another receives a revelation while he is sitting there, it is necessary for the first one to be silent.
QUENYA: But if another receives a revelation while he is sitting there, it is necessary for the first one to be silent.

ENGLISH: For you can speak as prophets one after one; thus all will be exhorted.
QUENYA: For you can speak as prophets one after one; thus all will be exhorted.

ENGLISH: And it is necessary for the prophets to control their spirits.
QUENYA: And it is necessary for the prophets to control their spirits.

ENGLISH: For God is not a God whose paths are not arranged, but a God of peace.As in all congrations of the holy ones
QUENYA: For God is not a God whose paths are not arranged, but a God of peace.As in all congrations of the holy ones

ENGLISH: it is necessary for the women to be silent in the congrations, for is not permitted to them to speak, but it is necessary that they are in subjection , as the Law also says.
QUENYA: it is necessary for the women to be silent in the congrations, for is not permitted to them to speak, but it is necessary that they are in subjection , as the Law also says.

ENGLISH: But if they wish to learn something, it is necessary for them to ask their own husbands in the home, for speaking in the congration is a humilation for a woman.
QUENYA: But if they wish to learn something, it is necessary for them to ask their own husbands in the home, for speaking in the congration is a humilation for a woman.

ENGLISH: What? Was it from you God's word went out, or only as far as you it has reached?
QUENYA: What? Was it from you God's word went out, or only as far as you it has reached?

ENGLISH: If anyone thinks that he is a prophet or that he has the spirit, it is necessary for him to give heed to to the things that I am writing to you, for they are the Lord's command.
QUENYA: If anyone thinks that he is a prophet or that he has the spirit, it is necessary for him to give heed to to the things that I am writing to you, for they are the Lord's command.

ENGLISH: But if anyone lacks knowledge, without knowledge he is.
QUENYA: But if anyone lacks knowledge, without knowledge he is.

ENGLISH: Therefore, brothers, with a burning spirit seek the gift of the prophet, and yet do not forbid the speaking in tongues.
QUENYA: Therefore, brothers, with a burning spirit seek the gift of the prophet, and yet do not forbid the speaking in tongues.

ENGLISH: But may all these things happen in a proper and arranged manner.
QUENYA: But may all these things happen in a proper and arranged manner.

ENGLISH: Now I made known to you, brothers, the gospel that I gave to you, which I also received, in which you also stand,
QUENYA: Now I made known to you, brothers, the gospel that I gave to you, which I also received, in which you also stand,

ENGLISH: by which you are saved, by the speech with which I made the gospel known to you, if you keep it – if you did not believe for nothing.
QUENYA: by which you are saved, by the speech with which I made the gospel known to you, if you keep it – if you did not believe for nothing.

ENGLISH: For I gave over to you, among the first things, that which I also received, that Christ died for our sins as the Scripture says,
QUENYA: For I gave over to you, among the first things, that which I also received, that Christ died for our sins as the Scripture says,

ENGLISH: and that he was brought to his grave, and he has been raised up on the third day as the Scripture says,
QUENYA: and that he was brought to his grave, and he has been raised up on the third day as the Scripture says,

ENGLISH: and that he showed himself to Cephas, then to the twelve.
QUENYA: and that he showed himself to Cephas, then to the twelve.

ENGLISH: Thereafter he showed himself to more than five hundred brothers, of whom the greater number remain until this day, though some are dead.
QUENYA: Thereafter he showed himself to more than five hundred brothers, of whom the greater number remain until this day, though some are dead.

ENGLISH: Thereafter he showed himself to Jacob, then to all the apostles,
QUENYA: Thereafter he showed himself to Jacob, then to all the apostles,

ENGLISH: but last of all he showed himself to me, as to a babe born before the time.
QUENYA: but last of all he showed himself to me, as to a babe born before the time.

ENGLISH: For I am the smallest of the apostles, and I am not worthy to be called an apostle, for I have persecuted God's congregation.
QUENYA: For I am the smallest of the apostles, and I am not worthy to be called an apostle, for I have persecuted God's congregation.

ENGLISH: But by God's grace I am who I am. And the grace that he gave to me was not for nothing, but I labored more than them all, and yet not I, but God's grace that is in me.
QUENYA: But by God's grace I am who I am. And the grace that he gave to me was not for nothing, but I labored more than them all, and yet not I, but God's grace that is in me.

ENGLISH: But not heeding if I or they did the work, this is what we make known , and so you have believed.
QUENYA: But not heeding if I or they did the work, this is what we make known , and so you have believed.

ENGLISH: Now if concerning the Christ is made known that he has been raised from dead, how is that are some among you that say that there is no resurrection from dead?
QUENYA: Now if concerning the Christ is made known that he has been raised from dead, how is that are some among you that say that there is no resurrection from dead?

ENGLISH: If is no resurrection from the dead, Christ as well has not been raised.
QUENYA: If is no resurrection from the dead, Christ as well has not been raised.

ENGLISH: But if Christ has not been raised, what we make known is actually empty , and our faith is empty.
QUENYA: But if Christ has not been raised, what we make known is actually empty , and our faith is empty.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, we are also found as lying witnesses against God, for we have witnessed against God that he raised the Christ, whom he did not raise if dead are not being raised.
QUENYA: Furthermore, we are also found as lying witnesses against God, for we have witnessed against God that he raised the Christ, whom he did not raise if dead are not being raised.

ENGLISH: For if dead are not raised, the Christ as well has not been raised.
QUENYA: For if dead are not raised, the Christ as well has not been raised.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, if the Christ has not been raised, your faith is for nothing; you are still in your sins.
QUENYA: Furthermore, if the Christ has not been raised, your faith is for nothing; you are still in your sins.

ENGLISH: Indeed also that have died in Christ perished.
QUENYA: Indeed also that have died in Christ perished.

ENGLISH: If in this life alone we have put our hope in Christ, we are among all men the most worthy of pity .
QUENYA: If in this life alone we have put our hope in Christ, we are among all men the most worthy of pity .

ENGLISH: But the Christ has indeed been raised from dead, a first fruit of who have died.
QUENYA: But the Christ has indeed been raised from dead, a first fruit of who have died.

ENGLISH: For like death came through a man, also resurrection of dead is through a man.
QUENYA: For like death came through a man, also resurrection of dead is through a man.

ENGLISH: For like in Adam all die, so also in Christ all will be made alive.
QUENYA: For like in Adam all die, so also in Christ all will be made alive.

ENGLISH: But everyone in his own time: Christ the first fruit, thereafter that are Christ at his coming,
QUENYA: But everyone in his own time: Christ the first fruit, thereafter that are Christ at his coming,

ENGLISH: then the end, when he gives over the kingdom to God and to the Father, after he put an end to all power and might.
QUENYA: then the end, when he gives over the kingdom to God and to the Father, after he put an end to all power and might.

ENGLISH: For it is necessary for him to rule until God puts all enemies under his feet.
QUENYA: For it is necessary for him to rule until God puts all enemies under his feet.

ENGLISH: As the last enemy death will be put an end to.
QUENYA: As the last enemy death will be put an end to.

ENGLISH: For God “has put all things under his feet”. But when he says that all things have been put under his power, it is easy to see that he who put all things under him is not counted among them.
QUENYA: For God “has put all things under his feet”. But when he says that all things have been put under his power, it is easy to see that he who put all things under him is not counted among them.

ENGLISH: But when all things will be put under his power, then the Son himself will put himself under the power of that put all things under him, to make God everything for all.
QUENYA: But when all things will be put under his power, then the Son himself will put himself under the power of that put all things under him, to make God everything for all.

ENGLISH: If not, what will they do who are baptized for dead? What is their reason for being baptized for them if dead will by no means be raised?
QUENYA: If not, what will they do who are baptized for dead? What is their reason for being baptized for them if dead will by no means be raised?

ENGLISH: Furthermore, what is our reason for putting ourselves in danger in every hour?
QUENYA: Furthermore, what is our reason for putting ourselves in danger in every hour?

ENGLISH: Every day I am dying – as true as it is possible for me to praise myself by means of you, brothers, in Christ Jesus our Lord.
QUENYA: Every day I am dying – as true as it is possible for me to praise myself by means of you, brothers, in Christ Jesus our Lord.

ENGLISH: If was in the manner of men that I have fought against wild beasts in Ephesus, how was that beneficial to me? If dead will not be raised up, let us eat and drink, for tomorrow we shall die!
QUENYA: If was in the manner of men that I have fought against wild beasts in Ephesus, how was that beneficial to me? If dead will not be raised up, let us eat and drink, for tomorrow we shall die!

ENGLISH: Do not be made to err: If one remains among bad people, good habits will be marred.
QUENYA: Do not be made to err: If one remains among bad people, good habits will be marred.

ENGLISH: Attain keenness of perception in a just manner and do not sin, for are some that lack knowledge about God. I am talking to cause you to feel shame!
QUENYA: Attain keenness of perception in a just manner and do not sin, for are some that lack knowledge about God. I am talking to cause you to feel shame!

ENGLISH: But a person will say: “How will dead be raised? What will be the kind of bodies that they come in?”
QUENYA: But a person will say: “How will dead be raised? What will be the kind of bodies that they come in?”

ENGLISH: O unintelligent person! which you sow is not made alive if it does not first die;
QUENYA: O unintelligent person! which you sow is not made alive if it does not first die;

ENGLISH: and that which you sow is not the body that will exist, but a naked seed – perhaps of grain, perhaps of another kind of plant –
QUENYA: and that which you sow is not the body that will exist, but a naked seed – perhaps of grain, perhaps of another kind of plant –

ENGLISH: but God gives it a body just as is good in his eyes, and to every seed its own body.
QUENYA: but God gives it a body just as is good in his eyes, and to every seed its own body.

ENGLISH: All flesh is not the same flash, but men have their kind, and is another kind in cattle, and another kind of flesh in birds, and another kind in fishes.
QUENYA: All flesh is not the same flash, but men have their kind, and is another kind in cattle, and another kind of flesh in birds, and another kind in fishes.

ENGLISH: And there are heavenly bodies and bodies on earth, but the glory of the heavenly bodies is of another kind, and not of the same kind as the glory of the bodies on earth.
QUENYA: And there are heavenly bodies and bodies on earth, but the glory of the heavenly bodies is of another kind, and not of the same kind as the glory of the bodies on earth.

ENGLISH: The sun's glory is of its own kind, and the Moon's glory is another, and the glory of stars is another; indeed star is not like another star in glory.
QUENYA: The sun's glory is of its own kind, and the Moon's glory is another, and the glory of stars is another; indeed star is not like another star in glory.

ENGLISH: Thus is also the resurrection of dead: It is sown in a destructible state; it is raised in a state beyond destruction.
QUENYA: Thus is also the resurrection of dead: It is sown in a destructible state; it is raised in a state beyond destruction.

ENGLISH: It is sown without glory; it is raised in glory.
QUENYA: It is sown without glory; it is raised in glory.

ENGLISH: It is sown as a body of matter; it is raised as a body of spirit.
QUENYA: It is sown as a body of matter; it is raised as a body of spirit.

ENGLISH: Thus is also written: “The first man, Adam, became a living creature.” The last Adam became a spirit giving life.
QUENYA: Thus is also written: “The first man, Adam, became a living creature.” The last Adam became a spirit giving life.

ENGLISH: And yet the first is not that which is of spirit, but that which is of matter; thereafter comes that which is of spirit.
QUENYA: And yet the first is not that which is of spirit, but that which is of matter; thereafter comes that which is of spirit.

ENGLISH: The first man is out of the earth and made of dust; the second man is out of heaven.
QUENYA: The first man is out of the earth and made of dust; the second man is out of heaven.

ENGLISH: Like the person made of dust, thus are also that were made of dust, and like the heavenly person is, so are also that are heavenly.
QUENYA: Like the person made of dust, thus are also that were made of dust, and like the heavenly person is, so are also that are heavenly.

ENGLISH: And just as we have borne the image of the person made of dust, we shall also bear the heavenly person's image.
QUENYA: And just as we have borne the image of the person made of dust, we shall also bear the heavenly person's image.

ENGLISH: But I say, brothers: Flesh and blood cannot be heir of God's kingdom; furthermore, that which is destructible will not possess that which is beyond destruction.
QUENYA: But I say, brothers: Flesh and blood cannot be heir of God's kingdom; furthermore, that which is destructible will not possess that which is beyond destruction.

ENGLISH: Behold! I am telling you a secret: All among us will not die, but all among us will be changed,
QUENYA: Behold! I am telling you a secret: All among us will not die, but all among us will be changed,

ENGLISH: in a single moment, in the twinkling of an eye, when the last trumpet shall be heard. For the trumpet will sound, and dead will be raised in a state beyond destruction, and we shall be changed.
QUENYA: in a single moment, in the twinkling of an eye, when the last trumpet shall be heard. For the trumpet will sound, and dead will be raised in a state beyond destruction, and we shall be changed.

ENGLISH: For is necessary that this destructible puts on itself a state beyond destruction, and is necessary for this mortal to put on itself an immortal state.
QUENYA: For is necessary that this destructible puts on itself a state beyond destruction, and is necessary for this mortal to put on itself an immortal state.

ENGLISH: But when this mortal puts on itself an immortal state, then will occur the saying that is written: “Death has been undone forever!
QUENYA: But when this mortal puts on itself an immortal state, then will occur the saying that is written: “Death has been undone forever!

ENGLISH: Death, where your victory? Death, where is your sting?”
QUENYA: Death, where your victory? Death, where is your sting?”

ENGLISH: The sting of death is sin, but the power of sin is the Law.
QUENYA: The sting of death is sin, but the power of sin is the Law.

ENGLISH: But thanks to God, for he gives us the victory through Jesus Christ our Lord!
QUENYA: But thanks to God, for he gives us the victory through Jesus Christ our Lord!

ENGLISH: Therefore, my brothers, be faithful, firm – always doing an abundance in the work of the Lord, knowing that your work is not for nothing in the Lord.
QUENYA: Therefore, my brothers, be faithful, firm – always doing an abundance in the work of the Lord, knowing that your work is not for nothing in the Lord.

ENGLISH: About the collection for the holy ones: As I commanded the congregations in Galatia, so you do as well!
QUENYA: About the collection for the holy ones: As I commanded the congregations in Galatia, so you do as well!

ENGLISH: May everyone among you, on every first day of the week, set aside money – the sum that it is possible for him to give. Thus, when I shall come, there will not be need to do collections then.
QUENYA: May everyone among you, on every first day of the week, set aside money – the sum that it is possible for him to give. Thus, when I shall come, there will not be need to do collections then.

ENGLISH: But when I shall come there, I will send the men of your choosing to Jerusalem with letters, to carry your gift.
QUENYA: But when I shall come there, I will send the men of your choosing to Jerusalem with letters, to carry your gift.

ENGLISH: If it is possible for me as well to go, they shall go with me.
QUENYA: If it is possible for me as well to go, they shall go with me.

ENGLISH: But I will come to you when I have gone through Macedonia – for by way of Macedonia that I shall come –
QUENYA: But I will come to you when I have gone through Macedonia – for by way of Macedonia that I shall come –

ENGLISH: and with you I will perhaps remain, or I will stay through the winter. Then you will be able to send me on my way again, to where I can go.
QUENYA: and with you I will perhaps remain, or I will stay through the winter. Then you will be able to send me on my way again, to where I can go.

ENGLISH: For I do not want to meet you now, passing through your region, for I have the hope that I will stay with you for a longer time, if the Lord allows.
QUENYA: For I do not want to meet you now, passing through your region, for I have the hope that I will stay with you for a longer time, if the Lord allows.

ENGLISH: But I stay in Ephesus until the Festival of Weeks ,
QUENYA: But I stay in Ephesus until the Festival of Weeks ,

ENGLISH: for a great door to work has been opened, and are many that stand against me.
QUENYA: for a great door to work has been opened, and are many that stand against me.

ENGLISH: When Timothy shall come, see that he will be free of fear among you, for he is doing the Lord's work, as do I.
QUENYA: When Timothy shall come, see that he will be free of fear among you, for he is doing the Lord's work, as do I.

ENGLISH: Therefore allow no one to despise him. Send him on his journey in peace, for him to come to me, for I am waiting for him, with the brothers.
QUENYA: Therefore allow no one to despise him. Send him on his journey in peace, for him to come to me, for I am waiting for him, with the brothers.

ENGLISH: Now about Apollos our brother: I urged him with many words to come to us, with the brothers, and yet his will was not to come now, but he shall come when it shall be possible for him.. Be awake, be firm in the faith, be manly, be mighty!
QUENYA: Now about Apollos our brother: I urged him with many words to come to us, with the brothers, and yet his will was not to come now, but he shall come when it shall be possible for him.. Be awake, be firm in the faith, be manly, be mighty!

ENGLISH: Cause all your affairs to happen in love.
QUENYA: Cause all your affairs to happen in love.

ENGLISH: Now I urge you, brothers: You know that the family of Stephanas is the first fruit in Achaia, and that they appointed themselves to be servants to the holy ones.
QUENYA: Now I urge you, brothers: You know that the family of Stephanas is the first fruit in Achaia, and that they appointed themselves to be servants to the holy ones.

ENGLISH: Thus it is necessary also for you to subject yourselves such people and all that work together and toil.
QUENYA: Thus it is necessary also for you to subject yourselves such people and all that work together and toil.

ENGLISH: But I am happy since Stephanus and Fortunatus and Achaicus are here, for though you are not with me, they have filled my need.
QUENYA: But I am happy since Stephanus and Fortunatus and Achaicus are here, for though you are not with me, they have filled my need.

ENGLISH: For they renewed my spirit and your spirit. Therefore receive such people well.
QUENYA: For they renewed my spirit and your spirit. Therefore receive such people well.

ENGLISH: The congregation in Asia greets you. Aquila and Prisca, with the congregation, greet you sincerely in the Lord.
QUENYA: The congregation in Asia greets you. Aquila and Prisca, with the congregation, greet you sincerely in the Lord.

ENGLISH: All the brothers greet you. Greet one another with a holy kiss.
QUENYA: All the brothers greet you. Greet one another with a holy kiss.

ENGLISH: This is my, Paul's, greeting, by my own hand.
QUENYA: This is my, Paul's, greeting, by my own hand.

ENGLISH: If anyone does not love the Lord, may he be accursed! Maran atha!
QUENYA: If anyone does not love the Lord, may he be accursed! Maran atha!

ENGLISH: May the grace of the Lord Jesus be with you!
QUENYA: May the grace of the Lord Jesus be with you!

ENGLISH: May my love be with all among you in Christ Jesus.
QUENYA: May my love be with all among you in Christ Jesus.

ENGLISH: which existed from the beginning, which we heard, which we have seen with our eyes, which we have beheld and our hands have felt concerning the word of life
QUENYA: which existed from the beginning, which we heard, which we have seen with our eyes, which we have beheld and our hands have felt concerning the word of life

ENGLISH: – indeed the life was revealed, and we have seen it and witness and tell you about the eternal life that was with the Father and was revealed to us –
QUENYA: – indeed the life was revealed, and we have seen it and witness and tell you about the eternal life that was with the Father and was revealed to us –

ENGLISH: that which we have seen and we heard we are telling also to you, that also you will have a part with us. And our part is with the Father and with Jesus Christ his Son.
QUENYA: that which we have seen and we heard we are telling also to you, that also you will have a part with us. And our part is with the Father and with Jesus Christ his Son.

ENGLISH: And so we are writing these things, that our joy will be full.
QUENYA: And so we are writing these things, that our joy will be full.

ENGLISH: And this is the message that we have heard from him and we are telling you, that God is light, and there is not at all darkness in him.
QUENYA: And this is the message that we have heard from him and we are telling you, that God is light, and there is not at all darkness in him.

ENGLISH: If we say that we have a part with him, and yet we walk in the dark, we are lying and do not do the truth.
QUENYA: If we say that we have a part with him, and yet we walk in the dark, we are lying and do not do the truth.

ENGLISH: But if we walk in the light as he is in the light, we have a part one with the other, and the blood of Jesus his Son cleanses us from all sin.
QUENYA: But if we walk in the light as he is in the light, we have a part one with the other, and the blood of Jesus his Son cleanses us from all sin.

ENGLISH: If we say that we do not have sin, we mislead ourselves and the truth is not in us.
QUENYA: If we say that we do not have sin, we mislead ourselves and the truth is not in us.

ENGLISH: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and righteous to forgive us our sins and cleanse us from all unrighteousness.
QUENYA: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and righteous to forgive us our sins and cleanse us from all unrighteousness.

ENGLISH: If we say that we do not sin, we make him a liar, and his word is not in us.
QUENYA: If we say that we do not sin, we make him a liar, and his word is not in us.

ENGLISH: My children, I am writing these things to you that you will not sin. And if anyone does sin, we have a helper with the Father: Jesus Christ, the Righteous .
QUENYA: My children, I am writing these things to you that you will not sin. And if anyone does sin, we have a helper with the Father: Jesus Christ, the Righteous .

ENGLISH: And he is a covering sacrifice for our sins, and yet not for ours alone, but the whole world’s.
QUENYA: And he is a covering sacrifice for our sins, and yet not for ours alone, but the whole world’s.

ENGLISH: And thus we have the knowledge that we know him: if we abide by his commandments.
QUENYA: And thus we have the knowledge that we know him: if we abide by his commandments.

ENGLISH: who says: ”I know him”, but by his commandments he does not abide, he is a liar, and the truth is not in such a person.
QUENYA: who says: ”I know him”, but by his commandments he does not abide, he is a liar, and the truth is not in such a person.

ENGLISH: But anyone who abides by his words, in him the love of God is made perfect. By this we know that we are in him.
QUENYA: But anyone who abides by his words, in him the love of God is made perfect. By this we know that we are in him.

ENGLISH: For the one who says that he is in him it is necessary to walk as he walked.
QUENYA: For the one who says that he is in him it is necessary to walk as he walked.

ENGLISH: Beloved ones, I do not write to you a new commandment, but an old commandment that you had from the beginning. This old commandment is the word that you heard.
QUENYA: Beloved ones, I do not write to you a new commandment, but an old commandment that you had from the beginning. This old commandment is the word that you heard.

ENGLISH: Again, I write to you a new commandment, which is true for him and for you, since the darkness is passing, and the true light is shining even now.
QUENYA: Again, I write to you a new commandment, which is true for him and for you, since the darkness is passing, and the true light is shining even now.

ENGLISH: who says that he is in the light, and yet he hates his brother, is still in the darkness.
QUENYA: who says that he is in the light, and yet he hates his brother, is still in the darkness.

ENGLISH: who loves his brother remains in the light, and in him there is nothing that causes anyone to fall.
QUENYA: who loves his brother remains in the light, and in him there is nothing that causes anyone to fall.

ENGLISH: But who hates his brother is in the darkness and walks in the darkness, and he does not know where he is going, for the darkness has made his eyes blind.
QUENYA: But who hates his brother is in the darkness and walks in the darkness, and he does not know where he is going, for the darkness has made his eyes blind.

ENGLISH: I am writing to you, children, because your sins are forgiven you by means of his name.
QUENYA: I am writing to you, children, because your sins are forgiven you by means of his name.

ENGLISH: I am writing to you, fathers, because you know who is from the beginning. I am writing to you, youths, because you have conquered the Wicked One. I am writing to you, children, because you know the Father.
QUENYA: I am writing to you, fathers, because you know who is from the beginning. I am writing to you, youths, because you have conquered the Wicked One. I am writing to you, children, because you know the Father.

ENGLISH: I am writing to you, fathers, because you know who is from the beginning. I am writing to you, youths, because you are strong and God’s word remains in you, and you have conquered the Wicked One.
QUENYA: I am writing to you, fathers, because you know who is from the beginning. I am writing to you, youths, because you are strong and God’s word remains in you, and you have conquered the Wicked One.

ENGLISH: Do not love the world or that are in the world. If anyone loves the world, the love for the Father is not in him,
QUENYA: Do not love the world or that are in the world. If anyone loves the world, the love for the Father is not in him,

ENGLISH: since everything that is in the world – the lust of the flesh and the lust of the eyes and the pride caused by wealth – is not of the Father, but of the world.
QUENYA: since everything that is in the world – the lust of the flesh and the lust of the eyes and the pride caused by wealth – is not of the Father, but of the world.

ENGLISH: And the world passes away, and so does its lust, but who does God’s will remains forever.
QUENYA: And the world passes away, and so does its lust, but who does God’s will remains forever.

ENGLISH: My children, this is the last hour, and as you have heard that the Antichrist is coming, even now there are numerous Antichrists. Thus we know that this is the last hour.
QUENYA: My children, this is the last hour, and as you have heard that the Antichrist is coming, even now there are numerous Antichrists. Thus we know that this is the last hour.

ENGLISH: They went forth from us, but they were not of our kind, for if they were of our kind, they remained with us. But it happened so that would be shown that they are not all of our kind.
QUENYA: They went forth from us, but they were not of our kind, for if they were of our kind, they remained with us. But it happened so that would be shown that they are not all of our kind.

ENGLISH: For you have an annointing from the Holy One; all among you have knowledge.
QUENYA: For you have an annointing from the Holy One; all among you have knowledge.

ENGLISH: I write to you, not because you do not know the truth, but because you know it, and because there is not lie that comes from the truth.
QUENYA: I write to you, not because you do not know the truth, but because you know it, and because there is not lie that comes from the truth.

ENGLISH: Who is the liar, if not who denies that Jesus is the Christ? This is the Antichrist, he that denies the Father and the Son.
QUENYA: Who is the liar, if not who denies that Jesus is the Christ? This is the Antichrist, he that denies the Father and the Son.

ENGLISH: Everyone who lacks the Son also lacks the Father. who confesses the Son confesses also the Father.
QUENYA: Everyone who lacks the Son also lacks the Father. who confesses the Son confesses also the Father.

ENGLISH: You, let which you have heard from the beginning remain in you. If which you have heard from the beginning remains in you, you too will remain in the Son and the Father.
QUENYA: You, let which you have heard from the beginning remain in you. If which you have heard from the beginning remains in you, you too will remain in the Son and the Father.

ENGLISH: And this is the promise that he gave us: eternal life.
QUENYA: And this is the promise that he gave us: eternal life.

ENGLISH: These things I write to you concerning those who try to mislead you.
QUENYA: These things I write to you concerning those who try to mislead you.

ENGLISH: And you – the annointment that you received from him remains in you, and you do not have need that anyone teaches you. For it teaches you about everything, and it is true and without lie. Like it has taught you, remain in him.
QUENYA: And you – the annointment that you received from him remains in you, and you do not have need that anyone teaches you. For it teaches you about everything, and it is true and without lie. Like it has taught you, remain in him.

ENGLISH: And now, my children, you remain in him, that, when he shall be revealed, you will have freeness of speech and we shall not be shamed away from him at his coming.
QUENYA: And now, my children, you remain in him, that, when he shall be revealed, you will have freeness of speech and we shall not be shamed away from him at his coming.

ENGLISH: If you know that he is righteous, you know that everybody who does righteousness has been born by him.
QUENYA: If you know that he is righteous, you know that everybody who does righteousness has been born by him.

ENGLISH: Behold the kind of love that the Father has given us, that we were going to be called children of God, and that we are. Therefore the world does not know us, since it has not known him.
QUENYA: Behold the kind of love that the Father has given us, that we were going to be called children of God, and that we are. Therefore the world does not know us, since it has not known him.

ENGLISH: Beloved ones, now we are children of God, but still is not revealed what we will be. We know that when he shall be revealed we will be like him, and we shall see him as he is.
QUENYA: Beloved ones, now we are children of God, but still is not revealed what we will be. We know that when he shall be revealed we will be like him, and we shall see him as he is.

ENGLISH: And everybody who has this hope in him, purifies self as he is clean.
QUENYA: And everybody who has this hope in him, purifies self as he is clean.

ENGLISH: Everybody who does sin also does lawlessness, for sin is lawlessness.
QUENYA: Everybody who does sin also does lawlessness, for sin is lawlessness.

ENGLISH: And you know that he was revealed to take away sins, and is not sin in him.
QUENYA: And you know that he was revealed to take away sins, and is not sin in him.

ENGLISH: Everyone remaining in him does not sin, nobody who sins has either seen him or known him.
QUENYA: Everyone remaining in him does not sin, nobody who sins has either seen him or known him.

ENGLISH: My children, let nobody mislead you; who does righteousness is righteous, as he is righteous.
QUENYA: My children, let nobody mislead you; who does righteousness is righteous, as he is righteous.

ENGLISH: who does sin is from the Devil, since the Devil has sinned from the beginning. For this reason the Son of God was revealed: to undo the deeds of the Devil.
QUENYA: who does sin is from the Devil, since the Devil has sinned from the beginning. For this reason the Son of God was revealed: to undo the deeds of the Devil.

ENGLISH: Everyone who has been born from God does not do sin, since his seed remains in him, and he cannot sin, since he has been born from God.
QUENYA: Everyone who has been born from God does not do sin, since his seed remains in him, and he cannot sin, since he has been born from God.

ENGLISH: The children of God and the children of the Devil are revealed by this: Everyone who does not do righteousness is not of God, also not who does not love his brother.
QUENYA: The children of God and the children of the Devil are revealed by this: Everyone who does not do righteousness is not of God, also not who does not love his brother.

ENGLISH: For this is the message that you have heard from the beginning: to have love one for the other,
QUENYA: For this is the message that you have heard from the beginning: to have love one for the other,

ENGLISH: not like Cain, who was of the Wicked One and killed his brother. And what is the reason by which he killed him? Because his own deeds were evil, but his brother’s deeds righteous.
QUENYA: not like Cain, who was of the Wicked One and killed his brother. And what is the reason by which he killed him? Because his own deeds were evil, but his brother’s deeds righteous.

ENGLISH: Do not feel wonder, brothers, if the world hates you.
QUENYA: Do not feel wonder, brothers, if the world hates you.

ENGLISH: We know that we have passed from death to life, since we love the brothers. who does not love remains in death.
QUENYA: We know that we have passed from death to life, since we love the brothers. who does not love remains in death.

ENGLISH: Everyone who hates his brother is a manslayer, and you not that is not manslayer who has eternal life remaining in him.
QUENYA: Everyone who hates his brother is a manslayer, and you not that is not manslayer who has eternal life remaining in him.

ENGLISH: By this we know his love, because he gave his life for us, and is our debt to give our life for our brothers.
QUENYA: By this we know his love, because he gave his life for us, and is our debt to give our life for our brothers.

ENGLISH: But who is rich in this world and sees his brother having need, and yet he shuts the door of his compassion to him – how does God love remain in him?
QUENYA: But who is rich in this world and sees his brother having need, and yet he shuts the door of his compassion to him – how does God love remain in him?

ENGLISH: My children, let us love, not by word or by tongue, but by deed and by truth.
QUENYA: My children, let us love, not by word or by tongue, but by deed and by truth.

ENGLISH: By this we shall know that we are of the truth, and we shall set our heart at rest before him.
QUENYA: By this we shall know that we are of the truth, and we shall set our heart at rest before him.

ENGLISH: For if our heart accuses us, God is greater than our heart and knows all things.
QUENYA: For if our heart accuses us, God is greater than our heart and knows all things.

ENGLISH: Beloved ones, if your heart does not accuse us, we have freeness of speech before God,
QUENYA: Beloved ones, if your heart does not accuse us, we have freeness of speech before God,

ENGLISH: and anything that we request we receive from him, since we abide by his commandments and do that are good to his eyes.
QUENYA: and anything that we request we receive from him, since we abide by his commandments and do that are good to his eyes.

ENGLISH: For this is his commandment, that we believe in the name of Jesus Christ his Son and love one another, as he commanded us.
QUENYA: For this is his commandment, that we believe in the name of Jesus Christ his Son and love one another, as he commanded us.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, who abides by his commandment remains in him, and he himself in the other, and so we know that he remains in us, by the spirit that he gave us.
QUENYA: Furthermore, who abides by his commandment remains in him, and he himself in the other, and so we know that he remains in us, by the spirit that he gave us.

ENGLISH: Beloved ones, do not believe in every spirit, but test the spirits to see if they are of God, for numerous false prophets have gone out into the world.
QUENYA: Beloved ones, do not believe in every spirit, but test the spirits to see if they are of God, for numerous false prophets have gone out into the world.

ENGLISH: By this you know God’s spirit: Every spirit that confesses Jesus Christ come in the flesh is of God,
QUENYA: By this you know God’s spirit: Every spirit that confesses Jesus Christ come in the flesh is of God,

ENGLISH: but every spirit that does not confess Jesus Christ is not of God. And this is the Antichrist’s spirit, of which you heard that it was coming, and even now it is in the world.
QUENYA: but every spirit that does not confess Jesus Christ is not of God. And this is the Antichrist’s spirit, of which you heard that it was coming, and even now it is in the world.

ENGLISH: You are of God, my children, and you have conquered them, since who is in you is greater than who is in the world.
QUENYA: You are of God, my children, and you have conquered them, since who is in you is greater than who is in the world.

ENGLISH: They are of the world; therefore they speak by the world’s manner, and the world listens to them.
QUENYA: They are of the world; therefore they speak by the world’s manner, and the world listens to them.

ENGLISH: We are of God. who knows God listens to us; he who is not of God does not listen to us. Thus we know the spirit of truth and the spirit of lie.
QUENYA: We are of God. who knows God listens to us; he who is not of God does not listen to us. Thus we know the spirit of truth and the spirit of lie.

ENGLISH: Beloved ones, let us love one another, since love is of God, and everyone who loves is born of God and knows God.
QUENYA: Beloved ones, let us love one another, since love is of God, and everyone who loves is born of God and knows God.

ENGLISH: who does not love does not know God, because God is love.
QUENYA: who does not love does not know God, because God is love.

ENGLISH: By this God’s love was revealed among us: God sent his only-born Son into the world, that we could have life by him.
QUENYA: By this God’s love was revealed among us: God sent his only-born Son into the world, that we could have life by him.

ENGLISH: Love is revealed in this, not that we have loved God, but that he loved us and sent his Son as an atoning sacrifice for our sins.
QUENYA: Love is revealed in this, not that we have loved God, but that he loved us and sent his Son as an atoning sacrifice for our sins.

ENGLISH: Beloved ones, if God has loved us so, our debt is that also we love one another.
QUENYA: Beloved ones, if God has loved us so, our debt is that also we love one another.

ENGLISH: No one has ever seen God. If we love one another, God remains in us and his love is made perfect in us.
QUENYA: No one has ever seen God. If we love one another, God remains in us and his love is made perfect in us.

ENGLISH: By this we know that in him we remain, and he in us, because he has given us out of his spirit.
QUENYA: By this we know that in him we remain, and he in us, because he has given us out of his spirit.

ENGLISH: And we have seen and have witnessed that the Father has sent his Son as Savior of the world.
QUENYA: And we have seen and have witnessed that the Father has sent his Son as Savior of the world.

ENGLISH: Anyone who confesses that Jesus Christ is the Son of God, in him God remains, and he in God.
QUENYA: Anyone who confesses that Jesus Christ is the Son of God, in him God remains, and he in God.

ENGLISH: And you know and have believed the love that God has for us.God is love, and who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.
QUENYA: And you know and have believed the love that God has for us.God is love, and who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

ENGLISH: Thus love is made perfect with us, that we will have freedom of speech on the day of doom. For as he is, so also we are in this world.
QUENYA: Thus love is made perfect with us, that we will have freedom of speech on the day of doom. For as he is, so also we are in this world.

ENGLISH: There is no fear in love, since perfect love throws fear out, because fear carries punishment with itself. who fears is not made perfect in love.
QUENYA: There is no fear in love, since perfect love throws fear out, because fear carries punishment with itself. who fears is not made perfect in love.

ENGLISH: We love, since he loved us first.
QUENYA: We love, since he loved us first.

ENGLISH: If anyone says: ”I love God”, and yet he hates his brother, he is a liar. For who does not love his brother whom he has seen, cannot love God whom he has not seen.
QUENYA: If anyone says: ”I love God”, and yet he hates his brother, he is a liar. For who does not love his brother whom he has seen, cannot love God whom he has not seen.

ENGLISH: And this commandment we have from him, that is necessary to who loves God to love also his brother.
QUENYA: And this commandment we have from him, that is necessary to who loves God to love also his brother.

ENGLISH: Everyone who believes that Jesus is the Christ is born of God, and everyone who loves the Father will love who was born by him.
QUENYA: Everyone who believes that Jesus is the Christ is born of God, and everyone who loves the Father will love who was born by him.

ENGLISH: By this we know that we love the children of God, when we are loving God and are doing his commandments.
QUENYA: By this we know that we love the children of God, when we are loving God and are doing his commandments.

ENGLISH: For this is the love for God, that we abide by his commandments. And his commandments are not burdensome,
QUENYA: For this is the love for God, that we abide by his commandments. And his commandments are not burdensome,

ENGLISH: since everything that is born of God conquers the world. And this is the victory that has conquered the world: our faith.
QUENYA: since everything that is born of God conquers the world. And this is the victory that has conquered the world: our faith.

ENGLISH: Who is who conquers the world if not who believes that Jesus is the Son of God?
QUENYA: Who is who conquers the world if not who believes that Jesus is the Son of God?

ENGLISH: This is who came by water and blood, Jesus Christ, not by the water alone, but by the water and by the blood. And the spirit is what is witnessing, since the spirit is truth.
QUENYA: This is who came by water and blood, Jesus Christ, not by the water alone, but by the water and by the blood. And the spirit is what is witnessing, since the spirit is truth.

ENGLISH: For are three that bear witness,
QUENYA: For are three that bear witness,

ENGLISH: the spirit and the water and the blood, and these three are one.
QUENYA: the spirit and the water and the blood, and these three are one.

ENGLISH: If we receive the witness of men, God’s witness is greater. For this is the witness of God, that he has witnessed about his Son.
QUENYA: If we receive the witness of men, God’s witness is greater. For this is the witness of God, that he has witnessed about his Son.

ENGLISH: who believes in the Son of God possesses the witness within himself. who does not believe in God has made him a liar, since he has not believed the witness that he has given about his Son.
QUENYA: who believes in the Son of God possesses the witness within himself. who does not believe in God has made him a liar, since he has not believed the witness that he has given about his Son.

ENGLISH: And this is the witness, that God gave us eternal life, and this life is in his Son.
QUENYA: And this is the witness, that God gave us eternal life, and this life is in his Son.

ENGLISH: who has the Son has the life; who does not have the Son of God does not have the life.
QUENYA: who has the Son has the life; who does not have the Son of God does not have the life.

ENGLISH: I write these things to you that you will know that you have eternal life, you who believe in the name of the Son of God.
QUENYA: I write these things to you that you will know that you have eternal life, you who believe in the name of the Son of God.

ENGLISH: And this is the freeness of speech that we have towards him, that if we ask for anything according to his will, he hears us.
QUENYA: And this is the freeness of speech that we have towards him, that if we ask for anything according to his will, he hears us.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, if we know that he hears us about anything that we ask for, we know that we shall have the asked for, since we have asked them from him.
QUENYA: Furthermore, if we know that he hears us about anything that we ask for, we know that we shall have the asked for, since we have asked them from him.

ENGLISH: If anybody sees his brother do a sin that does not lead to death, he shall make request, and God will give him life – if he is not among the people whose sin leads to death. is a sin that leads to death; I do not say that one is to make request concerning that.
QUENYA: If anybody sees his brother do a sin that does not lead to death, he shall make request, and God will give him life – if he is not among the people whose sin leads to death. is a sin that leads to death; I do not say that one is to make request concerning that.

ENGLISH: All lawlessness is sin, and yet there is sin that does not lead to death.
QUENYA: All lawlessness is sin, and yet there is sin that does not lead to death.

ENGLISH: We know that anyone born of God does not sin, but the One who was born of God abides by him, and the Wicked One does not touch him.
QUENYA: We know that anyone born of God does not sin, but the One who was born of God abides by him, and the Wicked One does not touch him.

ENGLISH: We know that we are of God, but the whole world lies in the power of the Wicked One.
QUENYA: We know that we are of God, but the whole world lies in the power of the Wicked One.

ENGLISH: And we know that the Son of God has come, and he has given us understanding to know him who is true, and we are in who is true, by his Son Jesus Christ. He is the true God and eternal life.
QUENYA: And we know that the Son of God has come, and he has given us understanding to know him who is true, and we are in who is true, by his Son Jesus Christ. He is the true God and eternal life.

ENGLISH: My children, keep yourselves from idols!
QUENYA: My children, keep yourselves from idols!

ENGLISH: Peter, apostle of Jesus Christ, to the exiles scattered in Pontus, Galatia, Cappadocia, Asia and Bithynia – to the chosen ones
QUENYA: Peter, apostle of Jesus Christ, to the exiles scattered in Pontus, Galatia, Cappadocia, Asia and Bithynia – to the chosen ones

ENGLISH: that were known beforehand by God the Father, by sanctification by the spirit, by their doing according to God's will and for them to be purified by the blood of Jesus Christ: May you have grace and peace in abundance!
QUENYA: that were known beforehand by God the Father, by sanctification by the spirit, by their doing according to God's will and for them to be purified by the blood of Jesus Christ: May you have grace and peace in abundance!

ENGLISH: Blessed be God, the Father of Jesus Christ our Lord, for by his great grace he has given us a new birth to a living hope by the resurrection of Jesus Christ from the dead,
QUENYA: Blessed be God, the Father of Jesus Christ our Lord, for by his great grace he has given us a new birth to a living hope by the resurrection of Jesus Christ from the dead,

ENGLISH: to an inheritance that is not stained or fading. It is reserved in heaven for you
QUENYA: to an inheritance that is not stained or fading. It is reserved in heaven for you

ENGLISH: that are protected by God's power, by faith, for a salvation that is ready to be revealed in the last time.
QUENYA: that are protected by God's power, by faith, for a salvation that is ready to be revealed in the last time.

ENGLISH: By means of this even now you have great joy, though in this time, if there is need, you have grief in this or that testing.
QUENYA: By means of this even now you have great joy, though in this time, if there is need, you have grief in this or that testing.

ENGLISH: Thus your tested faith, far more valuable than gold that is corruptible though it is tested by fire, will be found a cause of praise and glory and honor at the revelation of Jesus Christ.
QUENYA: Thus your tested faith, far more valuable than gold that is corruptible though it is tested by fire, will be found a cause of praise and glory and honor at the revelation of Jesus Christ.

ENGLISH: You did not ever see him, and yet you love him. You do not look at him now, and yet you believe in him and have a joy glorious beyond words,
QUENYA: You did not ever see him, and yet you love him. You do not look at him now, and yet you believe in him and have a joy glorious beyond words,

ENGLISH: since you are receiving the goal of your faith, the salvation of your souls.
QUENYA: since you are receiving the goal of your faith, the salvation of your souls.

ENGLISH: Concerning this salvation the Prophets sought and inquired, who spoke predictions of the grace that you were going to receive.
QUENYA: Concerning this salvation the Prophets sought and inquired, who spoke predictions of the grace that you were going to receive.

ENGLISH: They tried to understand what is the time that the Spirit in them indicated for the Christ, when it witnessed beforehand about Christ's torments and the glories that were going to come after them.
QUENYA: They tried to understand what is the time that the Spirit in them indicated for the Christ, when it witnessed beforehand about Christ's torments and the glories that were going to come after them.

ENGLISH: was revealed to them that not to themselves, but to you, they were servants of the things that now are preached to you by that brought to you the gospel, by Holy Spirit sent from heaven. These things angels want to inquire into!
QUENYA: was revealed to them that not to themselves, but to you, they were servants of the things that now are preached to you by that brought to you the gospel, by Holy Spirit sent from heaven. These things angels want to inquire into!

ENGLISH: Therefore fully keep your keenness of perception, by keeping your mind prepared. Have hope in the grace which will be brought to you at the revelation of Jesus Christ.
QUENYA: Therefore fully keep your keenness of perception, by keeping your mind prepared. Have hope in the grace which will be brought to you at the revelation of Jesus Christ.

ENGLISH: Like obedient children, do not be shaped according to the desires that you formerly had, when you lacked knowledge.
QUENYA: Like obedient children, do not be shaped according to the desires that you formerly had, when you lacked knowledge.

ENGLISH: But, by the will of the Holy One who called you, be also you holy in all your doings,
QUENYA: But, by the will of the Holy One who called you, be also you holy in all your doings,

ENGLISH: for is written: «It is necessary for you to be holy, since I am holy.»
QUENYA: for is written: «It is necessary for you to be holy, since I am holy.»

ENGLISH: Furthermore, if you are calling to the Father who does not heed who anyone is, but judges as everyone's work is, behave with fear while you dwell as exiles.
QUENYA: Furthermore, if you are calling to the Father who does not heed who anyone is, but judges as everyone's work is, behave with fear while you dwell as exiles.

ENGLISH: For you know that you were not saved from fruitless behavior by means of corruptible things, by means of silver or by means of gold.
QUENYA: For you know that you were not saved from fruitless behavior by means of corruptible things, by means of silver or by means of gold.

ENGLISH: On the contrary, you were saved with precious blood, like that of a lamb without stain or spot – Christ's blood.
QUENYA: On the contrary, you were saved with precious blood, like that of a lamb without stain or spot – Christ's blood.

ENGLISH: Indeed he was known beforehand before the founding of the world, but he was revealed at the end of times for your good,
QUENYA: Indeed he was known beforehand before the founding of the world, but he was revealed at the end of times for your good,

ENGLISH: you that by him believe in God, who raised him from dead and gave him glory, for you to put your faith and your hope in God.
QUENYA: you that by him believe in God, who raised him from dead and gave him glory, for you to put your faith and your hope in God.

ENGLISH: After cleansing your souls by heeding the truth, which gives brotherly love without hypocrisy, love one another profoundly from the heart.
QUENYA: After cleansing your souls by heeding the truth, which gives brotherly love without hypocrisy, love one another profoundly from the heart.

ENGLISH: For a new birth is given to you, not by corruptible but by incorruptible seed, by the word of the living and lasting God.
QUENYA: For a new birth is given to you, not by corruptible but by incorruptible seed, by the word of the living and lasting God.

ENGLISH: For «all flesh is like grass, and all its glory is like the flower of the grass; the grass withers, and the flower falls away,
QUENYA: For «all flesh is like grass, and all its glory is like the flower of the grass; the grass withers, and the flower falls away,

ENGLISH: but the Lord's saying remains forever.» And this is the saying, the gospel preached to you.
QUENYA: but the Lord's saying remains forever.» And this is the saying, the gospel preached to you.

ENGLISH: Therefore put away all evil and all falsehood and all envies and all harsh answers.
QUENYA: Therefore put away all evil and all falsehood and all envies and all harsh answers.

ENGLISH: As newborn babies long for the uncorrupt milk of the word, for you to grow into salvation,
QUENYA: As newborn babies long for the uncorrupt milk of the word, for you to grow into salvation,

ENGLISH: if you have tasted the Lord's goodness.
QUENYA: if you have tasted the Lord's goodness.

ENGLISH: When you come to him, to the rock that was turned away by men, but is chosen and precious to God,
QUENYA: When you come to him, to the rock that was turned away by men, but is chosen and precious to God,

ENGLISH: you as well are built up as living stones, making a building of spirit, as a holy priesthood, to sacrifice sacrifices of spirit that God wants to receive, through Jesus Christ.
QUENYA: you as well are built up as living stones, making a building of spirit, as a holy priesthood, to sacrifice sacrifices of spirit that God wants to receive, through Jesus Christ.

ENGLISH: For as the Scripture says: «Behold, I put in Sion a chosen stone, a founding corner-stone, precious, and anyone who believes in it shall by no means be shamed.»
QUENYA: For as the Scripture says: «Behold, I put in Sion a chosen stone, a founding corner-stone, precious, and anyone who believes in it shall by no means be shamed.»

ENGLISH: Therefore he is precious to you who believe, but to those who do not believe, «the same stone that the builders turned away is now head of the corner»,
QUENYA: Therefore he is precious to you who believe, but to those who do not believe, «the same stone that the builders turned away is now head of the corner»,

ENGLISH: and «a stone of slipping and a stone causing people to fall». They fall because they do not heed the word; so they have been destined.
QUENYA: and «a stone of slipping and a stone causing people to fall». They fall because they do not heed the word; so they have been destined.

ENGLISH: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a precious people, for you to be heralds of the goodness of who called you out of darkness into his light of wonder.
QUENYA: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a precious people, for you to be heralds of the goodness of who called you out of darkness into his light of wonder.

ENGLISH: For there was a time that you were not a people, but now you are God's people; you were the ones that did not receive mercy, but now you are who have indeed received mercy.
QUENYA: For there was a time that you were not a people, but now you are God's people; you were the ones that did not receive mercy, but now you are who have indeed received mercy.

ENGLISH: Beloved ones, I urge you as exiles and people that dwell in foreign lands: Keep yourselves from the lusts of the flesh, that make war against the soul. Behave well among the nations!
QUENYA: Beloved ones, I urge you as exiles and people that dwell in foreign lands: Keep yourselves from the lusts of the flesh, that make war against the soul. Behave well among the nations!

ENGLISH: Then who now speak evil of you, as of evildoers, will be witnesses of your good deeds, and will give glory to God on the day that he examines them.
QUENYA: Then who now speak evil of you, as of evildoers, will be witnesses of your good deeds, and will give glory to God on the day that he examines them.

ENGLISH: For the good of the Lord put yourselves under every creation of men – perhaps under the king, as a superior person,
QUENYA: For the good of the Lord put yourselves under every creation of men – perhaps under the king, as a superior person,

ENGLISH: perhaps under governors sent from him to punish who do evil, but to praise who do good.
QUENYA: perhaps under governors sent from him to punish who do evil, but to praise who do good.

ENGLISH: For this is God's will: By doing good stop the witless talk of people that lack knowledge!
QUENYA: For this is God's will: By doing good stop the witless talk of people that lack knowledge!

ENGLISH: Be like free people, but use your freedom, not to hide evil, but as God's slaves.
QUENYA: Be like free people, but use your freedom, not to hide evil, but as God's slaves.

ENGLISH: Give glory to all, love the brotherhood, fear God, give glory to the king!
QUENYA: Give glory to all, love the brotherhood, fear God, give glory to the king!

ENGLISH: Let servants put themselves under their lords with all fear, not under the good ones and the gentle ones alone, but also under the difficult ones.
QUENYA: Let servants put themselves under their lords with all fear, not under the good ones and the gentle ones alone, but also under the difficult ones.

ENGLISH: For it is a beautiful thing if a person, perceiving what is his debt to God, endures griefs and has difficulty unjustly.
QUENYA: For it is a beautiful thing if a person, perceiving what is his debt to God, endures griefs and has difficulty unjustly.

ENGLISH: For if, after sinning, you are beaten and you endure it, how is that praiseworthy? But if you have difficulty when you do good, and you endure it, that is a beautiful thing to God.
QUENYA: For if, after sinning, you are beaten and you endure it, how is that praiseworthy? But if you have difficulty when you do good, and you endure it, that is a beautiful thing to God.

ENGLISH: To this thing you were indeed called, for also Christ endured torments for you, for you to follow behind him in his path.
QUENYA: To this thing you were indeed called, for also Christ endured torments for you, for you to follow behind him in his path.

ENGLISH: He did not do sin, and lie was not found in his mouth.
QUENYA: He did not do sin, and lie was not found in his mouth.

ENGLISH: When others spoke to him with scorn, he did not speak with scorn to them. When he was tormented, he did not threaten, but put his case before who judges justly.
QUENYA: When others spoke to him with scorn, he did not speak with scorn to them. When he was tormented, he did not threaten, but put his case before who judges justly.

ENGLISH: He bore our sins in his own body on the cross, for us to move beyond sins and for us to have life by righteousness. For «by his wounds you were healed».
QUENYA: He bore our sins in his own body on the cross, for us to move beyond sins and for us to have life by righteousness. For «by his wounds you were healed».

ENGLISH: For you were like sheep, straying; but now we have returned to who oversees our souls.
QUENYA: For you were like sheep, straying; but now we have returned to who oversees our souls.

ENGLISH: In the same manner, let the women that have married subject themselves to their husband. Thus, if any people do not heed the word, maybe they will be gained without a word, by the conduct of their wives,
QUENYA: In the same manner, let the women that have married subject themselves to their husband. Thus, if any people do not heed the word, maybe they will be gained without a word, by the conduct of their wives,

ENGLISH: after watching your pure conduct and the awe that you show.
QUENYA: after watching your pure conduct and the awe that you show.

ENGLISH: And do not adorn yourselves on the outside, by arrangements of hair, or by putting trinkets of gold on yourselves, or by carrying raiments,
QUENYA: And do not adorn yourselves on the outside, by arrangements of hair, or by putting trinkets of gold on yourselves, or by carrying raiments,

ENGLISH: but adorn yourselves with the hidden person of the heart, with the incorruptible raiment of the the quiet and gentle soul, which is most precious in God's eyes.
QUENYA: but adorn yourselves with the hidden person of the heart, with the incorruptible raiment of the the quiet and gentle soul, which is most precious in God's eyes.

ENGLISH: For so also the holy women that had hope in God adorned themselves, subjecting themselves to their husbands,
QUENYA: For so also the holy women that had hope in God adorned themselves, subjecting themselves to their husbands,

ENGLISH: like Sarah did what Abraham said, calling him lord. And you have been made Sarah's children, if you do good and are not timid about anything fearful.
QUENYA: like Sarah did what Abraham said, calling him lord. And you have been made Sarah's children, if you do good and are not timid about anything fearful.

ENGLISH: You husbands, dwell with your wives with understanding, giving them glory as to a weaker vessel, the feminine, since you are also heirs with them to the grace of life – or your prayers will be hindered.
QUENYA: You husbands, dwell with your wives with understanding, giving them glory as to a weaker vessel, the feminine, since you are also heirs with them to the grace of life – or your prayers will be hindered.

ENGLISH: Finally, be of a single mind and have sympathy, having love for your brothers and a warm heart, humbling yourselves.
QUENYA: Finally, be of a single mind and have sympathy, having love for your brothers and a warm heart, humbling yourselves.

ENGLISH: Do not pay back with evil for evil or with harsh words for harsh words; on the contrary, you are to bless, for to this thing you have been called, for you to be heirs of a blessing.
QUENYA: Do not pay back with evil for evil or with harsh words for harsh words; on the contrary, you are to bless, for to this thing you have been called, for you to be heirs of a blessing.

ENGLISH: For «who wants to love life and see good days, may he keep his tongue from evil and his lips from speaking a lie,
QUENYA: For «who wants to love life and see good days, may he keep his tongue from evil and his lips from speaking a lie,

ENGLISH: but let him turn himself from evil and do good; may be seek peace and pursue it!
QUENYA: but let him turn himself from evil and do good; may be seek peace and pursue it!

ENGLISH: For the eyes of the Lord are turned against just ones, and his ears to their petitions, but the Lord has set his face against who do evil things .»
QUENYA: For the eyes of the Lord are turned against just ones, and his ears to their petitions, but the Lord has set his face against who do evil things .»

ENGLISH: For who is the person who will do evil to you if you burn for which is good?
QUENYA: For who is the person who will do evil to you if you burn for which is good?

ENGLISH: But if you will indeed have difficulty because of doing good, happy you are! Do not fear from them, and do not be terrified,
QUENYA: But if you will indeed have difficulty because of doing good, happy you are! Do not fear from them, and do not be terrified,

ENGLISH: but you sanctify the Christ as Lord in your heart. Always have your answer ready for everyone who demands a reason for the hope that dwells in you, but do so in a mild manner and having awe .
QUENYA: but you sanctify the Christ as Lord in your heart. Always have your answer ready for everyone who demands a reason for the hope that dwells in you, but do so in a mild manner and having awe .

ENGLISH: Keep your conscience clean! . Thus, when you receive hostile words, the people that speak evil about your good behavior in Christ will be shamed.
QUENYA: Keep your conscience clean! . Thus, when you receive hostile words, the people that speak evil about your good behavior in Christ will be shamed.

ENGLISH: For having difficulty since you are doing good, if God's will wishes it, is to you better than having difficulty since you are doing evil.
QUENYA: For having difficulty since you are doing good, if God's will wishes it, is to you better than having difficulty since you are doing evil.

ENGLISH: Christ as well died a single time concerning sins, a righteous person on behalf of unrighteous ones, for it to be possible for him to bring you to God, after he saw death in the flesh, but was made alive by the spirit.
QUENYA: Christ as well died a single time concerning sins, a righteous person on behalf of unrighteous ones, for it to be possible for him to bring you to God, after he saw death in the flesh, but was made alive by the spirit.

ENGLISH: Thus he also went away and preached to the spirits in custody,
QUENYA: Thus he also went away and preached to the spirits in custody,

ENGLISH: that did not heed their orders when God in his patience waited in the days of Noah, in the building of the ark, in which some few, that is, eight persons, were carried in safety through the water.
QUENYA: that did not heed their orders when God in his patience waited in the days of Noah, in the building of the ark, in which some few, that is, eight persons, were carried in safety through the water.

ENGLISH: What answers to this, baptism, now saves you. It does not put away the filth of the flesh, but it is a petition to God about a good conscience , by the resurrection of Jesus Christ.
QUENYA: What answers to this, baptism, now saves you. It does not put away the filth of the flesh, but it is a petition to God about a good conscience , by the resurrection of Jesus Christ.

ENGLISH: He is sitting by God's right hand, for he went away to heaven, and angels and authorities and powers have been put under him .
QUENYA: He is sitting by God's right hand, for he went away to heaven, and angels and authorities and powers have been put under him .
