ENGLISH: Therefore, since the Christ was tormented in the flesh, take as your weapon the same kind of mind – for who has had grief in the flesh is beyond sins. Thus he can use the time that remains of his life in the flesh, no more for the wishes of men, but for God's will.
QUENYA: Therefore, since the Christ was tormented in the flesh, take as your weapon the same kind of mind – for who has had grief in the flesh is beyond sins. Thus he can use the time that remains of his life in the flesh, no more for the wishes of men, but for God's will.

ENGLISH: For you have had sufficient time in the past having such a life that people of the nations choose, walking in loose behavior, in lust, drinking wine in abundance, having wild parties, overdrinking, and worshiping idols.
QUENYA: For you have had sufficient time in the past having such a life that people of the nations choose, walking in loose behavior, in lust, drinking wine in abundance, having wild parties, overdrinking, and worshiping idols.

ENGLISH: Now they are filled with wonder, since you do no more run with them in this stream of filthy behavior, and they talk to you with scorn.
QUENYA: Now they are filled with wonder, since you do no more run with them in this stream of filthy behavior, and they talk to you with scorn.

ENGLISH: But these people will answer concerning this to that is ready to judge the living and the dead.
QUENYA: But these people will answer concerning this to that is ready to judge the living and the dead.

ENGLISH: Therefore the gospel was brought also to dead ones, for them to be judged in the flesh, in the manner of Men, but for them to have life in the spirit, in the manner of God.
QUENYA: Therefore the gospel was brought also to dead ones, for them to be judged in the flesh, in the manner of Men, but for them to have life in the spirit, in the manner of God.

ENGLISH: But the end of all things has come near. Therefore be in health of mind and keep your keenness of perception, in order to pray.
QUENYA: But the end of all things has come near. Therefore be in health of mind and keep your keenness of perception, in order to pray.

ENGLISH: Above all things, love one another with a profound love, since love covers a host of sins.
QUENYA: Above all things, love one another with a profound love, since love covers a host of sins.

ENGLISH: Receive others into your houses, not grumbling.
QUENYA: Receive others into your houses, not grumbling.

ENGLISH: Since everyone among you has received a gift, use it while you serve one another, in various graces.
QUENYA: Since everyone among you has received a gift, use it while you serve one another, in various graces.

ENGLISH: If anyone speaks, may he speak as if his sayings were God's words. If anyone serves, may he serve as if by the strenght that God gives; thus Gud will receive glory in all things, by Jesus Christ, who has the glroy and the might forever and ever. Amen!
QUENYA: If anyone speaks, may he speak as if his sayings were God's words. If anyone serves, may he serve as if by the strenght that God gives; thus Gud will receive glory in all things, by Jesus Christ, who has the glroy and the might forever and ever. Amen!

ENGLISH: Beloved ones, do not be in wonder about the fire that happens among you to test you, as if a strange thing has happened to you.
QUENYA: Beloved ones, do not be in wonder about the fire that happens among you to test you, as if a strange thing has happened to you.

ENGLISH: On the contrary, have joy since you have a part in the torments of the Christ, for you to be happy beyond measure also at the revelation of his glory.
QUENYA: On the contrary, have joy since you have a part in the torments of the Christ, for you to be happy beyond measure also at the revelation of his glory.

ENGLISH: If you receive scorn because of Christ's name, happy you are, since the spirit of glory, indeed the spirit of God, lies upon you!
QUENYA: If you receive scorn because of Christ's name, happy you are, since the spirit of glory, indeed the spirit of God, lies upon you!

ENGLISH: But may no one among you have difficulty because he has done murder or theft or evil or has troubled others concerning their own affairs.
QUENYA: But may no one among you have difficulty because he has done murder or theft or evil or has troubled others concerning their own affairs.

ENGLISH: But if he has difficulty since he is a Christian, may he not be shamed, but may he praise God about this name!
QUENYA: But if he has difficulty since he is a Christian, may he not be shamed, but may he praise God about this name!

ENGLISH: For the time has come when the judgement will be begun from God's house. If it is begun from us, what will be the end of those who are not obedient to the gospel of God?
QUENYA: For the time has come when the judgement will be begun from God's house. If it is begun from us, what will be the end of those who are not obedient to the gospel of God?

ENGLISH: «For if the righteous man is saved with difficulty, what will happen to the one hostile to God and to the sinner?»
QUENYA: «For if the righteous man is saved with difficulty, what will happen to the one hostile to God and to the sinner?»

ENGLISH: Thus, may those who have difficulty since they heed God's will, put their souls in his hand while they do good.
QUENYA: Thus, may those who have difficulty since they heed God's will, put their souls in his hand while they do good.

ENGLISH: Therefore, to the elders among you I give this urging – for I as well am an older man together with you, and a witness to the torments of the Christ, a person who has a share in the glory that will be revealed:
QUENYA: Therefore, to the elders among you I give this urging – for I as well am an older man together with you, and a witness to the torments of the Christ, a person who has a share in the glory that will be revealed:

ENGLISH: Be shepherds of the flock of God under your patronage, not by compulsion, but by will, not in order to receive unjust gain, but with a burning spirit,
QUENYA: Be shepherds of the flock of God under your patronage, not by compulsion, but by will, not in order to receive unjust gain, but with a burning spirit,

ENGLISH: not as if you rule the people under your patronage, but by being examples to the flock.
QUENYA: not as if you rule the people under your patronage, but by being examples to the flock.

ENGLISH: And when the Chief Shepherd shall be revealed, you will receive the glorious crown which is not fading.
QUENYA: And when the Chief Shepherd shall be revealed, you will receive the glorious crown which is not fading.

ENGLISH: In the same manner, you young ones, subject yourselves to the elders. But carry as your belt, all among you, lowliness of mind, one towards the other, for God stands against the haughty ones, but to people that humble themselves he gives grace.
QUENYA: In the same manner, you young ones, subject yourselves to the elders. But carry as your belt, all among you, lowliness of mind, one towards the other, for God stands against the haughty ones, but to people that humble themselves he gives grace.

ENGLISH: Therefore humble yourselves under God's mighty hand, for him to make you exalted when the time comes.
QUENYA: Therefore humble yourselves under God's mighty hand, for him to make you exalted when the time comes.

ENGLISH: Throw your every fear at him, for you are important to him.
QUENYA: Throw your every fear at him, for you are important to him.

ENGLISH: Your enemy, the Devil, walks to and from seeking people that he can devour.
QUENYA: Your enemy, the Devil, walks to and from seeking people that he can devour.

ENGLISH: But stand against him, firm in the faith, knowing that your brotherhood endures the same difficulties in the whole world.
QUENYA: But stand against him, firm in the faith, knowing that your brotherhood endures the same difficulties in the whole world.

ENGLISH: But, when you have had difficulty for a short time, the God of all grace, who called you to his everlasting glory by Christ, will himself renew you. He will make you firm, he will make you strong.
QUENYA: But, when you have had difficulty for a short time, the God of all grace, who called you to his everlasting glory by Christ, will himself renew you. He will make you firm, he will make you strong.

ENGLISH: To him be the might forever, amen!
QUENYA: To him be the might forever, amen!

ENGLISH: Through Silvanus, whom I count as a faithful brother, I have written in few words, urging and witnessing that this is the true grace of God; stand firm in it.
QUENYA: Through Silvanus, whom I count as a faithful brother, I have written in few words, urging and witnessing that this is the true grace of God; stand firm in it.

ENGLISH: who is in Babel , chosen with yourselves, greets you, and so does Mark my son.
QUENYA: who is in Babel , chosen with yourselves, greets you, and so does Mark my son.

ENGLISH: Greet one another with a kiss of love! May all among you have peace in Christ!
QUENYA: Greet one another with a kiss of love! May all among you have peace in Christ!

ENGLISH: Paul and Silvanus and Timothy to the congregation in Thessalonica, in God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ: May you have grace and peace!
QUENYA: Paul and Silvanus and Timothy to the congregation in Thessalonica, in God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ: May you have grace and peace!

ENGLISH: We always give thanks to God when we recall you in our prayers, ever
QUENYA: We always give thanks to God when we recall you in our prayers, ever

ENGLISH: recalling your faithful work and your loving toil and your steadfastness in the hope that you have in our Lord, Jesus Christ, before our God and Father.
QUENYA: recalling your faithful work and your loving toil and your steadfastness in the hope that you have in our Lord, Jesus Christ, before our God and Father.

ENGLISH: For we know, brothers loved by God, how you are chosen,
QUENYA: For we know, brothers loved by God, how you are chosen,

ENGLISH: and among you the gospel that we brought was not only by words, but it came with power and Holy Spirit and made you fully certain about it, as you know how we behaved among you for your good.
QUENYA: and among you the gospel that we brought was not only by words, but it came with power and Holy Spirit and made you fully certain about it, as you know how we behaved among you for your good.

ENGLISH: For you followed in our path and in the Lord's path, receiving the word in harsh tribulation, having joy by Holy Spirit.
QUENYA: For you followed in our path and in the Lord's path, receiving the word in harsh tribulation, having joy by Holy Spirit.

ENGLISH: Thus you were made an example for all that believe in Macedonia and Achaia.
QUENYA: Thus you were made an example for all that believe in Macedonia and Achaia.

ENGLISH: For from you the Lord's word has been made known, not in Macedonia and Achaia alone, but to every place your faith in God has gone out, and so we not not have need of saying a single thing.
QUENYA: For from you the Lord's word has been made known, not in Macedonia and Achaia alone, but to every place your faith in God has gone out, and so we not not have need of saying a single thing.

ENGLISH: For they themselves are telling how we first came to you, and how you turned yourselves to God from the idols, to be servants for a living and true God,
QUENYA: For they themselves are telling how we first came to you, and how you turned yourselves to God from the idols, to be servants for a living and true God,

ENGLISH: and to look forward to the coming from heaven of his Son, whom he raised from dead: Jesus, who delivers us from the coming wrath.
QUENYA: and to look forward to the coming from heaven of his Son, whom he raised from dead: Jesus, who delivers us from the coming wrath.

ENGLISH: For you know, brothers, how our coming to you was not for nothing.
QUENYA: For you know, brothers, how our coming to you was not for nothing.

ENGLISH: But after suffering violence in Philippi, as you know, we received boldness from God to speak to you God's gospel, although by a difficult fight.
QUENYA: But after suffering violence in Philippi, as you know, we received boldness from God to speak to you God's gospel, although by a difficult fight.

ENGLISH: For the encouragement which we give does not come from errror or from uncleanness or by a lie,
QUENYA: For the encouragement which we give does not come from errror or from uncleanness or by a lie,

ENGLISH: but as we have been tested by God and found worthy to receive the gospel into our keeping, so we speak, not to please men, but God who tests our heart.
QUENYA: but as we have been tested by God and found worthy to receive the gospel into our keeping, so we speak, not to please men, but God who tests our heart.

ENGLISH: For as you know, we have not ever spoken with smooth words, or with a hidden greedy desire; God is witness!
QUENYA: For as you know, we have not ever spoken with smooth words, or with a hidden greedy desire; God is witness!

ENGLISH: Furthemore, we have not sought glory from men, not from you or from others,
QUENYA: Furthemore, we have not sought glory from men, not from you or from others,

ENGLISH: though it would have been possible for us to be a heavy burden as Christ's apostles.
QUENYA: though it would have been possible for us to be a heavy burden as Christ's apostles.

ENGLISH: On the contrary, we were gentle among you, as when a nursing mother behaves lovingly towards her own children.
QUENYA: On the contrary, we were gentle among you, as when a nursing mother behaves lovingly towards her own children.

ENGLISH: Therefore, since you are dear to us, we thought well about giving you a part, not in God's gospel alone, but also in our own soul, since you have become dear to us.
QUENYA: Therefore, since you are dear to us, we thought well about giving you a part, not in God's gospel alone, but also in our own soul, since you have become dear to us.

ENGLISH: For you recall, brothers, our work and our toil. Working night and day, not to be a burden upon anyone among you, we made known to you God's gospel.
QUENYA: For you recall, brothers, our work and our toil. Working night and day, not to be a burden upon anyone among you, we made known to you God's gospel.

ENGLISH: You are witnesses, like God is, how holy and just and perfect we were among you who believe.
QUENYA: You are witnesses, like God is, how holy and just and perfect we were among you who believe.

ENGLISH: Thus you know well how we encouraged everyone among you, like a father encouraging his children,
QUENYA: Thus you know well how we encouraged everyone among you, like a father encouraging his children,

ENGLISH: comforting you and witnessing to you, for you to walk worthily for God who calls you into his own kingdom and his glory.
QUENYA: comforting you and witnessing to you, for you to walk worthily for God who calls you into his own kingdom and his glory.

ENGLISH: And therefore we also give God thanks continually, for when you got God's word which you heard from us, you received it not like men's word, but like that which truly it is: as God's word, which also works in you that believe.
QUENYA: And therefore we also give God thanks continually, for when you got God's word which you heard from us, you received it not like men's word, but like that which truly it is: as God's word, which also works in you that believe.

ENGLISH: For you have followed, brothers, in the path of the congregations of God which are in Judea in Jesus Christ, for you as well have suffered from people of your own nation the same things that also they suffer from the Jews,
QUENYA: For you have followed, brothers, in the path of the congregations of God which are in Judea in Jesus Christ, for you as well have suffered from people of your own nation the same things that also they suffer from the Jews,

ENGLISH: that killed the Lord Jesus and the prophets alike, and persecuted us. Furthermore, they fail to please God, but they stand against the good of all men,
QUENYA: that killed the Lord Jesus and the prophets alike, and persecuted us. Furthermore, they fail to please God, but they stand against the good of all men,

ENGLISH: since they stop us from speaking to people of the nations for their salvation, and so they always fill the measure of their sins. But in the end the wrath has come upon them.
QUENYA: since they stop us from speaking to people of the nations for their salvation, and so they always fill the measure of their sins. But in the end the wrath has come upon them.

ENGLISH: But we, brothers, when you were away from us for a short time – in person, not in heart – we tried with still greater vigour to see your face, by a great desire.
QUENYA: But we, brothers, when you were away from us for a short time – in person, not in heart – we tried with still greater vigour to see your face, by a great desire.

ENGLISH: For this reason we wanted to come to you – indeed I, Paul – at one time and two alike, but Satan stopped us.
QUENYA: For this reason we wanted to come to you – indeed I, Paul – at one time and two alike, but Satan stopped us.

ENGLISH: And what is our hope or our joy or the crown by which we praise ourselves? Is that not you, before our Lord, Jesus, at his return?
QUENYA: And what is our hope or our joy or the crown by which we praise ourselves? Is that not you, before our Lord, Jesus, at his return?

ENGLISH: For you are our glory and our joy!
QUENYA: For you are our glory and our joy!

ENGLISH: Therefore, when it was not possible for us to bear it more, we made the choice of being left in Athens, alone.
QUENYA: Therefore, when it was not possible for us to bear it more, we made the choice of being left in Athens, alone.

ENGLISH: For we sent Timothy, who is our brother and who with us is God's servant in the gospel of Christ, for him to make you firm and to urge you concerning your faith,
QUENYA: For we sent Timothy, who is our brother and who with us is God's servant in the gospel of Christ, for him to make you firm and to urge you concerning your faith,

ENGLISH: to stop anyone from being pulled away by these tribulations. For you know that this thing is destined for us .
QUENYA: to stop anyone from being pulled away by these tribulations. For you know that this thing is destined for us .

ENGLISH: Indeed also when we were with you we told you beforehand that we were going to suffer tribulation, as has also happened and you know.
QUENYA: Indeed also when we were with you we told you beforehand that we were going to suffer tribulation, as has also happened and you know.

ENGLISH: Indeed for this reason, when for me it was not possible to bear it more, I sent to know your faithfulness. My fear was that perhaps the Tempter has tempted you in this or that manner, and our toil was for nothing.
QUENYA: Indeed for this reason, when for me it was not possible to bear it more, I sent to know your faithfulness. My fear was that perhaps the Tempter has tempted you in this or that manner, and our toil was for nothing.

ENGLISH: But now Timothy has come to us from you, and he has given us the god news about your faithfulness and your love, and about how you have a good memory of ourselves, always longing to see us, like we long for you.
QUENYA: But now Timothy has come to us from you, and he has given us the god news about your faithfulness and your love, and about how you have a good memory of ourselves, always longing to see us, like we long for you.

ENGLISH: Therefore, brothers, we have been comforted concerning you by your faithfulness, in all our need and our tribulation.
QUENYA: Therefore, brothers, we have been comforted concerning you by your faithfulness, in all our need and our tribulation.

ENGLISH: For now we are alive, if you stand firm in the Lord.
QUENYA: For now we are alive, if you stand firm in the Lord.

ENGLISH: For what thanks is it possible for us to give to God about you, about the whole joy by which we are happy on your behalf before our God,
QUENYA: For what thanks is it possible for us to give to God about you, about the whole joy by which we are happy on your behalf before our God,

ENGLISH: when at night and at day, with the greatest vigour, we are making petitions to see your face and to fill which your faith lack?
QUENYA: when at night and at day, with the greatest vigour, we are making petitions to see your face and to fill which your faith lack?

ENGLISH: Now may our God and our Father himself grant us a straight path to you!
QUENYA: Now may our God and our Father himself grant us a straight path to you!

ENGLISH: Furthermore, may the Lord cause you to grow and have abundant love one for the other and for all, as also we have love for you,
QUENYA: Furthermore, may the Lord cause you to grow and have abundant love one for the other and for all, as also we have love for you,

ENGLISH: to make your heart firm, without spot in holiness before our God and our Father at the return of our Lord, Jesus, with all his holy ones. Amen!
QUENYA: to make your heart firm, without spot in holiness before our God and our Father at the return of our Lord, Jesus, with all his holy ones. Amen!

ENGLISH: Finally, brothers, we ask of you and encourage you by the Lord Jesus: As you received from us the knowledge about how it is necessary for you to behave and to please God, so you indeed behave, but do it more fully.
QUENYA: Finally, brothers, we ask of you and encourage you by the Lord Jesus: As you received from us the knowledge about how it is necessary for you to behave and to please God, so you indeed behave, but do it more fully.

ENGLISH: For you know the exhortations that we gave you through the Lord Jesus.
QUENYA: For you know the exhortations that we gave you through the Lord Jesus.

ENGLISH: For so is God's will: That you will be hallowed – that you will keep yourselves away from fornication.
QUENYA: For so is God's will: That you will be hallowed – that you will keep yourselves away from fornication.

ENGLISH: Thus it is necessary for everyone among you to possess his own vessel, in sanctification and in glory,
QUENYA: Thus it is necessary for everyone among you to possess his own vessel, in sanctification and in glory,

ENGLISH: not in greedy lust, as have also the nations that do not know God.
QUENYA: not in greedy lust, as have also the nations that do not know God.

ENGLISH: It is necessary that no one crosses the line and does unjustice to his brother in this matter, for the Lord shall avenge all such things, as we have told you previously and have witnessed to you.
QUENYA: It is necessary that no one crosses the line and does unjustice to his brother in this matter, for the Lord shall avenge all such things, as we have told you previously and have witnessed to you.

ENGLISH: For God did not call us to uncleanness, but in sanctification.
QUENYA: For God did not call us to uncleanness, but in sanctification.

ENGLISH: Therefore, who does not give heed does not fail to give heed to man, but to God, who also sets his Holy Spirit in you.
QUENYA: Therefore, who does not give heed does not fail to give heed to man, but to God, who also sets his Holy Spirit in you.

ENGLISH: But concerning brotherly love you do not have need that I will write to you, for you are instructed by God that you are to love one another,
QUENYA: But concerning brotherly love you do not have need that I will write to you, for you are instructed by God that you are to love one another,

ENGLISH: and indeed you do so, loving the brothers in all of Macedonia. But we encourage you, brothers, that you will do so more fully,
QUENYA: and indeed you do so, loving the brothers in all of Macedonia. But we encourage you, brothers, that you will do so more fully,

ENGLISH: and that you will make your goal that you will have a quiet life, heeding your own matters and working with your own hands , as we commanded you.
QUENYA: and that you will make your goal that you will have a quiet life, heeding your own matters and working with your own hands , as we commanded you.

ENGLISH: Thus you can walk in a proper manner, as seen by people on the outside, and in need of nothing.
QUENYA: Thus you can walk in a proper manner, as seen by people on the outside, and in need of nothing.

ENGLISH: But brothers, we do not wish that you are to be ignorant about the slumbering ones . Thus would will not have the same grief that the others have, they that do not have hope.
QUENYA: But brothers, we do not wish that you are to be ignorant about the slumbering ones . Thus would will not have the same grief that the others have, they that do not have hope.

ENGLISH: For if we believe that Jesus died and rose again, God will also bring with him in the same manner that have died through Jesus.
QUENYA: For if we believe that Jesus died and rose again, God will also bring with him in the same manner that have died through Jesus.

ENGLISH: For this matter we speak to you by God's word: We, the living ones that remain until the Lord's coming, will by no means come before that have died,
QUENYA: For this matter we speak to you by God's word: We, the living ones that remain until the Lord's coming, will by no means come before that have died,

ENGLISH: for the Lord himself will come down from heaven with a cry, with the voice of a chief angel and having the trumpet of God, and the dead ones in Christ will rise first.
QUENYA: for the Lord himself will come down from heaven with a cry, with the voice of a chief angel and having the trumpet of God, and the dead ones in Christ will rise first.

ENGLISH: Thereafter we, the living ones who remain, will be snatched away with them into the coulds to meet the Lord in the air, and thus we will always be with the Lord.
QUENYA: Thereafter we, the living ones who remain, will be snatched away with them into the coulds to meet the Lord in the air, and thus we will always be with the Lord.

ENGLISH: Therefore comfort one another with these words.
QUENYA: Therefore comfort one another with these words.

ENGLISH: But concerning the times and moments, brothers, you do not have need that anyone writes to you.
QUENYA: But concerning the times and moments, brothers, you do not have need that anyone writes to you.

ENGLISH: For you know well that the Lord's day will come like a thief in the night.
QUENYA: For you know well that the Lord's day will come like a thief in the night.

ENGLISH: When they say: “Peace and security!”, then destruction will with a sudden twist come upon them, just as when the sharp pain seizes a woman heavy with child before she bears her child, and they will by no means escape.
QUENYA: When they say: “Peace and security!”, then destruction will with a sudden twist come upon them, just as when the sharp pain seizes a woman heavy with child before she bears her child, and they will by no means escape.

ENGLISH: But you, brothers, are not in the dark, and so the day will not fall upon you like a thief,
QUENYA: But you, brothers, are not in the dark, and so the day will not fall upon you like a thief,

ENGLISH: for all among you are sons of light and sons of day. We are not of the night or of darkness.
QUENYA: for all among you are sons of light and sons of day. We are not of the night or of darkness.

ENGLISH: Therefore, let us not be asleep like the others, but let us be awake and keep our keenness of perception.
QUENYA: Therefore, let us not be asleep like the others, but let us be awake and keep our keenness of perception.

ENGLISH: For the slumbering ones are slumbering at night, and that fill themselves with wine drink wine at night.
QUENYA: For the slumbering ones are slumbering at night, and that fill themselves with wine drink wine at night.

ENGLISH: But we that are of the day, let us keep our keenness of perception, bearing the breastplate of faith and of love, and as a helmet, the hope of salvation.
QUENYA: But we that are of the day, let us keep our keenness of perception, bearing the breastplate of faith and of love, and as a helmet, the hope of salvation.

ENGLISH: For God did not reserve us for anger, but for our receiving salvation through our Lord, Jesus Christ
QUENYA: For God did not reserve us for anger, but for our receiving salvation through our Lord, Jesus Christ

ENGLISH: who died for us. Thus, living ones or dead ones, we shall live with him.
QUENYA: who died for us. Thus, living ones or dead ones, we shall live with him.

ENGLISH: Therefore comfort one another with these words, and build up one another, as indeed you are doing.
QUENYA: Therefore comfort one another with these words, and build up one another, as indeed you are doing.

ENGLISH: But we ask of you, brothers, give heed to those that toil among you and and lead you and show you the way.
QUENYA: But we ask of you, brothers, give heed to those that toil among you and and lead you and show you the way.

ENGLISH: Have great awe for them, in love, because of their work. Keep peace among yourselves.
QUENYA: Have great awe for them, in love, because of their work. Keep peace among yourselves.

ENGLISH: But we urge you, brothers: Show the right path to the errant ones, speak with comfort to that lack courage, help the ones that are weak, have patience towards all.
QUENYA: But we urge you, brothers: Show the right path to the errant ones, speak with comfort to that lack courage, help the ones that are weak, have patience towards all.

ENGLISH: See that nobody pays for evil with evil, but always pursue what is good, one for the other, and for all.
QUENYA: See that nobody pays for evil with evil, but always pursue what is good, one for the other, and for all.

ENGLISH: Always have joy.
QUENYA: Always have joy.

ENGLISH: Pray ever.
QUENYA: Pray ever.

ENGLISH: About everything give thanks, for that is God's will in Jesus Christ for you.
QUENYA: About everything give thanks, for that is God's will in Jesus Christ for you.

ENGLISH: Do not extinguish the Spirit.
QUENYA: Do not extinguish the Spirit.

ENGLISH: Do not look down on speaking like a prophet.
QUENYA: Do not look down on speaking like a prophet.

ENGLISH: Test all things; keep that are good.
QUENYA: Test all things; keep that are good.

ENGLISH: Keep yourselves away from every kind of evil.
QUENYA: Keep yourselves away from every kind of evil.

ENGLISH: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely! May your spirit and your soul and your body be kept in a perfect manner at the return of our Lord, Jesus Christ.
QUENYA: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely! May your spirit and your soul and your body be kept in a perfect manner at the return of our Lord, Jesus Christ.

ENGLISH: He who calls you is faithful – who will also do it.
QUENYA: He who calls you is faithful – who will also do it.

ENGLISH: Brothers, pray also for us!
QUENYA: Brothers, pray also for us!

ENGLISH: Greet all the brothers with a holy kiss!
QUENYA: Greet all the brothers with a holy kiss!

ENGLISH: I command you by oath, in the Lord: Read out this letter to all the brothers.
QUENYA: I command you by oath, in the Lord: Read out this letter to all the brothers.

ENGLISH: May the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you.
QUENYA: May the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you.

ENGLISH: Paul – apostle of Jesus Christ, as commanded by God our Father and Christ Jesus our hope,
QUENYA: Paul – apostle of Jesus Christ, as commanded by God our Father and Christ Jesus our hope,

ENGLISH: to Timotheus, true child in the faith: May be grace, mercy, peace from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord.
QUENYA: to Timotheus, true child in the faith: May be grace, mercy, peace from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord.

ENGLISH: As I exhorted you to remain in Ephesus when I was to go to Macedonia, so I do now, for you to command some people that they are not to teach strange teaching
QUENYA: As I exhorted you to remain in Ephesus when I was to go to Macedonia, so I do now, for you to command some people that they are not to teach strange teaching

ENGLISH: and that they are not to heed fables and genealogies without end, which lead to inquiries before they lead to a distribution of anything by God in the faith.
QUENYA: and that they are not to heed fables and genealogies without end, which lead to inquiries before they lead to a distribution of anything by God in the faith.

ENGLISH: The aim of this charge is love out of a pure heart and out of a good conscience without hypocrisy.
QUENYA: The aim of this charge is love out of a pure heart and out of a good conscience without hypocrisy.

ENGLISH: But turning themselves from these things some have been turned to empty speaking ,
QUENYA: But turning themselves from these things some have been turned to empty speaking ,

ENGLISH: wishing to be teachers of law, but failing to understand both the things of which they are speaking and the ones of which they talk with bold words.
QUENYA: wishing to be teachers of law, but failing to understand both the things of which they are speaking and the ones of which they talk with bold words.

ENGLISH: We know that the Law is good, if one uses it in a regular manner,
QUENYA: We know that the Law is good, if one uses it in a regular manner,

ENGLISH: having this knowledge: It does not stand against a righteous person, but against people lawless and rebellious, godless and sinners, without love and unholy, that kill fathers and mothers, manslayers,
QUENYA: having this knowledge: It does not stand against a righteous person, but against people lawless and rebellious, godless and sinners, without love and unholy, that kill fathers and mothers, manslayers,

ENGLISH: fornicators, men that lie with men, abductors , people who lie and break their promises, and every other thing that stands against the healthy teaching
QUENYA: fornicators, men that lie with men, abductors , people who lie and break their promises, and every other thing that stands against the healthy teaching

ENGLISH: according to the glorious gospel of the happy God, which was placed in my keeping.
QUENYA: according to the glorious gospel of the happy God, which was placed in my keeping.

ENGLISH: I thank Christ Jesus, who gave me strength , since he counted me faithful and reserved me for servant-work,
QUENYA: I thank Christ Jesus, who gave me strength , since he counted me faithful and reserved me for servant-work,

ENGLISH: though formerly I was a person who blasphemed and persecuted and was violent. And yet I received mercy, since in ignorance I did so, lacking faith.
QUENYA: though formerly I was a person who blasphemed and persecuted and was violent. And yet I received mercy, since in ignorance I did so, lacking faith.

ENGLISH: But our Lord's grace was extremely abundant, with faith and love in Christ Jesus.
QUENYA: But our Lord's grace was extremely abundant, with faith and love in Christ Jesus.

ENGLISH: This saying is faithful, and worthy of being fully received: Jesus Christ came into the world to save sinners. Among them I am the most prominent.
QUENYA: This saying is faithful, and worthy of being fully received: Jesus Christ came into the world to save sinners. Among them I am the most prominent.

ENGLISH: But the reason by which I received mercy was that by me it was possible for Christ Jesus to show his patience first, making me an example of who will believe in him, thus getting eternal life.
QUENYA: But the reason by which I received mercy was that by me it was possible for Christ Jesus to show his patience first, making me an example of who will believe in him, thus getting eternal life.

ENGLISH: To the king of eternity, incorruptable, invisible, to the sole God, be honor and glory forever and ever! Amen.
QUENYA: To the king of eternity, incorruptable, invisible, to the sole God, be honor and glory forever and ever! Amen.

ENGLISH: This overseership I put on you, Timothy my child, by the predictions which led to you; thus you can by them fight in the good fight,
QUENYA: This overseership I put on you, Timothy my child, by the predictions which led to you; thus you can by them fight in the good fight,

ENGLISH: having faith and a good conscience, which some have thrown away, and the ship of their faith has been destroyed.
QUENYA: having faith and a good conscience, which some have thrown away, and the ship of their faith has been destroyed.

ENGLISH: Among them are Hymenaeus and Alexander, and I have given them into Satan's power, for them to learn by chastisement that they are not to blaspheme.
QUENYA: Among them are Hymenaeus and Alexander, and I have given them into Satan's power, for them to learn by chastisement that they are not to blaspheme.

ENGLISH: Therefore, firstly, I exhort that you make petitions, prayers, intercessions , thanksgivings, concerning all men,
QUENYA: Therefore, firstly, I exhort that you make petitions, prayers, intercessions , thanksgivings, concerning all men,

ENGLISH: concerning kings and all that are in prominent places, for them to have a life which is quiet and in peace, in all reverence and seriousness.
QUENYA: concerning kings and all that are in prominent places, for them to have a life which is quiet and in peace, in all reverence and seriousness.

ENGLISH: That is good and acceptable to God our Savior,
QUENYA: That is good and acceptable to God our Savior,

ENGLISH: who wishes that all men will be saved and will come to knowledge of the truth.
QUENYA: who wishes that all men will be saved and will come to knowledge of the truth.

ENGLISH: For there is one God, and one intermediary between God and men, Christ Jesus the man,
QUENYA: For there is one God, and one intermediary between God and men, Christ Jesus the man,

ENGLISH: who gave himself as a ransom for all: Of that it is necessary to witness in the times that we have.
QUENYA: who gave himself as a ransom for all: Of that it is necessary to witness in the times that we have.

ENGLISH: For that purpose I was appointed a preacher and an apostle – I tell the truth, I do not lie – teacher of nations, in faith and truth.
QUENYA: For that purpose I was appointed a preacher and an apostle – I tell the truth, I do not lie – teacher of nations, in faith and truth.

ENGLISH: Therefore I wish that in every place men will pray, raising faithful hands, turning themselves from wrath and quarrelings.
QUENYA: Therefore I wish that in every place men will pray, raising faithful hands, turning themselves from wrath and quarrelings.

ENGLISH: In the same manner I wish that the women will adorn themselves with well-arranged garments, in a humble manner and having soundness of mind, not arranging their hair, or with gold or with pearls or with costly garment,
QUENYA: In the same manner I wish that the women will adorn themselves with well-arranged garments, in a humble manner and having soundness of mind, not arranging their hair, or with gold or with pearls or with costly garment,

ENGLISH: but in the manner worthy of women that say about themselves that they are reverential, that is, by good deeds.
QUENYA: but in the manner worthy of women that say about themselves that they are reverential, that is, by good deeds.

ENGLISH: A woman is to learn in quiet, fully submitting herself to authority.
QUENYA: A woman is to learn in quiet, fully submitting herself to authority.

ENGLISH: I do not allow that a woman teaches, or has authority over a man; a woman will be silent.
QUENYA: I do not allow that a woman teaches, or has authority over a man; a woman will be silent.

ENGLISH: For Adam was created first, then Eve.
QUENYA: For Adam was created first, then Eve.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, Adam was not seduced, but the woman was seduced and fell into law-breaking.
QUENYA: Furthermore, Adam was not seduced, but the woman was seduced and fell into law-breaking.

ENGLISH: But she will be saved by bearing children, if they remain in faith and love and sanctification, with soundness of mind.
QUENYA: But she will be saved by bearing children, if they remain in faith and love and sanctification, with soundness of mind.

ENGLISH: Faithful the word: If anyone desires an office of overseer, he desires a good work.
QUENYA: Faithful the word: If anyone desires an office of overseer, he desires a good work.

ENGLISH: Therefore it is necessary that an overseer will be beyond suspicion, husband of a single wife, lowly in his habits, having soundness of mind, arranged , friendly to strangers, knowing instruct,
QUENYA: Therefore it is necessary that an overseer will be beyond suspicion, husband of a single wife, lowly in his habits, having soundness of mind, arranged , friendly to strangers, knowing instruct,

ENGLISH: not given to wine, not beating, but gentle, not a money-lover,
QUENYA: not given to wine, not beating, but gentle, not a money-lover,

ENGLISH: a man leading his own family, having reverent childer with every seriousness
QUENYA: a man leading his own family, having reverent childer with every seriousness

ENGLISH: (if a person does not know lead his own family, how will he oversee God's congregation?),
QUENYA: (if a person does not know lead his own family, how will he oversee God's congregation?),

ENGLISH: not a person newly-turned , or maybe he will become proud and will fall under the same judgement as the Devil.
QUENYA: not a person newly-turned , or maybe he will become proud and will fall under the same judgement as the Devil.

ENGLISH: Therefore, it is necessary that he has a good witness from people on the outside, to stop him from falling into rebuke and the Devil's snare.
QUENYA: Therefore, it is necessary that he has a good witness from people on the outside, to stop him from falling into rebuke and the Devil's snare.

ENGLISH: In the same manner it is necessary that congregation-servants will be serious, not speaking with two tongues, not giving themselves to much wine, not greedily seeking unjust gain,
QUENYA: In the same manner it is necessary that congregation-servants will be serious, not speaking with two tongues, not giving themselves to much wine, not greedily seeking unjust gain,

ENGLISH: having the mystery of the faith with a pure conscience.
QUENYA: having the mystery of the faith with a pure conscience.

ENGLISH: May they be tested first; thereafter let them be servants, being beyond suspicion.
QUENYA: May they be tested first; thereafter let them be servants, being beyond suspicion.

ENGLISH: May women in the same manner be serious, not speaking evil about others, lowly in habits, faithful in all things.
QUENYA: May women in the same manner be serious, not speaking evil about others, lowly in habits, faithful in all things.

ENGLISH: May congregation-servants be husbands of a single wife, leading their own families well.
QUENYA: May congregation-servants be husbands of a single wife, leading their own families well.

ENGLISH: For men that serve well as congregation-servants receive a good standing and great freedom of speech as concerns Christ Jesus.
QUENYA: For men that serve well as congregation-servants receive a good standing and great freedom of speech as concerns Christ Jesus.

ENGLISH: I write to you these things, though I have hope that I will come to you soon.
QUENYA: I write to you these things, though I have hope that I will come to you soon.

ENGLISH: But if I am hindered, you will know how it is necessary for you to behave in God's house, which is the congregation of the living God, pillar and support of the truth.
QUENYA: But if I am hindered, you will know how it is necessary for you to behave in God's house, which is the congregation of the living God, pillar and support of the truth.

ENGLISH: Indeed the secret of reverence is great: He was revealed in the flesh, pronounced righteous in the spirit, showed himself to angels, was preached in the nations, believed in the world, received up in glory.
QUENYA: Indeed the secret of reverence is great: He was revealed in the flesh, pronounced righteous in the spirit, showed himself to angels, was preached in the nations, believed in the world, received up in glory.

ENGLISH: But the spirit says in straight words that in last times some will fall away from the faith, heeding spirits that cause others to stray, and the teachings of demons,
QUENYA: But the spirit says in straight words that in last times some will fall away from the faith, heeding spirits that cause others to stray, and the teachings of demons,

ENGLISH: by the hypocrisy of people that speak lies, having a mark on their own conscience as if made by a hot iron.
QUENYA: by the hypocrisy of people that speak lies, having a mark on their own conscience as if made by a hot iron.

ENGLISH: They forbid that one marries and command that one turns away edibles that God created to be received with thanks by that have faith and knowledge of the truth.
QUENYA: They forbid that one marries and command that one turns away edibles that God created to be received with thanks by that have faith and knowledge of the truth.

ENGLISH: For every creature of God is good, and there is no need to turn away anything if it is received with thanksgiving,
QUENYA: For every creature of God is good, and there is no need to turn away anything if it is received with thanksgiving,

ENGLISH: for it is hallowed by God's word and by prayer.
QUENYA: for it is hallowed by God's word and by prayer.

ENGLISH: Giving these orders to the brothers you will be Christ Jesus's good servant, who thrives on the words of faith and of the good teaching which you have followed.
QUENYA: Giving these orders to the brothers you will be Christ Jesus's good servant, who thrives on the words of faith and of the good teaching which you have followed.

ENGLISH: But turn away the unholy fables of old women. But seek to be skilled in reverence!
QUENYA: But turn away the unholy fables of old women. But seek to be skilled in reverence!

ENGLISH: For making the body skilled is beneficial for a few things, but reverence is beneficial for all things, since it has a promise for this life for and the coming life alike.
QUENYA: For making the body skilled is beneficial for a few things, but reverence is beneficial for all things, since it has a promise for this life for and the coming life alike.

ENGLISH: Faithful and worthy of being fully received is that saying!
QUENYA: Faithful and worthy of being fully received is that saying!

ENGLISH: For for this purpose we labour and toil, since we have put our hope in a living God, who is a Savior of all men, of the faithful ones above all.
QUENYA: For for this purpose we labour and toil, since we have put our hope in a living God, who is a Savior of all men, of the faithful ones above all.

ENGLISH: Command them so, and teach!
QUENYA: Command them so, and teach!

ENGLISH: Do not let anyone despise your youth. On the contrary, be an example for the faithful ones in speech, in behavior, in love, in faith, in purity.
QUENYA: Do not let anyone despise your youth. On the contrary, be an example for the faithful ones in speech, in behavior, in love, in faith, in purity.

ENGLISH: Until I shall come, give heed to the reading, the comfort, the teaching.
QUENYA: Until I shall come, give heed to the reading, the comfort, the teaching.

ENGLISH: Do not fail to use the grace that is in you, given you by a prediction and by the elder's putting their hands on you.
QUENYA: Do not fail to use the grace that is in you, given you by a prediction and by the elder's putting their hands on you.

ENGLISH: Think about these things, fill your mind with them; thus all will see how you go forward.
QUENYA: Think about these things, fill your mind with them; thus all will see how you go forward.

ENGLISH: Keep your mind on yourself and on your teaching! Remain in these things, for so doing you save yourself and that listen to you alike.
QUENYA: Keep your mind on yourself and on your teaching! Remain in these things, for so doing you save yourself and that listen to you alike.

ENGLISH: Do not speak to an elderly man with harsh words. On the contrary, make an entreaty to him as to a father, to young men as to brothers, to old women as to mothers, to young women as to sisters, in all purity .
QUENYA: Do not speak to an elderly man with harsh words. On the contrary, make an entreaty to him as to a father, to young men as to brothers, to old women as to mothers, to young women as to sisters, in all purity .

ENGLISH: Honor widows that truly are widows.
QUENYA: Honor widows that truly are widows.

ENGLISH: But if there is a widow with whom there are children or children's children, let them first learn to behave with godly reverence in their own house and give a proper recompensation to their parents , for that is good in God's eyes.
QUENYA: But if there is a widow with whom there are children or children's children, let them first learn to behave with godly reverence in their own house and give a proper recompensation to their parents , for that is good in God's eyes.

ENGLISH: But who indeed is a widow and has become destitute, has put her hope in God and remains in petitions and prayers at night and at day.
QUENYA: But who indeed is a widow and has become destitute, has put her hope in God and remains in petitions and prayers at night and at day.

ENGLISH: But she who seeks her lusts is dead, though she lives.
QUENYA: But she who seeks her lusts is dead, though she lives.

ENGLISH: Therefore give these orders, to stop anyone from speaking evil about them.
QUENYA: Therefore give these orders, to stop anyone from speaking evil about them.

ENGLISH: But if anyone does not give to his own – and above all to those that are in his house – their needs, he has denied the faith and is worse than a person who does not believe.
QUENYA: But if anyone does not give to his own – and above all to those that are in his house – their needs, he has denied the faith and is worse than a person who does not believe.

ENGLISH: Put a widowed woman on the list if she has years not under sixty , wife of a single husband,
QUENYA: Put a widowed woman on the list if she has years not under sixty , wife of a single husband,

ENGLISH: a woman of whom one tells about her good deeds, if she raised children, if she received foreigners, if she washed the feet of the holy ones, if she helped persecuted ones, if she followed every good deed.
QUENYA: a woman of whom one tells about her good deeds, if she raised children, if she received foreigners, if she washed the feet of the holy ones, if she helped persecuted ones, if she followed every good deed.

ENGLISH: But turn away younger widows, for when their sexual desire draws them away from Christ, they wish to marry
QUENYA: But turn away younger widows, for when their sexual desire draws them away from Christ, they wish to marry

ENGLISH: and fall under judgement since they abandoned their first steadfastness.
QUENYA: and fall under judgement since they abandoned their first steadfastness.

ENGLISH: At the same time they also learn to be without labor, wandering from house to house, not only failing to labor, but also gossiping and inserting themselves into the affairs of others, talking about things of which there is no need to talk.
QUENYA: At the same time they also learn to be without labor, wandering from house to house, not only failing to labor, but also gossiping and inserting themselves into the affairs of others, talking about things of which there is no need to talk.

ENGLISH: Therefore I wish that these younger widows are to marry, and that they bear children and manage a home; thus who stands against us will not have a reason for speaking mockery.
QUENYA: Therefore I wish that these younger widows are to marry, and that they bear children and manage a home; thus who stands against us will not have a reason for speaking mockery.

ENGLISH: Even now some are turned to follow Satan.
QUENYA: Even now some are turned to follow Satan.

ENGLISH: If there are some widows with a believing woman, it compels for her to help them, not putting a burden on the congregation. Then the congregation can help those that indeed are widows.
QUENYA: If there are some widows with a believing woman, it compels for her to help them, not putting a burden on the congregation. Then the congregation can help those that indeed are widows.

ENGLISH: Let the elders that stand before the congregation in a good manner, be counted worthy of double honor, above all the ones that toil in speaking and teaching.
QUENYA: Let the elders that stand before the congregation in a good manner, be counted worthy of double honor, above all the ones that toil in speaking and teaching.

ENGLISH: For the scripture says: "Do not stop a bull trampling out grain, from eating", also: "He who works is worthy of his reward."
QUENYA: For the scripture says: "Do not stop a bull trampling out grain, from eating", also: "He who works is worthy of his reward."

ENGLISH: Do not count an accusation against an elder as true, if there are not two or three witnesses.
QUENYA: Do not count an accusation against an elder as true, if there are not two or three witnesses.

ENGLISH: Rebuke sinners while all are watching, to cause also the others to fear.
QUENYA: Rebuke sinners while all are watching, to cause also the others to fear.

ENGLISH: I witness before God and Jesus Christ and the chosen angels: Stick to these things without judging beforehand, doing nothing heeding faces .
QUENYA: I witness before God and Jesus Christ and the chosen angels: Stick to these things without judging beforehand, doing nothing heeding faces .

ENGLISH: Do not put your hands on anyone too soon; furthermore, do not have a share in the sins of others; keep yourself pure.
QUENYA: Do not put your hands on anyone too soon; furthermore, do not have a share in the sins of others; keep yourself pure.

ENGLISH: Do not drink water more, but use a small amount of wine, for your belly and for the illnesses that you frequently suffer.
QUENYA: Do not drink water more, but use a small amount of wine, for your belly and for the illnesses that you frequently suffer.

ENGLISH: Some men's sins are easy to see, and go before them to judgement. The sins of some other ones also follow.
QUENYA: Some men's sins are easy to see, and go before them to judgement. The sins of some other ones also follow.

ENGLISH: In the same manner the good deeds are easily seen, and that are not so, are still impossible to hide.
QUENYA: In the same manner the good deeds are easily seen, and that are not so, are still impossible to hide.

ENGLISH: Concerning all that are servants under a yoke: Let them count their lords worthy of every honor, to stop anyone from speaking mockery about God's name and the teaching.
QUENYA: Concerning all that are servants under a yoke: Let them count their lords worthy of every honor, to stop anyone from speaking mockery about God's name and the teaching.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, may those that have believing husbands not despise them since they are brothers. On the contrary, it is necessary for them to be better servants, since the ones that are helped by their good labor are people that believe and are beloved.Teach these things and so urge!
QUENYA: Furthermore, may those that have believing husbands not despise them since they are brothers. On the contrary, it is necessary for them to be better servants, since the ones that are helped by their good labor are people that believe and are beloved.Teach these things and so urge!

ENGLISH: If anyone teaches another teaching and does not receive the healthful words of Jesus Christ our lord or the reverent teaching,
QUENYA: If anyone teaches another teaching and does not receive the healthful words of Jesus Christ our lord or the reverent teaching,

ENGLISH: he has a swollen mind, understanding nothing, but being sick about questions and quarrels about words. From these things come envies, disputes, mockeries, wicked suspicions,
QUENYA: he has a swollen mind, understanding nothing, but being sick about questions and quarrels about words. From these things come envies, disputes, mockeries, wicked suspicions,

ENGLISH: continual fights among men corrupted in their minds, from whom the truth has been stolen, since they think about reverence as a path to gain.
QUENYA: continual fights among men corrupted in their minds, from whom the truth has been stolen, since they think about reverence as a path to gain.

ENGLISH: Reverence is indeed a path to great gain, together with sufficiency .
QUENYA: Reverence is indeed a path to great gain, together with sufficiency .

ENGLISH: For we have brought nothing into the world; in the same manner we can carry nothing out of it.
QUENYA: For we have brought nothing into the world; in the same manner we can carry nothing out of it.

ENGLISH: Therefore, if we have food and clothes, let them suffice for us.
QUENYA: Therefore, if we have food and clothes, let them suffice for us.

ENGLISH: But those who want to be rich fall into temptation and a snare and many insensible and hurtful desires, which pull men down into undoing and downfall.
QUENYA: But those who want to be rich fall into temptation and a snare and many insensible and hurtful desires, which pull men down into undoing and downfall.

ENGLISH: For the love of money is a root of all evil things, and seeking this love some have been caused to stray from the faith and have pierced themselves with many pains.
QUENYA: For the love of money is a root of all evil things, and seeking this love some have been caused to stray from the faith and have pierced themselves with many pains.

ENGLISH: But you, man of God, flee from these things! But pursue righteousness, reverence, love, steadfastness, gentleness!
QUENYA: But you, man of God, flee from these things! But pursue righteousness, reverence, love, steadfastness, gentleness!

ENGLISH: Fight the good fight of faith, seize the eternal life to which you were called and of which you made a good confession before many witnesses.
QUENYA: Fight the good fight of faith, seize the eternal life to which you were called and of which you made a good confession before many witnesses.

ENGLISH: Before God, who gives life to all, and before Jesus Christ, who witnessed to Pontius Pilate the good testimony, I command you:
QUENYA: Before God, who gives life to all, and before Jesus Christ, who witnessed to Pontius Pilate the good testimony, I command you:

ENGLISH: Keep you the commandment in a perfect manner of which nobody can speak evil, until the revelation of Jesus Christ our Lord.
QUENYA: Keep you the commandment in a perfect manner of which nobody can speak evil, until the revelation of Jesus Christ our Lord.

ENGLISH: This relevation the happy and sole Majesty will show in his proper time, the King of who rule as kings and the Lord of who rule as lords,
QUENYA: This relevation the happy and sole Majesty will show in his proper time, the King of who rule as kings and the Lord of who rule as lords,

ENGLISH: the sole Person having immortal life, who dwells in a light that no one can come to, whom no one aming men has seen or can see. To him be the honor and power forever! Amen.
QUENYA: the sole Person having immortal life, who dwells in a light that no one can come to, whom no one aming men has seen or can see. To him be the honor and power forever! Amen.

ENGLISH: Command who are rich in this age: Do not be haughty and do not put hope in riches, which are not steadfast, but in God, who gives us a rich measure of all things for our joy,
QUENYA: Command who are rich in this age: Do not be haughty and do not put hope in riches, which are not steadfast, but in God, who gives us a rich measure of all things for our joy,

ENGLISH: Let them labour for good, for them to be rich in good deeds, happy in giving, ready to distribute what they have,
QUENYA: Let them labour for good, for them to be rich in good deeds, happy in giving, ready to distribute what they have,

ENGLISH: gathering for themselves a good foundation for the time that shall come, in order to seize the real life.
QUENYA: gathering for themselves a good foundation for the time that shall come, in order to seize the real life.

ENGLISH: O Timothy, watch which has been given into your custody, and turn yourself away from the unholy and empty chattings, and from the contrary sayings of the "knowledge" called so falsely .
QUENYA: O Timothy, watch which has been given into your custody, and turn yourself away from the unholy and empty chattings, and from the contrary sayings of the "knowledge" called so falsely .

ENGLISH: For saying that they have such "knowledge", some have turned themselves away from the faith.May the grace of God be with you!
QUENYA: For saying that they have such "knowledge", some have turned themselves away from the faith.May the grace of God be with you!

ENGLISH: Paul, apostle of Jesus Christ through God's will, and Timothy our brother, to God's congregation which is in Corith, with all the holy ones that are in all of Achaia:
QUENYA: Paul, apostle of Jesus Christ through God's will, and Timothy our brother, to God's congregation which is in Corith, with all the holy ones that are in all of Achaia:

ENGLISH: Grace to you, and peace from God our Father and from the Lord Jesus Christ.
QUENYA: Grace to you, and peace from God our Father and from the Lord Jesus Christ.

ENGLISH: May God and the Father of Jesus Christ our Lord be blessed, the Father of mercies and God of all comfort,
QUENYA: May God and the Father of Jesus Christ our Lord be blessed, the Father of mercies and God of all comfort,

ENGLISH: who comforts us in our tribulation. Therefore it is possible for us to comfort the people that suffer every kind of tribulation, with the comfort with which we are comforted by God.
QUENYA: who comforts us in our tribulation. Therefore it is possible for us to comfort the people that suffer every kind of tribulation, with the comfort with which we are comforted by God.

ENGLISH: For as the Christ's sufferings are abundant in us, so the comfort that we receive is also abundant by the Christ.
QUENYA: For as the Christ's sufferings are abundant in us, so the comfort that we receive is also abundant by the Christ.

ENGLISH: If we have tribulation, that is for our comfort and for our salvation; or if we are comforted, that is for our comfort that is working to cause you to be steadfast in the same sufferings which we as well suffer.
QUENYA: If we have tribulation, that is for our comfort and for our salvation; or if we are comforted, that is for our comfort that is working to cause you to be steadfast in the same sufferings which we as well suffer.

ENGLISH: For thus our hope for you is firm, since we know that as you have a part in the tribulations, so you will also have a part in the comfort.
QUENYA: For thus our hope for you is firm, since we know that as you have a part in the tribulations, so you will also have a part in the comfort.

ENGLISH: For we do not wish that you lack knowledge, brothers, about the tribulation that happened to us in Asia – that we were broken by a burden beyond our strength, until we thought that there was no way of saving our life.
QUENYA: For we do not wish that you lack knowledge, brothers, about the tribulation that happened to us in Asia – that we were broken by a burden beyond our strength, until we thought that there was no way of saving our life.

ENGLISH: Indeed we felt in our heart that we were under a judgement of death, but that happened to cause us to seek our safety, not in ourselves, but in God who raises the dead.
QUENYA: Indeed we felt in our heart that we were under a judgement of death, but that happened to cause us to seek our safety, not in ourselves, but in God who raises the dead.

ENGLISH: From death-peril that great he delivered us and will he deliver us. In him we have placed our hope that he will deliver us again.
QUENYA: From death-peril that great he delivered us and will he deliver us. In him we have placed our hope that he will deliver us again.

ENGLISH: You as well can help with your petition for us, and so numerous ones will give thanks on our behalf, for the grace given us as answer to many prayers.
QUENYA: You as well can help with your petition for us, and so numerous ones will give thanks on our behalf, for the grace given us as answer to many prayers.

ENGLISH: For concerning this we praise ourselves: Our conscience witnesses that in a holy manner and sincerely to God, not with wisdom of flesh but by grace, we have behaved in the world – above everything to you.
QUENYA: For concerning this we praise ourselves: Our conscience witnesses that in a holy manner and sincerely to God, not with wisdom of flesh but by grace, we have behaved in the world – above everything to you.

ENGLISH: For we write to you nothing except the things that you can read and understand. I have the hope that you will fully understand them until the end,
QUENYA: For we write to you nothing except the things that you can read and understand. I have the hope that you will fully understand them until the end,

ENGLISH: as you have understoood in part, allowing you to praise yourselves concerning us, as we can do concerning you, on the day of the Lord Jesus.
QUENYA: as you have understoood in part, allowing you to praise yourselves concerning us, as we can do concerning you, on the day of the Lord Jesus.

ENGLISH: Being certain of this I wished beforehand to come to you, to give you a second reason for joy.
QUENYA: Being certain of this I wished beforehand to come to you, to give you a second reason for joy.

ENGLISH: After pausing with you I wished to go to Macedonia, and returning from Macedonia, to be helped by you at the start of my journey to Judea.
QUENYA: After pausing with you I wished to go to Macedonia, and returning from Macedonia, to be helped by you at the start of my journey to Judea.

ENGLISH: Wishing that, surely I was not too free? Or the things that I make my goal, did I wish to do them in the manner of the flesh, and so was with me 'Yes, Yes' and 'No, no'?
QUENYA: Wishing that, surely I was not too free? Or the things that I make my goal, did I wish to do them in the manner of the flesh, and so was with me 'Yes, Yes' and 'No, no'?

ENGLISH: But as God is trusty, our speech to you is not Yes and yet No.
QUENYA: But as God is trusty, our speech to you is not Yes and yet No.

ENGLISH: For the Son of God, Jesus Christ, who was made known among you through us – that is, through me and Silvanus and Timothy – was not made Yes and yet No, but Yes has remained in him.
QUENYA: For the Son of God, Jesus Christ, who was made known among you through us – that is, through me and Silvanus and Timothy – was not made Yes and yet No, but Yes has remained in him.

ENGLISH: For not heeding how many God's promises are, in him they have their Yes. Therefore also through him the Amen is spoken to God by us, for his glory.
QUENYA: For not heeding how many God's promises are, in him they have their Yes. Therefore also through him the Amen is spoken to God by us, for his glory.

ENGLISH: But who has made you and us firm for the Christ, and who has annointed us, is God –
QUENYA: But who has made you and us firm for the Christ, and who has annointed us, is God –

ENGLISH: he who also has put his seal on us and has given us security of the spirit in our heart.
QUENYA: he who also has put his seal on us and has given us security of the spirit in our heart.

ENGLISH: But I call God as witness against my own life: to save you from grief that I did not come to Corinth.
QUENYA: But I call God as witness against my own life: to save you from grief that I did not come to Corinth.

ENGLISH: Not that we are lords of your faith, but we work with you for your joy, for by the faith you stand.
QUENYA: Not that we are lords of your faith, but we work with you for your joy, for by the faith you stand.

ENGLISH: Fot this thing is my choice: that I will not come to you again in grief.
QUENYA: Fot this thing is my choice: that I will not come to you again in grief.

ENGLISH: For if I cause grief to you, who will give me joy expect the person to whom I have caused grief?
QUENYA: For if I cause grief to you, who will give me joy expect the person to whom I have caused grief?

ENGLISH: And therefore I wrote as I did, that when I came I was not going to have grief from the people for whom compelled to bring me joy. For I was sure about you all, that in my joy all among you were going to have a part.
QUENYA: And therefore I wrote as I did, that when I came I was not going to have grief from the people for whom compelled to bring me joy. For I was sure about you all, that in my joy all among you were going to have a part.

ENGLISH: And out of great tribulation, being afflicted in my heard and having many tears, I wrote to you – not to cause you grief, but to allow you to know the abundant love that I have for you.
QUENYA: And out of great tribulation, being afflicted in my heard and having many tears, I wrote to you – not to cause you grief, but to allow you to know the abundant love that I have for you.

ENGLISH: For if anyone has caused grief, he has not caused it to me, but in a measure – not to speak in too harsh a manner – to all among you.
QUENYA: For if anyone has caused grief, he has not caused it to me, but in a measure – not to speak in too harsh a manner – to all among you.

ENGLISH: When he has so been shamed by the majority , that is enough for such a man.
QUENYA: When he has so been shamed by the majority , that is enough for such a man.

ENGLISH: Therefore turn yourselves and instead forgive him and confort him, or such a man will perhaps be consumed by too deep a grief.
QUENYA: Therefore turn yourselves and instead forgive him and confort him, or such a man will perhaps be consumed by too deep a grief.

ENGLISH: Thus I urge you that you will show your love of him.
QUENYA: Thus I urge you that you will show your love of him.

ENGLISH: For for that purpose I write also to test you, to know if you heed the commands in all things.
QUENYA: For for that purpose I write also to test you, to know if you heed the commands in all things.

ENGLISH: Everything that you forgive, I also forgive. Everything that I have forgiven – if I have forgiven anything – has been for your good before Christ,
QUENYA: Everything that you forgive, I also forgive. Everything that I have forgiven – if I have forgiven anything – has been for your good before Christ,

ENGLISH: to stop Satan from reaching over you; for we do not lack knowledge about his plans.
QUENYA: to stop Satan from reaching over you; for we do not lack knowledge about his plans.

ENGLISH: Now when I came to Troas to make the gospel known, and a door was opened for me in the Lord,
QUENYA: Now when I came to Troas to make the gospel known, and a door was opened for me in the Lord,

ENGLISH: I did not have rest in my spirit since I did not find Titus my brother; but I said farewell to them and went away to Macedonia.
QUENYA: I did not have rest in my spirit since I did not find Titus my brother; but I said farewell to them and went away to Macedonia.

ENGLISH: But thanks be to God, who always leads us in victory with the Christ, and through us he spreads in every place the scent of the knowledge about him!
QUENYA: But thanks be to God, who always leads us in victory with the Christ, and through us he spreads in every place the scent of the knowledge about him!

ENGLISH: For to God we are Christ's sweet scent, among that will be saved and that will be destroyed
QUENYA: For to God we are Christ's sweet scent, among that will be saved and that will be destroyed

ENGLISH: – to the last ones , a scent of death which brings death, but to the first ones , a scent of life that brings life. And who is sufficient for these things?
QUENYA: – to the last ones , a scent of death which brings death, but to the first ones , a scent of life that brings life. And who is sufficient for these things?

ENGLISH: For we do not make trade with God's word, as numerous ones do, but we speak sincerely, as sent by God and watched by God, in Christ.
QUENYA: For we do not make trade with God's word, as numerous ones do, but we speak sincerely, as sent by God and watched by God, in Christ.

ENGLISH: Do we again give a good witness to ourselves? Or perhaps we have need of good witness to you, or for us to receive it from you?
QUENYA: Do we again give a good witness to ourselves? Or perhaps we have need of good witness to you, or for us to receive it from you?

ENGLISH: Our letter is you, written in our heart and known and read by all men.
QUENYA: Our letter is you, written in our heart and known and read by all men.

ENGLISH: For is easily seen that you are a letter from Christ, a fruit of our ministry, written not with ink but by the spirit of the living God, not on tablets of stone, but on tablets of flesh – on hearts.
QUENYA: For is easily seen that you are a letter from Christ, a fruit of our ministry, written not with ink but by the spirit of the living God, not on tablets of stone, but on tablets of flesh – on hearts.

ENGLISH: And this is the firm faith that we have in God through the Christ.
QUENYA: And this is the firm faith that we have in God through the Christ.

ENGLISH: Not that we, in ourselves, are sufficient to count anything as if it came from ourselves, but our sufficiency comes from God.
QUENYA: Not that we, in ourselves, are sufficient to count anything as if it came from ourselves, but our sufficiency comes from God.

ENGLISH: He made us sufficient servants of a new covenant, not of a written law, but of the spririt; for the written law kills, but the spirit gives life.
QUENYA: He made us sufficient servants of a new covenant, not of a written law, but of the spririt; for the written law kills, but the spirit gives life.

ENGLISH: But if the ministry of death by the written law was established in a glory so great that it was impossible for the Children of Israel to look at the face of Moses, because of the glory that was in his face – a glory that was going to fade –
QUENYA: But if the ministry of death by the written law was established in a glory so great that it was impossible for the Children of Israel to look at the face of Moses, because of the glory that was in his face – a glory that was going to fade –

ENGLISH: will not the ministry of the spirit be glorious far beyond that?
QUENYA: will not the ministry of the spirit be glorious far beyond that?

ENGLISH: For if the ministry by which people were judged evil was glorious, the ministry that makes people righteous has a glory much more abundant.
QUENYA: For if the ministry by which people were judged evil was glorious, the ministry that makes people righteous has a glory much more abundant.

ENGLISH: For in this matter, that which formerly had glory now does not have glory at all, by reason of the glory that surpasses it.
QUENYA: For in this matter, that which formerly had glory now does not have glory at all, by reason of the glory that surpasses it.

ENGLISH: For if that which was going to fade was established in glory, much more will that which remains have glory.
QUENYA: For if that which was going to fade was established in glory, much more will that which remains have glory.

ENGLISH: Therefore, since we have such hope, we are very bold,
QUENYA: Therefore, since we have such hope, we are very bold,

ENGLISH: and we do not do like Moses, who put a veil on his face, to stop the Children of Israel from seeing the end of the fading glory.
QUENYA: and we do not do like Moses, who put a veil on his face, to stop the Children of Israel from seeing the end of the fading glory.

ENGLISH: But their mind was made hard. For until this day the same veil remains and is not lifted at the reading of the old covenant, since it is put away by means of the Christ.
QUENYA: But their mind was made hard. For until this day the same veil remains and is not lifted at the reading of the old covenant, since it is put away by means of the Christ.

ENGLISH: Indeed until this day, whenever Moses is read, a veil lies upon their heart.
QUENYA: Indeed until this day, whenever Moses is read, a veil lies upon their heart.

ENGLISH: But when they turn to the Lord, the veil is taken away.
QUENYA: But when they turn to the Lord, the veil is taken away.

ENGLISH: But the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Lord's spirit is, is freedom.
QUENYA: But the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Lord's spirit is, is freedom.

ENGLISH: And when all among us, without veil covering our face, give back the Lord's glory like a mirror, we are changed into his appearance, from glory to glory – as is done by the Lord, the Spirit.
QUENYA: And when all among us, without veil covering our face, give back the Lord's glory like a mirror, we are changed into his appearance, from glory to glory – as is done by the Lord, the Spirit.

ENGLISH: Therefore, since we have this ministry by the grace given us, we do not abandon our courage.
QUENYA: Therefore, since we have this ministry by the grace given us, we do not abandon our courage.

ENGLISH: But we have abandoned the hidden things that cause humiliation , for we do not behave with cunning. Furthermore, we do not falsify God's word, but by showing the truth we give ourselves good witness before the face of God, to the conscience of all men.
QUENYA: But we have abandoned the hidden things that cause humiliation , for we do not behave with cunning. Furthermore, we do not falsify God's word, but by showing the truth we give ourselves good witness before the face of God, to the conscience of all men.

ENGLISH: If our gospel is indeed veiled, it is veiled from that will be destroyed.
QUENYA: If our gospel is indeed veiled, it is veiled from that will be destroyed.

ENGLISH: For the god of this age has made blind the mind of who do not believe, to stop from shining the light from the gospel of Christ's glory, he who is God's image.
QUENYA: For the god of this age has made blind the mind of who do not believe, to stop from shining the light from the gospel of Christ's glory, he who is God's image.

ENGLISH: For we do not make ourselves known, but Christ Jesus as Lord, while we are your thralls, for the good of Jesus.
QUENYA: For we do not make ourselves known, but Christ Jesus as Lord, while we are your thralls, for the good of Jesus.

ENGLISH: For God is who commanded: "Let light shine out of darkness", and he has shone upon our heart, illuminating the knowledge about God's glory in the face of Jesus Christ.
QUENYA: For God is who commanded: "Let light shine out of darkness", and he has shone upon our heart, illuminating the knowledge about God's glory in the face of Jesus Christ.

ENGLISH: But we have this treasure in earthen vessels, causing the abundant power to be from God and not from ourselves.
QUENYA: But we have this treasure in earthen vessels, causing the abundant power to be from God and not from ourselves.

ENGLISH: We are pressed from every direction, but we are not in a place that narrow that we cannot move; we do not know what we are to do, but we are not wholly without escape;
QUENYA: We are pressed from every direction, but we are not in a place that narrow that we cannot move; we do not know what we are to do, but we are not wholly without escape;

ENGLISH: we are persecuted, but not without hope; we are thrown down, but we are not undone.
QUENYA: we are persecuted, but not without hope; we are thrown down, but we are not undone.

ENGLISH: Always we suffer in our body the killing of Jesus, that also Jesus' life will be shown in our body.
QUENYA: Always we suffer in our body the killing of Jesus, that also Jesus' life will be shown in our body.
