ENGLISH: For we that are alive are ever given over to death by reason of Jesus, for the purpose that also Jesus' life will be shown in our mortal flesh.
QUENYA: For we that are alive are ever given over to death by reason of Jesus, for the purpose that also Jesus' life will be shown in our mortal flesh.

ENGLISH: Thus death is at work in us, but life in you.
QUENYA: Thus death is at work in us, but life in you.

ENGLISH: But since we have the same spirit of believing – as is written, "I believed, therefore I spoke" – we as well believe, and therefore we also speak,
QUENYA: But since we have the same spirit of believing – as is written, "I believed, therefore I spoke" – we as well believe, and therefore we also speak,

ENGLISH: knowing that he who raised Jesus will also raise us and will make us stand among you.
QUENYA: knowing that he who raised Jesus will also raise us and will make us stand among you.

ENGLISH: For everything is for your good, and so the grace, reaching to people ever more numerous, will bring more thanksgiving, to the glory of God.
QUENYA: For everything is for your good, and so the grace, reaching to people ever more numerous, will bring more thanksgiving, to the glory of God.

ENGLISH: Therefore we do not abandon our courage, but although our outer man is wearing out, our inner man is renewed from day to day.
QUENYA: Therefore we do not abandon our courage, but although our outer man is wearing out, our inner man is renewed from day to day.

ENGLISH: For though the persecution is passing and is not heavy, it is preparing for us an eternal measure of glory ever more abundant,
QUENYA: For though the persecution is passing and is not heavy, it is preparing for us an eternal measure of glory ever more abundant,

ENGLISH: while we look not at the visible , but at the invisible. For the things which one sees shall pass, but the invisible ones are eternal.
QUENYA: while we look not at the visible , but at the invisible. For the things which one sees shall pass, but the invisible ones are eternal.

ENGLISH: For we know that if our house of dwelling on earth will be destroyed, we shall receive a building from God, a house not made with hands, everlasting in heaven.
QUENYA: For we know that if our house of dwelling on earth will be destroyed, we shall receive a building from God, a house not made with hands, everlasting in heaven.

ENGLISH: For in this our home we do groan, longing to put on ourselves our heavenly home.
QUENYA: For in this our home we do groan, longing to put on ourselves our heavenly home.

ENGLISH: Thus, after putting that on ourselves, we will not be found naked.
QUENYA: Thus, after putting that on ourselves, we will not be found naked.

ENGLISH: When we exist in this tent we indeed groan under the burden, for we wish, not to put it away, but to put on ourselves the other, causing which is mortal to be devoured by life.
QUENYA: When we exist in this tent we indeed groan under the burden, for we wish, not to put it away, but to put on ourselves the other, causing which is mortal to be devoured by life.

ENGLISH: But that has made for us this thing is God, who has given us the spirit as a security that we will receive it.
QUENYA: But that has made for us this thing is God, who has given us the spirit as a security that we will receive it.

ENGLISH: Therefore, always having courage, we know that when we dwell in the body, we are away from the Lord –
QUENYA: Therefore, always having courage, we know that when we dwell in the body, we are away from the Lord –

ENGLISH: for we walk by faith, not by seeing.
QUENYA: for we walk by faith, not by seeing.

ENGLISH: But we have courage and wish more to be away from the body and to dwell with the Lord.
QUENYA: But we have courage and wish more to be away from the body and to dwell with the Lord.

ENGLISH: Therefore our goal is that if we will be pleasing to him, not heeding if we dwell with him or away from him.
QUENYA: Therefore our goal is that if we will be pleasing to him, not heeding if we dwell with him or away from him.

ENGLISH: For all among us shall stand before the judgement seat of the Christ, and so everyone will receive his reward for the things done in the flesh, good or bad.
QUENYA: For all among us shall stand before the judgement seat of the Christ, and so everyone will receive his reward for the things done in the flesh, good or bad.

ENGLISH: Therefore, knowing the fear of the Lord we lead men to our beliefs, but we have been made manifest to God. But we have the hope that we will also be manifest to your conscience.
QUENYA: Therefore, knowing the fear of the Lord we lead men to our beliefs, but we have been made manifest to God. But we have the hope that we will also be manifest to your conscience.

ENGLISH: We do not give ourselves good witness before you, but we give you an opportunity to praise yourselves by means of us, for you to have an answer to that praise themselves for outer appearance, but not for the heart.
QUENYA: We do not give ourselves good witness before you, but we give you an opportunity to praise yourselves by means of us, for you to have an answer to that praise themselves for outer appearance, but not for the heart.

ENGLISH: For if we were out of our mind, that was for God; if we had health of mind, that is for you.
QUENYA: For if we were out of our mind, that was for God; if we had health of mind, that is for you.

ENGLISH: For the Lord's love compels us, for so we have judged: One died for numerous ones, indeed all died,
QUENYA: For the Lord's love compels us, for so we have judged: One died for numerous ones, indeed all died,

ENGLISH: and for all he died, wishing that they that are alive will not more have life for themselves, but for him that died for them and was raised.
QUENYA: and for all he died, wishing that they that are alive will not more have life for themselves, but for him that died for them and was raised.

ENGLISH: Therefore from now we do not know anybody by the flesh. Also if we have known the Christ by the flesh, we do not know him so more.
QUENYA: Therefore from now we do not know anybody by the flesh. Also if we have known the Christ by the flesh, we do not know him so more.

ENGLISH: Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creature; the old have gone away; behold! new ones have come.
QUENYA: Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creature; the old have gone away; behold! new ones have come.

ENGLISH: But everything is from God, who made peace between himself and us through Christ and gave us the ministry of peace-making.
QUENYA: But everything is from God, who made peace between himself and us through Christ and gave us the ministry of peace-making.

ENGLISH: Thus it is possible for God by the Christ to make peace between himself and the world, not counting against them their crimes, and he gave the word of peacemaking to us.
QUENYA: Thus it is possible for God by the Christ to make peace between himself and the world, not counting against them their crimes, and he gave the word of peacemaking to us.

ENGLISH: Therefore we are representatives on behalf of Christ, as if God made request through us. In Christ's place we urge: Make peace between you and God!
QUENYA: Therefore we are representatives on behalf of Christ, as if God made request through us. In Christ's place we urge: Make peace between you and God!

ENGLISH: He that did not know sin he made sin for us, for us to be God's righteousness through him.
QUENYA: He that did not know sin he made sin for us, for us to be God's righteousness through him.

ENGLISH: Laboring with him we also urge you: Do not receive God's grace for nothing!
QUENYA: Laboring with him we also urge you: Do not receive God's grace for nothing!

ENGLISH: For he says: "In a desirable time I heard you, and on the day of salvation I helped you!" Behold, now is the desirable hour! Behold, now is the day of salvation!
QUENYA: For he says: "In a desirable time I heard you, and on the day of salvation I helped you!" Behold, now is the desirable hour! Behold, now is the day of salvation!

ENGLISH: We do not do anything at all which will turn people away, not wishing that our ministry will be stained.
QUENYA: We do not do anything at all which will turn people away, not wishing that our ministry will be stained.

ENGLISH: But in every manner we get good witness as God's servants – in great steadfastness, in tribulations, in needs, in difficulties,
QUENYA: But in every manner we get good witness as God's servants – in great steadfastness, in tribulations, in needs, in difficulties,

ENGLISH: in beatings, in disturbances, in toilings, in nights without sleep, in lacking food,
QUENYA: in beatings, in disturbances, in toilings, in nights without sleep, in lacking food,

ENGLISH: in purity, in knowledge, in patience, in gentleness, in holy spirit, in love without hypocrisy,
QUENYA: in purity, in knowledge, in patience, in gentleness, in holy spirit, in love without hypocrisy,

ENGLISH: in truthful speech, in God's power, having the weapons of judice in right hand and left hand,
QUENYA: in truthful speech, in God's power, having the weapons of judice in right hand and left hand,

ENGLISH: in glory and shape, having a good name and an evil name, as people who make others err and yet are trusty,
QUENYA: in glory and shape, having a good name and an evil name, as people who make others err and yet are trusty,

ENGLISH: as unknown and yet well known, as dying and behold! we are alive, as receiving chastisement and yet not slain,
QUENYA: as unknown and yet well known, as dying and behold! we are alive, as receiving chastisement and yet not slain,

ENGLISH: as having grief, but ever full of joy, as poor, but making numerous ones rich, as if we have nothing and yet have everything.
QUENYA: as having grief, but ever full of joy, as poor, but making numerous ones rich, as if we have nothing and yet have everything.

ENGLISH: Our mouth is open to you, Corinthians, our heart is widened!
QUENYA: Our mouth is open to you, Corinthians, our heart is widened!

ENGLISH: You are not in a narrow place with us, but your own heart is narrow.
QUENYA: You are not in a narrow place with us, but your own heart is narrow.

ENGLISH: Therefore, in order to give us the same that we give to you, widen your heart!
QUENYA: Therefore, in order to give us the same that we give to you, widen your heart!

ENGLISH: Do not be put under an uneven yoke with the people that do not believe. For what is that justice and lawlessness have together? Or what is the community between light and darkness?
QUENYA: Do not be put under an uneven yoke with the people that do not believe. For what is that justice and lawlessness have together? Or what is the community between light and darkness?

ENGLISH: And how can Christ and Belial be of one mind? Or what part does a person who believe have with a person that does not believe? For we are a temple of the Living Deity, as God has said: "I shall dwell with them and walk among them, and I will be their God, and they will be my people.
QUENYA: And how can Christ and Belial be of one mind? Or what part does a person who believe have with a person that does not believe? For we are a temple of the Living Deity, as God has said: "I shall dwell with them and walk among them, and I will be their God, and they will be my people.

ENGLISH: Therefore pass away from them and leave," says the Lord, "and do not touch the unclean, and I shall receive you.
QUENYA: Therefore pass away from them and leave," says the Lord, "and do not touch the unclean, and I shall receive you.

ENGLISH: For I shall be for you a Father, and you shall be for be sons and daughters," says the Lord Almighty.
QUENYA: For I shall be for you a Father, and you shall be for be sons and daughters," says the Lord Almighty.

ENGLISH: Therefore, since we have these promises, beloved ones, let us cleanse ourselves from every stain of flesh and of spirit, seeking perfect holiness, in the fear of God.
QUENYA: Therefore, since we have these promises, beloved ones, let us cleanse ourselves from every stain of flesh and of spirit, seeking perfect holiness, in the fear of God.

ENGLISH: Widen your heart to us! To no one have we done evil, no one have we marred, by no one have we received profit!
QUENYA: Widen your heart to us! To no one have we done evil, no one have we marred, by no one have we received profit!

ENGLISH: So I do not speak in order to judge you evil, for I have spoken beforehand that you are in our heart, together for death and for life.
QUENYA: So I do not speak in order to judge you evil, for I have spoken beforehand that you are in our heart, together for death and for life.

ENGLISH: I have great freedom of speech toward you, great boasting by you. I am filled with comfort, I have abundant joy in all our persecution.
QUENYA: I have great freedom of speech toward you, great boasting by you. I am filled with comfort, I have abundant joy in all our persecution.

ENGLISH: Indeed we did not have rest for the body when we came to Macedonia – were outer quarrels, internal fears.
QUENYA: Indeed we did not have rest for the body when we came to Macedonia – were outer quarrels, internal fears.

ENGLISH: And yet God, who comforts the lowly ones, comforted us by the coming of Titus,
QUENYA: And yet God, who comforts the lowly ones, comforted us by the coming of Titus,

ENGLISH: and yet not by his coming alone, but also by the comfort with which he was comforted concerning you, when he told how you long, how you have grief, how your spirit burns for me – which caused me to have joy still greater.
QUENYA: and yet not by his coming alone, but also by the comfort with which he was comforted concerning you, when he told how you long, how you have grief, how your spirit burns for me – which caused me to have joy still greater.

ENGLISH: And yet if I gave you grief with my letter , I do not have second thoughts about it. I had second thoughts formerly – for I see that my letter caused you grief, though for a short time only –
QUENYA: And yet if I gave you grief with my letter , I do not have second thoughts about it. I had second thoughts formerly – for I see that my letter caused you grief, though for a short time only –

ENGLISH: and yet I am happy now, not since you had grief, but since the grief led you to a change of mind . For the grief that you had was of God, that nothing will be lost to you because of us.
QUENYA: and yet I am happy now, not since you had grief, but since the grief led you to a change of mind . For the grief that you had was of God, that nothing will be lost to you because of us.

ENGLISH: For the grief that is of God causes a mind-change concerning which no one can have second thoughts, but the world's grief causes death.
QUENYA: For the grief that is of God causes a mind-change concerning which no one can have second thoughts, but the world's grief causes death.

ENGLISH: For behold! this thing itself – that you had grief which is of God – how great is the urgency that it has caused! How you stood up for yourselves! How you are provoked! How you long! How your spirit burns! How you wish to punish evil! In everything you have shown yourselves clean in this matter.
QUENYA: For behold! this thing itself – that you had grief which is of God – how great is the urgency that it has caused! How you stood up for yourselves! How you are provoked! How you long! How your spirit burns! How you wish to punish evil! In everything you have shown yourselves clean in this matter.

ENGLISH: Though I wrote to you I indeed did not do so for the good of the person who did evil, or for the person who suffered the evil, but I wrote to make your urgency for us easily seen among you, before God.
QUENYA: Though I wrote to you I indeed did not do so for the good of the person who did evil, or for the person who suffered the evil, but I wrote to make your urgency for us easily seen among you, before God.

ENGLISH: Therefore we have been comforted.But added to our comfort we have also joy still more abundant by the joy of Titus, for his spirit has been renewed by you all.
QUENYA: Therefore we have been comforted.But added to our comfort we have also joy still more abundant by the joy of Titus, for his spirit has been renewed by you all.

ENGLISH: For if I have praised him before you, I have not been shamed, but as we have said all things to you in truth, so also our praise before Titus has been shown true.
QUENYA: For if I have praised him before you, I have not been shamed, but as we have said all things to you in truth, so also our praise before Titus has been shown true.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, he has still more profound feelings towards you when he recalls how you heeded his commands, how you received him in fear and trembling.
QUENYA: Furthermore, he has still more profound feelings towards you when he recalls how you heeded his commands, how you received him in fear and trembling.

ENGLISH: I find joy in the knowledge that in every manner I can have courage by means of you.
QUENYA: I find joy in the knowledge that in every manner I can have courage by means of you.

ENGLISH: Now we are making known to you, brothers, the grace that God has given to the congregations of Macedonia.
QUENYA: Now we are making known to you, brothers, the grace that God has given to the congregations of Macedonia.

ENGLISH: For when they suffered a great test by tribulation, their abundance of joy and their profound poverty made abundant the rich desire of giving that they had.
QUENYA: For when they suffered a great test by tribulation, their abundance of joy and their profound poverty made abundant the rich desire of giving that they had.

ENGLISH: For they gave as was possible to them; indeed I am a witness that they gave beyond what was possible for them, and by their own will.
QUENYA: For they gave as was possible to them; indeed I am a witness that they gave beyond what was possible for them, and by their own will.

ENGLISH: They petitioned us with many petitions, wishing to receive the grace of having a part in the service for the holy ones.
QUENYA: They petitioned us with many petitions, wishing to receive the grace of having a part in the service for the holy ones.

ENGLISH: They did not gave only according to the hope that we had, but firstly they gave themselves to the Lord and to us, by God's will.
QUENYA: They did not gave only according to the hope that we had, but firstly they gave themselves to the Lord and to us, by God's will.

ENGLISH: Therefore we urged Titus that he was going to complete the gift that he formerly started to collect among you.
QUENYA: Therefore we urged Titus that he was going to complete the gift that he formerly started to collect among you.

ENGLISH: Like you are abundant in everything – in faith and word and knowledge and all urgency, and in the love that we have for you – may you also be abundant in your giving!
QUENYA: Like you are abundant in everything – in faith and word and knowledge and all urgency, and in the love that we have for you – may you also be abundant in your giving!

ENGLISH: I do not say that as a command, but by the urgency of others I want to test if your love is also true.
QUENYA: I do not say that as a command, but by the urgency of others I want to test if your love is also true.

ENGLISH: For you know the grace of Jesus Christ our Lord – that although he was rich he was made poor for your good, for you to be made rich by his poverty.
QUENYA: For you know the grace of Jesus Christ our Lord – that although he was rich he was made poor for your good, for you to be made rich by his poverty.

ENGLISH: And concerning that I give my thoughts, for that will be beneficial for you who began, not the doing alone, but also your wishing to do it, one year ago.
QUENYA: And concerning that I give my thoughts, for that will be beneficial for you who began, not the doing alone, but also your wishing to do it, one year ago.

ENGLISH: Now, then, complete also the doing! As you were willing to do it, so is also good if you complete it, out of which you have.
QUENYA: Now, then, complete also the doing! As you were willing to do it, so is also good if you complete it, out of which you have.

ENGLISH: For if is the will, it is desirable by which one has, not by which one does not have.
QUENYA: For if is the will, it is desirable by which one has, not by which one does not have.

ENGLISH: For my goal is not that others will be helped, while things are difficult for you,
QUENYA: For my goal is not that others will be helped, while things are difficult for you,

ENGLISH: but that all will be equal. At this time you have abundance and can help who suffer need. At another time they will have abundance and can help you, when you suffer need. Thus all will be equal,
QUENYA: but that all will be equal. At this time you have abundance and can help who suffer need. At another time they will have abundance and can help you, when you suffer need. Thus all will be equal,

ENGLISH: as is written: "The person having much did not have too much, and the person having little did not have too little."
QUENYA: as is written: "The person having much did not have too much, and the person having little did not have too little."

ENGLISH: Thanks to God, since he put the same urgency for you in the heart of Titus,
QUENYA: Thanks to God, since he put the same urgency for you in the heart of Titus,

ENGLISH: for he received the urgency, and since he set out with great vigor , he is going to you by his own choice.
QUENYA: for he received the urgency, and since he set out with great vigor , he is going to you by his own choice.

ENGLISH: But we are sending with him a brother whose praise has spread through all the congregations because of his work for the gospel.
QUENYA: But we are sending with him a brother whose praise has spread through all the congregations because of his work for the gospel.

ENGLISH: Not that alone, but he was also placed by the congregations as my companion, going with us while we carry the collection that we oversee, to the glory of God and to show our good will.
QUENYA: Not that alone, but he was also placed by the congregations as my companion, going with us while we carry the collection that we oversee, to the glory of God and to show our good will.

ENGLISH: We want to stop anyone from speaking evil about us concerning the gift that we have in our keeping,
QUENYA: We want to stop anyone from speaking evil about us concerning the gift that we have in our keeping,

ENGLISH: for our goal is that we will do which is good, not in the Lord's eyes alone, but also in men's eyes.
QUENYA: for our goal is that we will do which is good, not in the Lord's eyes alone, but also in men's eyes.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, we send with them our brother, whom we frequently have tested in numerous matters and have found that he shows urgency in his work. He firmly believes that you are trusty, and therefore he works with still greater urgency.
QUENYA: Furthermore, we send with them our brother, whom we frequently have tested in numerous matters and have found that he shows urgency in his work. He firmly believes that you are trusty, and therefore he works with still greater urgency.

ENGLISH: Concerning Titus: His share is with me, and he works with me for your good. Concerning the other brothers, they are sent by the congregtaions and are Christ's glory.
QUENYA: Concerning Titus: His share is with me, and he works with me for your good. Concerning the other brothers, they are sent by the congregtaions and are Christ's glory.

ENGLISH: Therefore show them your love and let them know that I praised you before the congregations for a good reason.
QUENYA: Therefore show them your love and let them know that I praised you before the congregations for a good reason.

ENGLISH: Now concerning the ministry for the holy ones: I do not have real reason to write to you,
QUENYA: Now concerning the ministry for the holy ones: I do not have real reason to write to you,

ENGLISH: for I know that you are willing. Therefore I praise you in Macedonia, saying that Achaia was ready one year ago, and your burning spirit has spurred the majority .
QUENYA: for I know that you are willing. Therefore I praise you in Macedonia, saying that Achaia was ready one year ago, and your burning spirit has spurred the majority .

ENGLISH: But I am sending the brothers, that my praise concerning you will not be empty in this matter, but as I have said you will indeeed be ready.
QUENYA: But I am sending the brothers, that my praise concerning you will not be empty in this matter, but as I have said you will indeeed be ready.

ENGLISH: I do not wish that people are to come from Macedonia with me and will find you unprepared, for so we – not to say you – will be humiliated because we were so sure.
QUENYA: I do not wish that people are to come from Macedonia with me and will find you unprepared, for so we – not to say you – will be humiliated because we were so sure.

ENGLISH: Therefore I thought that it was necessary to send the brothers before me to you, to make ready beforehand the blessed gift of which you gave promise formerly. Thus it will indeed be ready as a blessed gift, and not by compulsion.
QUENYA: Therefore I thought that it was necessary to send the brothers before me to you, to make ready beforehand the blessed gift of which you gave promise formerly. Thus it will indeed be ready as a blessed gift, and not by compulsion.

ENGLISH: What I am saying is this: He who sows little will also have a small harvest, and he that sows an abundance will also have an abundant harvest.
QUENYA: What I am saying is this: He who sows little will also have a small harvest, and he that sows an abundance will also have an abundant harvest.

ENGLISH: Let everyone do as he has chosen in his heart, not grumbling or by compulsion, for God loves that is happy to give.
QUENYA: Let everyone do as he has chosen in his heart, not grumbling or by compulsion, for God loves that is happy to give.

ENGLISH: And God can give you every grace in abundance, to case you to always have everything in sufficiency and an abundance for every good deed,
QUENYA: And God can give you every grace in abundance, to case you to always have everything in sufficiency and an abundance for every good deed,

ENGLISH: as has been written: "He has scattered, he has given to poor ones; his righteousness remains forever."
QUENYA: as has been written: "He has scattered, he has given to poor ones; his righteousness remains forever."

ENGLISH: But who gives seed to who sows and bread for eating will give you your seed and will make it abundant, and the fruits of your righteousness he will make rich.
QUENYA: But who gives seed to who sows and bread for eating will give you your seed and will make it abundant, and the fruits of your righteousness he will make rich.

ENGLISH: In everything you are made rich, allowing you to give freely in every manner, and so God will receive thanksgiving by means of you.
QUENYA: In everything you are made rich, allowing you to give freely in every manner, and so God will receive thanksgiving by means of you.

ENGLISH: For this ministry is not done solely to fill the needs of the holy ones, but it also causes an abundance of thanksgiving to God.
QUENYA: For this ministry is not done solely to fill the needs of the holy ones, but it also causes an abundance of thanksgiving to God.

ENGLISH: This ministry shows your faithfulness when you are tested. Therefore you give glory to God, since you subject yourselves the gospel of Christ, as you openly say that you do, and you give freely to them and to all.
QUENYA: This ministry shows your faithfulness when you are tested. Therefore you give glory to God, since you subject yourselves the gospel of Christ, as you openly say that you do, and you give freely to them and to all.

ENGLISH: They pray for you and long for you, by reason of the surpassing grace that you have.
QUENYA: They pray for you and long for you, by reason of the surpassing grace that you have.

ENGLISH: Thanks to God for his gift beyond words!
QUENYA: Thanks to God for his gift beyond words!

ENGLISH: In the quiet and gentle manner of Christ I, Paul, beg of you – I who am "timid" when I see you face to face, but "bold" towards you when I am not there with you.
QUENYA: In the quiet and gentle manner of Christ I, Paul, beg of you – I who am "timid" when I see you face to face, but "bold" towards you when I am not there with you.

ENGLISH: Indeed I beg of you that when I shall come it will not be necessary for me to behave in the bold manner that I foresee, against who think that we walk by the flesh.
QUENYA: Indeed I beg of you that when I shall come it will not be necessary for me to behave in the bold manner that I foresee, against who think that we walk by the flesh.

ENGLISH: For though we walk in the flesh, we do not make war by the flesh.
QUENYA: For though we walk in the flesh, we do not make war by the flesh.

ENGLISH: For the weapons of our war-making are not of flesh, but they are mighty by God to overturn fortresses.
QUENYA: For the weapons of our war-making are not of flesh, but they are mighty by God to overturn fortresses.

ENGLISH: We overturn thought-constructions and every lofty thing that is raised against the knowledge of God, and we put every thought in gaol to cause it to adhere to the commands of the Christ.
QUENYA: We overturn thought-constructions and every lofty thing that is raised against the knowledge of God, and we put every thought in gaol to cause it to adhere to the commands of the Christ.

ENGLISH: For we shall be ready to punish every deed which is not obedient, after you have been made wholly obedient.
QUENYA: For we shall be ready to punish every deed which is not obedient, after you have been made wholly obedient.

ENGLISH: You look at things by their appearance. If anyone is certain that he is of the Christ, may he recall that as he is of the Christ, so are also we.
QUENYA: You look at things by their appearance. If anyone is certain that he is of the Christ, may he recall that as he is of the Christ, so are also we.

ENGLISH: For also if I praise myself too much concerning the power that the Lord gave to us – to build you up and not to tear you down – I shall not be humbled.
QUENYA: For also if I praise myself too much concerning the power that the Lord gave to us – to build you up and not to tear you down – I shall not be humbled.

ENGLISH: I do not wish to be perceived as trying to terrify you with my letters.
QUENYA: I do not wish to be perceived as trying to terrify you with my letters.

ENGLISH: For, say they: "His letters are strong and mighty, but when he himself comes, he is weak, and his speech despicable."
QUENYA: For, say they: "His letters are strong and mighty, but when he himself comes, he is weak, and his speech despicable."

ENGLISH: May such people understand that as we are in our letters when we are away, so we are also in deeds when we are with you.
QUENYA: May such people understand that as we are in our letters when we are away, so we are also in deeds when we are with you.

ENGLISH: For we do not dare to count ourselves among those that speak well of themselves, or compare ourselves with them. When they are their own measure, and compare themselves with themselves, they are not wise.
QUENYA: For we do not dare to count ourselves among those that speak well of themselves, or compare ourselves with them. When they are their own measure, and compare themselves with themselves, they are not wise.

ENGLISH: But we do not praise ourselves beyond the measure, but by the measure that God has put for us: that we have reached also to you.
QUENYA: But we do not praise ourselves beyond the measure, but by the measure that God has put for us: that we have reached also to you.

ENGLISH: We have not gone too far praising ourselves, as we were going to do if we did not come to you. But indeed we have come to you bringing the gospel of the Christ.
QUENYA: We have not gone too far praising ourselves, as we were going to do if we did not come to you. But indeed we have come to you bringing the gospel of the Christ.

ENGLISH: We do not go beyond our borders by praising ourselves about work done by others, but we have the hope that when your faith grows, we as well will be made mighty among you, by the measure given us. Then we will reach still further,
QUENYA: We do not go beyond our borders by praising ourselves about work done by others, but we have the hope that when your faith grows, we as well will be made mighty among you, by the measure given us. Then we will reach still further,

ENGLISH: making the gospel known in the countries beyond you. Thus I will not praise myself about work done in another's region, where things are prepared beforehand.
QUENYA: making the gospel known in the countries beyond you. Thus I will not praise myself about work done in another's region, where things are prepared beforehand.

ENGLISH: "But he that praises himself, may he praise himself in the Lord."
QUENYA: "But he that praises himself, may he praise himself in the Lord."

ENGLISH: For that gives himself a good witness is not the one that will pass at the test, but he to whom the Lord gives good witness.
QUENYA: For that gives himself a good witness is not the one that will pass at the test, but he to whom the Lord gives good witness.

ENGLISH: I wish that you will allow a small measure of unwisdom from me. But indeed you allow it from me!
QUENYA: I wish that you will allow a small measure of unwisdom from me. But indeed you allow it from me!

ENGLISH: For my spirit burns for you with a divine burning, for I united you with one husband, for me to lead you to the Christ as a pure virgin.
QUENYA: For my spirit burns for you with a divine burning, for I united you with one husband, for me to lead you to the Christ as a pure virgin.

ENGLISH: But now I fear that in this or that manner – like the serpent seduced Eve with its cunning – your minds will be marred and led away from loving the Christ sincerely and with purity.
QUENYA: But now I fear that in this or that manner – like the serpent seduced Eve with its cunning – your minds will be marred and led away from loving the Christ sincerely and with purity.

ENGLISH: For you well allow it if a person comes to you and speaks of another Christ – not the same that we made known – or you get a spirit which is not the same that you got formerly, or a gospel which is not the same that you have received.
QUENYA: For you well allow it if a person comes to you and speaks of another Christ – not the same that we made known – or you get a spirit which is not the same that you got formerly, or a gospel which is not the same that you have received.

ENGLISH: For I judge that in nothing I fall short of the most lofty apostles.
QUENYA: For I judge that in nothing I fall short of the most lofty apostles.

ENGLISH: Also if I am unskilled concerning words, I am not so concerning knowledge, but in every manner I have showed that to you.
QUENYA: Also if I am unskilled concerning words, I am not so concerning knowledge, but in every manner I have showed that to you.

ENGLISH: Surely I did not do a sin when I maked myself lowly in order to elevate you, since unpaid I made God's gospel known?
QUENYA: Surely I did not do a sin when I maked myself lowly in order to elevate you, since unpaid I made God's gospel known?

ENGLISH: From other congrations I "stole", receiving support from them to do ministry for you.
QUENYA: From other congrations I "stole", receiving support from them to do ministry for you.

ENGLISH: For when I was with you and had need, I was not a burden for anyone, for my needs were filled by the brothers that came from Macedonia. In every manner I kept myself and shall I keep myself from being a burden to you.
QUENYA: For when I was with you and had need, I was not a burden for anyone, for my needs were filled by the brothers that came from Macedonia. In every manner I kept myself and shall I keep myself from being a burden to you.

ENGLISH: As the truth of Christ exists in me, I shall not be stopped from so praising myself in the congrations of Macedonia.
QUENYA: As the truth of Christ exists in me, I shall not be stopped from so praising myself in the congrations of Macedonia.

ENGLISH: And how so? Since I do not love you? God knows that I do!
QUENYA: And how so? Since I do not love you? God knows that I do!

ENGLISH: And what I am doing I shall also do, not to give an opportunity to those that desire an opportuniy, for them to be found equal with us in that of which they praise themselves.
QUENYA: And what I am doing I shall also do, not to give an opportunity to those that desire an opportuniy, for them to be found equal with us in that of which they praise themselves.

ENGLISH: For such men are false apostles, lying workers, changing themselves into Christ's apostles.
QUENYA: For such men are false apostles, lying workers, changing themselves into Christ's apostles.

ENGLISH: And that is not a wonder, for Satan himself changes himself into an angel of light.
QUENYA: And that is not a wonder, for Satan himself changes himself into an angel of light.

ENGLISH: Therefore it is not a great thing if his servants change themselves into servants of righteousness. But their end shall be that which follows from their deeds.
QUENYA: Therefore it is not a great thing if his servants change themselves into servants of righteousness. But their end shall be that which follows from their deeds.

ENGLISH: I say again: Let nobody think that I am a fool! But if you indeed think so, receive me also as if I am a fool, allowing me as well to praise myself in a small measure!
QUENYA: I say again: Let nobody think that I am a fool! But if you indeed think so, receive me also as if I am a fool, allowing me as well to praise myself in a small measure!

ENGLISH: What I say I do not say from the Lord, but like in the manner of a fool, when I praise myself so surely!
QUENYA: What I say I do not say from the Lord, but like in the manner of a fool, when I praise myself so surely!

ENGLISH: Since numerous ones praise themselves by the flesh, I as well will praise myself!
QUENYA: Since numerous ones praise themselves by the flesh, I as well will praise myself!

ENGLISH: For with joy you allow fools to do their things – you who are so wise!
QUENYA: For with joy you allow fools to do their things – you who are so wise!

ENGLISH: You allow it when a person makes you thralls, or devours what you have, or seizes your goods, or raises himself above you, or strikes you to the face!
QUENYA: You allow it when a person makes you thralls, or devours what you have, or seizes your goods, or raises himself above you, or strikes you to the face!

ENGLISH: I am humbled saying that we have been too weak to do that!
QUENYA: I am humbled saying that we have been too weak to do that!

ENGLISH: But everyting of which anyone dares to praise himself – I am speaking as a fool – I as well dares to praise myself of himself!
QUENYA: But everyting of which anyone dares to praise himself – I am speaking as a fool – I as well dares to praise myself of himself!

ENGLISH: Are they Hebrews? I as well am! Are they Abraham's seed? I as well am!
QUENYA: Are they Hebrews? I as well am! Are they Abraham's seed? I as well am!

ENGLISH: Are they Christ's servants? I speak as if I am out of my mind: I am so still more! I have toiled more, I have been in prison more frequently, I have received more numerous blows, I have been near to death frequently.
QUENYA: Are they Christ's servants? I speak as if I am out of my mind: I am so still more! I have toiled more, I have been in prison more frequently, I have received more numerous blows, I have been near to death frequently.

ENGLISH: On five occasions I have received from Jews forty blows except one.
QUENYA: On five occasions I have received from Jews forty blows except one.

ENGLISH: Thrice I have been beaten with rods; one time I have been stoned. Thrice the ship on which I was went down; for a night and a day I have been in the deep waters,
QUENYA: Thrice I have been beaten with rods; one time I have been stoned. Thrice the ship on which I was went down; for a night and a day I have been in the deep waters,

ENGLISH: on numerous journeys, in danger from rivers, in danger from robbers, in danger from my own people, in danger from the other nations, in danger in the city, in danger in the wilderness, in danger at sea, in danger from false brothers,
QUENYA: on numerous journeys, in danger from rivers, in danger from robbers, in danger from my own people, in danger from the other nations, in danger in the city, in danger in the wilderness, in danger at sea, in danger from false brothers,

ENGLISH: in toiling and difficulty, frequently without sleep, in hunger and thirst, frequently lacking food, being cold and without clothes.
QUENYA: in toiling and difficulty, frequently without sleep, in hunger and thirst, frequently lacking food, being cold and without clothes.

ENGLISH: And added to the things on the outside is also the daily pressure upon me, the anxiety for all the congregations.
QUENYA: And added to the things on the outside is also the daily pressure upon me, the anxiety for all the congregations.

ENGLISH: Who is weak, and I am not weak? Who is caused to fall and I do not burn?
QUENYA: Who is weak, and I am not weak? Who is caused to fall and I do not burn?

ENGLISH: If it is necessary that I shall praise myself, I will praise myself concerning the things in which I am weak.
QUENYA: If it is necessary that I shall praise myself, I will praise myself concerning the things in which I am weak.

ENGLISH: The God and Father of Jesus Christ our Lord, indeed who shall be blessed forever, knows that I am not lying.
QUENYA: The God and Father of Jesus Christ our Lord, indeed who shall be blessed forever, knows that I am not lying.

ENGLISH: In Damascus the governor under king Aretas watched the city of the Damascenes to seize me,
QUENYA: In Damascus the governor under king Aretas watched the city of the Damascenes to seize me,

ENGLISH: but through a hole in the wall I was sent down in a box and escaped out of his hands.
QUENYA: but through a hole in the wall I was sent down in a box and escaped out of his hands.

ENGLISH: It is necessary for me to praise myself. It is not beneficial, but now I shall come to visions and revelations of the Lord.
QUENYA: It is necessary for me to praise myself. It is not beneficial, but now I shall come to visions and revelations of the Lord.

ENGLISH: I know a man in Christ who fourteen years ago – in the body or outside of the body I do not know, God knows – was taken away to the third heaven.
QUENYA: I know a man in Christ who fourteen years ago – in the body or outside of the body I do not know, God knows – was taken away to the third heaven.

ENGLISH: Indeed I know such a man – in the body or outside of the body I do not know, God knows –
QUENYA: Indeed I know such a man – in the body or outside of the body I do not know, God knows –

ENGLISH: he was taken away to paradise and heard unutterable words, which a man may not speak.
QUENYA: he was taken away to paradise and heard unutterable words, which a man may not speak.

ENGLISH: Concerning such a man I will praise myself, but not concerning myself, except concerning my weak state.
QUENYA: Concerning such a man I will praise myself, but not concerning myself, except concerning my weak state.

ENGLISH: For if I indeed want to praise myself, that was not going to make me a fool, for I would speak the truth. But I do not, to stop anyone from thinking about me more highly than which he sees that I am, or he hears from me.
QUENYA: For if I indeed want to praise myself, that was not going to make me a fool, for I would speak the truth. But I do not, to stop anyone from thinking about me more highly than which he sees that I am, or he hears from me.

ENGLISH: To stop me from being haughty by the abundance of revelation I have received a thorn in the flesh, an angel of Satan, for it to strike me; thus I will not be too haughty.
QUENYA: To stop me from being haughty by the abundance of revelation I have received a thorn in the flesh, an angel of Satan, for it to strike me; thus I will not be too haughty.

ENGLISH: Concerning that I requested of the Lord thrice that it would go away from me,
QUENYA: Concerning that I requested of the Lord thrice that it would go away from me,

ENGLISH: but the Lord said to me: "My grace suffices for you, for my power is made perfect in a weak state." With greatest joy, therefore, I praise myself about my weak state, causing the Christ's power to lie upon me.
QUENYA: but the Lord said to me: "My grace suffices for you, for my power is made perfect in a weak state." With greatest joy, therefore, I praise myself about my weak state, causing the Christ's power to lie upon me.

ENGLISH: Therefore I am happy when I am weak, when I suffer violence, when I have need, when I am persecuted or in difficulties, for Christ. For when I am weak, then I am strong.
QUENYA: Therefore I am happy when I am weak, when I suffer violence, when I have need, when I am persecuted or in difficulties, for Christ. For when I am weak, then I am strong.

ENGLISH: I have been a fool! You compelled me to be so, for what you owed me was to speak well about me. For in nothing I fall short of the loftiest apostles, though I am nothing.
QUENYA: I have been a fool! You compelled me to be so, for what you owed me was to speak well about me. For in nothing I fall short of the loftiest apostles, though I am nothing.

ENGLISH: The signs of a true apostle was done among you with all patience, with signs and wonders and powerful deeds.
QUENYA: The signs of a true apostle was done among you with all patience, with signs and wonders and powerful deeds.

ENGLISH: For in what were you made less than the other congrations, except that I was not a burden to you? Forgive me this injustice!
QUENYA: For in what were you made less than the other congrations, except that I was not a burden to you? Forgive me this injustice!

ENGLISH: Behold, this is the third occasion that I am ready to come to you. And I will not be a burden, for I do not seek what you have, but I seek you. For children do not have a debt to make store for their parents, but parents for their children.
QUENYA: Behold, this is the third occasion that I am ready to come to you. And I will not be a burden, for I do not seek what you have, but I seek you. For children do not have a debt to make store for their parents, but parents for their children.

ENGLISH: And with joy I will use what I have, and will I be used, for your souls. If I love you the more, will I be loved the less?
QUENYA: And with joy I will use what I have, and will I be used, for your souls. If I love you the more, will I be loved the less?

ENGLISH: But even if that is so, I was not a burden to you – but being foxy perhaps I seized you by a trick?
QUENYA: But even if that is so, I was not a burden to you – but being foxy perhaps I seized you by a trick?

ENGLISH: Surely I did not make profit out of you by anyone that I sent to you?
QUENYA: Surely I did not make profit out of you by anyone that I sent to you?

ENGLISH: I urged Titus and sent the brother with with. Surely Titus did not make profit out of you? Did we not walk in the same spirit, in the same path?
QUENYA: I urged Titus and sent the brother with with. Surely Titus did not make profit out of you? Did we not walk in the same spirit, in the same path?

ENGLISH: Did you for this whole time think that to you we stand up for ourselves? to God, in Christ, we speak! But everything, my beloved, is in order to build you up.
QUENYA: Did you for this whole time think that to you we stand up for ourselves? to God, in Christ, we speak! But everything, my beloved, is in order to build you up.

ENGLISH: For I fear that when I shall come, I will not find you as I can wish, and I will not be to you like you can wish, but instead will be in this or that manner quarrelings, envies, angry feelings, strifes, evil speaking about others, whisperings, pride, a disordered state.
QUENYA: For I fear that when I shall come, I will not find you as I can wish, and I will not be to you like you can wish, but instead will be in this or that manner quarrelings, envies, angry feelings, strifes, evil speaking about others, whisperings, pride, a disordered state.

ENGLISH: Perhaps, when I shall return, my God will humiliate me among you, and it will be necessary for me to have grief concerning numerous ones that sinned formerly and have not found repentance concerning the uncleanness and the fornication and the loose conduct with which they have behaved.
QUENYA: Perhaps, when I shall return, my God will humiliate me among you, and it will be necessary for me to have grief concerning numerous ones that sinned formerly and have not found repentance concerning the uncleanness and the fornication and the loose conduct with which they have behaved.

ENGLISH: This is the third time that I am coming to you. By the mouth of two or three witnesses every matter will be established.
QUENYA: This is the third time that I am coming to you. By the mouth of two or three witnesses every matter will be established.

ENGLISH: I have said formerly, when I was with you after I came to you for the second time, and now when I am away I say beforehand to those that have sinned formerly and to all the others: If I ever return I will not show mercy,
QUENYA: I have said formerly, when I was with you after I came to you for the second time, and now when I am away I say beforehand to those that have sinned formerly and to all the others: If I ever return I will not show mercy,

ENGLISH: since you seek a sign establishing that by me Christ speaks, he who is not weak towards you but powerful among you.
QUENYA: since you seek a sign establishing that by me Christ speaks, he who is not weak towards you but powerful among you.

ENGLISH: Indeed he was crucified owing to his weak state, but he is alive by God's power. And indeed we are weak with him, but we shall be alive with him by God's power towards you.
QUENYA: Indeed he was crucified owing to his weak state, but he is alive by God's power. And indeed we are weak with him, but we shall be alive with him by God's power towards you.

ENGLISH: Test yourselves if you are in the faith; be sure about what you are. Or do you not keep in mind that Jesus Christ exists in you? If you have not failed at the test.
QUENYA: Test yourselves if you are in the faith; be sure about what you are. Or do you not keep in mind that Jesus Christ exists in you? If you have not failed at the test.

ENGLISH: But I have the hope that you will understand that we have not failed at the test.
QUENYA: But I have the hope that you will understand that we have not failed at the test.

ENGLISH: We pray to God that you will do nothing evil, not to show that we have passed when we were tested, but for you to do good, even if will seem that we have failed.
QUENYA: We pray to God that you will do nothing evil, not to show that we have passed when we were tested, but for you to do good, even if will seem that we have failed.

ENGLISH: For we can do nothing against the truth; we can solely help the truth.
QUENYA: For we can do nothing against the truth; we can solely help the truth.

ENGLISH: For we are happy when we are weak but you are strong, for for this thing we pray: that you will be made perfect.
QUENYA: For we are happy when we are weak but you are strong, for for this thing we pray: that you will be made perfect.

ENGLISH: Therefore I am writing these things when I am away, to stop myself from behaving in a harsh manner when I shall be with you, by the power that the Lord gave me – to build up and not to tear down.
QUENYA: Therefore I am writing these things when I am away, to stop myself from behaving in a harsh manner when I shall be with you, by the power that the Lord gave me – to build up and not to tear down.

ENGLISH: Finally, brothers: Farewell! Be made perfect, be comforted, be of one mind, dwell in peace; and the God of love and of peace will be with you.
QUENYA: Finally, brothers: Farewell! Be made perfect, be comforted, be of one mind, dwell in peace; and the God of love and of peace will be with you.

ENGLISH: Greet one another with a holy kiss!
QUENYA: Greet one another with a holy kiss!

ENGLISH: All the holy ones greet you!
QUENYA: All the holy ones greet you!

ENGLISH: May the grace of the Lord Jesus Christ and God's love and your share in the Holy Spirit be with all among you!
QUENYA: May the grace of the Lord Jesus Christ and God's love and your share in the Holy Spirit be with all among you!

ENGLISH: The elder to the chosen lady and to her children, whom I love in truth, and not I alone, but also all who know the truth,
QUENYA: The elder to the chosen lady and to her children, whom I love in truth, and not I alone, but also all who know the truth,

ENGLISH: by the truth that is in us, and it shall be with us forever.
QUENYA: by the truth that is in us, and it shall be with us forever.

ENGLISH: will be with us grace, mercy and peace from God the Father and from Jesus Christ, the Father’s Son, by truth and by love.
QUENYA: will be with us grace, mercy and peace from God the Father and from Jesus Christ, the Father’s Son, by truth and by love.

ENGLISH: I have the greatest joy because I have found that some of your children walk in the truth, according to the commandent that we received from the Father.
QUENYA: I have the greatest joy because I have found that some of your children walk in the truth, according to the commandent that we received from the Father.

ENGLISH: And now I ask of you, o lady, not as if I am writing to you a new commandment, but that which we had from the beginning: that we love one another.
QUENYA: And now I ask of you, o lady, not as if I am writing to you a new commandment, but that which we had from the beginning: that we love one another.

ENGLISH: And this is the love: that we walk according to his commandments. That is the commandment, as you heard from the beginning, in order to walk in it.
QUENYA: And this is the love: that we walk according to his commandments. That is the commandment, as you heard from the beginning, in order to walk in it.

ENGLISH: For many deceivers have gone forth into the world, the ones that do not confess Jesus Christ come in the flesh. This is the deceiver and the Antichrist.
QUENYA: For many deceivers have gone forth into the world, the ones that do not confess Jesus Christ come in the flesh. This is the deceiver and the Antichrist.

ENGLISH: Watch yourselves, that the we have done will not be lost to you, but you will receive full reward.
QUENYA: Watch yourselves, that the we have done will not be lost to you, but you will receive full reward.

ENGLISH: Everyone who does not remain in Christ’s teaching, but goes beyond it, does not have God. who remains in the teaching, he has the Father and the Son.
QUENYA: Everyone who does not remain in Christ’s teaching, but goes beyond it, does not have God. who remains in the teaching, he has the Father and the Son.

ENGLISH: If anyone comes to you not bringing this teaching, do not receive him into your houses, and do not greet him.
QUENYA: If anyone comes to you not bringing this teaching, do not receive him into your houses, and do not greet him.

ENGLISH: For who greets him has a part with him in his evil deeds.
QUENYA: For who greets him has a part with him in his evil deeds.

ENGLISH: I have many things to write to you, but I do not want to do so with paper and ink. But I have the hope that I will come to you and speak with you face to face, that your joy will be perfect.
QUENYA: I have many things to write to you, but I do not want to do so with paper and ink. But I have the hope that I will come to you and speak with you face to face, that your joy will be perfect.

ENGLISH: Your chosen sister’s children greet you
QUENYA: Your chosen sister’s children greet you

ENGLISH: Simon Peter, slave and apostle of Jesus Christ, to those who have received a faith as precious as our own, by the righteousness of our God and of our Savior, Jesus Christ.
QUENYA: Simon Peter, slave and apostle of Jesus Christ, to those who have received a faith as precious as our own, by the righteousness of our God and of our Savior, Jesus Christ.

ENGLISH: May you have grace and peace in abundance, by the knowledge about God and Jesus Christ our Lord,
QUENYA: May you have grace and peace in abundance, by the knowledge about God and Jesus Christ our Lord,

ENGLISH: since by his divine power he has given us everything that leads to life and to piety , by the knowledge about who called us by glory and by goodness.
QUENYA: since by his divine power he has given us everything that leads to life and to piety , by the knowledge about who called us by glory and by goodness.

ENGLISH: By these things he has given us the precious and greatest promises, for us to have a part in divine nature , after fleeing the marring that is in the world by lust.
QUENYA: By these things he has given us the precious and greatest promises, for us to have a part in divine nature , after fleeing the marring that is in the world by lust.

ENGLISH: For this reason, with every urgency, you add to your faith goodness, to your goodness knowledge,
QUENYA: For this reason, with every urgency, you add to your faith goodness, to your goodness knowledge,

ENGLISH: to your knowledge self-control, to your self-control endurance, to your endurance piety,
QUENYA: to your knowledge self-control, to your self-control endurance, to your endurance piety,

ENGLISH: to your piety brotherly affection , to your brotherly affection love.
QUENYA: to your piety brotherly affection , to your brotherly affection love.

ENGLISH: For if these things exist in you in abundance, they will stop you from being without deeds or fruit after knowing Jesus Christ our Lord.
QUENYA: For if these things exist in you in abundance, they will stop you from being without deeds or fruit after knowing Jesus Christ our Lord.

ENGLISH: For if these things do not exist in a person, he is blind or short-sighted, and has slipped from his recall how he was cleansed from his sins long ago.
QUENYA: For if these things do not exist in a person, he is blind or short-sighted, and has slipped from his recall how he was cleansed from his sins long ago.

ENGLISH: Therefore, brothers, do everything that you can to make firm your calling and your choosing, for so doing you shall by no means fall.
QUENYA: Therefore, brothers, do everything that you can to make firm your calling and your choosing, for so doing you shall by no means fall.

ENGLISH: In this way a broad door will be opened to you into the eternal kingdom of our Lord and of our Savior, Jesus Christ.
QUENYA: In this way a broad door will be opened to you into the eternal kingdom of our Lord and of our Savior, Jesus Christ.

ENGLISH: Thus I will always cause you to recall these things, though you know them and are firm in the truth that exists in you.
QUENYA: Thus I will always cause you to recall these things, though you know them and are firm in the truth that exists in you.

ENGLISH: But when I still exist in this tent I count proper to urge you, by causing you to remember.
QUENYA: But when I still exist in this tent I count proper to urge you, by causing you to remember.

ENGLISH: For I know that my tent soon will be put away, as also Jesus Christ our Lord made known to me.
QUENYA: For I know that my tent soon will be put away, as also Jesus Christ our Lord made known to me.

ENGLISH: Therefore, with every urgency, I will do what is possible for me, for you to be able to recall these things after my passing.
QUENYA: Therefore, with every urgency, I will do what is possible for me, for you to be able to recall these things after my passing.

ENGLISH: When we told you about the power and the coming of Jesus Christ our Lord, we did not repeat cleverly invented fables; on the contrary, we were bystanders and saw his majesty with our own eyes.
QUENYA: When we told you about the power and the coming of Jesus Christ our Lord, we did not repeat cleverly invented fables; on the contrary, we were bystanders and saw his majesty with our own eyes.

ENGLISH: For from God Father he received honor and glory, when words like this were carried to him by the Majestic Glory: «This is my son, my beloved, of whom I have thought well.»
QUENYA: For from God Father he received honor and glory, when words like this were carried to him by the Majestic Glory: «This is my son, my beloved, of whom I have thought well.»

ENGLISH: For these words we heard carried to him when we were with him on the holy mountain.
QUENYA: For these words we heard carried to him when we were with him on the holy mountain.

ENGLISH: Therefore we have the word of the Prophets made more firm, and you are doing well in heeding it, as one heeds a lamp shining in a dark place, until day comes and a day-star rises in your heart.
QUENYA: Therefore we have the word of the Prophets made more firm, and you are doing well in heeding it, as one heeds a lamp shining in a dark place, until day comes and a day-star rises in your heart.

ENGLISH: For above everything you know that does not exist prophecy in the Scriptures that comes from anyone's own insight.
QUENYA: For above everything you know that does not exist prophecy in the Scriptures that comes from anyone's own insight.

ENGLISH: For a prophecy was not ever brought by man's will, but some men spoke from God, being carried by Holy Spirit.
QUENYA: For a prophecy was not ever brought by man's will, but some men spoke from God, being carried by Holy Spirit.

ENGLISH: But there were also some false prophets among the people, as there will be false teachers among you. They will quietly bring in destructive false teachings and deny even the Lord that traded them to himself, bringing a swift destruction upon themselves.
QUENYA: But there were also some false prophets among the people, as there will be false teachers among you. They will quietly bring in destructive false teachings and deny even the Lord that traded them to himself, bringing a swift destruction upon themselves.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, numerous ones will follow their deeds of loose conduct, and because of them the road of truth will be blasphemed.
QUENYA: Furthermore, numerous ones will follow their deeds of loose conduct, and because of them the road of truth will be blasphemed.

ENGLISH: Being greedy, they will use you for their own gain, with lying words. But their judgement from of old does not move slowly, and their destruction is not asleep.
QUENYA: Being greedy, they will use you for their own gain, with lying words. But their judgement from of old does not move slowly, and their destruction is not asleep.

ENGLISH: For God did not refrain from punishing the angels that sinned, but threw them into the abyss and gave them over to pits of gloom to be reserved for judgement.
QUENYA: For God did not refrain from punishing the angels that sinned, but threw them into the abyss and gave them over to pits of gloom to be reserved for judgement.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, he did not refrain from punishing the ancient world, but kept Noah, herald of righteousness, in safety with seven others when he brought a flood upon a world of wicked people. Furthermore, he judged the cities Sodom and Gomorrah by changing them into dust, making a danger-sign for wicked people in coming ages.
QUENYA: Furthermore, he did not refrain from punishing the ancient world, but kept Noah, herald of righteousness, in safety with seven others when he brought a flood upon a world of wicked people. Furthermore, he judged the cities Sodom and Gomorrah by changing them into dust, making a danger-sign for wicked people in coming ages.

ENGLISH: But he rescued righteous Lot, who was very troubled by the loose behavior of who stood against law.
QUENYA: But he rescued righteous Lot, who was very troubled by the loose behavior of who stood against law.

ENGLISH: For by their lawless deeds, that just man was tormented in his just soul by which he saw and heard when he dwelt among them.
QUENYA: For by their lawless deeds, that just man was tormented in his just soul by which he saw and heard when he dwelt among them.

ENGLISH: Thus the Lord knows to rescue reverent ones out of trial, but to reserve unjust ones for the day of judgement. Then they will be cut off,
QUENYA: Thus the Lord knows to rescue reverent ones out of trial, but to reserve unjust ones for the day of judgement. Then they will be cut off,

ENGLISH: above everything the people following flesh desiring to stain it, and who despice lordship.
QUENYA: above everything the people following flesh desiring to stain it, and who despice lordship.

ENGLISH: Bold, willful, they do not tremble before glorious ones, but blaspheme,
QUENYA: Bold, willful, they do not tremble before glorious ones, but blaspheme,

ENGLISH: though angels, that are stronger and mightier than them, do not speak harsh words of judgement against them before the Lord.
QUENYA: though angels, that are stronger and mightier than them, do not speak harsh words of judgement against them before the Lord.

ENGLISH: But these people, like animals without intellect – born to be seized and destroyed – will be corrupted by their own corruption, by the things of which they know nothing and against which they blaspheme,
QUENYA: But these people, like animals without intellect – born to be seized and destroyed – will be corrupted by their own corruption, by the things of which they know nothing and against which they blaspheme,

ENGLISH: doing evil to themselves as a payment for unrighteousness. What they count a joy is to dwell in abundance. They are blots and stains, finding abundant joy in their lying teachings while they make themselves festive with you.
QUENYA: doing evil to themselves as a payment for unrighteousness. What they count a joy is to dwell in abundance. They are blots and stains, finding abundant joy in their lying teachings while they make themselves festive with you.

ENGLISH: Their eyes always seek a harlot; they cannot keep themselves from sin, and they cause unsteady people to stray. Their heart has learned lust. Accursed children,
QUENYA: Their eyes always seek a harlot; they cannot keep themselves from sin, and they cause unsteady people to stray. Their heart has learned lust. Accursed children,

ENGLISH: abandoning the straight road, they have been led into an errant path. They have followed the path of Balaam son of Beor, who loved the reward for wrong-doing,
QUENYA: abandoning the straight road, they have been led into an errant path. They have followed the path of Balaam son of Beor, who loved the reward for wrong-doing,

ENGLISH: but received a rebuke concerning his own law-breaking: A voiceless beast of burden, speaking with a man's voice, stopped the witless journey of the prophet.
QUENYA: but received a rebuke concerning his own law-breaking: A voiceless beast of burden, speaking with a man's voice, stopped the witless journey of the prophet.

ENGLISH: These men are springs without water, mists carried by storm, and for them the gloom of darkness is reserved.
QUENYA: These men are springs without water, mists carried by storm, and for them the gloom of darkness is reserved.

ENGLISH: For they speak big words that do nothing good, and by the desire of the flesh and by loose habits they cause those to stray those that a short time ago fled from the people whose conduct is errant.
QUENYA: For they speak big words that do nothing good, and by the desire of the flesh and by loose habits they cause those to stray those that a short time ago fled from the people whose conduct is errant.

ENGLISH: Though they give them promises about freedom, they are slaves of corruption. For who is conquered by another, is this other one's slave.
QUENYA: Though they give them promises about freedom, they are slaves of corruption. For who is conquered by another, is this other one's slave.

ENGLISH: For if, after fleeing from the stains of the world, by the knowledge about the Lord and Savior Jesus Christ, they are again entangled by these things and are overwon, then the last affairs are more evil to them than the first.
QUENYA: For if, after fleeing from the stains of the world, by the knowledge about the Lord and Savior Jesus Christ, they are again entangled by these things and are overwon, then the last affairs are more evil to them than the first.

ENGLISH: For if they did not ever know the path of righteousness, that was to them better than turning themselves away from it after knowing the holy commandment given to them.
QUENYA: For if they did not ever know the path of righteousness, that was to them better than turning themselves away from it after knowing the holy commandment given to them.

ENGLISH: The saying of the true proverb has happened to them: «The dog has returned to its own vomit, and the pig that was washed, to rolling in the mud.»
QUENYA: The saying of the true proverb has happened to them: «The dog has returned to its own vomit, and the pig that was washed, to rolling in the mud.»

ENGLISH: Beloved ones, this letter is the second that I am writing to you, in which, as in my first, I stir your heart to a wakeful understanding by reminding you,
QUENYA: Beloved ones, this letter is the second that I am writing to you, in which, as in my first, I stir your heart to a wakeful understanding by reminding you,

ENGLISH: for you to recall the sayings beforehand spoken by the holy prophets and the commandment of the Lord and Savior through the apostles sent to you.
QUENYA: for you to recall the sayings beforehand spoken by the holy prophets and the commandment of the Lord and Savior through the apostles sent to you.

ENGLISH: For you know this above everything, that in the last days will come blasphemers speaking mockery, behaving according to their own desires
QUENYA: For you know this above everything, that in the last days will come blasphemers speaking mockery, behaving according to their own desires

ENGLISH: and saying: «Where is this return of which he gave promise? For our fathers are dead, but everything is still as it has been from the beginning of creation.»
QUENYA: and saying: «Where is this return of which he gave promise? For our fathers are dead, but everything is still as it has been from the beginning of creation.»

ENGLISH: By their own desire they do not perceive this, that there existed a heaven and an earth in past, rising out of the waters and in midst of water by God's word,
QUENYA: By their own desire they do not perceive this, that there existed a heaven and an earth in past, rising out of the waters and in midst of water by God's word,

ENGLISH: and by those waters the ancient world was destroyed, being inundated with water.
QUENYA: and by those waters the ancient world was destroyed, being inundated with water.

ENGLISH: But by the same word the heaven and earth that exist now are destined for fire and are reserved for the day of judgement, in which men hostile to God will be destroyed.
QUENYA: But by the same word the heaven and earth that exist now are destined for fire and are reserved for the day of judgement, in which men hostile to God will be destroyed.

ENGLISH: But beloved ones, do not fail to perceive this: To the Lord a single day is like a thousand years, and thousand years as a single day.
QUENYA: But beloved ones, do not fail to perceive this: To the Lord a single day is like a thousand years, and thousand years as a single day.

ENGLISH: The Lord is not slow in fulfilling his promise, as some count slowness, but he shows patience to you, since he does not wish that anyone will be destroyed, but that all will find repentance.
QUENYA: The Lord is not slow in fulfilling his promise, as some count slowness, but he shows patience to you, since he does not wish that anyone will be destroyed, but that all will find repentance.

ENGLISH: But the day of the Lord will come as a thief, in which heaven will pass away with a great noice, but the heavenly bodies will melt in a terrible heat, and earth and that have been done in it shall be revealed.
QUENYA: But the day of the Lord will come as a thief, in which heaven will pass away with a great noice, but the heavenly bodies will melt in a terrible heat, and earth and that have been done in it shall be revealed.

ENGLISH: Since all these things will melt away, understand what is the kind of people it is necessary for you to be, by holy deeds and conduct and doings of reverence ,
QUENYA: Since all these things will melt away, understand what is the kind of people it is necessary for you to be, by holy deeds and conduct and doings of reverence ,

ENGLISH: while you look forward to the Lord's day and speed up the coming of that day, in which heaven, being on fire, melts and the heavenly bodies melt away in a terrible heat.
QUENYA: while you look forward to the Lord's day and speed up the coming of that day, in which heaven, being on fire, melts and the heavenly bodies melt away in a terrible heat.

ENGLISH: But by his promise we look forward to a new heaven and a new earth, in which righteousness shall dwell.
QUENYA: But by his promise we look forward to a new heaven and a new earth, in which righteousness shall dwell.

ENGLISH: Therefore, beloved ones, since you look forward to these things, do everything that you can to be found without stain or blot, and at peace.
QUENYA: Therefore, beloved ones, since you look forward to these things, do everything that you can to be found without stain or blot, and at peace.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, count our Lord's patience as an opportunity for salvation, just like Paul, our beloved brother, also wrote to you by the wisdom given him,
QUENYA: Furthermore, count our Lord's patience as an opportunity for salvation, just like Paul, our beloved brother, also wrote to you by the wisdom given him,

ENGLISH: speaking of these things as he does in all his letters. But in them are some things that are difficult to understand, which the untaught and the unsteady twist, as they also twist the other Scriptures, to their own undoing.
QUENYA: speaking of these things as he does in all his letters. But in them are some things that are difficult to understand, which the untaught and the unsteady twist, as they also twist the other Scriptures, to their own undoing.

ENGLISH: Therefore, beloved ones, since you know this beforehand, take heed that you are not led away with them by the error of those who stand against the Law, and fall from your own steadfastness.
QUENYA: Therefore, beloved ones, since you know this beforehand, take heed that you are not led away with them by the error of those who stand against the Law, and fall from your own steadfastness.

ENGLISH: But thrive by the grace and by the knowledge about our Lord and our Savior, Jesus Christ. To him be the glory, now and in the day of eternity alike.
QUENYA: But thrive by the grace and by the knowledge about our Lord and our Savior, Jesus Christ. To him be the glory, now and in the day of eternity alike.

ENGLISH: Paul and Silvanus and Timothy to the congregation in Thessalonica, in God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
QUENYA: Paul and Silvanus and Timothy to the congregation in Thessalonica, in God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

ENGLISH: May you have grace and peace from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ!
QUENYA: May you have grace and peace from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ!

ENGLISH: We are obliged to always give God thanks concerning you, brothers, as is proper; for your faith is growing extremely quickly, and among you everyone's love of the others is ever more great.
QUENYA: We are obliged to always give God thanks concerning you, brothers, as is proper; for your faith is growing extremely quickly, and among you everyone's love of the others is ever more great.

ENGLISH: Therefore we praise ourselves concerning you among God's congregations, by reason of your steadfastness and your faith in all your persecutions and the tribulations that you bear,
QUENYA: Therefore we praise ourselves concerning you among God's congregations, by reason of your steadfastness and your faith in all your persecutions and the tribulations that you bear,

ENGLISH: showing forth God's just judgment, for you to be counted worthy of God's kingdom, for which you are indeed suffering.
QUENYA: showing forth God's just judgment, for you to be counted worthy of God's kingdom, for which you are indeed suffering.

ENGLISH: Thus it is just in God's eyes to pay back tribulation to those that cause tribulation to you,
QUENYA: Thus it is just in God's eyes to pay back tribulation to those that cause tribulation to you,

ENGLISH: but to you that suffer tribulation, rest with us when the Lord Jesus is revealed from heaven with his powerful angels
QUENYA: but to you that suffer tribulation, rest with us when the Lord Jesus is revealed from heaven with his powerful angels

ENGLISH: in a burning flame, when he brings destruction upon those that do not know God and do not follow the gospel of Jesus our Lord.
QUENYA: in a burning flame, when he brings destruction upon those that do not know God and do not follow the gospel of Jesus our Lord.

ENGLISH: They will suffer punishment of eternal undoing away from the Lord and from his glorious strength,
QUENYA: They will suffer punishment of eternal undoing away from the Lord and from his glorious strength,

ENGLISH: on the day that he shall come to receive glory among his holy ones and to be watched with wonder by all that believed – for the witness that we gave was believed by yourselves.
QUENYA: on the day that he shall come to receive glory among his holy ones and to be watched with wonder by all that believed – for the witness that we gave was believed by yourselves.

ENGLISH: For this goal we are indeed always praying for you, praying that our God will count you worthy of his calling and will complete everything that he wants – goodness and deeds of faith – in power,
QUENYA: For this goal we are indeed always praying for you, praying that our God will count you worthy of his calling and will complete everything that he wants – goodness and deeds of faith – in power,

ENGLISH: in order to bring glory to Jesus our Lord's name among you.
QUENYA: in order to bring glory to Jesus our Lord's name among you.

ENGLISH: But, brothers, concerning the return of your Lord Jesus Christ and our being gathered to him, we ask of you:
QUENYA: But, brothers, concerning the return of your Lord Jesus Christ and our being gathered to him, we ask of you:

ENGLISH: Do not be quickly shaken from your wits or stirred, by a spirit's revelation or by a word or by a letter said to come from us, saying that the Lord's day has come.
QUENYA: Do not be quickly shaken from your wits or stirred, by a spirit's revelation or by a word or by a letter said to come from us, saying that the Lord's day has come.

ENGLISH: Let no one so seduce you, since it will not come before the apostasy has come first, and the man of lawlessness will be revealed, the son of destruction .
QUENYA: Let no one so seduce you, since it will not come before the apostasy has come first, and the man of lawlessness will be revealed, the son of destruction .
