ENGLISH: He stands against us and elevates himself over everyone called god or to whom one prays; thus he will sit down in God's temple, showing himself as a god.
QUENYA: He stands against us and elevates himself over everyone called god or to whom one prays; thus he will sit down in God's temple, showing himself as a god.

ENGLISH: Do you not recall that while I was with you, I told you these things?
QUENYA: Do you not recall that while I was with you, I told you these things?

ENGLISH: And now you know that is keeping him restrained, for him to be revealed at his own time.
QUENYA: And now you know that is keeping him restrained, for him to be revealed at his own time.

ENGLISH: The secret of lawlessness is working now as well, but solely until who is now standing against it will be taken away.
QUENYA: The secret of lawlessness is working now as well, but solely until who is now standing against it will be taken away.

ENGLISH: And then the lawless person will be revealed, whom the Lord Jesus will undo with the breath of his mouth, and whom he will bring to nothing when his coming has been made known
QUENYA: And then the lawless person will be revealed, whom the Lord Jesus will undo with the breath of his mouth, and whom he will bring to nothing when his coming has been made known

ENGLISH: – he whose coming is caused by Satan's work, by every mighty deed and sign and lying portent,
QUENYA: – he whose coming is caused by Satan's work, by every mighty deed and sign and lying portent,

ENGLISH: and every unjust temptation of the ones that will be destroyed , since they did not receive the love of truth, for them to be saved.
QUENYA: and every unjust temptation of the ones that will be destroyed , since they did not receive the love of truth, for them to be saved.

ENGLISH: Therefore God gave them over to a powerful error , for them to believe the lie.
QUENYA: Therefore God gave them over to a powerful error , for them to believe the lie.

ENGLISH: Thus all among them will be judged, since they did not believe the truth, but had joy in unrighteousness.
QUENYA: Thus all among them will be judged, since they did not believe the truth, but had joy in unrighteousness.

ENGLISH: But for us it is necessary give God thanks concerning you, brothers beloved by the Lord, for God chose you from the beginning for you to be saved, by sanctification of spirit and by faith in the truth
QUENYA: But for us it is necessary give God thanks concerning you, brothers beloved by the Lord, for God chose you from the beginning for you to be saved, by sanctification of spirit and by faith in the truth

ENGLISH: to which he also called you by the gospel that we bring, for you to have the glory of the Lord Jesus Christ.
QUENYA: to which he also called you by the gospel that we bring, for you to have the glory of the Lord Jesus Christ.

ENGLISH: Therefore, brothers, stand firm and abide by the received instructions of which you were instructed – whether by our word or whether by our letter.
QUENYA: Therefore, brothers, stand firm and abide by the received instructions of which you were instructed – whether by our word or whether by our letter.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, may Jesus Christ himself and God our Father, who loved us and gave us eternal comfort and good hope by grace,
QUENYA: Furthermore, may Jesus Christ himself and God our Father, who loved us and gave us eternal comfort and good hope by grace,

ENGLISH: comfort your heart and make you firm in every good deed and word.
QUENYA: comfort your heart and make you firm in every good deed and word.

ENGLISH: Finally, brothers, pray on our behalf; thus the Lord's word will still move quickly and will receive glory, as it is doing beside you.
QUENYA: Finally, brothers, pray on our behalf; thus the Lord's word will still move quickly and will receive glory, as it is doing beside you.

ENGLISH: Also pray that you will be delivered from evil and wicked men, for all do not have faith.
QUENYA: Also pray that you will be delivered from evil and wicked men, for all do not have faith.

ENGLISH: But the Lord is faithful, and he will make you firm and will protect you from the Evil One.
QUENYA: But the Lord is faithful, and he will make you firm and will protect you from the Evil One.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, we are certain in the Lord concerning you, that you are doing and still will do that we command.
QUENYA: Furthermore, we are certain in the Lord concerning you, that you are doing and still will do that we command.

ENGLISH: But the Lord will lead your heart into God's love and the endurance of the Christ.
QUENYA: But the Lord will lead your heart into God's love and the endurance of the Christ.

ENGLISH: Now I am commanding you, brothers, by the name of the our Lord Jesus Christ: Keep yourselves away from every brother who walks in an improper manner and not by the custom that you received from us.
QUENYA: Now I am commanding you, brothers, by the name of the our Lord Jesus Christ: Keep yourselves away from every brother who walks in an improper manner and not by the custom that you received from us.

ENGLISH: For you know how it is necessary for you to follow in our path, by doing as we did, since we did not behave among you in an improper manner,
QUENYA: For you know how it is necessary for you to follow in our path, by doing as we did, since we did not behave among you in an improper manner,

ENGLISH: or ate anyone's food not paying. On the contrary, by work and by toil, at night and at day, we labored not to put burden on anyone among you.
QUENYA: or ate anyone's food not paying. On the contrary, by work and by toil, at night and at day, we labored not to put burden on anyone among you.

ENGLISH: Not by lacking power, but to make ourselves an example to you, we did so – for you to do as we did.
QUENYA: Not by lacking power, but to make ourselves an example to you, we did so – for you to do as we did.

ENGLISH: For when we were with you, we gave you this command: ”If anyone does not wish to work, he also will not eat.”
QUENYA: For when we were with you, we gave you this command: ”If anyone does not wish to work, he also will not eat.”

ENGLISH: For we are hearing that some among you walk in an improper manner, failing to work, but inserting themselves into the matters of others.
QUENYA: For we are hearing that some among you walk in an improper manner, failing to work, but inserting themselves into the matters of others.

ENGLISH: To such people we give this command and exhortation by the Lord Jesus Christ: They are to eat their own bread by laboring in silence.
QUENYA: To such people we give this command and exhortation by the Lord Jesus Christ: They are to eat their own bread by laboring in silence.

ENGLISH: But you, brothers, do not become tired, ceasing to do what is right!
QUENYA: But you, brothers, do not become tired, ceasing to do what is right!

ENGLISH: But if anyone does not listen to our word through this letter, remember who he is. Stop being with him, for him to be humiliated.
QUENYA: But if anyone does not listen to our word through this letter, remember who he is. Stop being with him, for him to be humiliated.

ENGLISH: But do not count him as an enemy, but warn him as a brother.
QUENYA: But do not count him as an enemy, but warn him as a brother.

ENGLISH: May the Lord of peace himself give you peace always, in every manner. May the Lord be with you!
QUENYA: May the Lord of peace himself give you peace always, in every manner. May the Lord be with you!

ENGLISH: This is my greeting by my own hand, which is a sign in every letter: So I write.
QUENYA: This is my greeting by my own hand, which is a sign in every letter: So I write.

ENGLISH: May the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with all among you!
QUENYA: May the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with all among you!

ENGLISH: Paul – apostle of Jesus Christ by God's will, by the promise about the life which is in Jesus Christ –
QUENYA: Paul – apostle of Jesus Christ by God's will, by the promise about the life which is in Jesus Christ –

ENGLISH: to Timothy , beloved child: Grace, mercy and peace from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord.
QUENYA: to Timothy , beloved child: Grace, mercy and peace from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord.

ENGLISH: I give thanks to God, to whom I am a servant as were my fathers, having a clean conscience, since I do not ever stop recalling you in my prayers , night and day,
QUENYA: I give thanks to God, to whom I am a servant as were my fathers, having a clean conscience, since I do not ever stop recalling you in my prayers , night and day,

ENGLISH: longing to see you, when I recall your tears, for me to be filled with joy.
QUENYA: longing to see you, when I recall your tears, for me to be filled with joy.

ENGLISH: For I recall the faith that is in you without hypocricy, and which dwelt first in Lois your grandmother and Eunice your mother, but I am sure that it exists also in you.
QUENYA: For I recall the faith that is in you without hypocricy, and which dwelt first in Lois your grandmother and Eunice your mother, but I am sure that it exists also in you.

ENGLISH: For this reason I remind you to rekindle like a fire God's gift which is in you, since I put my hands upon you.
QUENYA: For this reason I remind you to rekindle like a fire God's gift which is in you, since I put my hands upon you.

ENGLISH: For God has not given us a timid spirit, but a spirit of power and love and of health of mind.
QUENYA: For God has not given us a timid spirit, but a spirit of power and love and of health of mind.

ENGLISH: Therefore do not be ashamed about the witness of our Lord, or concerning me as his bound one, but have your share in suffering for the gospel, by God's power.
QUENYA: Therefore do not be ashamed about the witness of our Lord, or concerning me as his bound one, but have your share in suffering for the gospel, by God's power.

ENGLISH: He saved us and called us by a holy calling, not by reason of our deeds, but by reason of his own purpose and his grace, given us by Jesus Christ before everlasting times,
QUENYA: He saved us and called us by a holy calling, not by reason of our deeds, but by reason of his own purpose and his grace, given us by Jesus Christ before everlasting times,

ENGLISH: but now it has been made known when our Savior, Jesus Christ, was revealed. He has put an end to death and has shone a light upon life and upon incorruption by the gospel,
QUENYA: but now it has been made known when our Savior, Jesus Christ, was revealed. He has put an end to death and has shone a light upon life and upon incorruption by the gospel,

ENGLISH: concerning which I have been set aside as a herald and an apostle and a teacher.
QUENYA: concerning which I have been set aside as a herald and an apostle and a teacher.

ENGLISH: For this reason I suffer also these things, but I am not ashamed. For I know the one in whom you have believed, and I am sure that he can guard what is put in my custody until that Day.
QUENYA: For this reason I suffer also these things, but I am not ashamed. For I know the one in whom you have believed, and I am sure that he can guard what is put in my custody until that Day.

ENGLISH: Be led by the healthy words that you have heard from me, by the faith and love in Jesus Christ.
QUENYA: Be led by the healthy words that you have heard from me, by the faith and love in Jesus Christ.

ENGLISH: Watch the good thing put in your custody, by the holy spirit that dwells in you.
QUENYA: Watch the good thing put in your custody, by the holy spirit that dwells in you.

ENGLISH: As you know, all the people from Asia have forsaken me. Among them are Phygellus and Hermogenes.
QUENYA: As you know, all the people from Asia have forsaken me. Among them are Phygellus and Hermogenes.

ENGLISH: May the Lord have mercy on Onesiphorus's house, for frequently he brought me refreshment, and he was not ashamed about my bonds.
QUENYA: May the Lord have mercy on Onesiphorus's house, for frequently he brought me refreshment, and he was not ashamed about my bonds.

ENGLISH: On the contrary, when he came to Rome, he sought me without rest and found me.
QUENYA: On the contrary, when he came to Rome, he sought me without rest and found me.

ENGLISH: May the Lord let him to find mercy with the Lord on that day. And all the acts of service that he did in Ephesus you know well.
QUENYA: May the Lord let him to find mercy with the Lord on that day. And all the acts of service that he did in Ephesus you know well.

ENGLISH: Therefore you be strengthened, my child, by the grace that is by Christ Jesus.
QUENYA: Therefore you be strengthened, my child, by the grace that is by Christ Jesus.

ENGLISH: And the things that you heard from me through many witnesses, give them to faithful men, for whom it will also be possible to instruct others.
QUENYA: And the things that you heard from me through many witnesses, give them to faithful men, for whom it will also be possible to instruct others.

ENGLISH: As a good soldier of Christ Jesus suffer evil with the others.
QUENYA: As a good soldier of Christ Jesus suffer evil with the others.

ENGLISH: No one who is a soldier allows himself to be entangled by the commerce of life. Thus he can please the one who made him a soldier.
QUENYA: No one who is a soldier allows himself to be entangled by the commerce of life. Thus he can please the one who made him a soldier.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, if anyone runs in a race, he does not receive a crown if he does not run according to the rules.
QUENYA: Furthermore, if anyone runs in a race, he does not receive a crown if he does not run according to the rules.

ENGLISH: As is necessary, the working farmer is the first who receives a part of the fruits.
QUENYA: As is necessary, the working farmer is the first who receives a part of the fruits.

ENGLISH: Fill your mind with my sayings, for the Lord will give you insight concerning all things.
QUENYA: Fill your mind with my sayings, for the Lord will give you insight concerning all things.

ENGLISH: Recall Jesus Christ, raised from dead, of the seed of David, as made known in my gospel,
QUENYA: Recall Jesus Christ, raised from dead, of the seed of David, as made known in my gospel,

ENGLISH: the gospel for which I am suffering and am carrying bonds as an evil-doer. But God's word is not in bonds.
QUENYA: the gospel for which I am suffering and am carrying bonds as an evil-doer. But God's word is not in bonds.

ENGLISH: Therefore I am steadfast in everything for the good of the chosen ones, wishing that also they will receive the salvation that is in Christ Jesus, with eternal glory.
QUENYA: Therefore I am steadfast in everything for the good of the chosen ones, wishing that also they will receive the salvation that is in Christ Jesus, with eternal glory.

ENGLISH: Faithful the word: If we died with him, we will also live with him;
QUENYA: Faithful the word: If we died with him, we will also live with him;

ENGLISH: if we are faithful, we will also rule with him; if he deny him, he will also deny us;
QUENYA: if we are faithful, we will also rule with him; if he deny him, he will also deny us;

ENGLISH: if we are not faithful, he is still faithful, for he cannot deny himself.
QUENYA: if we are not faithful, he is still faithful, for he cannot deny himself.

ENGLISH: Make them recall that, and command them before the Lord: Do not quarrel about words, for that is not beneficial, and destroyes who listen.
QUENYA: Make them recall that, and command them before the Lord: Do not quarrel about words, for that is not beneficial, and destroyes who listen.

ENGLISH: Do everything to put yourself before God as a tested person who works without being ashamed, handling the sword of truth in a skillful manner.
QUENYA: Do everything to put yourself before God as a tested person who works without being ashamed, handling the sword of truth in a skillful manner.

ENGLISH: But turn yourself away from empty and unholy sayings, for they lead into ever deeper godlessness,
QUENYA: But turn yourself away from empty and unholy sayings, for they lead into ever deeper godlessness,

ENGLISH: and their word will spread like rot in flesh. Hymenaeus and Philetus are among them.
QUENYA: and their word will spread like rot in flesh. Hymenaeus and Philetus are among them.

ENGLISH: These people have turned themselves from the truth, saying that the resurrection has happened even now, and they make some peoples' faith unsteady.
QUENYA: These people have turned themselves from the truth, saying that the resurrection has happened even now, and they make some peoples' faith unsteady.

ENGLISH: And yet God's firm foundation still stands, having this seal: “The Lord knows his own”, and: “It is necessary for everyone that names the Lord's name to abandon unrighteousness!”
QUENYA: And yet God's firm foundation still stands, having this seal: “The Lord knows his own”, and: “It is necessary for everyone that names the Lord's name to abandon unrighteousness!”

ENGLISH: In a big house there are vessels not only of gold and silver, but also of wood or earthenware, and some vessels for a glorious purpose, but others for a purpose without glory.
QUENYA: In a big house there are vessels not only of gold and silver, but also of wood or earthenware, and some vessels for a glorious purpose, but others for a purpose without glory.

ENGLISH: Therefore, if anyone purifies himself from them, he will be a vessel for a glorious purpose, hallowed, useful for who has it, prepared for every good deed.
QUENYA: Therefore, if anyone purifies himself from them, he will be a vessel for a glorious purpose, hallowed, useful for who has it, prepared for every good deed.

ENGLISH: Therefore, flee from the youthful desires, but pursue righteousness, faith, love, with that call to the Lord out of a pure heart.
QUENYA: Therefore, flee from the youthful desires, but pursue righteousness, faith, love, with that call to the Lord out of a pure heart.

ENGLISH: But turn away foolish and ignorant inquries, knowing that they lead to quarrelings.
QUENYA: But turn away foolish and ignorant inquries, knowing that they lead to quarrelings.

ENGLISH: But it is necessary that the Lord's slave does not quarrel, but that he is gentle to all, knowing to instruct, restraining himself when he suffers evil,
QUENYA: But it is necessary that the Lord's slave does not quarrel, but that he is gentle to all, knowing to instruct, restraining himself when he suffers evil,

ENGLISH: gently instructing the hostile ones, for perhaps God will give them a change of mind, leading to knowledge of the truth,
QUENYA: gently instructing the hostile ones, for perhaps God will give them a change of mind, leading to knowledge of the truth,

ENGLISH: and they will return to their keenness of perception out of the Devil's snare, they that were seized by him in order to do his will.
QUENYA: and they will return to their keenness of perception out of the Devil's snare, they that were seized by him in order to do his will.

ENGLISH: But know this: In the last days difficult times will come.
QUENYA: But know this: In the last days difficult times will come.

ENGLISH: For men will love themselves and will love money , praising themselved – haughty, blaspheming, not heeding parents, thankless, disloyal,
QUENYA: For men will love themselves and will love money , praising themselved – haughty, blaspheming, not heeding parents, thankless, disloyal,

ENGLISH: without love for their kin, remaining in strife, speaking evil about others, not able to control themselves, wild, without love of good,
QUENYA: without love for their kin, remaining in strife, speaking evil about others, not able to control themselves, wild, without love of good,

ENGLISH: betrayers, willful, proud, loving their lusts over God,
QUENYA: betrayers, willful, proud, loving their lusts over God,

ENGLISH: having a form of reverence but denying its power; and from such people turn yourself away.
QUENYA: having a form of reverence but denying its power; and from such people turn yourself away.

ENGLISH: For from them arise that cleverly enter into houses and snare frail women that carry a burden of sin, led by various desires.
QUENYA: For from them arise that cleverly enter into houses and snare frail women that carry a burden of sin, led by various desires.

ENGLISH: They are always learning, but they are not able to ever come to knowledge of the truth.
QUENYA: They are always learning, but they are not able to ever come to knowledge of the truth.

ENGLISH: As Jannes and Jambres stood against Moses, so also these men stand against the truth, men completely corrupted in their minds, rejected concerning the faith.
QUENYA: As Jannes and Jambres stood against Moses, so also these men stand against the truth, men completely corrupted in their minds, rejected concerning the faith.

ENGLISH: But they will not come any longer , for their madness will be shown to all, as also was their madness .
QUENYA: But they will not come any longer , for their madness will be shown to all, as also was their madness .

ENGLISH: But you have followed my instruction, my path in life, my aim, my faith, my patience, my steadfastness,
QUENYA: But you have followed my instruction, my path in life, my aim, my faith, my patience, my steadfastness,

ENGLISH: my persecutions, my sufferings – like those that happened to me in Antioch, in Iconum, in Lystra – and out of all the Lord has delivered me.
QUENYA: my persecutions, my sufferings – like those that happened to me in Antioch, in Iconum, in Lystra – and out of all the Lord has delivered me.

ENGLISH: Indeed all that wish to have a reverent life in Christ Jesus shall be persecuted.
QUENYA: Indeed all that wish to have a reverent life in Christ Jesus shall be persecuted.

ENGLISH: But wicked men and impostors will go into ever deeper evil, causing others to stray and caused to stray.
QUENYA: But wicked men and impostors will go into ever deeper evil, causing others to stray and caused to stray.

ENGLISH: But you, remain in the things that you learned and in which you firmly believe, knowing the people from whom you learned them,
QUENYA: But you, remain in the things that you learned and in which you firmly believe, knowing the people from whom you learned them,

ENGLISH: and that from you were a child you knew the holy scriptures, that can make you righteous for your salvation, by the faith which is by Christ Jesus.
QUENYA: and that from you were a child you knew the holy scriptures, that can make you righteous for your salvation, by the faith which is by Christ Jesus.

ENGLISH: All scriptures breathed by God are also beneficial for instruction, for refuting error, for making matters straight, for chastisement in righteousness.
QUENYA: All scriptures breathed by God are also beneficial for instruction, for refuting error, for making matters straight, for chastisement in righteousness.

ENGLISH: Thus it is possible for God's man to be wholly able, being prepared for every good deed.
QUENYA: Thus it is possible for God's man to be wholly able, being prepared for every good deed.

ENGLISH: I put upon you the order before God and Christ Jesus, who will judge the living and the dead, and by his apparance and by his kingdom:
QUENYA: I put upon you the order before God and Christ Jesus, who will judge the living and the dead, and by his apparance and by his kingdom:

ENGLISH: Make known the word, stand ready in good times and in times that are not good, turn away error, speak stern words, speak encouragement , having every patience in your teaching.
QUENYA: Make known the word, stand ready in good times and in times that are not good, turn away error, speak stern words, speak encouragement , having every patience in your teaching.

ENGLISH: For will come a time where they will not tolerate the beneficial teaching, but by their own desires they will gather teachers that tickle their ears,
QUENYA: For will come a time where they will not tolerate the beneficial teaching, but by their own desires they will gather teachers that tickle their ears,

ENGLISH: and from the truth they will turn themselves away, but they will stray, following lying stories.
QUENYA: and from the truth they will turn themselves away, but they will stray, following lying stories.

ENGLISH: But you, keep your keenness of perception in all things, suffer evil, labour as a person making known the gospel, complete your service .
QUENYA: But you, keep your keenness of perception in all things, suffer evil, labour as a person making known the gospel, complete your service .

ENGLISH: For I am also now poured forth as a drink-offering, and the time when I shall be freed is near.
QUENYA: For I am also now poured forth as a drink-offering, and the time when I shall be freed is near.

ENGLISH: The good fight I have fought, I have run the race to the end, I have kept the faith.
QUENYA: The good fight I have fought, I have run the race to the end, I have kept the faith.

ENGLISH: From now the wreath of righteousnes is reserved for me, that which the Lord shall give to me on that day, but not to me alone, but also all that have loved the revelation of him.
QUENYA: From now the wreath of righteousnes is reserved for me, that which the Lord shall give to me on that day, but not to me alone, but also all that have loved the revelation of him.

ENGLISH: Do everything that you can to come to me soon!
QUENYA: Do everything that you can to come to me soon!

ENGLISH: For Demas has forsaken me, since he loved this world, and he went away to Thessalonica, Crescens to Galatia, Titus to Dalmatia.
QUENYA: For Demas has forsaken me, since he loved this world, and he went away to Thessalonica, Crescens to Galatia, Titus to Dalmatia.

ENGLISH: Only Luke remains with me.
QUENYA: Only Luke remains with me.

ENGLISH: Bring Mark and make him come with you, for he is helpful for me in my service .
QUENYA: Bring Mark and make him come with you, for he is helpful for me in my service .

ENGLISH: But Tychicus I have sent to Ephesus .
QUENYA: But Tychicus I have sent to Ephesus .

ENGLISH: When I you come, bring the cloak that I left behind in Troas with Carpus, and the books, above everything the parchments .
QUENYA: When I you come, bring the cloak that I left behind in Troas with Carpus, and the books, above everything the parchments .

ENGLISH: Alexander the copper-smith did numerous evils to me – the Lord will pay him back as his deeds are –
QUENYA: Alexander the copper-smith did numerous evils to me – the Lord will pay him back as his deeds are –

ENGLISH: and you as well watch yourself concerning him, for he stood against our words in an extremely hostile manner.
QUENYA: and you as well watch yourself concerning him, for he stood against our words in an extremely hostile manner.

ENGLISH: When I defended myself on the first occasion, nobody helped me, but they abandoend me – may that not be counted against them –
QUENYA: When I defended myself on the first occasion, nobody helped me, but they abandoend me – may that not be counted against them –

ENGLISH: but the Lord stood with me and strengthened me, wishing that by me the preaching shall be completed and that all the nations will hear it; and I was delivered from the lion's mouth.
QUENYA: but the Lord stood with me and strengthened me, wishing that by me the preaching shall be completed and that all the nations will hear it; and I was delivered from the lion's mouth.

ENGLISH: The Lord will deliver me from every evil deed and will save me for his heavenly kingdom. To him be the glory forever and ever! Amen!
QUENYA: The Lord will deliver me from every evil deed and will save me for his heavenly kingdom. To him be the glory forever and ever! Amen!

ENGLISH: Greet Prisca and Aquila and the house of Onesiphorus!
QUENYA: Greet Prisca and Aquila and the house of Onesiphorus!

ENGLISH: Erastus remained in Corinth, but Trophimus I left behind sick in Miletus .
QUENYA: Erastus remained in Corinth, but Trophimus I left behind sick in Miletus .

ENGLISH: Do everything in order to come before the winter!Eubolus greets you, and so do Pudens and Linus and Claudia and all the brothers.
QUENYA: Do everything in order to come before the winter!Eubolus greets you, and so do Pudens and Linus and Claudia and all the brothers.

ENGLISH: May the Lord be with your spirit! May his grace be with you!
QUENYA: May the Lord be with your spirit! May his grace be with you!

ENGLISH: The elder to Gaius the beloved, whom I love in truth.
QUENYA: The elder to Gaius the beloved, whom I love in truth.

ENGLISH: Beloved, I pray that in all things you are prosperous and have good health, as your soul is prosperous.
QUENYA: Beloved, I pray that in all things you are prosperous and have good health, as your soul is prosperous.

ENGLISH: For I had the greatest joy when some brothers came and witnessed about the truth that is in you, and how you walk in the truth.
QUENYA: For I had the greatest joy when some brothers came and witnessed about the truth that is in you, and how you walk in the truth.

ENGLISH: I do not have reason for thanksgiving greater than this: that I hear that my children walk in the truth.
QUENYA: I do not have reason for thanksgiving greater than this: that I hear that my children walk in the truth.

ENGLISH: Beloved, you are doing a faithful work in everything that you do for the brothers, also for strangers,
QUENYA: Beloved, you are doing a faithful work in everything that you do for the brothers, also for strangers,

ENGLISH: who have witnessed about your love before the congregation. Please, send them away in a manner worthy of God.
QUENYA: who have witnessed about your love before the congregation. Please, send them away in a manner worthy of God.

ENGLISH: For on behalf of his name they went forth, not taking anything from people of nations.
QUENYA: For on behalf of his name they went forth, not taking anything from people of nations.

ENGLISH: Therefore we must receive such people, that we will work together for the truth.
QUENYA: Therefore we must receive such people, that we will work together for the truth.

ENGLISH: I wrote some words to the congregation, but Diotrephes, who loves being prominent among them, does not receive anything from us.
QUENYA: I wrote some words to the congregation, but Diotrephes, who loves being prominent among them, does not receive anything from us.

ENGLISH: Therefore, if I will come, I will make them remember his deeds that he is doing, chattering about us with evil words. Moreover, since that is not enough for him, he also refuses to receive the brothers, and who want to receive them he tries to stop and to throw them out of the congregation.
QUENYA: Therefore, if I will come, I will make them remember his deeds that he is doing, chattering about us with evil words. Moreover, since that is not enough for him, he also refuses to receive the brothers, and who want to receive them he tries to stop and to throw them out of the congregation.

ENGLISH: Beloved, do, not according to what is evil, but according to that which is good. who does good is of God. who does evil has not seen God.
QUENYA: Beloved, do, not according to what is evil, but according to that which is good. who does good is of God. who does evil has not seen God.

ENGLISH: Demetrius has a good witness from all among them, and from the truth itself. Indeed also we are bearing witness, ar you know that our witness is true.
QUENYA: Demetrius has a good witness from all among them, and from the truth itself. Indeed also we are bearing witness, ar you know that our witness is true.

ENGLISH: I had many things to write to you , and yet I do not want to write to you with ink and with pen.
QUENYA: I had many things to write to you , and yet I do not want to write to you with ink and with pen.

ENGLISH: But I have the hope that I will see you personally, and we will speak face to face. Peace be to you! The friends greet you. Greet the friends, each one by name.
QUENYA: But I have the hope that I will see you personally, and we will speak face to face. Peace be to you! The friends greet you. Greet the friends, each one by name.

ENGLISH: My first account, glorious Theophilus, I wrote about all the things that Jesus started to do and to teach,
QUENYA: My first account, glorious Theophilus, I wrote about all the things that Jesus started to do and to teach,

ENGLISH: until the day when he was taken up, after he gave commands to the apostles that he chose.
QUENYA: until the day when he was taken up, after he gave commands to the apostles that he chose.

ENGLISH: To them he also showed himself alive with many signs after he suffered, being seen by them through forty days, making known the things that concern God's kingdom.
QUENYA: To them he also showed himself alive with many signs after he suffered, being seen by them through forty days, making known the things that concern God's kingdom.

ENGLISH: And at his meetings with them he gave them the commands: “Do not go away from Jerusalem, but remain, waiting for that about which the Father gave his promise, and about which you heard from me.
QUENYA: And at his meetings with them he gave them the commands: “Do not go away from Jerusalem, but remain, waiting for that about which the Father gave his promise, and about which you heard from me.

ENGLISH: For John baptized with water, but you will be baptized with Holy Spirit not many days from now.”
QUENYA: For John baptized with water, but you will be baptized with Holy Spirit not many days from now.”

ENGLISH: Now when they were assembled, they asked him: “Lord, do you renew the kingdom for Israel at this time?”
QUENYA: Now when they were assembled, they asked him: “Lord, do you renew the kingdom for Israel at this time?”

ENGLISH: He said to them: “It is not for you to know the times and moments which the Father has placed in his own power,
QUENYA: He said to them: “It is not for you to know the times and moments which the Father has placed in his own power,

ENGLISH: but you will receive power when the Holy Spirit shall come to you; and you will be my witnesses in Jerusalem and the entire Judea and Samaria alike, and to the farthest part of the earth.”
QUENYA: but you will receive power when the Holy Spirit shall come to you; and you will be my witnesses in Jerusalem and the entire Judea and Samaria alike, and to the farthest part of the earth.”

ENGLISH: And after he said these things, while they were watching, he was being lifted up, and a cloud hid him from their eyes .
QUENYA: And after he said these things, while they were watching, he was being lifted up, and a cloud hid him from their eyes .

ENGLISH: And while they looked up into heaven when he went away, behold! two men in white garments stood by them,
QUENYA: And while they looked up into heaven when he went away, behold! two men in white garments stood by them,

ENGLISH: and they said: “Men from Galilee, how is that you are standing looking at heaven? This Jesus, who was taken up from you into the cloud, shall return so, in the same manner that you watched him go into heaven.”
QUENYA: and they said: “Men from Galilee, how is that you are standing looking at heaven? This Jesus, who was taken up from you into the cloud, shall return so, in the same manner that you watched him go into heaven.”

ENGLISH: Then they went back into Jerusalem from the mountain called Mount of Olives, which is near to Jerusalem, around a sabbath's journey away.
QUENYA: Then they went back into Jerusalem from the mountain called Mount of Olives, which is near to Jerusalem, around a sabbath's journey away.

ENGLISH: Then, after going inside, they went up into the upper hall where they dwelt, Peter and John and Jacob and Andrew, Philip and Thomas and Matthew, Jacob son of Alphaeus and Simon the Zelot, and Judas son of Jacob.
QUENYA: Then, after going inside, they went up into the upper hall where they dwelt, Peter and John and Jacob and Andrew, Philip and Thomas and Matthew, Jacob son of Alphaeus and Simon the Zelot, and Judas son of Jacob.

ENGLISH: All among them were steadfast in prayer, with some women and Mary mother of Jesus, and with his brothers.
QUENYA: All among them were steadfast in prayer, with some women and Mary mother of Jesus, and with his brothers.

ENGLISH: Now in those days Peter arose out of the middle of the brothers – the crowd was around hundred and twenty persons – and said:
QUENYA: Now in those days Peter arose out of the middle of the brothers – the crowd was around hundred and twenty persons – and said:

ENGLISH: “Men, brothers, it was necessary for the Scripture to be made true, that which the Holy Spirit spoke beforehand through David's mouth about Judas, who showed the way for those that seized Jesus.
QUENYA: “Men, brothers, it was necessary for the Scripture to be made true, that which the Holy Spirit spoke beforehand through David's mouth about Judas, who showed the way for those that seized Jesus.

ENGLISH: For he was counted among us and received a part in this ministry.”
QUENYA: For he was counted among us and received a part in this ministry.”

ENGLISH: (This man got a field for the reward of unrighteousness, and falling with a headlong movement he burst in the middle, and all his entrails poured out of him.
QUENYA: (This man got a field for the reward of unrighteousness, and falling with a headlong movement he burst in the middle, and all his entrails poured out of him.

ENGLISH: That became known to all that dwelt in Jerusalem, and therefore that field was called in their tongue Aceldama, which means: Field of Blood.)
QUENYA: That became known to all that dwelt in Jerusalem, and therefore that field was called in their tongue Aceldama, which means: Field of Blood.)

ENGLISH: “For has been written in the Book of Psalms: 'May his home be empty, and may no one live there', and: 'His place of oversight let another take.'
QUENYA: “For has been written in the Book of Psalms: 'May his home be empty, and may no one live there', and: 'His place of oversight let another take.'

ENGLISH: Therefore it is necessary for us to choose one of the men that came together with us through the entire time in which the Lord Jesus went in and out among us,
QUENYA: Therefore it is necessary for us to choose one of the men that came together with us through the entire time in which the Lord Jesus went in and out among us,

ENGLISH: from the beginning when John was baptizing and until the day when he was received up from us. For a person among them it is necessary to be a witness with us about his resurrection.”
QUENYA: from the beginning when John was baptizing and until the day when he was received up from us. For a person among them it is necessary to be a witness with us about his resurrection.”

ENGLISH: And they led forward two, Joseph called Barsabbas, who had the nickname Justus, and Matthias.
QUENYA: And they led forward two, Joseph called Barsabbas, who had the nickname Justus, and Matthias.

ENGLISH: And they prayed and said: “You, Lord who know the hearts of all, make known who you have chosen
QUENYA: And they prayed and said: “You, Lord who know the hearts of all, make known who you have chosen

ENGLISH: to receive the ministry and place as apostle which Judas abandoned to go to his own place.”
QUENYA: to receive the ministry and place as apostle which Judas abandoned to go to his own place.”

ENGLISH: And they threw lots about them, and the lot indicated Matthias, and he was counted among the eleven apostles.
QUENYA: And they threw lots about them, and the lot indicated Matthias, and he was counted among the eleven apostles.

ENGLISH: When the day of the festival of Seven Weeks was come, they were all together in one place,
QUENYA: When the day of the festival of Seven Weeks was come, they were all together in one place,

ENGLISH: and suddenly came from heaven a noice as of a blowing violent wind, and they filled the entire house in which they were.
QUENYA: and suddenly came from heaven a noice as of a blowing violent wind, and they filled the entire house in which they were.

ENGLISH: And tongues as of fire being distributed appeared to them, and it settled on everyone among them.
QUENYA: And tongues as of fire being distributed appeared to them, and it settled on everyone among them.

ENGLISH: Then all among them were filled with Holy Spirit and began to speak in various tongues, as the Spirit gave to them to talk.
QUENYA: Then all among them were filled with Holy Spirit and began to speak in various tongues, as the Spirit gave to them to talk.

ENGLISH: And were in Jerusalem Jews dwelling there, pious men, from every country under heaven.
QUENYA: And were in Jerusalem Jews dwelling there, pious men, from every country under heaven.

ENGLISH: Thus, when this noise occurred, the host assembled and was confused, for everyone aming them heard them speak in his own tongue.
QUENYA: Thus, when this noise occurred, the host assembled and was confused, for everyone aming them heard them speak in his own tongue.

ENGLISH: They were startled and in wonder, saying: “Behold, all these people that are speaking are from Galilee, no?
QUENYA: They were startled and in wonder, saying: “Behold, all these people that are speaking are from Galilee, no?

ENGLISH: And yet how is that we are hearing, everyone among us, his own tongue that we are born in?
QUENYA: And yet how is that we are hearing, everyone among us, his own tongue that we are born in?

ENGLISH: People from Parthea ar Media and Elam, people that dwell in Mesopotamia, Judea and Capadocia, Pontus and Asia,
QUENYA: People from Parthea ar Media and Elam, people that dwell in Mesopotamia, Judea and Capadocia, Pontus and Asia,

ENGLISH: and Phrygia and Pamphylia, Egypt and the regions of Libya, near to Cyrene, and that have come from Rome, Jews and converted ones alike,
QUENYA: and Phrygia and Pamphylia, Egypt and the regions of Libya, near to Cyrene, and that have come from Rome, Jews and converted ones alike,

ENGLISH: people from Crete and Arabia – we are hearing them speak in our own tongues about God's great deeds!”
QUENYA: people from Crete and Arabia – we are hearing them speak in our own tongues about God's great deeds!”

ENGLISH: They were beside themselves with wonder and understood nothing, saying one to the other: “What is this thing?”
QUENYA: They were beside themselves with wonder and understood nothing, saying one to the other: “What is this thing?”

ENGLISH: But others, in mockery against them, said: “They are full of sweet wine!”
QUENYA: But others, in mockery against them, said: “They are full of sweet wine!”

ENGLISH: But Peter arose with the twelve and raised his voice and said to them: “Men from Judea and all you that dwell in Jerusalem, may this be known to you, and listen to my sayings:
QUENYA: But Peter arose with the twelve and raised his voice and said to them: “Men from Judea and all you that dwell in Jerusalem, may this be known to you, and listen to my sayings:

ENGLISH: These men are not full of wine as you suppose, for this is the third hour of the day.
QUENYA: These men are not full of wine as you suppose, for this is the third hour of the day.

ENGLISH: On the contrary, this is which was spoken though Joel the Prophet:
QUENYA: On the contrary, this is which was spoken though Joel the Prophet:

ENGLISH: 'And in the last days,' God says, 'I will pour of my spirit upon all flesh, and your sons and your daughters will speak like prophets, and your young men will see visions, and your old men will dream dreams will be dreamt with dreams],
QUENYA: 'And in the last days,' God says, 'I will pour of my spirit upon all flesh, and your sons and your daughters will speak like prophets, and your young men will see visions, and your old men will dream dreams will be dreamt with dreams],

ENGLISH: and also upon my male and female thralls I shall pour of my spirit in those days, and they will speak as prophets.
QUENYA: and also upon my male and female thralls I shall pour of my spirit in those days, and they will speak as prophets.

ENGLISH: And I will give signs in heaven above you and portents on earth below, blood and fire and mist of smoke;
QUENYA: And I will give signs in heaven above you and portents on earth below, blood and fire and mist of smoke;

ENGLISH: The Sun will become darkness and the Moon will become blood, before the Lord's great and mighty day shall come.
QUENYA: The Sun will become darkness and the Moon will become blood, before the Lord's great and mighty day shall come.

ENGLISH: And everyone who calls upon the Lord's name will be saved.
QUENYA: And everyone who calls upon the Lord's name will be saved.

ENGLISH: Men of Israel, hear these words: Jesus from Nazareth, a man that God put before you with mighty deeds and signs and portents which God did by him in your midst, as you know,
QUENYA: Men of Israel, hear these words: Jesus from Nazareth, a man that God put before you with mighty deeds and signs and portents which God did by him in your midst, as you know,

ENGLISH: this man, as a person given over, by God's firm plan and the knowledge that he had beforehand, you fastened on a cross by the hand of lawless ones and killed him.
QUENYA: this man, as a person given over, by God's firm plan and the knowledge that he had beforehand, you fastened on a cross by the hand of lawless ones and killed him.

ENGLISH: But God raised him by loosening the bonds of death, for it was not possible for death to keep him.
QUENYA: But God raised him by loosening the bonds of death, for it was not possible for death to keep him.

ENGLISH: For David says concerning him: 'I always saw the Lord before my eyes, for he is by my right hand, to stop me from being shaken.
QUENYA: For David says concerning him: 'I always saw the Lord before my eyes, for he is by my right hand, to stop me from being shaken.

ENGLISH: Therefore my heart was glad and my tongue spoke about great joy. Furthermore, also my flesh will dwell in hope,
QUENYA: Therefore my heart was glad and my tongue spoke about great joy. Furthermore, also my flesh will dwell in hope,

ENGLISH: for you will not abandon my soul in Mandos , also you will not allow your faithful one to see a corrupt state.
QUENYA: for you will not abandon my soul in Mandos , also you will not allow your faithful one to see a corrupt state.

ENGLISH: You have made known to me the paths of life; you will fill me with joy from your face.'
QUENYA: You have made known to me the paths of life; you will fill me with joy from your face.'

ENGLISH: Men, brothers, it is me allowed to speak freely to you about the patriarch David, that he expired and was brought to his grave, and his tomb is among us until this day.
QUENYA: Men, brothers, it is me allowed to speak freely to you about the patriarch David, that he expired and was brought to his grave, and his tomb is among us until this day.

ENGLISH: Therefore, since he was a prophet and knew that God gave him a promise about placing on his throne a person of the fruit of his loins,
QUENYA: Therefore, since he was a prophet and knew that God gave him a promise about placing on his throne a person of the fruit of his loins,

ENGLISH: he had foresight and spoke about the resurrection of the Christ, that he was not abandoned in Mandos ; furthermore, his flesh did not see a corrupt state.
QUENYA: he had foresight and spoke about the resurrection of the Christ, that he was not abandoned in Mandos ; furthermore, his flesh did not see a corrupt state.

ENGLISH: This Jesus God resurrected, about which all among us are witnesses.
QUENYA: This Jesus God resurrected, about which all among us are witnesses.

ENGLISH: Therefore, since he was raised to God's right hand and received the Holy Spirit from his Father by the promise he had given, he poured forth this that you are seeing and you are hearing.
QUENYA: Therefore, since he was raised to God's right hand and received the Holy Spirit from his Father by the promise he had given, he poured forth this that you are seeing and you are hearing.

ENGLISH: For David did not ascend to heaven, but he himself says: 'The Lord said to my lord: Sit by my right hand,
QUENYA: For David did not ascend to heaven, but he himself says: 'The Lord said to my lord: Sit by my right hand,

ENGLISH: until I shall place your enemies as a support for your feet.'
QUENYA: until I shall place your enemies as a support for your feet.'

ENGLISH: Therefore may the entire kin of Israel know that God made him Lord and Christ, this Jesus that you crucified.”
QUENYA: Therefore may the entire kin of Israel know that God made him Lord and Christ, this Jesus that you crucified.”

ENGLISH: When they heard that they were cut in their heart, and they said to Peter and to the other apostles: “Men, brothers, what are we to do?”
QUENYA: When they heard that they were cut in their heart, and they said to Peter and to the other apostles: “Men, brothers, what are we to do?”

ENGLISH: Peter said to them: “Find repentance, and may everyone among you be baptized by the name of Jesus Christ for forgiveness of your sins, and you will receive the gift of Holy Spirit.
QUENYA: Peter said to them: “Find repentance, and may everyone among you be baptized by the name of Jesus Christ for forgiveness of your sins, and you will receive the gift of Holy Spirit.

ENGLISH: For for you is the promise, and for your children and for that are far away – all that the Lord our God will call to himself.”
QUENYA: For for you is the promise, and for your children and for that are far away – all that the Lord our God will call to himself.”

ENGLISH: And with many other words he witnessed for them and urged them, saying: “Be saved from this perverse generation!”
QUENYA: And with many other words he witnessed for them and urged them, saying: “Be saved from this perverse generation!”

ENGLISH: Therefore that received his word were baptized, and on that day around three thousand souls were added.
QUENYA: Therefore that received his word were baptized, and on that day around three thousand souls were added.

ENGLISH: And they were steadfast in the teaching of the apostles and the brotherhood, in the breaking of the bread and in the prayers.
QUENYA: And they were steadfast in the teaching of the apostles and the brotherhood, in the breaking of the bread and in the prayers.

ENGLISH: Fear fell upon everyone, and numerous wonders and signs happened through the apostles.
QUENYA: Fear fell upon everyone, and numerous wonders and signs happened through the apostles.

ENGLISH: All that believed were together in having everything common,
QUENYA: All that believed were together in having everything common,

ENGLISH: and they sold their goods and the fields that they possessed and distributed the money to all, by anyone's need.
QUENYA: and they sold their goods and the fields that they possessed and distributed the money to all, by anyone's need.

ENGLISH: And day after day they were in the temple, being of one mind, and they broke bread in the houses, eating their food in joy and having a pure heart,
QUENYA: And day after day they were in the temple, being of one mind, and they broke bread in the houses, eating their food in joy and having a pure heart,

ENGLISH: praising God and having the grace of the entire people, while every day the Lord was adding to them that were saved.
QUENYA: praising God and having the grace of the entire people, while every day the Lord was adding to them that were saved.

ENGLISH: Now Peter and John went up into the temple at the hour of prayer, the ninth hour.
QUENYA: Now Peter and John went up into the temple at the hour of prayer, the ninth hour.

ENGLISH: And a man who was lame from his mother's womb was being carried thither, and they put him every day beside the gate of the temple that was called the Beautiful, for him to ask gifts of mercy from those that were going into the temple.
QUENYA: And a man who was lame from his mother's womb was being carried thither, and they put him every day beside the gate of the temple that was called the Beautiful, for him to ask gifts of mercy from those that were going into the temple.

ENGLISH: When he saw Peter and John going towards the temple, he asked from them gifts of mercy.
QUENYA: When he saw Peter and John going towards the temple, he asked from them gifts of mercy.

ENGLISH: But Peter, with John, looked at him and said: “Look at us!”
QUENYA: But Peter, with John, looked at him and said: “Look at us!”

ENGLISH: Therefore he fixed his eyes on them, thinking that he was going to receive something from them.
QUENYA: Therefore he fixed his eyes on them, thinking that he was going to receive something from them.

ENGLISH: But Peter said: “Silver and gold I do not possess, but what I do have I give to you: By the name of Jesus Christ from Nazareth, walk!”
QUENYA: But Peter said: “Silver and gold I do not possess, but what I do have I give to you: By the name of Jesus Christ from Nazareth, walk!”

ENGLISH: And he seized him in his right hand and raised him up. In the same moment his soles and the joints between foot and leg became firm,
QUENYA: And he seized him in his right hand and raised him up. In the same moment his soles and the joints between foot and leg became firm,

ENGLISH: and he jumped up and walked, and he went with them into the temple, walking and jumping and praising God.
QUENYA: and he jumped up and walked, and he went with them into the temple, walking and jumping and praising God.

ENGLISH: And the entire people saw him walking and praising God.
QUENYA: And the entire people saw him walking and praising God.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, they knew who he was, that he was the man who beforehand sat to receive gifts of mercy by the Fair Gate in the temple, and they were filled with wonder and were beside themselves by which had happened to him.
QUENYA: Furthermore, they knew who he was, that he was the man who beforehand sat to receive gifts of mercy by the Fair Gate in the temple, and they were filled with wonder and were beside themselves by which had happened to him.

ENGLISH: When the man stuck to Peter and John, the entire people, being startled, ran together to them in the place called the Columnade of Solomon.
QUENYA: When the man stuck to Peter and John, the entire people, being startled, ran together to them in the place called the Columnade of Solomon.

ENGLISH: Seeing that, Peter said to the people: “Men of Israel, how is that you are in wonder about this, and what is your reason for looking at us as if by our own power or by our godliness we have caused him to walk?
QUENYA: Seeing that, Peter said to the people: “Men of Israel, how is that you are in wonder about this, and what is your reason for looking at us as if by our own power or by our godliness we have caused him to walk?

ENGLISH: The God of Abraham and Isaac and Jacob, the God of our fathers, has made Jesus his servant glorious, him that you gave over and denied before the face of Pilate, though he wanted to free him.
QUENYA: The God of Abraham and Isaac and Jacob, the God of our fathers, has made Jesus his servant glorious, him that you gave over and denied before the face of Pilate, though he wanted to free him.

ENGLISH: You denied the holy and just , and you requested that you were to receive a man who was a murderer,
QUENYA: You denied the holy and just , and you requested that you were to receive a man who was a murderer,

ENGLISH: but you killed the Chief of life. But God raised him from dead, of which all among us are witnesses.
QUENYA: but you killed the Chief of life. But God raised him from dead, of which all among us are witnesses.

ENGLISH: Therefore, by our faith in his name, his name has made this man strong, him whom you look at and whom you know, and the faith which is through him has given him health before your eyes.
QUENYA: Therefore, by our faith in his name, his name has made this man strong, him whom you look at and whom you know, and the faith which is through him has given him health before your eyes.

ENGLISH: And now, brothers, I know that you did so in lack of knowledge, as your rulers also did.
QUENYA: And now, brothers, I know that you did so in lack of knowledge, as your rulers also did.

ENGLISH: But thus God has made true the things that beforehand he made known through the mouth of all his heralds : that his Christ was going to suffer.
QUENYA: But thus God has made true the things that beforehand he made known through the mouth of all his heralds : that his Christ was going to suffer.

ENGLISH: Therefore find repentence and turn yourselves ! Then your sins will be wiped away, allowing times of refreshment to come from the face of the Lord.
QUENYA: Therefore find repentence and turn yourselves ! Then your sins will be wiped away, allowing times of refreshment to come from the face of the Lord.

ENGLISH: Thus he will send the Christ appointed to you, Jesus,
QUENYA: Thus he will send the Christ appointed to you, Jesus,

ENGLISH: whom it is necessary for heaven to keep until the times of renewal of all things, of which God spoke by the mouth of his holy heralds , of old.
QUENYA: whom it is necessary for heaven to keep until the times of renewal of all things, of which God spoke by the mouth of his holy heralds , of old.

ENGLISH: Indeed Moses said: “The Lord your God will raise among your brothers, like me.
QUENYA: Indeed Moses said: “The Lord your God will raise among your brothers, like me.

ENGLISH: Indeed every person who does to listen to that prophet will be destroyed from his people.”
QUENYA: Indeed every person who does to listen to that prophet will be destroyed from his people.”

ENGLISH: And all the prophets, from Samuel to those that followed him – all that have spoken – have also made known these days.
QUENYA: And all the prophets, from Samuel to those that followed him – all that have spoken – have also made known these days.

ENGLISH: You are sons of the prophets and of the covenant that God established with your fathers, saying to Abraham: 'And in your seed all the families of earth will be blessed.'
QUENYA: You are sons of the prophets and of the covenant that God established with your fathers, saying to Abraham: 'And in your seed all the families of earth will be blessed.'

ENGLISH: After God raised his Son, to you he first sent him to bless you, by turning everyone away from your wicked deeds.”
QUENYA: After God raised his Son, to you he first sent him to bless you, by turning everyone away from your wicked deeds.”

ENGLISH: While they talked to the people, the chief priests and the captain of the temple and the Sadducees came to them,
QUENYA: While they talked to the people, the chief priests and the captain of the temple and the Sadducees came to them,

ENGLISH: being angry since they instructed the people and made know the resurrection from the dead by Jesus.
QUENYA: being angry since they instructed the people and made know the resurrection from the dead by Jesus.

ENGLISH: And they put their hands on them and put them in gaol until the following day, for evening had come.
QUENYA: And they put their hands on them and put them in gaol until the following day, for evening had come.

ENGLISH: But numerous ones among that heard the word believed. And the number of the men rose as far as five thousands.
QUENYA: But numerous ones among that heard the word believed. And the number of the men rose as far as five thousands.

ENGLISH: It happened on the following day that the rulers and the elders and the scribes in Jerusalem assembled,
QUENYA: It happened on the following day that the rulers and the elders and the scribes in Jerusalem assembled,

ENGLISH: with Annas the chief priest and Caiaphas and John and Alexander and all that were of the kin of the chief priest.
QUENYA: with Annas the chief priest and Caiaphas and John and Alexander and all that were of the kin of the chief priest.

ENGLISH: After putting them in their midst they asked: “By what power and by whose name did you do this thing?”
QUENYA: After putting them in their midst they asked: “By what power and by whose name did you do this thing?”

ENGLISH: Then Peter, full of Holy Spirit, said to them: “Rulers of the people and elders,
QUENYA: Then Peter, full of Holy Spirit, said to them: “Rulers of the people and elders,

ENGLISH: if we are on this day investigated about a good deed to an ailing man, and you want to know by whom this man has received his health,
QUENYA: if we are on this day investigated about a good deed to an ailing man, and you want to know by whom this man has received his health,

ENGLISH: may it be known to all among you and to the entire people of Israel that it happened by the name of Jesus Christ from Nazareth, whom you crucified but God raised out of dead. By him this man is standing here before you in health.
QUENYA: may it be known to all among you and to the entire people of Israel that it happened by the name of Jesus Christ from Nazareth, whom you crucified but God raised out of dead. By him this man is standing here before you in health.

ENGLISH: This is the rock which was counted as nothing by you that built, which has been made the head of the corner.
QUENYA: This is the rock which was counted as nothing by you that built, which has been made the head of the corner.

ENGLISH: For is no salvation by anyone else, for also there is not given other name by which it is necessary for us to be saved.”
QUENYA: For is no salvation by anyone else, for also there is not given other name by which it is necessary for us to be saved.”

ENGLISH: When they saw how freely Peter and John spoke, and knew that they were unlettered and ordinary men, they were filled with wonder, since they also knew them as people that were with Jesus.
QUENYA: When they saw how freely Peter and John spoke, and knew that they were unlettered and ordinary men, they were filled with wonder, since they also knew them as people that were with Jesus.

ENGLISH: When they saw the man that stood with them , he who received health, they had nothing to say against them .
QUENYA: When they saw the man that stood with them , he who received health, they had nothing to say against them .

ENGLISH: Therefore, after commanding them to go out from the council, they made a consideration together,
QUENYA: Therefore, after commanding them to go out from the council, they made a consideration together,

ENGLISH: saying: “What are we to do to these men? For a sign which people know has happened through them, easy to see to all that dwell in Jerusalem, and it is not possible for us to deny it.
QUENYA: saying: “What are we to do to these men? For a sign which people know has happened through them, easy to see to all that dwell in Jerusalem, and it is not possible for us to deny it.

ENGLISH: But to stop it from being spread more widely in the people, let us rebuke them , that they are not to speak more by this name to anyone.”
QUENYA: But to stop it from being spread more widely in the people, let us rebuke them , that they are not to speak more by this name to anyone.”

ENGLISH: And after calling them they commanded them that it was necessary for them to completely cease to speak and teach by the name of Jesus.
QUENYA: And after calling them they commanded them that it was necessary for them to completely cease to speak and teach by the name of Jesus.

ENGLISH: But in answer Peter said to them: “If it is just in God's eyes to listen to you and not to God, you judge for yourselves!
QUENYA: But in answer Peter said to them: “If it is just in God's eyes to listen to you and not to God, you judge for yourselves!

ENGLISH: But we cannot cease to speak about that we have seen and we have heard.”
QUENYA: But we cannot cease to speak about that we have seen and we have heard.”

ENGLISH: After they spoke more to them with sharp words they released them, since they did not find a reason for punishing them , and by reason of the people, for all among them gave glory to God about which had happened.
QUENYA: After they spoke more to them with sharp words they released them, since they did not find a reason for punishing them , and by reason of the people, for all among them gave glory to God about which had happened.

ENGLISH: For the man on which this sign of healing had happened had more than forty years.
QUENYA: For the man on which this sign of healing had happened had more than forty years.

ENGLISH: And after they were released they went to their own and told them about the things which the chief priests and elders had said to them .
QUENYA: And after they were released they went to their own and told them about the things which the chief priests and elders had said to them .

ENGLISH: Hearing that, with one mind they raised their voice to God and said: “Master, you are who made heaven and earth and that are exist in them ,
QUENYA: Hearing that, with one mind they raised their voice to God and said: “Master, you are who made heaven and earth and that are exist in them ,

ENGLISH: and who by Holy Spirit spoke through the mouth of David our father, your servant: 'How is that nations rise up up and peoples are thinking about empty things?
QUENYA: and who by Holy Spirit spoke through the mouth of David our father, your servant: 'How is that nations rise up up and peoples are thinking about empty things?

ENGLISH: The kings of earth have taken stand and the rulers have assembled as one, against the Lord and against his Christ.'
QUENYA: The kings of earth have taken stand and the rulers have assembled as one, against the Lord and against his Christ.'

ENGLISH: For indeed they assembled in this city, Herod and Pontius Pilate and people of the nations against your holy servant, Jesus, whom you anointed,
QUENYA: For indeed they assembled in this city, Herod and Pontius Pilate and people of the nations against your holy servant, Jesus, whom you anointed,

ENGLISH: to do that by your hand and by your choice you have beforehand established were going to happen.
QUENYA: to do that by your hand and by your choice you have beforehand established were going to happen.

ENGLISH: And now, Lord, notice their threats, and allow your servants to speak your word with all boldness,
QUENYA: And now, Lord, notice their threats, and allow your servants to speak your word with all boldness,

ENGLISH: when you reach out with your hand to heal, and when signs and portents happen by the name of your holy servant, Jesus.
QUENYA: when you reach out with your hand to heal, and when signs and portents happen by the name of your holy servant, Jesus.

ENGLISH: And after they said the request, the place where they were assembled was being shaken, and everyone among them was filled by the Holy Spirit and spoke God's word with boldness.
QUENYA: And after they said the request, the place where they were assembled was being shaken, and everyone among them was filled by the Holy Spirit and spoke God's word with boldness.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, the multitude of those that believed had one mind and spirit, and no one among them said about anything that he had that that was his own, but they possessed all things in common .
QUENYA: Furthermore, the multitude of those that believed had one mind and spirit, and no one among them said about anything that he had that that was his own, but they possessed all things in common .

ENGLISH: And with great power the apostles gave out their witness about the resurrection of Jesus Christ, and great grace lay upon all among them.
QUENYA: And with great power the apostles gave out their witness about the resurrection of Jesus Christ, and great grace lay upon all among them.

ENGLISH: Indeed was no one having need among them, for all that had fields or houses sold them and brought the money that they got for the sold things
QUENYA: Indeed was no one having need among them, for all that had fields or houses sold them and brought the money that they got for the sold things

ENGLISH: and put that before the feet of the apostles. Then one distributed to everyone was their need was.
QUENYA: and put that before the feet of the apostles. Then one distributed to everyone was their need was.

ENGLISH: Thus Joseph, who from the apostles received the nickname Barsabba – which means Son of Comfort – one of the Levites, born at Cyprus,
QUENYA: Thus Joseph, who from the apostles received the nickname Barsabba – which means Son of Comfort – one of the Levites, born at Cyprus,

ENGLISH: who had a field, sold it and brought the money and put it before the feet of the apostles.
QUENYA: who had a field, sold it and brought the money and put it before the feet of the apostles.

ENGLISH: But a man whose name was Ananias, with Sapphira his wife, sold a field that he had
QUENYA: But a man whose name was Ananias, with Sapphira his wife, sold a field that he had

ENGLISH: and secretly kept a part of the money that he got, as his wife also knew. He brought only a part and put it before the feet of the apostles.
QUENYA: and secretly kept a part of the money that he got, as his wife also knew. He brought only a part and put it before the feet of the apostles.

ENGLISH: But Peter said: “Ananias, how is that Satan has given you boldness to lie to the Holy Spirit and put away for yourself a part of the money that you got for the field?
QUENYA: But Peter said: “Ananias, how is that Satan has given you boldness to lie to the Holy Spirit and put away for yourself a part of the money that you got for the field?

ENGLISH: While you possessed it, was it not your own? And after it was sold, could you not still choose what you were going to do? What is your reason for doing such a deed? You have lied, not to men, but to God!”
QUENYA: While you possessed it, was it not your own? And after it was sold, could you not still choose what you were going to do? What is your reason for doing such a deed? You have lied, not to men, but to God!”

ENGLISH: When he heard these words, Ananias fell down and expired. And a great fear came upon all that heard it.
QUENYA: When he heard these words, Ananias fell down and expired. And a great fear came upon all that heard it.

ENGLISH: But the young men rose up, wrapped him in clothes, and carried him outside to his grave.
QUENYA: But the young men rose up, wrapped him in clothes, and carried him outside to his grave.

ENGLISH: After three hours his wife came inside, not knowing which had happened.
QUENYA: After three hours his wife came inside, not knowing which had happened.

ENGLISH: Peter said to her: “Tell me, did you sell the field for this sum?” She said: “Yes, that was the sum.”
QUENYA: Peter said to her: “Tell me, did you sell the field for this sum?” She said: “Yes, that was the sum.”

ENGLISH: But Peter said to her: “How is that you were of one mind to test the Lord's spirit? Behold! The feet of that brought your husband to his grave are before the door, and they will carry you outside.”
QUENYA: But Peter said to her: “How is that you were of one mind to test the Lord's spirit? Behold! The feet of that brought your husband to his grave are before the door, and they will carry you outside.”

ENGLISH: In the same moment she fell down before Peter's feet and expired. Whent he young men came inside, they found her dead, and they carried her outside and gave her a grave beside her husband.
QUENYA: In the same moment she fell down before Peter's feet and expired. Whent he young men came inside, they found her dead, and they carried her outside and gave her a grave beside her husband.

ENGLISH: Therefore great fear came upon the entire congregation and upon all that heard about these things.
QUENYA: Therefore great fear came upon the entire congregation and upon all that heard about these things.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, through the hands of the apostles numerous signs and portents happened among the people, and all among them assembled in Solomon's columnade, being of one mind.
QUENYA: Furthermore, through the hands of the apostles numerous signs and portents happened among the people, and all among them assembled in Solomon's columnade, being of one mind.

ENGLISH: No one of the others dared to join himself to them, and yet the people praised them.
QUENYA: No one of the others dared to join himself to them, and yet the people praised them.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, persons that belived in the Lord were added, multitudes of men and women alike.
QUENYA: Furthermore, persons that belived in the Lord were added, multitudes of men and women alike.

QUENYA: Therefore they brought the sick ones outside and put them there on small beds and on biers, wishing only that Peter, when he passed by, was going to cast shadow on some people among them.

QUENYA: And the multitude from the cities surrounding Jerusalem assembled, carrying sick ones and that were being tormented by unclean spirits, and everyone among them was healed.

ENGLISH: But the chief priest and that were with him, the order of the Sadducees that existed then, arose and were filled with envy,
QUENYA: But the chief priest and that were with him, the order of the Sadducees that existed then, arose and were filled with envy,

QUENYA: and they laid hands upon the apostles and put them in the city gaol.
