QUENYA: to open their eyes , in order to turn them from darkness to light and from Satan's power to God, for them to receive forgiveness of sins and a part as heirs among who are hallowed by believing in me.'

ENGLISH: Therfore, king Agrippa, I did not fail to heed the vision from heaven,
QUENYA: Therfore, king Agrippa, I did not fail to heed the vision from heaven,

ENGLISH: but firstly to that are in Damascus and then to that are in Jerusalem and the entire land surrounding Judea I brought the message that it is necessary for them to find repentance and turn themselves to God, by doing deeds worthy of repentance.
QUENYA: but firstly to that are in Damascus and then to that are in Jerusalem and the entire land surrounding Judea I brought the message that it is necessary for them to find repentance and turn themselves to God, by doing deeds worthy of repentance.

ENGLISH: Concerning these things some Jews seized me in the temple and tried to kill me.
QUENYA: Concerning these things some Jews seized me in the temple and tried to kill me.

ENGLISH: But since I was being helped by God I have stood witnessing to small and to great, but saying nothing except that the Prophets and Moses alike said were going to happen:
QUENYA: But since I was being helped by God I have stood witnessing to small and to great, but saying nothing except that the Prophets and Moses alike said were going to happen:

ENGLISH: The Christ was going to suffer, and as the first being raised from dead, he was going to make light known to this people and to the nations alike.»
QUENYA: The Christ was going to suffer, and as the first being raised from dead, he was going to make light known to this people and to the nations alike.»

ENGLISH: When he said these things defending himself, Festus said in a mighty voice: “You are out of your mind, Paul! Great learning is undoing your mind!”
QUENYA: When he said these things defending himself, Festus said in a mighty voice: “You are out of your mind, Paul! Great learning is undoing your mind!”

ENGLISH: But Paul said: “I am not out of my mind, mighty Festus, but I speak sayings of truth and soundness of mind.
QUENYA: But Paul said: “I am not out of my mind, mighty Festus, but I speak sayings of truth and soundness of mind.

ENGLISH: For the king understands these things, he to whom I am speaking with boldness, for I am certain that nothing of this escapes his notice, for this thing has not been done in a corner.
QUENYA: For the king understands these things, he to whom I am speaking with boldness, for I am certain that nothing of this escapes his notice, for this thing has not been done in a corner.

ENGLISH: Do you, King Agrippa, believe in the Prophets? I know that you believe.”
QUENYA: Do you, King Agrippa, believe in the Prophets? I know that you believe.”

ENGLISH: But Agrippa said to Paul: “In a short time you would talk me into becoming a Christian.”
QUENYA: But Agrippa said to Paul: “In a short time you would talk me into becoming a Christian.”

ENGLISH: Then Paul said: “I can wish to God that soon or later, not just you but also all that are hearing me today will become such as I am, though without these chains.”
QUENYA: Then Paul said: “I can wish to God that soon or later, not just you but also all that are hearing me today will become such as I am, though without these chains.”

ENGLISH: But the king arose, and so did the the governor and Bernice and the men that had sat with them.
QUENYA: But the king arose, and so did the the governor and Bernice and the men that had sat with them.

ENGLISH: But when they went away they talked one with the other, saying: “This man does nothing worthy of death or of chains.”
QUENYA: But when they went away they talked one with the other, saying: “This man does nothing worthy of death or of chains.”

ENGLISH: Furthermore, Agrippa said to Festus: “It was possible to release this man if he did not put his case before the High King.”
QUENYA: Furthermore, Agrippa said to Festus: “It was possible to release this man if he did not put his case before the High King.”

ENGLISH: After the choice was made that we were going to sail to Italy , they gave Paul and some other bound men over to a centurion called Julius, of the army of His Majesty.
QUENYA: After the choice was made that we were going to sail to Italy , they gave Paul and some other bound men over to a centurion called Julius, of the army of His Majesty.

ENGLISH: We went into a ship from Adramyttium which was going to sail from the coast of Asia. We sailed away, and with us was Aristarchus the Macedonian, from Thessalonica.
QUENYA: We went into a ship from Adramyttium which was going to sail from the coast of Asia. We sailed away, and with us was Aristarchus the Macedonian, from Thessalonica.

ENGLISH: And on the following day we reached Sidon , and Julius showed kindness to Paul and allowed him to go to his friends and receive their comfort.
QUENYA: And on the following day we reached Sidon , and Julius showed kindness to Paul and allowed him to go to his friends and receive their comfort.

ENGLISH: And we sailed away from there and went under the shelter of Cyprus, since the winds were against us.
QUENYA: And we sailed away from there and went under the shelter of Cyprus, since the winds were against us.

ENGLISH: And after we sailed through the open sea by Cilicia and Pamphylia we came to port in Myra in Lycia.
QUENYA: And after we sailed through the open sea by Cilicia and Pamphylia we came to port in Myra in Lycia.

ENGLISH: But the centurion found a ship from Alexandria that was going to sail to Italy, and he commanded us to go into that.
QUENYA: But the centurion found a ship from Alexandria that was going to sail to Italy, and he commanded us to go into that.

ENGLISH: After sailing slowly for a sufficient number of days and coming to Cnidus with difficulty, since we had the wind in our face, we sailed under the shelter of Crete at Salmone,
QUENYA: After sailing slowly for a sufficient number of days and coming to Cnidus with difficulty, since we had the wind in our face, we sailed under the shelter of Crete at Salmone,

ENGLISH: and sailing difficultly by the shore we came to a place called Fair Havens, near to the city Lasea.
QUENYA: and sailing difficultly by the shore we came to a place called Fair Havens, near to the city Lasea.

ENGLISH: A long time was gone, and now was danger in traveling on sea, for even the Fast was past. Therefore Paul spoke about what he thought was the best,
QUENYA: A long time was gone, and now was danger in traveling on sea, for even the Fast was past. Therefore Paul spoke about what he thought was the best,

ENGLISH: saying to them: “Men, I perceive that sailing will bring destruction, and much will be lost to you, not concerning the goods and the ship alone, but also concerning our lives.”
QUENYA: saying to them: “Men, I perceive that sailing will bring destruction, and much will be lost to you, not concerning the goods and the ship alone, but also concerning our lives.”

ENGLISH: But the centurion heeded the captain and the man who owned the ship more than the things that Paul said.
QUENYA: But the centurion heeded the captain and the man who owned the ship more than the things that Paul said.

ENGLISH: The haven was not good for remaining through the winter, and therefore the greater number thought that it was better to sail away from there, if in this or that manner it was possible for them to reach as far as Phoenix and remain there through the winter. That is a haven of Crete that is open towards the north-east and south-east.
QUENYA: The haven was not good for remaining through the winter, and therefore the greater number thought that it was better to sail away from there, if in this or that manner it was possible for them to reach as far as Phoenix and remain there through the winter. That is a haven of Crete that is open towards the north-east and south-east.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, when the wind from the south blew they thought that their goal was in their reach, and they pulled up the anchor and sailed along the coast of Crete.
QUENYA: Furthermore, when the wind from the south blew they thought that their goal was in their reach, and they pulled up the anchor and sailed along the coast of Crete.

ENGLISH: But after not a long time a stormwind, that which is called Euroaquilo, came rushing from the island.
QUENYA: But after not a long time a stormwind, that which is called Euroaquilo, came rushing from the island.

ENGLISH: The ship was seized and could not keep its prow against the wind, and we stopped trying to control it and were carried .
QUENYA: The ship was seized and could not keep its prow against the wind, and we stopped trying to control it and were carried .

ENGLISH: When we came into the shelter of a small island called Cauda, we could with difficulty save the boat .
QUENYA: When we came into the shelter of a small island called Cauda, we could with difficulty save the boat .

ENGLISH: After we lifted it into the ship we used the emergency equipment and bound around the ship with ropes. Our fear was that the ship was going to hit the hidden rocks in Syrte; therefore they took down the front sail and were carried .
QUENYA: After we lifted it into the ship we used the emergency equipment and bound around the ship with ropes. Our fear was that the ship was going to hit the hidden rocks in Syrte; therefore they took down the front sail and were carried .

ENGLISH: But the storm lay extremely heavy upon us, and on the following day they threw the goods into the sea,
QUENYA: But the storm lay extremely heavy upon us, and on the following day they threw the goods into the sea,

ENGLISH: and on the third day with their own hands they threw the equipment of the ship into the sea.
QUENYA: and on the third day with their own hands they threw the equipment of the ship into the sea.

ENGLISH: When we did not see the Sun or stars for many days, and no small storm lay upon us, all hope of our salvation faded.
QUENYA: When we did not see the Sun or stars for many days, and no small storm lay upon us, all hope of our salvation faded.

ENGLISH: And after a long time when they did not eat food, Paul arose among them and said: “Men, you did better if you listened to me, not going away from Crete, but escaping this destruction and loss.
QUENYA: And after a long time when they did not eat food, Paul arose among them and said: “Men, you did better if you listened to me, not going away from Crete, but escaping this destruction and loss.

ENGLISH: But now I exhort you: Have courage, for is not a single person among you who will be lost! Only the ship will be.
QUENYA: But now I exhort you: Have courage, for is not a single person among you who will be lost! Only the ship will be.

ENGLISH: For in this night stood beforeme an angel of the God whose servant I am, and whom I worship.
QUENYA: For in this night stood beforeme an angel of the God whose servant I am, and whom I worship.

ENGLISH: He said: 'Do not fear, Paul! It is necessary for you to stand before the High King, and behold! God has given you all that are sailing with you.'
QUENYA: He said: 'Do not fear, Paul! It is necessary for you to stand before the High King, and behold! God has given you all that are sailing with you.'

ENGLISH: Therefore have courage, men, for I believe what God said , that the matter will be just as has been told me.
QUENYA: Therefore have courage, men, for I believe what God said , that the matter will be just as has been told me.

ENGLISH: But we will be thrown onto the beach of some island.”
QUENYA: But we will be thrown onto the beach of some island.”

ENGLISH: When the fourteenth night fell and we were thrown hither and thirther on the Sea of Adria, in the middle of the night the sailors supposed that they were coming near to some land.
QUENYA: When the fourteenth night fell and we were thrown hither and thirther on the Sea of Adria, in the middle of the night the sailors supposed that they were coming near to some land.

ENGLISH: And they measured how deep the sea was and found that it was twenty fathoms. They went a short way forward and measured again, and they found fifteen fathoms.
QUENYA: And they measured how deep the sea was and found that it was twenty fathoms. They went a short way forward and measured again, and they found fifteen fathoms.

ENGLISH: And since we feared that perhaps we were going to strike the rocks, they threw into the sea four anchors from the rear of the ship and longed for the coming of day.
QUENYA: And since we feared that perhaps we were going to strike the rocks, they threw into the sea four anchors from the rear of the ship and longed for the coming of day.

ENGLISH: But the sailors, seeking to escape from the ship, put the boat on the sea, saying that they were going to hang anchors from the prow.
QUENYA: But the sailors, seeking to escape from the ship, put the boat on the sea, saying that they were going to hang anchors from the prow.

ENGLISH: Paul said to the centurion and to the soldiers: “If these men do not remain on the ship, it is not possible for you to be saved!”
QUENYA: Paul said to the centurion and to the soldiers: “If these men do not remain on the ship, it is not possible for you to be saved!”

ENGLISH: Then the soldiers cut the ropes of the boat and let it float way.
QUENYA: Then the soldiers cut the ropes of the boat and let it float way.

ENGLISH: When day was near, Paul encouraged all that they were to eat, saying: “Today is the fourteenth day when you are waiting without food, for you have eaten nothing.
QUENYA: When day was near, Paul encouraged all that they were to eat, saying: “Today is the fourteenth day when you are waiting without food, for you have eaten nothing.

ENGLISH: Therefore I ask of you that you will eat food, for that will help your rescue. For a single hair on the head of anyone among you will not be lost.”
QUENYA: Therefore I ask of you that you will eat food, for that will help your rescue. For a single hair on the head of anyone among you will not be lost.”

ENGLISH: After saying these words he took a bread, gave thanks to God before them all, and broke it and began to eat.
QUENYA: After saying these words he took a bread, gave thanks to God before them all, and broke it and began to eat.

ENGLISH: Then they had joy, and they as well ate food.
QUENYA: Then they had joy, and they as well ate food.

ENGLISH: Our total number on the ship was two hundred and seventy-six.
QUENYA: Our total number on the ship was two hundred and seventy-six.

ENGLISH: After eating the food that we wanted, we made the ship less heavy by throwing the grain into the sea.
QUENYA: After eating the food that we wanted, we made the ship less heavy by throwing the grain into the sea.

ENGLISH: When day came, they did not know the land, but they saw a bay where was a beach, and they wanted to bring the ship thither, if it was possible for them.
QUENYA: When day came, they did not know the land, but they saw a bay where was a beach, and they wanted to bring the ship thither, if it was possible for them.

ENGLISH: Therefore they cut away the anchors and let them fall into the sea, and at the same time they loosened the lashes of the rudder. Then they raised the forward sail towards the wind and went against the beach.
QUENYA: Therefore they cut away the anchors and let them fall into the sea, and at the same time they loosened the lashes of the rudder. Then they raised the forward sail towards the wind and went against the beach.

ENGLISH: When they fell upon a place where the sea struck from both directions, they brought the ship onto ground. The prow was fixed and could not move, but the back of the ship was broken into pieces by the violence of the sea.
QUENYA: When they fell upon a place where the sea struck from both directions, they brought the ship onto ground. The prow was fixed and could not move, but the back of the ship was broken into pieces by the violence of the sea.

ENGLISH: Then the soldiers wanted to kill the bound men, to stop anyone from escaping by swimming away.
QUENYA: Then the soldiers wanted to kill the bound men, to stop anyone from escaping by swimming away.

ENGLISH: But the centurion wished to bring Paul to safety and stopped them from doing what they wanted. And he commanded those that knew to swim that they were to jump into the sea, in order to reach to land first.
QUENYA: But the centurion wished to bring Paul to safety and stopped them from doing what they wanted. And he commanded those that knew to swim that they were to jump into the sea, in order to reach to land first.

ENGLISH: The others followed, some on planks, some on things from the ship. And thus all were brought safely to land.
QUENYA: The others followed, some on planks, some on things from the ship. And thus all were brought safely to land.

ENGLISH: After we reached safety we learnt that the name of the island was Melite .
QUENYA: After we reached safety we learnt that the name of the island was Melite .

ENGLISH: And the people there, who spoke a language that we did not understand, behaved towards us with kindness beyond what is usual, for they kindled a fire and received us all, by reason of the rain that fell, and of the cold.
QUENYA: And the people there, who spoke a language that we did not understand, behaved towards us with kindness beyond what is usual, for they kindled a fire and received us all, by reason of the rain that fell, and of the cold.

ENGLISH: But when Paul collected a bunch of sticks and put them on the fire, a snake came out because of the heat and fastened itself to his hand.
QUENYA: But when Paul collected a bunch of sticks and put them on the fire, a snake came out because of the heat and fastened itself to his hand.

ENGLISH: When the people there saw the venomous creature hanging from his hand, they said one to the other: “Surely this man is a murderer, and although he was saved from the sea, doom did not allow him to live.”
QUENYA: When the people there saw the venomous creature hanging from his hand, they said one to the other: “Surely this man is a murderer, and although he was saved from the sea, doom did not allow him to live.”

ENGLISH: But he shook the venomous creature into the fire and suffered nothing bad.
QUENYA: But he shook the venomous creature into the fire and suffered nothing bad.

ENGLISH: But they thought that he was going to swell, or that suddenly he was going to fall dead. After waiting long and seeing nothing bad happening to him, they changed their mind and said that he was a god.
QUENYA: But they thought that he was going to swell, or that suddenly he was going to fall dead. After waiting long and seeing nothing bad happening to him, they changed their mind and said that he was a god.

ENGLISH: Near to that place the most prominent man of the island, called Poplio , had some fields. He received us well and kindly allowed us to dwell in his house for three days.
QUENYA: Near to that place the most prominent man of the island, called Poplio , had some fields. He received us well and kindly allowed us to dwell in his house for three days.

ENGLISH: But Poplio's father was bed-ridden with fever and dystentery. Paul went in to him and prayed, put his hands on him and healed him.
QUENYA: But Poplio's father was bed-ridden with fever and dystentery. Paul went in to him and prayed, put his hands on him and healed him.

ENGLISH: After that happened, the other people on the island that had illnesses also came to him and were healed.
QUENYA: After that happened, the other people on the island that had illnesses also came to him and were healed.

ENGLISH: Thereafter they also glorified us with numerous gifts, and when we sailed away, they gave us things for our needs.
QUENYA: Thereafter they also glorified us with numerous gifts, and when we sailed away, they gave us things for our needs.

ENGLISH: After three months we sailed away on a ship that came from Alexandria. It had remained through the winter on the island, and it had the Twins as the figurehead .
QUENYA: After three months we sailed away on a ship that came from Alexandria. It had remained through the winter on the island, and it had the Twins as the figurehead .

ENGLISH: We came to Syracus and remained there for three days.
QUENYA: We came to Syracus and remained there for three days.

ENGLISH: From there we went aroud the coast and came to Rhegium, and after one day was a wind from the south, and we arrived in Puteoli on the second day.
QUENYA: From there we went aroud the coast and came to Rhegium, and after one day was a wind from the south, and we arrived in Puteoli on the second day.

ENGLISH: There we found brothers who requested that we would stay with them for seven days, and thus we came into Rome.
QUENYA: There we found brothers who requested that we would stay with them for seven days, and thus we came into Rome.

ENGLISH: And from there the brothers, when they heard the news about us, came to see us as far as Forum Appii and the Three Taverns. Paul, seeing them, gave thanks to God and had courage.
QUENYA: And from there the brothers, when they heard the news about us, came to see us as far as Forum Appii and the Three Taverns. Paul, seeing them, gave thanks to God and had courage.

ENGLISH: When we came into Rome was permitted to Paul to dwell privately, with the soldier watching him.
QUENYA: When we came into Rome was permitted to Paul to dwell privately, with the soldier watching him.

ENGLISH: But after three days he summoned who were among the prominent men of the Jews. After they assembled he said to them: “Men, brothers, though I did nothing against the people or the customs from our fathers, I was given over from Jerusalem into hands of Romans.
QUENYA: But after three days he summoned who were among the prominent men of the Jews. After they assembled he said to them: “Men, brothers, though I did nothing against the people or the customs from our fathers, I was given over from Jerusalem into hands of Romans.

ENGLISH: They, after making an inquiry, wished to free me, since was not guilt worthy of death in me.
QUENYA: They, after making an inquiry, wished to free me, since was not guilt worthy of death in me.

ENGLISH: But when the Jews spoke against that, it was necessary for me to put my case before the High King – but not as if I have anything evil to say against my nation.
QUENYA: But when the Jews spoke against that, it was necessary for me to put my case before the High King – but not as if I have anything evil to say against my nation.

ENGLISH: For this reason I therefore requested to see you and to speak to you, for by reason of the hope of Israel I am carrying this chain.”
QUENYA: For this reason I therefore requested to see you and to speak to you, for by reason of the hope of Israel I am carrying this chain.”

ENGLISH: They said to him: “We have not received letters about you from Judea; furthermore; no one of the brothers that have come have said anything bad about you.
QUENYA: They said to him: “We have not received letters about you from Judea; furthermore; no one of the brothers that have come have said anything bad about you.

ENGLISH: But we think it is proper to hear from you what your thoughts are, for indeed we know about this sect that in every place one speaks against it.”
QUENYA: But we think it is proper to hear from you what your thoughts are, for indeed we know about this sect that in every place one speaks against it.”

ENGLISH: They fixed a day when they were going to see him and came to where he lived, more numerous than they were the first time. From morning to evening he told and witnessed to them about God's kingdom, and from the Law and from the prophets he tried to give them understanding about Jesus.
QUENYA: They fixed a day when they were going to see him and came to where he lived, more numerous than they were the first time. From morning to evening he told and witnessed to them about God's kingdom, and from the Law and from the prophets he tried to give them understanding about Jesus.

ENGLISH: Some among them listened to his words, but others failed to believe.
QUENYA: Some among them listened to his words, but others failed to believe.

ENGLISH: Since they were split they went away, but Paul said a single saying to them: “Truly the Holy Spirit spoke to your fathers through Isaiah the Prophet,
QUENYA: Since they were split they went away, but Paul said a single saying to them: “Truly the Holy Spirit spoke to your fathers through Isaiah the Prophet,

ENGLISH: saying: 'Go to this people and say: Indeed you will hear, but you will by no means understand, and indeed you will look, but you will by no means see.
QUENYA: saying: 'Go to this people and say: Indeed you will hear, but you will by no means understand, and indeed you will look, but you will by no means see.

ENGLISH: For the heart of this people has become blunt, and their ears are heavy of hearing, and their eyes they have closed – stopping them from perceiving with their eyes and from hearing with their ears and from understanding with their heart and from finding repentance , for me to heal them.'
QUENYA: For the heart of this people has become blunt, and their ears are heavy of hearing, and their eyes they have closed – stopping them from perceiving with their eyes and from hearing with their ears and from understanding with their heart and from finding repentance , for me to heal them.'

ENGLISH: Therefore, may it be known to you that this salvation has been sent to the nations; they will also hear.”
QUENYA: Therefore, may it be known to you that this salvation has been sent to the nations; they will also hear.”

ENGLISH: And after he said these words, the Jews went away, having a great dispute among themselves.
QUENYA: And after he said these words, the Jews went away, having a great dispute among themselves.

ENGLISH: Then he remained for two years in the house where he paid to live, and he received all that came to him,
QUENYA: Then he remained for two years in the house where he paid to live, and he received all that came to him,

ENGLISH: making God's kingdom known and teaching about the Lord Jesus Christ with all boldness, without anyone stopping him.
QUENYA: making God's kingdom known and teaching about the Lord Jesus Christ with all boldness, without anyone stopping him.

ENGLISH: Paul, apostle of Jesus Christ by God's will, and Timothy the brother,
QUENYA: Paul, apostle of Jesus Christ by God's will, and Timothy the brother,

ENGLISH: to the holy and faithful brothers in Christ that are in Colossae: Grace to you, and peace from God our Father.
QUENYA: to the holy and faithful brothers in Christ that are in Colossae: Grace to you, and peace from God our Father.

ENGLISH: We always give thanks to God, the Father of Jesus Christ our Lord, while we are praying about you.
QUENYA: We always give thanks to God, the Father of Jesus Christ our Lord, while we are praying about you.

ENGLISH: For we have heard about your faith in Christ Jesus and about the love that you have for all the holy ones,
QUENYA: For we have heard about your faith in Christ Jesus and about the love that you have for all the holy ones,

ENGLISH: by the hope that has been reserved for you in heaven. About that you have heard previously, by the true word of the gospel
QUENYA: by the hope that has been reserved for you in heaven. About that you have heard previously, by the true word of the gospel

ENGLISH: that is among yourselves. Just as it bears fruit and thrives in the whole world, so also among you, from the day that you listened and knew God's grace in truth.
QUENYA: that is among yourselves. Just as it bears fruit and thrives in the whole world, so also among you, from the day that you listened and knew God's grace in truth.

ENGLISH: That is what you learnt from Epaphras, a beloved slave with us, who on your behalf is a faithful servant to Christ.
QUENYA: That is what you learnt from Epaphras, a beloved slave with us, who on your behalf is a faithful servant to Christ.

ENGLISH: He also showed us your love, by spirit.
QUENYA: He also showed us your love, by spirit.

ENGLISH: Therefore we as well, from the day that we heard it, have not ceased to pray and make request for you that you will be filled with knowledge of his will in all wisdom and understanding of the spirit,
QUENYA: Therefore we as well, from the day that we heard it, have not ceased to pray and make request for you that you will be filled with knowledge of his will in all wisdom and understanding of the spirit,

ENGLISH: in order to walk worthily before the Lord, giving him perfect joy when you bear fruit and grow in the knowlege of God,
QUENYA: in order to walk worthily before the Lord, giving him perfect joy when you bear fruit and grow in the knowlege of God,

ENGLISH: by all power being made mighty, by the might of his glory. Thus you get all steadfastness and patience, with joy,
QUENYA: by all power being made mighty, by the might of his glory. Thus you get all steadfastness and patience, with joy,

ENGLISH: giving thanks to the Father who made you worthy to receive your portion of the light which the holy ones shall possess.
QUENYA: giving thanks to the Father who made you worthy to receive your portion of the light which the holy ones shall possess.

ENGLISH: He delivered us out of the power of the darkness and brought us over into the kingdom of his beloved Son,
QUENYA: He delivered us out of the power of the darkness and brought us over into the kingdom of his beloved Son,

ENGLISH: by whom we have our ransom, the forgiveness of our sins.
QUENYA: by whom we have our ransom, the forgiveness of our sins.

ENGLISH: He is the image of the invisible God, the firstborn of all creation,
QUENYA: He is the image of the invisible God, the firstborn of all creation,

ENGLISH: and by him all things were created in heaven and on earth, the visible ones and the invisible ones, not heeding if they are thrones or lordships or governments or powers. Everything has been created through him and for him,
QUENYA: and by him all things were created in heaven and on earth, the visible ones and the invisible ones, not heeding if they are thrones or lordships or governments or powers. Everything has been created through him and for him,

ENGLISH: for he is before all things, and all things were by him caused to exist,
QUENYA: for he is before all things, and all things were by him caused to exist,

ENGLISH: and he is head of his body: the congregation. He is the beginning, the firstborn from dead, for him to be in all things the first.
QUENYA: and he is head of his body: the congregation. He is the beginning, the firstborn from dead, for him to be in all things the first.

ENGLISH: For God thought well about causing the entire fullness to dwell in him,
QUENYA: For God thought well about causing the entire fullness to dwell in him,

ENGLISH: and through him unite all things with himself, after making peace by the blood of his cross, the things on earth and the things in heaven alike.
QUENYA: and through him unite all things with himself, after making peace by the blood of his cross, the things on earth and the things in heaven alike.

ENGLISH: Also with you, who were at a time strangers and of a hostile mind by your wicked deeds,
QUENYA: Also with you, who were at a time strangers and of a hostile mind by your wicked deeds,

ENGLISH: he has now made peace by his fleshly body, by dying, to place you holy and perfect and beyond accusation before himself
QUENYA: he has now made peace by his fleshly body, by dying, to place you holy and perfect and beyond accusation before himself

ENGLISH: – if indeed you remain in the faith, made firm on the foundation and steadfast, and not being caused to abandon the hope of the gospel that you heard, that which has been made known in the entire creation under heaven. For this gospel I, Paul, was made a servant.
QUENYA: – if indeed you remain in the faith, made firm on the foundation and steadfast, and not being caused to abandon the hope of the gospel that you heard, that which has been made known in the entire creation under heaven. For this gospel I, Paul, was made a servant.

ENGLISH: Now I find joy in our sufferings concerning you, and I am filling what is lacking of the sufferings of the Christ by means of my flesh, on behalf of his body, which is the congregation.
QUENYA: Now I find joy in our sufferings concerning you, and I am filling what is lacking of the sufferings of the Christ by means of my flesh, on behalf of his body, which is the congregation.

ENGLISH: To it I was made a servant by the leadership from God which was given to me for your good, to make true God's word,
QUENYA: To it I was made a servant by the leadership from God which was given to me for your good, to make true God's word,

ENGLISH: the secret which was hidden from the past ages and generations. But now it has been revealed to his holy ones,
QUENYA: the secret which was hidden from the past ages and generations. But now it has been revealed to his holy ones,

ENGLISH: by means of whom God has wished to make known among the nations what the glorious riches of this secret are. That is Christ in you, the hope of glory.
QUENYA: by means of whom God has wished to make known among the nations what the glorious riches of this secret are. That is Christ in you, the hope of glory.

ENGLISH: He is whom we make known, showing every man the way and teaching every man all wisdom, for us to show forth every man perfect, in Christ.
QUENYA: He is whom we make known, showing every man the way and teaching every man all wisdom, for us to show forth every man perfect, in Christ.

ENGLISH: For that I also toil, fighting by his work that works in me with power.
QUENYA: For that I also toil, fighting by his work that works in me with power.

ENGLISH: For I want you to know how profound is the struggle that I have on your behalf and of the people in Laodicea and of those that have not seen my face in the flesh,
QUENYA: For I want you to know how profound is the struggle that I have on your behalf and of the people in Laodicea and of those that have not seen my face in the flesh,

ENGLISH: to comfort their heart, for them to be united in love and for them toreceive the whole riches of a full understanding, and for them to get knowledge of the mystery of God: Christ.
QUENYA: to comfort their heart, for them to be united in love and for them toreceive the whole riches of a full understanding, and for them to get knowledge of the mystery of God: Christ.

ENGLISH: Hidden in him are all the treasures of wisdom and of knowlegde.
QUENYA: Hidden in him are all the treasures of wisdom and of knowlegde.

ENGLISH: This thing I say to stop anyone from causing you to stray with seductive speech.
QUENYA: This thing I say to stop anyone from causing you to stray with seductive speech.

ENGLISH: For though I am away in the flesh, I am still with you in the spirit, having joy and beholding how you are well-organized and true in your faith in Christ.
QUENYA: For though I am away in the flesh, I am still with you in the spirit, having joy and beholding how you are well-organized and true in your faith in Christ.

ENGLISH: Therefore, since you have received Christ Jesus the Lord, walk in him,
QUENYA: Therefore, since you have received Christ Jesus the Lord, walk in him,

ENGLISH: having your roots in him and being built up in him, established in the faith – as was taught to you, giving thanks in abundance.
QUENYA: having your roots in him and being built up in him, established in the faith – as was taught to you, giving thanks in abundance.

ENGLISH: Be awake, to stop anyone from drawing you away with the philosophy and the empty deception which follows the teachings received from men – following the world's poor things and not Christ.
QUENYA: Be awake, to stop anyone from drawing you away with the philosophy and the empty deception which follows the teachings received from men – following the world's poor things and not Christ.

ENGLISH: For in him the entire divine fullness dwells in a body.
QUENYA: For in him the entire divine fullness dwells in a body.

ENGLISH: Thus you are filled by him who is the head of all lordship and power.
QUENYA: Thus you are filled by him who is the head of all lordship and power.

ENGLISH: In him you were also circumcised with a circumcision which is not by hands or takes flesh away from the body – by the circumcision of the Christ.
QUENYA: In him you were also circumcised with a circumcision which is not by hands or takes flesh away from the body – by the circumcision of the Christ.

ENGLISH: For you were placed with him in a grave by baptism, and by him you were also raised up with him, by reason of your faith and the work of God, who raised him from dead.
QUENYA: For you were placed with him in a grave by baptism, and by him you were also raised up with him, by reason of your faith and the work of God, who raised him from dead.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, though you were dead in your crimes and in your lack of circumcision in your flesh, God made you alive with him. He forgave us all our crimes
QUENYA: Furthermore, though you were dead in your crimes and in your lack of circumcision in your flesh, God made you alive with him. He forgave us all our crimes

ENGLISH: and wiped away the writing of guilt which was against us, and he has taken it away by fastening it to the cross with nails.
QUENYA: and wiped away the writing of guilt which was against us, and he has taken it away by fastening it to the cross with nails.

ENGLISH: He made the lordships and the powers naked and openly showed them forth for mockery, after he had his victory over them on the cross.
QUENYA: He made the lordships and the powers naked and openly showed them forth for mockery, after he had his victory over them on the cross.

ENGLISH: Therefore may no one among you judge you concerning eating or drinking and concerning a festival or new moon or day of rest,
QUENYA: Therefore may no one among you judge you concerning eating or drinking and concerning a festival or new moon or day of rest,

ENGLISH: for these things are a shadow of the coming things, but the actual thing is of the Christ.
QUENYA: for these things are a shadow of the coming things, but the actual thing is of the Christ.

ENGLISH: Do not let anyone take away your crown of victory who has his joy in “lowliness” and worship of angels. His thoughts are fixed on the things that he has seen in vision, and he praises himself without reason, by his fleshly mind.
QUENYA: Do not let anyone take away your crown of victory who has his joy in “lowliness” and worship of angels. His thoughts are fixed on the things that he has seen in vision, and he praises himself without reason, by his fleshly mind.

ENGLISH: He does not stick to the head, him from whom the entire body – kept together and having its support by its joints and bonds – grows with the growth that God gives.
QUENYA: He does not stick to the head, him from whom the entire body – kept together and having its support by its joints and bonds – grows with the growth that God gives.

ENGLISH: If you died with Christ from the poor things of the world, how is that you, as if you still dwell in the world, behave by the commands:
QUENYA: If you died with Christ from the poor things of the world, how is that you, as if you still dwell in the world, behave by the commands:

ENGLISH: “Do not touch, do not taste, do not feel” –
QUENYA: “Do not touch, do not taste, do not feel” –

ENGLISH: concerning things that are destined for destruction by being used, by the commands and teachings of men?
QUENYA: concerning things that are destined for destruction by being used, by the commands and teachings of men?

ENGLISH: These things have an appearance of wisdom in a worship that people have chosen for themselves, and in “lowliness” and behaving towards the body in a harsh manner, but they are not of benefit for stopping the desires of the flesh from being filled.
QUENYA: These things have an appearance of wisdom in a worship that people have chosen for themselves, and in “lowliness” and behaving towards the body in a harsh manner, but they are not of benefit for stopping the desires of the flesh from being filled.

ENGLISH: But if you were raised with the Christ, seek the high things, in which the Christ is sitting by God's right hand.
QUENYA: But if you were raised with the Christ, seek the high things, in which the Christ is sitting by God's right hand.

ENGLISH: Give heed to the high things, not the things on earth.
QUENYA: Give heed to the high things, not the things on earth.

ENGLISH: For you died, and your life has been hidden with the Christ, in God.
QUENYA: For you died, and your life has been hidden with the Christ, in God.

ENGLISH: When the Christ, our life, shall be revealed, then you as well will be revealed with him in glory.
QUENYA: When the Christ, our life, shall be revealed, then you as well will be revealed with him in glory.

ENGLISH: Therefore let die the body-parts that you have on earth, concerning fornication, uncleanness, sexual lust, wicked desire and greed, which is idol-worship.
QUENYA: Therefore let die the body-parts that you have on earth, concerning fornication, uncleanness, sexual lust, wicked desire and greed, which is idol-worship.

ENGLISH: Because of these things God's wrath comes upon the people that break his orders.
QUENYA: Because of these things God's wrath comes upon the people that break his orders.

ENGLISH: In these things you too walked formerly, when they filled your life.
QUENYA: In these things you too walked formerly, when they filled your life.

ENGLISH: But now you too put away everything: wrath, rage, wickedness, blasphemy, and dirty talk out of your mouth.
QUENYA: But now you too put away everything: wrath, rage, wickedness, blasphemy, and dirty talk out of your mouth.

ENGLISH: Do not lie one to the other. Put away the old man with his doings,
QUENYA: Do not lie one to the other. Put away the old man with his doings,

ENGLISH: and cover yourselves with the new man, who by knowledge is renewed by the image of who created him.
QUENYA: and cover yourselves with the new man, who by knowledge is renewed by the image of who created him.

ENGLISH: Here is not Greek or Jew, circumcision or uncircumcision, foreign person, Scythian, slave, free person, but everything and in all Christ is.
QUENYA: Here is not Greek or Jew, circumcision or uncircumcision, foreign person, Scythian, slave, free person, but everything and in all Christ is.

ENGLISH: Therefore, as God's chosen ones, holy and beloved, cover yourselves with the feelings of sympathy, of goodness, of a lowly mind, of gentleness, of patience.
QUENYA: Therefore, as God's chosen ones, holy and beloved, cover yourselves with the feelings of sympathy, of goodness, of a lowly mind, of gentleness, of patience.

ENGLISH: Bear the others and forgive one another, if anyone has a complaint against another. As the Lord forgave you, so you forgive, you as well.
QUENYA: Bear the others and forgive one another, if anyone has a complaint against another. As the Lord forgave you, so you forgive, you as well.

ENGLISH: But in addition to all these things cover yourselves with love, which is a perfect bond between you.
QUENYA: But in addition to all these things cover yourselves with love, which is a perfect bond between you.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, let the peace of Christ rule in your heart, to which you were called in one body, and give thanks!
QUENYA: Furthermore, let the peace of Christ rule in your heart, to which you were called in one body, and give thanks!

ENGLISH: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly. In all wisdom instruct one another and show to one another the way with psalms, with songs of praise, with spiritual songs in grace, singing in your heart to God.
QUENYA: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly. In all wisdom instruct one another and show to one another the way with psalms, with songs of praise, with spiritual songs in grace, singing in your heart to God.

ENGLISH: And every thing that you ever do, by word or by deed, do everything in the name of the Lord Jesus, giving thanks to God the Father through him.
QUENYA: And every thing that you ever do, by word or by deed, do everything in the name of the Lord Jesus, giving thanks to God the Father through him.

ENGLISH: You women , put yourselves under your husbands, as is proper in the Lord.
QUENYA: You women , put yourselves under your husbands, as is proper in the Lord.

ENGLISH: You men, love your wives and do not be bitterly angry towards them.
QUENYA: You men, love your wives and do not be bitterly angry towards them.

ENGLISH: You children, heed your parents' commands in everything, for that is pleasing to the Lord.
QUENYA: You children, heed your parents' commands in everything, for that is pleasing to the Lord.

ENGLISH: You fathers, do not cause your children grief, or you will take away their courage.
QUENYA: You fathers, do not cause your children grief, or you will take away their courage.

ENGLISH: You slaves, give in everything heed to the will of who are your lords by the flesh, not like eye-servants, as if to please men, but sincerely, fearing the Lord.
QUENYA: You slaves, give in everything heed to the will of who are your lords by the flesh, not like eye-servants, as if to please men, but sincerely, fearing the Lord.

ENGLISH: Anything that you do, work with your entire soul, as for the Lord and not for men.
QUENYA: Anything that you do, work with your entire soul, as for the Lord and not for men.

ENGLISH: for you know that you will receive from the Lord your reward, the part that you will possess as heirs. Be servants to the Lord Jesus.
QUENYA: for you know that you will receive from the Lord your reward, the part that you will possess as heirs. Be servants to the Lord Jesus.

ENGLISH: For who does injustice will received back his injustice, and there is not heeding of face .
QUENYA: For who does injustice will received back his injustice, and there is not heeding of face .

ENGLISH: You lords , give to your slaves what is just and proper, knowing that you as well have a Lord in heaven.
QUENYA: You lords , give to your slaves what is just and proper, knowing that you as well have a Lord in heaven.

ENGLISH: Be steadfast in prayer, awake in it by thanksgiving,
QUENYA: Be steadfast in prayer, awake in it by thanksgiving,

ENGLISH: at every moment praying also for us, requesting that God will open to us a door of the Word, to speak the mystery concerning Christ, concerning whom I am also in fetters,
QUENYA: at every moment praying also for us, requesting that God will open to us a door of the Word, to speak the mystery concerning Christ, concerning whom I am also in fetters,

ENGLISH: for me to reveal it, as is necessary for me to speak.
QUENYA: for me to reveal it, as is necessary for me to speak.

ENGLISH: Behave with wisdom to that are on the outside, seizing the opportunity .
QUENYA: Behave with wisdom to that are on the outside, seizing the opportunity .

ENGLISH: Allow your word to have grace, its taste strengthened with salt, for you to know how you are to answer everyone.
QUENYA: Allow your word to have grace, its taste strengthened with salt, for you to know how you are to answer everyone.

ENGLISH: All my matters will be make known to you by Tychicus, my beloved brother and a faithful servant and a slave with you in the Lord.
QUENYA: All my matters will be make known to you by Tychicus, my beloved brother and a faithful servant and a slave with you in the Lord.

ENGLISH: I have sent him to you for this same reason: for you to know that concern me, and for him to comfort your heart, I have sent him to you.
QUENYA: I have sent him to you for this same reason: for you to know that concern me, and for him to comfort your heart, I have sent him to you.

ENGLISH: With him I send Onesimus, my steadfast and beloved brother, who is from among you. All the matters here they will make known to you.
QUENYA: With him I send Onesimus, my steadfast and beloved brother, who is from among you. All the matters here they will make known to you.

ENGLISH: Aristarchus, who is in gaol with me, greets you. So do Mark, the cousin of Barnabas – concerning him you have received commands: if he comes to you, receive him well –
QUENYA: Aristarchus, who is in gaol with me, greets you. So do Mark, the cousin of Barnabas – concerning him you have received commands: if he comes to you, receive him well –

ENGLISH: and Jesus called Justus, who are of the circumsized. They alone work with me for the kingdom of God, and they have given me comfort.
QUENYA: and Jesus called Justus, who are of the circumsized. They alone work with me for the kingdom of God, and they have given me comfort.

ENGLISH: Epaphras greets you, he who is from among you, slave of Christ Jesus. Always he fights on your behalf in his prayers, requesting that you will stand perfect and firm in all the will of God.
QUENYA: Epaphras greets you, he who is from among you, slave of Christ Jesus. Always he fights on your behalf in his prayers, requesting that you will stand perfect and firm in all the will of God.

ENGLISH: Indeed I witness for him that he has a great strife for you and for who are in Laodicea and Hierapolis.
QUENYA: Indeed I witness for him that he has a great strife for you and for who are in Laodicea and Hierapolis.

ENGLISH: Luke, the beloved physician, greets you, as does Demas.
QUENYA: Luke, the beloved physician, greets you, as does Demas.

ENGLISH: Greet the brothers in Laodicea and Nympha and the congregation in her house.
QUENYA: Greet the brothers in Laodicea and Nympha and the congregation in her house.

ENGLISH: And when this letter has been read among you, make sure that it will be read also to the congregation in Laodicea, and get the letter from Laodicea, allowing you to read it as well.
QUENYA: And when this letter has been read among you, make sure that it will be read also to the congregation in Laodicea, and get the letter from Laodicea, allowing you to read it as well.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, say to Archippus: “Keep the ministry which you received in the Lord, in order to complete it!”
QUENYA: Furthermore, say to Archippus: “Keep the ministry which you received in the Lord, in order to complete it!”

ENGLISH: Here I am writing my greeting with my own hand. Recall my chains! May the grace be with you.
QUENYA: Here I am writing my greeting with my own hand. Recall my chains! May the grace be with you.

ENGLISH: Paul, apostle of Jesus Christ by God's will, to the holy ones that are in Ephesus, steadfast in Christ Jesus:
QUENYA: Paul, apostle of Jesus Christ by God's will, to the holy ones that are in Ephesus, steadfast in Christ Jesus:

ENGLISH: May you have grace and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
QUENYA: May you have grace and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

ENGLISH: Blessed be God, Father of Jesus Christ our Lord, who has blessed us with every blessing of the spirit in the heavenly places in Christ,
QUENYA: Blessed be God, Father of Jesus Christ our Lord, who has blessed us with every blessing of the spirit in the heavenly places in Christ,

ENGLISH: who called us in him before the world was established, for us to be holy and without stain before him in love.
QUENYA: who called us in him before the world was established, for us to be holy and without stain before him in love.

ENGLISH: For beforehand he appointed us to be received by Jesus Christ as his sons, as he thought well according to his will,
QUENYA: For beforehand he appointed us to be received by Jesus Christ as his sons, as he thought well according to his will,

ENGLISH: into praise of his glorious grace which he gave us by his Beloved One.
QUENYA: into praise of his glorious grace which he gave us by his Beloved One.

ENGLISH: By him we have the ransom by his blood: the forgiveness of our sins, by the riches of his grace.
QUENYA: By him we have the ransom by his blood: the forgiveness of our sins, by the riches of his grace.

ENGLISH: He caused us to have an abundance of all wisdom and understanding,
QUENYA: He caused us to have an abundance of all wisdom and understanding,

ENGLISH: making known to us the secret of his will, by the choice of his good will:
QUENYA: making known to us the secret of his will, by the choice of his good will:

ENGLISH: to establish a plan that he would make real when the time was ready, to gather together all things in Christ – the things in heaven and the things on earth – by him.
QUENYA: to establish a plan that he would make real when the time was ready, to gather together all things in Christ – the things in heaven and the things on earth – by him.

ENGLISH: In him we were also established as heirs, for us to be previously appointed by the purpose of who works everything by the choice of his will,
QUENYA: In him we were also established as heirs, for us to be previously appointed by the purpose of who works everything by the choice of his will,

ENGLISH: for us to be a praise of his glory, we that previously had hope in Christ.
QUENYA: for us to be a praise of his glory, we that previously had hope in Christ.

ENGLISH: But also you had hope in him after you heard the word of truth, the gospel of your salvation. By him, after you believed, you were also sealed by the Holy Spirit of his promise,
QUENYA: But also you had hope in him after you heard the word of truth, the gospel of your salvation. By him, after you believed, you were also sealed by the Holy Spirit of his promise,

ENGLISH: which is a sign of our part as heirs, as a ransom for his own people, to his glorious praise.
QUENYA: which is a sign of our part as heirs, as a ransom for his own people, to his glorious praise.

ENGLISH: Therefore I also – since I have heard about your faith in the Lord Jesus and your love of all the holy ones –
QUENYA: Therefore I also – since I have heard about your faith in the Lord Jesus and your love of all the holy ones –

ENGLISH: do not cease to give thanks concering you when I recall you in my prayers,
QUENYA: do not cease to give thanks concering you when I recall you in my prayers,

ENGLISH: asking that the God of Jesus Christ our Lord will give you a spirit of wisdom and revelation for you to have knowledge about him,
QUENYA: asking that the God of Jesus Christ our Lord will give you a spirit of wisdom and revelation for you to have knowledge about him,

ENGLISH: the eyes of your heart being enlightened, for you to know what the hope is to which he called you – what the glorious riches are which he has reserved for the holy ones that will be heirs to it,
QUENYA: the eyes of your heart being enlightened, for you to know what the hope is to which he called you – what the glorious riches are which he has reserved for the holy ones that will be heirs to it,

ENGLISH: and what the abundant greatness of his power is, to us that believe – by the work of his mighty power,
QUENYA: and what the abundant greatness of his power is, to us that believe – by the work of his mighty power,

ENGLISH: with which he worked in Christ when he raised him up from dead and caused him to sit by his right hand in the heavenly places,
QUENYA: with which he worked in Christ when he raised him up from dead and caused him to sit by his right hand in the heavenly places,

ENGLISH: far above every government and power and lordship and every name called, not in this age alone, but also in the coming one.
QUENYA: far above every government and power and lordship and every name called, not in this age alone, but also in the coming one.

ENGLISH: And everything he put under his feet, and he made him the head of all things for the congregation,
QUENYA: And everything he put under his feet, and he made him the head of all things for the congregation,

ENGLISH: which is his body, the fullness of who fills everything in all things.
QUENYA: which is his body, the fullness of who fills everything in all things.

ENGLISH: And you God made alive though you were dead in your crimes and your sins,
QUENYA: And you God made alive though you were dead in your crimes and your sins,

ENGLISH: in which you walked formerly, by the manner of this age, the manner of the ruler who has power over the air, the spirit which now works in the sons of disobedience .
QUENYA: in which you walked formerly, by the manner of this age, the manner of the ruler who has power over the air, the spirit which now works in the sons of disobedience .

ENGLISH: Among them we also formerly behaved by the lusts of our flesh, doing the desires and thoughts of the flesh, and by nature we were children of wrath, as were also the others.
QUENYA: Among them we also formerly behaved by the lusts of our flesh, doing the desires and thoughts of the flesh, and by nature we were children of wrath, as were also the others.

ENGLISH: But God, being rich in mercy, by his great love with which he loved us,
QUENYA: But God, being rich in mercy, by his great love with which he loved us,

ENGLISH: made us alive with the Christ, also when we were dead in crimes. By grace we have been saved,
QUENYA: made us alive with the Christ, also when we were dead in crimes. By grace we have been saved,

ENGLISH: and he raised us up together and allowed us to dwell together in the heavenly places, in Christ Jesus.
QUENYA: and he raised us up together and allowed us to dwell together in the heavenly places, in Christ Jesus.

ENGLISH: Thus, in the coming ages, the surpassing riches of his grace will be shown by the manner by which he has been friendly to us in Christ Jesus.
QUENYA: Thus, in the coming ages, the surpassing riches of his grace will be shown by the manner by which he has been friendly to us in Christ Jesus.

ENGLISH: For by his grace you have been saved, by faith, and that did not happen by you; the gift is of God,
QUENYA: For by his grace you have been saved, by faith, and that did not happen by you; the gift is of God,

ENGLISH: it is not by deeds, to stop anyone from praising himself.
QUENYA: it is not by deeds, to stop anyone from praising himself.

ENGLISH: For we are his work and were created in Christ Jesus for good deeds, which God prepared beforehand, for us to walk in them.
QUENYA: For we are his work and were created in Christ Jesus for good deeds, which God prepared beforehand, for us to walk in them.

ENGLISH: Therefore recall that formerly you were people of the nations concerning the flesh. You were called Uncircumcision by that which is called Circumcision, made in the flesh with hands.
QUENYA: Therefore recall that formerly you were people of the nations concerning the flesh. You were called Uncircumcision by that which is called Circumcision, made in the flesh with hands.

ENGLISH: For you were at that time without Christ, foreign to the kindred of Israel and strangers to the covenants of the promise, and you did not have hope and were without God in the world.
QUENYA: For you were at that time without Christ, foreign to the kindred of Israel and strangers to the covenants of the promise, and you did not have hope and were without God in the world.

ENGLISH: But now, in Jesus Christ, you that formerly were far away are now brought near, by the blood of the Christ.
QUENYA: But now, in Jesus Christ, you that formerly were far away are now brought near, by the blood of the Christ.

ENGLISH: For he is our peace, he who made both one and undid the middle wall between them . The hostile state by his flesh
QUENYA: For he is our peace, he who made both one and undid the middle wall between them . The hostile state by his flesh

ENGLISH: he took away, the Law of commands in orders , to make in himself the two peoples into a one new man, by making peace –
QUENYA: he took away, the Law of commands in orders , to make in himself the two peoples into a one new man, by making peace –

ENGLISH: to make both without strife with God in one body by the cross; for he slew the hostile state by himself.
QUENYA: to make both without strife with God in one body by the cross; for he slew the hostile state by himself.

ENGLISH: And he came and made the gospel of peace known to you that were far off, and peace to that are near,
QUENYA: And he came and made the gospel of peace known to you that were far off, and peace to that are near,

ENGLISH: for through him we, both peoples, may come near, in one spirit, to the Father.
QUENYA: for through him we, both peoples, may come near, in one spirit, to the Father.

ENGLISH: Therefore you are no more foreigners and people that live in a land not your own, but you are neighbors with the holy ones and dwell in God's house,
QUENYA: Therefore you are no more foreigners and people that live in a land not your own, but you are neighbors with the holy ones and dwell in God's house,

ENGLISH: and you have been built up on the ground of the apostles and of the prophets, while Christ Jesus himself is the stone of the corner.
QUENYA: and you have been built up on the ground of the apostles and of the prophets, while Christ Jesus himself is the stone of the corner.

ENGLISH: In him the entire building is put together and grows into a holy temple to the Lord.
QUENYA: In him the entire building is put together and grows into a holy temple to the Lord.

ENGLISH: In him also you are built up together into a place where God will dwell by spirit.
QUENYA: In him also you are built up together into a place where God will dwell by spirit.

ENGLISH: Therefore also I, Paul, who for Jesus Christ is in gaol on behalf of you that are of the nations ...
QUENYA: Therefore also I, Paul, who for Jesus Christ is in gaol on behalf of you that are of the nations ...

ENGLISH: – if indeed you have heard about the oversight of the grace of God which was given me for your good,
QUENYA: – if indeed you have heard about the oversight of the grace of God which was given me for your good,

ENGLISH: how by revelation the mystery that told to me, as I wrote in brief previously.
QUENYA: how by revelation the mystery that told to me, as I wrote in brief previously.

ENGLISH: Thus it is possible for you, reading my letter, to understand the insight that I have on the mystery of the Christ.
QUENYA: Thus it is possible for you, reading my letter, to understand the insight that I have on the mystery of the Christ.

ENGLISH: In former generations this mystery was not made known to the sons of men as now by spirit it has been made known to his holy apostles and to his heralds :
QUENYA: In former generations this mystery was not made known to the sons of men as now by spirit it has been made known to his holy apostles and to his heralds :

ENGLISH: how people of the nations will be heirs and members and will have a part with us of the promise, in Jesus Christ, by the gospel.
QUENYA: how people of the nations will be heirs and members and will have a part with us of the promise, in Jesus Christ, by the gospel.

ENGLISH: I have been made a servant to this gospel by the grace of God, which has been given me by his power working in me.
QUENYA: I have been made a servant to this gospel by the grace of God, which has been given me by his power working in me.

ENGLISH: To me, a man smaller than the smallest of all the holy ones, this grace has been given, for me to make known to the nations the gospel about the Christ's riches beyond measure,
QUENYA: To me, a man smaller than the smallest of all the holy ones, this grace has been given, for me to make known to the nations the gospel about the Christ's riches beyond measure,

ENGLISH: and to show how God makes real the secret that from eternity has been hidden in God who created all things,
QUENYA: and to show how God makes real the secret that from eternity has been hidden in God who created all things,

ENGLISH: now to make known, through the congregation, to those that rule and have lordship in heavenly places God's diverse wisdom,
QUENYA: now to make known, through the congregation, to those that rule and have lordship in heavenly places God's diverse wisdom,

ENGLISH: by the eternal purpose that he formed in Christ, our Lord Jesus.
QUENYA: by the eternal purpose that he formed in Christ, our Lord Jesus.

ENGLISH: By him we have boldness and may come near without fear, by our belief in him.
QUENYA: By him we have boldness and may come near without fear, by our belief in him.

ENGLISH: Therefore I ask: Do not turn from your goal because of these tribulations of mine on your behalf, which are a glory to you.
QUENYA: Therefore I ask: Do not turn from your goal because of these tribulations of mine on your behalf, which are a glory to you.

ENGLISH: By this reason I fall upon my knees before the Father,
QUENYA: By this reason I fall upon my knees before the Father,

ENGLISH: by whom every family in heaven and earth is named.
QUENYA: by whom every family in heaven and earth is named.

ENGLISH: Thus, out of his riches he can give you by his spirit to be made mighty by might in your internal man,
QUENYA: Thus, out of his riches he can give you by his spirit to be made mighty by might in your internal man,

ENGLISH: in order to cause the Christ to dwell in your heart by your faith, in love having a root and a foundation,
QUENYA: in order to cause the Christ to dwell in your heart by your faith, in love having a root and a foundation,

ENGLISH: for you to be able to understand, with the holy ones, the breadth and length and height and depth,
QUENYA: for you to be able to understand, with the holy ones, the breadth and length and height and depth,

ENGLISH: and for you to know the Christ's love which surpasses knowledge, for you to be filled with God's fullness.
QUENYA: and for you to know the Christ's love which surpasses knowledge, for you to be filled with God's fullness.

ENGLISH: To who can do far more than everything you request or think, by his power which works in us,
QUENYA: To who can do far more than everything you request or think, by his power which works in us,

ENGLISH: to him be the glory by the congregation and by Christ Jesus in all generations forever and ever! Amen.
QUENYA: to him be the glory by the congregation and by Christ Jesus in all generations forever and ever! Amen.

ENGLISH: Therefore I, who am in gaol by reason of the Lord, ask of you: Walk in a manner worthy of the calling with which you were called,
QUENYA: Therefore I, who am in gaol by reason of the Lord, ask of you: Walk in a manner worthy of the calling with which you were called,

ENGLISH: having all lowliness of mind and a mild manner, suffering one another with love,
QUENYA: having all lowliness of mind and a mild manner, suffering one another with love,

ENGLISH: sincerely trying to keep the oneness of the spirit with a bond of peace.
QUENYA: sincerely trying to keep the oneness of the spirit with a bond of peace.

ENGLISH: There are one body and one spirit, as you were called in the one hope of your calling,
QUENYA: There are one body and one spirit, as you were called in the one hope of your calling,

ENGLISH: one Lord, one faith, one baptism,
QUENYA: one Lord, one faith, one baptism,

ENGLISH: one God and Father of all, who is over all and through all and in all.
QUENYA: one God and Father of all, who is over all and through all and in all.

ENGLISH: But to every single person among us the grace has been given, by the measure by which the gift of the Christ is distributed.
QUENYA: But to every single person among us the grace has been given, by the measure by which the gift of the Christ is distributed.

ENGLISH: Therefore he says: “When he went up to on high he brought away people in captivity; he gave gifts to men.”
QUENYA: Therefore he says: “When he went up to on high he brought away people in captivity; he gave gifts to men.”

ENGLISH: What do the words “he went up” mean, if not that he also went down to the lower regions, that is, to earth?
QUENYA: What do the words “he went up” mean, if not that he also went down to the lower regions, that is, to earth?

ENGLISH: who went down is also who went up to above all heavens, for him to give fullness to all things.
QUENYA: who went down is also who went up to above all heavens, for him to give fullness to all things.

ENGLISH: And he gave some people as apostles, some as prophets, some to preach the gospel, some like shepherds and teachers .
QUENYA: And he gave some people as apostles, some as prophets, some to preach the gospel, some like shepherds and teachers .

ENGLISH: Thus he prepared the holy ones for their work as servants, to build up the Christ's body,
QUENYA: Thus he prepared the holy ones for their work as servants, to build up the Christ's body,

ENGLISH: until all among us shall be one by our faith and by our knowing the son of God – for us to be a perfect man, for us to have the full height of the fullness of Christ.
QUENYA: until all among us shall be one by our faith and by our knowing the son of God – for us to be a perfect man, for us to have the full height of the fullness of Christ.

ENGLISH: Thus we will not be babes more, thrown up and down by waves and carried hither and thither by every wind of teaching, by the tricks of men, by the cunning in inventing error.
QUENYA: Thus we will not be babes more, thrown up and down by waves and carried hither and thither by every wind of teaching, by the tricks of men, by the cunning in inventing error.

ENGLISH: But speaking the truth, may we grow up by love in all things into who is the head: Christ,
QUENYA: But speaking the truth, may we grow up by love in all things into who is the head: Christ,

ENGLISH: out of whom the entire body is put together and made one, every joint adding its work by the measure of every single part. Thus the body causes itself to grow, building itself up in love.
QUENYA: out of whom the entire body is put together and made one, every joint adding its work by the measure of every single part. Thus the body causes itself to grow, building itself up in love.

ENGLISH: This thing I therefore say and I witness to you in the Lord: Do not walk anymore like the nations also walk by their empty minds,
QUENYA: This thing I therefore say and I witness to you in the Lord: Do not walk anymore like the nations also walk by their empty minds,

ENGLISH: their understanding being in darkness, strangers to the life of God, by the incomprehension that is in them by their blunt heart.
QUENYA: their understanding being in darkness, strangers to the life of God, by the incomprehension that is in them by their blunt heart.

ENGLISH: After their perception of good and evil faded, they gave themselves to loose conduct, to working every kind of uncleanness in greed.
QUENYA: After their perception of good and evil faded, they gave themselves to loose conduct, to working every kind of uncleanness in greed.

ENGLISH: But so you have not learnt about the Christ,
QUENYA: But so you have not learnt about the Christ,

ENGLISH: if indeed you heard him and were instructed by him, as is true in Jesus:
QUENYA: if indeed you heard him and were instructed by him, as is true in Jesus:

ENGLISH: Put away what follows your former behavior, the old man marred by seductive desires,
QUENYA: Put away what follows your former behavior, the old man marred by seductive desires,

ENGLISH: for you to be renewed in the spirit of your mind
QUENYA: for you to be renewed in the spirit of your mind

ENGLISH: and for you to put on yourselves the new man that is created by God's will, in righteousness and holiness of the truth.
QUENYA: and for you to put on yourselves the new man that is created by God's will, in righteousness and holiness of the truth.

ENGLISH: Therefore, now when you have put away lie, speak truth, everyone among you with his neighbor, for we are each one the other's body-parts .
QUENYA: Therefore, now when you have put away lie, speak truth, everyone among you with his neighbor, for we are each one the other's body-parts .

ENGLISH: Be wrathful, and yet do not sin; do not allow the sun to set on your wrath.
QUENYA: Be wrathful, and yet do not sin; do not allow the sun to set on your wrath.

ENGLISH: Therefore, do not give the Devil room.
QUENYA: Therefore, do not give the Devil room.

ENGLISH: It is necessary for the thief to stop stealing, but may he work with his hands doing what is good, allowing him to have thing to distribute to that are in need.
QUENYA: It is necessary for the thief to stop stealing, but may he work with his hands doing what is good, allowing him to have thing to distribute to that are in need.

ENGLISH: Do not allow foul word to come out of your mouth, but speak every saying that is good in order to build up, as the need is, in order to give a grace to who listen.
QUENYA: Do not allow foul word to come out of your mouth, but speak every saying that is good in order to build up, as the need is, in order to give a grace to who listen.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, do not cause grief to God's holy spirit, by which you have been sealed for the day of ransom.
QUENYA: Furthermore, do not cause grief to God's holy spirit, by which you have been sealed for the day of ransom.

ENGLISH: May every bitterness and wrath and anger and outcry and blasphemy be taken away from you, with every evil.
QUENYA: May every bitterness and wrath and anger and outcry and blasphemy be taken away from you, with every evil.

ENGLISH: But be loving one against the other, having compassion, forgiving one the other like God in Christ forgave you.
QUENYA: But be loving one against the other, having compassion, forgiving one the other like God in Christ forgave you.

ENGLISH: Therefore, be like God, like beloved children,
QUENYA: Therefore, be like God, like beloved children,

ENGLISH: and walk in love, like the Christ also loved you and gave himself on your behalf, as a gift and a sacrifice to God, for a fragrant smell.
QUENYA: and walk in love, like the Christ also loved you and gave himself on your behalf, as a gift and a sacrifice to God, for a fragrant smell.

ENGLISH: May every kind of fornication and uncleanness, or greediness, not be named among you, as is good for holy ones.
QUENYA: May every kind of fornication and uncleanness, or greediness, not be named among you, as is good for holy ones.

ENGLISH: Thus also concerning low behavior and foolish talk or dirty jokes, which are not a good habit; better it is to give thanks.
QUENYA: Thus also concerning low behavior and foolish talk or dirty jokes, which are not a good habit; better it is to give thanks.

ENGLISH: For this thing you know: You understand that a fornicating or unclean or greedy person – which means that he worships idols – will not be an heir of the kingdom of Christ and God.
QUENYA: For this thing you know: You understand that a fornicating or unclean or greedy person – which means that he worships idols – will not be an heir of the kingdom of Christ and God.

ENGLISH: Do not allow anyone to cause you to stray by means of empty words, for by these things God's anger is coming upon that are not obedient.
QUENYA: Do not allow anyone to cause you to stray by means of empty words, for by these things God's anger is coming upon that are not obedient.

ENGLISH: Therefore do not have part with them.
QUENYA: Therefore do not have part with them.

ENGLISH: For formerly you were darkness, but now you are light, in the Lord. Walk as children of light,
QUENYA: For formerly you were darkness, but now you are light, in the Lord. Walk as children of light,

ENGLISH: for the fruit of light is every kind of goodness and justice and truth.
QUENYA: for the fruit of light is every kind of goodness and justice and truth.

ENGLISH: Seek what is good to the Lord,
QUENYA: Seek what is good to the Lord,

ENGLISH: and do not have part in the fruitless deeds of darkness; you do better rebuking them.
QUENYA: and do not have part in the fruitless deeds of darkness; you do better rebuking them.

ENGLISH: For that happen by them are a shame also to tell .
QUENYA: For that happen by them are a shame also to tell .

ENGLISH: But the things rebuked are revealed by the light, for everything that is revealed, is light.
QUENYA: But the things rebuked are revealed by the light, for everything that is revealed, is light.

ENGLISH: Therefore he says: “Be awake, you who are sleeping, and rise from dead, and the Christ shall shine upon you.”
QUENYA: Therefore he says: “Be awake, you who are sleeping, and rise from dead, and the Christ shall shine upon you.”

ENGLISH: Therefore watch closely that how you walk is not like unwise ones, but like wise ones,
QUENYA: Therefore watch closely that how you walk is not like unwise ones, but like wise ones,

ENGLISH: trading to yourselves the good moment, for the days are evil.
QUENYA: trading to yourselves the good moment, for the days are evil.

ENGLISH: Therefore do not be unintelligent, but perceive what the Lord's will is.
QUENYA: Therefore do not be unintelligent, but perceive what the Lord's will is.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, do not fill yourselves with wine, which causes self-control to go away, but be filled with spirit,
QUENYA: Furthermore, do not fill yourselves with wine, which causes self-control to go away, but be filled with spirit,

ENGLISH: speaking to yourselves with holy songs and praises to God and with spiritual songs, singing and making tunes in your heart to the Lord,
QUENYA: speaking to yourselves with holy songs and praises to God and with spiritual songs, singing and making tunes in your heart to the Lord,

ENGLISH: by the name of our Lord Jesus Christ giving thanks always concerning all things, to God the Father.
QUENYA: by the name of our Lord Jesus Christ giving thanks always concerning all things, to God the Father.

ENGLISH: Be submissive to one another , in fear of the Christ.
QUENYA: Be submissive to one another , in fear of the Christ.

ENGLISH: It is necessary for the wives to subject themselves to their husbands, like they place themselves under the Lord,
QUENYA: It is necessary for the wives to subject themselves to their husbands, like they place themselves under the Lord,

ENGLISH: for a husband is his wife's head as also the Christ is head of the congregation, he being who saves his body.
QUENYA: for a husband is his wife's head as also the Christ is head of the congregation, he being who saves his body.

ENGLISH: But like the congregation subjects itself to the Christ, so may the women do to their husbands in everything.
QUENYA: But like the congregation subjects itself to the Christ, so may the women do to their husbands in everything.

ENGLISH: You husbands, love your wives, like the Christ also loved the congregation and gave himself for it,
QUENYA: You husbands, love your wives, like the Christ also loved the congregation and gave himself for it,

ENGLISH: for him to hallow it, cleansing it by the bath of water by the word,
QUENYA: for him to hallow it, cleansing it by the bath of water by the word,

ENGLISH: for him to place the congregation before himself glorious, without a spot or wrinkle or anything like that, but for him to be holy and without a stain.
QUENYA: for him to place the congregation before himself glorious, without a spot or wrinkle or anything like that, but for him to be holy and without a stain.

ENGLISH: Thus also the debt of the husbands is loving the women like their own bodies. Who loves his wife loves himself,
QUENYA: Thus also the debt of the husbands is loving the women like their own bodies. Who loves his wife loves himself,
