ENGLISH: for no one ever hated his own flesh, but he gives it food and cherishes it , like the Christ also does to the congregation,
QUENYA: for no one ever hated his own flesh, but he gives it food and cherishes it , like the Christ also does to the congregation,

ENGLISH: for we are parts of his body.
QUENYA: for we are parts of his body.

ENGLISH: “Therefore a man will leave his father and his mother, and he will stick to his wife, and the two will be one flesh.”
QUENYA: “Therefore a man will leave his father and his mother, and he will stick to his wife, and the two will be one flesh.”

ENGLISH: This mystery is great – I am speaking about Christ and the congregation.
QUENYA: This mystery is great – I am speaking about Christ and the congregation.

ENGLISH: But it is necessary for everyone among you to love his wife as he loves himself, and it is necessary for the wife to have awe for her husband.
QUENYA: But it is necessary for everyone among you to love his wife as he loves himself, and it is necessary for the wife to have awe for her husband.

ENGLISH: Children, be obedient to your parents in the Lord, for that is just.
QUENYA: Children, be obedient to your parents in the Lord, for that is just.

ENGLISH: “Give glory to your father and to your mother” – that is the first commandment that has a promise:
QUENYA: “Give glory to your father and to your mother” – that is the first commandment that has a promise:

ENGLISH: “for you to be fortunate and for you to have a long life on earth”.
QUENYA: “for you to be fortunate and for you to have a long life on earth”.

ENGLISH: And you, fathers, do not cause grief to your children, but raise them in the Lord's chastisement and instruction.
QUENYA: And you, fathers, do not cause grief to your children, but raise them in the Lord's chastisement and instruction.

ENGLISH: You slaves, be obedient to that are your lords in the flesh, in fear and in trembling, out of a whole heart, like to the Christ
QUENYA: You slaves, be obedient to that are your lords in the flesh, in fear and in trembling, out of a whole heart, like to the Christ

ENGLISH: – not like eye-servants, as if to please men, but like Christ's slaves, doing God's will sincerely.
QUENYA: – not like eye-servants, as if to please men, but like Christ's slaves, doing God's will sincerely.

ENGLISH: Be slaves that work with a willing mind, like to the Lord and not to men,
QUENYA: Be slaves that work with a willing mind, like to the Lord and not to men,

ENGLISH: for you know that everyone, if he does anything good, shall receive back this deed from the Lord, not matter whether he is a slave or free.
QUENYA: for you know that everyone, if he does anything good, shall receive back this deed from the Lord, not matter whether he is a slave or free.

ENGLISH: And you lords , do the same things to them. Stop speaking threats, for you know that you and they alike have a Lord in heaven, and he does not heed faces .
QUENYA: And you lords , do the same things to them. Stop speaking threats, for you know that you and they alike have a Lord in heaven, and he does not heed faces .

ENGLISH: Finally, be mighty in the Lord and in the might of his strength.
QUENYA: Finally, be mighty in the Lord and in the might of his strength.

ENGLISH: Put on yourselves the protective gear of God, for you to stand against the Devil's tricks.
QUENYA: Put on yourselves the protective gear of God, for you to stand against the Devil's tricks.

ENGLISH: For we fight, not against blood and against flesh, but against the lordships, against the powers, against the world-rulers in this darkness, against the wicked spirit-powers in heaven.
QUENYA: For we fight, not against blood and against flesh, but against the lordships, against the powers, against the world-rulers in this darkness, against the wicked spirit-powers in heaven.

ENGLISH: Therefore lift up the protective gear of God, for you to be able to stand against the enemy on the evil day. Then, having completed everything, you will stand.
QUENYA: Therefore lift up the protective gear of God, for you to be able to stand against the enemy on the evil day. Then, having completed everything, you will stand.

ENGLISH: Therefore stand firm, after binding the truth around your hips as a belt, and having the breast-plate of righteousness,
QUENYA: Therefore stand firm, after binding the truth around your hips as a belt, and having the breast-plate of righteousness,

ENGLISH: and bound around your feet with the prepared state that the gospel of peace gives.
QUENYA: and bound around your feet with the prepared state that the gospel of peace gives.

ENGLISH: Above everything take the shield of faith, with which you will be able extinguish all the burning arrows of the Wicked One,
QUENYA: Above everything take the shield of faith, with which you will be able extinguish all the burning arrows of the Wicked One,

ENGLISH: and take the helmet of salvation and the sword of spirit, which is God's word,
QUENYA: and take the helmet of salvation and the sword of spirit, which is God's word,

ENGLISH: while you always pray in spirit with every prayer and petition. For that purpose be awake with all steadfastness and with petition on behalf of all the holy ones
QUENYA: while you always pray in spirit with every prayer and petition. For that purpose be awake with all steadfastness and with petition on behalf of all the holy ones

ENGLISH: – also on my behalf, for me to receive words when I open my mouth, allowing me with boldness to make known the secret of the gospel,
QUENYA: – also on my behalf, for me to receive words when I open my mouth, allowing me with boldness to make known the secret of the gospel,

ENGLISH: for which I am an ambassador in fetters – for me to speak it boldly, as it is necessary for me to speak.
QUENYA: for which I am an ambassador in fetters – for me to speak it boldly, as it is necessary for me to speak.

ENGLISH: To let also you know my matters, how I am doing, Tychicus – a beloved brother and a faithful servant in the Lord – will make everything known to you.
QUENYA: To let also you know my matters, how I am doing, Tychicus – a beloved brother and a faithful servant in the Lord – will make everything known to you.

ENGLISH: I sent him to you for this purpose, for you to know our matters and for him to comfort your heart.
QUENYA: I sent him to you for this purpose, for you to know our matters and for him to comfort your heart.

ENGLISH: May the brothers have peace and love from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ!
QUENYA: May the brothers have peace and love from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ!

ENGLISH: May the grace be with all that love our Lord Jesus Christ with an immortal love!
QUENYA: May the grace be with all that love our Lord Jesus Christ with an immortal love!

ENGLISH: Paul, apostle, not from men or through man, but through Jesus Christ and God the Father, who raised him out of dead,
QUENYA: Paul, apostle, not from men or through man, but through Jesus Christ and God the Father, who raised him out of dead,

ENGLISH: and all the brothers with me, to the congregations in Galatia:
QUENYA: and all the brothers with me, to the congregations in Galatia:

ENGLISH: May you have grace and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ,
QUENYA: May you have grace and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ,

ENGLISH: who gave himself for our sins, for him to deliver us out of the wicked age that exists now, by the will of our God and our Father,
QUENYA: who gave himself for our sins, for him to deliver us out of the wicked age that exists now, by the will of our God and our Father,

ENGLISH: to whom be the glory forever and ever. Amen.
QUENYA: to whom be the glory forever and ever. Amen.

ENGLISH: I am in wonder that so quickly you have been turned from who called you into the grace of Christ to another gospel.
QUENYA: I am in wonder that so quickly you have been turned from who called you into the grace of Christ to another gospel.

ENGLISH: But that is not another, but there are some people who stir you up and want to twist the gospel about the Christ.
QUENYA: But that is not another, but there are some people who stir you up and want to twist the gospel about the Christ.

ENGLISH: But also if we, or an angel from heaven, bring to you another gospel not like the gospel that we made known to you – may he be cursed!
QUENYA: But also if we, or an angel from heaven, bring to you another gospel not like the gospel that we made known to you – may he be cursed!

ENGLISH: As I have said before, now I say again: Anyone who brings to you a gospel beyond that you received, may he be cursed!
QUENYA: As I have said before, now I say again: Anyone who brings to you a gospel beyond that you received, may he be cursed!

ENGLISH: to men I am now trying to show that I speak truth, or to God?
QUENYA: to men I am now trying to show that I speak truth, or to God?

ENGLISH: If I still made men happy, I were not Christ's slave.
QUENYA: If I still made men happy, I were not Christ's slave.

ENGLISH: For I let you know, brothers, that that gospel which was brought to you by me does not come from men,
QUENYA: For I let you know, brothers, that that gospel which was brought to you by me does not come from men,

ENGLISH: for I did not receive it from man or was instructed in it, except by revelation from Jesus Christ.
QUENYA: for I did not receive it from man or was instructed in it, except by revelation from Jesus Christ.

ENGLISH: For you have heard about my behavior in the past, how with vigour I persecuted God's congregation and tried to undo it,
QUENYA: For you have heard about my behavior in the past, how with vigour I persecuted God's congregation and tried to undo it,

ENGLISH: and I went further in Judaism than numerous ones in my people that had the same number of years, being much more burning in spirit for the customs from the fathers.
QUENYA: and I went further in Judaism than numerous ones in my people that had the same number of years, being much more burning in spirit for the customs from the fathers.

ENGLISH: But when was pleasing to God, who brought me out of my mother's womb and called me with his grace,
QUENYA: But when was pleasing to God, who brought me out of my mother's womb and called me with his grace,

ENGLISH: to reveal his Son by me – for me to make the gospel about him known to the nations – I did not have a conversation with flesh and blood.
QUENYA: to reveal his Son by me – for me to make the gospel about him known to the nations – I did not have a conversation with flesh and blood.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, I did not go up to Jerusalem to those that were apostles before me, but I went away into Arabia, and I returned to Damascus.
QUENYA: Furthermore, I did not go up to Jerusalem to those that were apostles before me, but I went away into Arabia, and I returned to Damascus.

ENGLISH: Thereafter, after three years, I went up to Jerusalem to see Cephas, and I remained with him for fifteen days.
QUENYA: Thereafter, after three years, I went up to Jerusalem to see Cephas, and I remained with him for fifteen days.

ENGLISH: But I did not see anyone else among the apostles, but solely Jacob, the Lord's brother.
QUENYA: But I did not see anyone else among the apostles, but solely Jacob, the Lord's brother.

ENGLISH: that I am writing to you – look, before the eyes of God, I am not lying!
QUENYA: that I am writing to you – look, before the eyes of God, I am not lying!

ENGLISH: Thereafter I went into the regions of Syria and Cilicia.
QUENYA: Thereafter I went into the regions of Syria and Cilicia.

ENGLISH: But I was not known by face to the congregations in Judea in Christ;
QUENYA: But I was not known by face to the congregations in Judea in Christ;

ENGLISH: they only said: “The man who beforehand persecuted us now makes known the gospel that he tried to destroy formerly.”
QUENYA: they only said: “The man who beforehand persecuted us now makes known the gospel that he tried to destroy formerly.”

ENGLISH: And they gave glory to God concerning me.
QUENYA: And they gave glory to God concerning me.

ENGLISH: Therefore, after fourteen years, I went again up to Jerusalem with Barnabas, bringing also Titus.
QUENYA: Therefore, after fourteen years, I went again up to Jerusalem with Barnabas, bringing also Titus.

ENGLISH: But I went up after a revelation. And I told them about the gospel that I make known among the nations – but privately, before that were prominent men, fearing that in this or that manner I run or I have run for nothing.
QUENYA: But I went up after a revelation. And I told them about the gospel that I make known among the nations – but privately, before that were prominent men, fearing that in this or that manner I run or I have run for nothing.

ENGLISH: But nobody, also not Titus who was with me, was circumcised by compulsion, since he was a Greek.
QUENYA: But nobody, also not Titus who was with me, was circumcised by compulsion, since he was a Greek.

ENGLISH: That happened by reason of the false brothers brought inside in silence, that came in secretly to spy on the freedom that we have by Jesus Christ, to make us thralls.
QUENYA: That happened by reason of the false brothers brought inside in silence, that came in secretly to spy on the freedom that we have by Jesus Christ, to make us thralls.

ENGLISH: To them we did not allow to have their desire, not for a single moment – to cause the truth of the gospel to remain with you.
QUENYA: To them we did not allow to have their desire, not for a single moment – to cause the truth of the gospel to remain with you.

ENGLISH: But concerning the people that seemed to be important – the kind of people that they were formerly, is not important to me, for God does not heed a man's appearance – to me these important people told nothing new.
QUENYA: But concerning the people that seemed to be important – the kind of people that they were formerly, is not important to me, for God does not heed a man's appearance – to me these important people told nothing new.

ENGLISH: On the contrary, when they saw how the gospel was placed in my keeping for me to bring it to the uncircumcized, like Peter had it for the circumcised ones –
QUENYA: On the contrary, when they saw how the gospel was placed in my keeping for me to bring it to the uncircumcized, like Peter had it for the circumcised ones –

ENGLISH: for He who created in Peter the power of being an apostle for the circumcised, gave powers also to me for who are of the nations –
QUENYA: for He who created in Peter the power of being an apostle for the circumcised, gave powers also to me for who are of the nations –

ENGLISH: and James and Cephas and John perceived the grace given to me, they that seemed to be pillars, then they gave me and Barnabas their hand of brotherhood: We were to go to the nations, but they to the circumcised ones.
QUENYA: and James and Cephas and John perceived the grace given to me, they that seemed to be pillars, then they gave me and Barnabas their hand of brotherhood: We were to go to the nations, but they to the circumcised ones.

ENGLISH: Solely it was necessary for us to remember the poor ones, and that I have sincerely tried to do.
QUENYA: Solely it was necessary for us to remember the poor ones, and that I have sincerely tried to do.

ENGLISH: But when Cephas came to Antioch, I stood against him face to face, for he stood judged.
QUENYA: But when Cephas came to Antioch, I stood against him face to face, for he stood judged.

ENGLISH: For before the coming of some men from James he ate with people of the nations, but when they came, he turned himself away and separated himself, fearing the circumcised ones.
QUENYA: For before the coming of some men from James he ate with people of the nations, but when they came, he turned himself away and separated himself, fearing the circumcised ones.

ENGLISH: The other Jews also followed him in hypocrisy, until also Barnabas was led away with them in their hypocrisy.
QUENYA: The other Jews also followed him in hypocrisy, until also Barnabas was led away with them in their hypocrisy.

ENGLISH: But when I saw that they did not walk straight by the truth of the gospel, I said to Cephas before them all: “If you, though you are a Jew, behaves like a person of the nations and does not like a Jew, how is that you compel people of the nations to follow the Jewish manner?”
QUENYA: But when I saw that they did not walk straight by the truth of the gospel, I said to Cephas before them all: “If you, though you are a Jew, behaves like a person of the nations and does not like a Jew, how is that you compel people of the nations to follow the Jewish manner?”

ENGLISH: We by nature are Jews, and not sinners from the nations,
QUENYA: We by nature are Jews, and not sinners from the nations,

ENGLISH: and know a man will not receive justice by acts of Law, but solely by believing in Jesus Christ – also if we have believed in Jesus Christ in order to have justice by believing in Christ, and not by acts of Law. For is not flesh that will have justice by acts of Law.
QUENYA: and know a man will not receive justice by acts of Law, but solely by believing in Jesus Christ – also if we have believed in Jesus Christ in order to have justice by believing in Christ, and not by acts of Law. For is not flesh that will have justice by acts of Law.

ENGLISH: But if we that seek to have justice by Christ are also found sinners, is Christ really sin's servant? By no means!
QUENYA: But if we that seek to have justice by Christ are also found sinners, is Christ really sin's servant? By no means!

ENGLISH: For if I build up the same things that I threw down, I show that I am a transgressor .
QUENYA: For if I build up the same things that I threw down, I show that I am a transgressor .

ENGLISH: For I by law died to law, for me to be alive to God.
QUENYA: For I by law died to law, for me to be alive to God.

ENGLISH: I am crucified with Christ. I am alive, and yet that is not me, but Christ who is alive in me. The life that I now have in flesh, I have by believing in God's son, he who has loved me and has given himself for me.
QUENYA: I am crucified with Christ. I am alive, and yet that is not me, but Christ who is alive in me. The life that I now have in flesh, I have by believing in God's son, he who has loved me and has given himself for me.

ENGLISH: I do not put away God's grace, for if is justice by law, the Christ actually died for nothing.
QUENYA: I do not put away God's grace, for if is justice by law, the Christ actually died for nothing.

ENGLISH: O stupid Galatians, who has enchanted you, you before whose eyes Christ was shown crucified as if by a picture?
QUENYA: O stupid Galatians, who has enchanted you, you before whose eyes Christ was shown crucified as if by a picture?

ENGLISH: This thing alone I want to learn from you: Did you receive the Spirit by acts of law or by hearing in faith?
QUENYA: This thing alone I want to learn from you: Did you receive the Spirit by acts of law or by hearing in faith?

ENGLISH: Are you that stupid? After you had your beginning in spirit, are you now completed in flesh?
QUENYA: Are you that stupid? After you had your beginning in spirit, are you now completed in flesh?

ENGLISH: Did you suffer that many things for nothing? If indeed it happened for nothing.
QUENYA: Did you suffer that many things for nothing? If indeed it happened for nothing.

ENGLISH: Therefore, he who gives you the Spirit and does mighty acts among you, is his reason for doing so acts of law, or hearing by faith?
QUENYA: Therefore, he who gives you the Spirit and does mighty acts among you, is his reason for doing so acts of law, or hearing by faith?

ENGLISH: In the same manner Abraham “believed in the Lord, and that was counted to him as justice”.
QUENYA: In the same manner Abraham “believed in the Lord, and that was counted to him as justice”.

ENGLISH: Indeed you know that they who adhere to faith, they are Abraham's sons.
QUENYA: Indeed you know that they who adhere to faith, they are Abraham's sons.

ENGLISH: But the Scripture, foreseeing that God by faith was going to justify people from the nations, made the gospel known beforehand to Abraham: “By you all the nations will be blessed.”
QUENYA: But the Scripture, foreseeing that God by faith was going to justify people from the nations, made the gospel known beforehand to Abraham: “By you all the nations will be blessed.”

ENGLISH: Thus who adhere to faith are blessed with Abraham the Faithful.
QUENYA: Thus who adhere to faith are blessed with Abraham the Faithful.

ENGLISH: For all who adhere to acts of Law are under a curse, for is written: “Cursed is everyone who does not remain in all the things written in the book of the Law, in order to do them.”
QUENYA: For all who adhere to acts of Law are under a curse, for is written: “Cursed is everyone who does not remain in all the things written in the book of the Law, in order to do them.”

ENGLISH: That nobody is made just before God is easily seen, for “the just one will have life by faith”.
QUENYA: That nobody is made just before God is easily seen, for “the just one will have life by faith”.

ENGLISH: The Law does not adhere to faith, but “ who does them will have life by them”.
QUENYA: The Law does not adhere to faith, but “ who does them will have life by them”.

ENGLISH: The Christ traded us to himself out of the curse of the Law by being made a curse in our place, for is written: “Cursed is everyone hanging on a cross.”
QUENYA: The Christ traded us to himself out of the curse of the Law by being made a curse in our place, for is written: “Cursed is everyone hanging on a cross.”

ENGLISH: Thus the blessing which Abraham received was going to come to the nations by Jesus Christ, for us to receive by faith the spirit of which we have a promise.
QUENYA: Thus the blessing which Abraham received was going to come to the nations by Jesus Christ, for us to receive by faith the spirit of which we have a promise.

ENGLISH: Brothers, I speak to you by the manner of men: After a covenant has been established, nobody puts it away or adds to it, though it is a man's covenant.
QUENYA: Brothers, I speak to you by the manner of men: After a covenant has been established, nobody puts it away or adds to it, though it is a man's covenant.

ENGLISH: But to Abraham the promises were given, and to his seed. It does not say 'and to his seeds', as if are numerous ones, but as if is one: 'And to your seed,' who is the Christ.
QUENYA: But to Abraham the promises were given, and to his seed. It does not say 'and to his seeds', as if are numerous ones, but as if is one: 'And to your seed,' who is the Christ.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, I say: Concerning the promise beforehand established by God, the Law that came four hundred and thirty years after it does not make it void, undoing the promise.
QUENYA: Furthermore, I say: Concerning the promise beforehand established by God, the Law that came four hundred and thirty years after it does not make it void, undoing the promise.

ENGLISH: For if our part as heirs comes by Law, it does not hang on a promise, but to Abraham God has given it by a promise.
QUENYA: For if our part as heirs comes by Law, it does not hang on a promise, but to Abraham God has given it by a promise.

ENGLISH: Then for what reason did the Law exist? It was added to make crimes easily seen, until coming of the seed to whom the promise has been made, for it was given through angels, by an intermediary's hand.
QUENYA: Then for what reason did the Law exist? It was added to make crimes easily seen, until coming of the seed to whom the promise has been made, for it was given through angels, by an intermediary's hand.

ENGLISH: But is no intermediary where is one alone, but God is one.
QUENYA: But is no intermediary where is one alone, but God is one.

ENGLISH: Does the Law then stand against God's promises? By no means! For if a law was given that could give life, indeed was justice by law.
QUENYA: Does the Law then stand against God's promises? By no means! For if a law was given that could give life, indeed was justice by law.

ENGLISH: But the Scripture put all things together in custody of sin, and so the promise that comes from faith will be given to that believe.
QUENYA: But the Scripture put all things together in custody of sin, and so the promise that comes from faith will be given to that believe.

ENGLISH: But before the faith came, we were under oversight under law, being in custody together, until the faith that was to come was revealed.
QUENYA: But before the faith came, we were under oversight under law, being in custody together, until the faith that was to come was revealed.

ENGLISH: Thus the Law instructed us and led us to Christ, for us to be made just by faith.
QUENYA: Thus the Law instructed us and led us to Christ, for us to be made just by faith.

ENGLISH: But now when faith has come, we are no more under an instructor.
QUENYA: But now when faith has come, we are no more under an instructor.

ENGLISH: For all among you are sons of God by your faith in Jesus Christ.
QUENYA: For all among you are sons of God by your faith in Jesus Christ.

ENGLISH: For all you that were baptized into Christ has put Christ on yourselves.
QUENYA: For all you that were baptized into Christ has put Christ on yourselves.

ENGLISH: is not Jew or Greek, is not thrall or free person, is not man or woman; for you are all one, in Jesus Christ.
QUENYA: is not Jew or Greek, is not thrall or free person, is not man or woman; for you are all one, in Jesus Christ.

ENGLISH: Therefore, if you are the Christ's, indeed you are Abraham's seed, heirs by the promise.
QUENYA: Therefore, if you are the Christ's, indeed you are Abraham's seed, heirs by the promise.

ENGLISH: Now I say that while the heir is a babe he is in nothing better than a thrall, though he is lord of all things.
QUENYA: Now I say that while the heir is a babe he is in nothing better than a thrall, though he is lord of all things.

ENGLISH: He is under stewards until the day that his father chose beforehand.
QUENYA: He is under stewards until the day that his father chose beforehand.

ENGLISH: In the same manner also we, while we were babes, were thralls of the poor things of the world.
QUENYA: In the same manner also we, while we were babes, were thralls of the poor things of the world.

ENGLISH: But when the full time came, God sent forth his Son, born by a woman, born under Law,
QUENYA: But when the full time came, God sent forth his Son, born by a woman, born under Law,

ENGLISH: for him to trade that were under Law to himself, freeing them. Thus is it possible for us as well to receive a place as his sons.
QUENYA: for him to trade that were under Law to himself, freeing them. Thus is it possible for us as well to receive a place as his sons.

ENGLISH: But since you are sons, God sent his Son's spirit into our heart, crying: “Abba, Father!”
QUENYA: But since you are sons, God sent his Son's spirit into our heart, crying: “Abba, Father!”

ENGLISH: Thus you are no more a thrall, but a son; and if a son, also an heir through God.
QUENYA: Thus you are no more a thrall, but a son; and if a son, also an heir through God.

ENGLISH: And yet, when you did not know God, you were thralls for those that are not by nature gods.
QUENYA: And yet, when you did not know God, you were thralls for those that are not by nature gods.

ENGLISH: But now, after you knew God – or better said, now that you were known by God – how is that you turn yourselves back towards the weak and poor things and wish to be thralls to them again?
QUENYA: But now, after you knew God – or better said, now that you were known by God – how is that you turn yourselves back towards the weak and poor things and wish to be thralls to them again?

ENGLISH: You keep days and months and times and years.
QUENYA: You keep days and months and times and years.

ENGLISH: I fear that in this or that manner I have worked for nothing among you.
QUENYA: I fear that in this or that manner I have worked for nothing among you.

ENGLISH: Brothers, I ask of you: Be like me, for I was also like you! You did nothing bad to me.
QUENYA: Brothers, I ask of you: Be like me, for I was also like you! You did nothing bad to me.

ENGLISH: But you know how because of a sickness in my flesh I made the gospel known to you at the first time.
QUENYA: But you know how because of a sickness in my flesh I made the gospel known to you at the first time.

ENGLISH: And which was a test to you in my flesh you did not despise or spat upon it, but like an angel of God you received me, like Christ Jesus.
QUENYA: And which was a test to you in my flesh you did not despise or spat upon it, but like an angel of God you received me, like Christ Jesus.

ENGLISH: Where, then, is the joy that you had? For I am a witness to you that if that were possible, you cut out your own eyes to give them to me.
QUENYA: Where, then, is the joy that you had? For I am a witness to you that if that were possible, you cut out your own eyes to give them to me.

ENGLISH: As if I am now your enemy since I am telling you the truth?
QUENYA: As if I am now your enemy since I am telling you the truth?

ENGLISH: They seek you with a burning desire, not for good, but they want to cut you away from me, for you to seek them with a burning desire.
QUENYA: They seek you with a burning desire, not for good, but they want to cut you away from me, for you to seek them with a burning desire.

ENGLISH: But it is good to be sought for a good reason, and not solely when I am with you,
QUENYA: But it is good to be sought for a good reason, and not solely when I am with you,

ENGLISH: my children, for whom I again have sharp pains until Christ shall be formed in you.
QUENYA: my children, for whom I again have sharp pains until Christ shall be formed in you.

ENGLISH: But it is possible for me to wish that I were there with you now, to speak with you in another manner, for I do not know what I am to do concerning you.
QUENYA: But it is possible for me to wish that I were there with you now, to speak with you in another manner, for I do not know what I am to do concerning you.

ENGLISH: Tell me, you that wish to be under law: Do you not hear the Law?
QUENYA: Tell me, you that wish to be under law: Do you not hear the Law?

ENGLISH: For it is written that there were two sons with Abraham, one by the servant woman and one by the free woman.
QUENYA: For it is written that there were two sons with Abraham, one by the servant woman and one by the free woman.

ENGLISH: But that was by the servant woman was born in the manner of the flesh, but the other by the free woman, by a promise.
QUENYA: But that was by the servant woman was born in the manner of the flesh, but the other by the free woman, by a promise.

ENGLISH: They are a picture of coming things. For these women are two covenants. The first is from Mount Sinai, which bears children into thralldom, and which is Hagar.
QUENYA: They are a picture of coming things. For these women are two covenants. The first is from Mount Sinai, which bears children into thralldom, and which is Hagar.

ENGLISH: Now this Hagar is Sinai, a mountain in Arabia, and it is a picture of the Jerusalem which exists now, for she is in thralldom with her children.
QUENYA: Now this Hagar is Sinai, a mountain in Arabia, and it is a picture of the Jerusalem which exists now, for she is in thralldom with her children.

ENGLISH: But Jerusalem on High is free, and she is our mother.
QUENYA: But Jerusalem on High is free, and she is our mother.

ENGLISH: For it is written: “Be happy, O woman who did not bear a child; have joy and cry out , you who did not have pain of birth! For the unfruitful woman's children are more numerous than the children of the woman who had the husband.”
QUENYA: For it is written: “Be happy, O woman who did not bear a child; have joy and cry out , you who did not have pain of birth! For the unfruitful woman's children are more numerous than the children of the woman who had the husband.”

ENGLISH: But you, brothers, are children by the promise, as was Isaac.
QUENYA: But you, brothers, are children by the promise, as was Isaac.

ENGLISH: But as who was born in the manner of the flesh persecuted who was born in the manner of spirit, so also now.
QUENYA: But as who was born in the manner of the flesh persecuted who was born in the manner of spirit, so also now.

ENGLISH: But what does the Scripture say? “Send away the slavegirl and her son, for the slavegirl's son will by no means be an heir with the free woman's son.”
QUENYA: But what does the Scripture say? “Send away the slavegirl and her son, for the slavegirl's son will by no means be an heir with the free woman's son.”

ENGLISH: For into such freedom the Christ freed us. Therefore stand firm, and do not allow yourselves to be kept under a thrall's yoke.
QUENYA: For into such freedom the Christ freed us. Therefore stand firm, and do not allow yourselves to be kept under a thrall's yoke.

ENGLISH: Behold! I, Paul, am telling you that if you are circumcised, Christ will not be of benefit to you.
QUENYA: Behold! I, Paul, am telling you that if you are circumcised, Christ will not be of benefit to you.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, I witness again to everyone who is circumcised that he has the obligation of keeping the entire Law.
QUENYA: Furthermore, I witness again to everyone who is circumcised that he has the obligation of keeping the entire Law.

ENGLISH: You are split from Christ, you who try to be made just by the Law; out of the grace you have fallen.
QUENYA: You are split from Christ, you who try to be made just by the Law; out of the grace you have fallen.

ENGLISH: For we by spirit look forward to the righteousness by faith concerning which we have hope.
QUENYA: For we by spirit look forward to the righteousness by faith concerning which we have hope.

ENGLISH: For in Jesus Christ circumcision and uncircumcision alike cannot do anything, but faith by love can.
QUENYA: For in Jesus Christ circumcision and uncircumcision alike cannot do anything, but faith by love can.

ENGLISH: You ran well. What stopped you from following the truth still?
QUENYA: You ran well. What stopped you from following the truth still?

ENGLISH: You are not so induced by who called you.
QUENYA: You are not so induced by who called you.

ENGLISH: A small sourdough makes the whole lump swell.
QUENYA: A small sourdough makes the whole lump swell.

ENGLISH: I am certain concerning you that are in Christ that you do not think in another manner, but he who is causing difficulty for you will carry his judgement, not heeding who he is.
QUENYA: I am certain concerning you that are in Christ that you do not think in another manner, but he who is causing difficulty for you will carry his judgement, not heeding who he is.

ENGLISH: And concerning me, brothers, if I am still preaching circumcision, what is the reason for pursuing me? Then the off-putting thing of the cross has been made empty.
QUENYA: And concerning me, brothers, if I am still preaching circumcision, what is the reason for pursuing me? Then the off-putting thing of the cross has been made empty.

ENGLISH: I wish that those that stir you up will cut off the whole thing!
QUENYA: I wish that those that stir you up will cut off the whole thing!

ENGLISH: For you were called into freedom, brothers; solely do not use this freedom to give an opportunity to the flesh, but by love be thralls one for the other.
QUENYA: For you were called into freedom, brothers; solely do not use this freedom to give an opportunity to the flesh, but by love be thralls one for the other.

ENGLISH: For the sum of the whole Law is one saying: “Love your neighbor as yourself.”
QUENYA: For the sum of the whole Law is one saying: “Love your neighbor as yourself.”

ENGLISH: But if you bite and consume one another, take heed that you are not destroyed one by the other!
QUENYA: But if you bite and consume one another, take heed that you are not destroyed one by the other!

ENGLISH: But I say: Walk by spirit, and you will by no means follow the desire of the flesh!
QUENYA: But I say: Walk by spirit, and you will by no means follow the desire of the flesh!

ENGLISH: For the flesh stands against the spirit by its desire, and the spirit against the flesh; for they are hostile, one against the other, to stop you from doing that you wish.
QUENYA: For the flesh stands against the spirit by its desire, and the spirit against the flesh; for they are hostile, one against the other, to stop you from doing that you wish.

ENGLISH: But if you are led by spirit, you are not under law.
QUENYA: But if you are led by spirit, you are not under law.

ENGLISH: The deeds of the flesh are easily seen, and they are fornication, uncleanness, loose conduct,
QUENYA: The deeds of the flesh are easily seen, and they are fornication, uncleanness, loose conduct,

ENGLISH: idol-worship, sorcery, strife, fighting, burning feeling, anger, quarrels, splits, divided orders,
QUENYA: idol-worship, sorcery, strife, fighting, burning feeling, anger, quarrels, splits, divided orders,

ENGLISH: envy, drunkenness, over-drinkings and their likes. About these things I tell you about the danger beforehand, as I also told you formerly: who do such things will not be heirs of the kingdom of God.
QUENYA: envy, drunkenness, over-drinkings and their likes. About these things I tell you about the danger beforehand, as I also told you formerly: who do such things will not be heirs of the kingdom of God.

ENGLISH: But the fruit of the spirit is love, joy, peace, patience, grace, goodness, faith,
QUENYA: But the fruit of the spirit is love, joy, peace, patience, grace, goodness, faith,

ENGLISH: gentleness, self-control. Against such things is no law.
QUENYA: gentleness, self-control. Against such things is no law.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, those who are of Chrsit Jesus have crucified the flesh with its lusts and desires.
QUENYA: Furthermore, those who are of Chrsit Jesus have crucified the flesh with its lusts and desires.

ENGLISH: If we have life by spirit, let us also walk by the spirit.
QUENYA: If we have life by spirit, let us also walk by the spirit.

ENGLISH: Let us not seek empty glory, stirring one another up, having envy one towards the other.
QUENYA: Let us not seek empty glory, stirring one another up, having envy one towards the other.

ENGLISH: Brothers, if a person makes this or that mistake, show him the right way in a gentle manner, you who are of the spirit, while everyone among you watches himself, or maybe you too will be tempted.
QUENYA: Brothers, if a person makes this or that mistake, show him the right way in a gentle manner, you who are of the spirit, while everyone among you watches himself, or maybe you too will be tempted.

ENGLISH: Carry one another's burdens, and so follow the Christ's law.
QUENYA: Carry one another's burdens, and so follow the Christ's law.

ENGLISH: For if a person thinks that he is important when he is nothing, he tells a lie to himself.
QUENYA: For if a person thinks that he is important when he is nothing, he tells a lie to himself.

ENGLISH: But may everyone examine his own work, and then he will have his reason for joy in that which he himself has done, not comparing himself to another person.
QUENYA: But may everyone examine his own work, and then he will have his reason for joy in that which he himself has done, not comparing himself to another person.

ENGLISH: For everyone will carry his own burden.
QUENYA: For everyone will carry his own burden.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, may who learns the word allow who instructs him to have a part in all good things.
QUENYA: Furthermore, may who learns the word allow who instructs him to have a part in all good things.

ENGLISH: Do not err: One may not speak mockery against God. For which a man sows, that he shall also reap,
QUENYA: Do not err: One may not speak mockery against God. For which a man sows, that he shall also reap,

ENGLISH: for who sows in his flesh shall reap destruction from his flesh, but who sows in the spirit shall reap eternal life from the spirit.
QUENYA: for who sows in his flesh shall reap destruction from his flesh, but who sows in the spirit shall reap eternal life from the spirit.

ENGLISH: Therefore let us not be tired and stop doing what is good, for when the time shall come, we will reap if we do not wear out.
QUENYA: Therefore let us not be tired and stop doing what is good, for when the time shall come, we will reap if we do not wear out.

ENGLISH: Truly, when we have an opportunity, may we do good to everyone, and above all to that are our kin in the faith.
QUENYA: Truly, when we have an opportunity, may we do good to everyone, and above all to that are our kin in the faith.

ENGLISH: Behold the big letters that I have written to you with my own hand!
QUENYA: Behold the big letters that I have written to you with my own hand!

ENGLISH: who want to compel you to be circumcised are that wish to make the flesh beautiful, wishing to escape persecution because of the cross of the Christ.
QUENYA: who want to compel you to be circumcised are that wish to make the flesh beautiful, wishing to escape persecution because of the cross of the Christ.

ENGLISH: For that are circumcised, they do not keep the Law, but they wish that you too will be circumcised, for them to have a reason to praise themselves concerning your flesh.
QUENYA: For that are circumcised, they do not keep the Law, but they wish that you too will be circumcised, for them to have a reason to praise themselves concerning your flesh.

ENGLISH: May I not ever praise myself, except by the cross of Jesus Christ, by whom the world has been crucified for me, and I for the world.
QUENYA: May I not ever praise myself, except by the cross of Jesus Christ, by whom the world has been crucified for me, and I for the world.

ENGLISH: For what is important is not circumcision or uncircumcision, but to be a new creature.
QUENYA: For what is important is not circumcision or uncircumcision, but to be a new creature.

ENGLISH: All that want to walk by this rule of conduct, to them be peace and grace, and to the God of Israel.
QUENYA: All that want to walk by this rule of conduct, to them be peace and grace, and to the God of Israel.

ENGLISH: From now may no one cause me difficulty, for I am carrying in my flesh the marks of Jesus Christ.
QUENYA: From now may no one cause me difficulty, for I am carrying in my flesh the marks of Jesus Christ.

ENGLISH: May the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit, brothers. Amen!
QUENYA: May the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit, brothers. Amen!

ENGLISH: God, who long ago at numerous occasions and in numerous manners spoke to our fathers by the prophets,
QUENYA: God, who long ago at numerous occasions and in numerous manners spoke to our fathers by the prophets,

ENGLISH: has at the end of these days spoken to us by a Son, whom he has appointed heir of all things, and through whom he has made the Universe.
QUENYA: has at the end of these days spoken to us by a Son, whom he has appointed heir of all things, and through whom he has made the Universe.

ENGLISH: He is a ray of his glory and an image of his true-being, bearing all things by the power of his word, and after making a cleansing of our sins he sat down to the right of the Majesty on high.
QUENYA: He is a ray of his glory and an image of his true-being, bearing all things by the power of his word, and after making a cleansing of our sins he sat down to the right of the Majesty on high.

ENGLISH: Thus he has been made greater than angels, being heir to a name more glorious than their name.
QUENYA: Thus he has been made greater than angels, being heir to a name more glorious than their name.

ENGLISH: For to whom among angels has he ever said: "You are my son; I begat you today" – ? And again: "I shall be his father, and he shall be my son."
QUENYA: For to whom among angels has he ever said: "You are my son; I begat you today" – ? And again: "I shall be his father, and he shall be my son."

ENGLISH: But when he again sends his Only-begotten into the world, he says: "And may all God's angels worship him!"
QUENYA: But when he again sends his Only-begotten into the world, he says: "And may all God's angels worship him!"

ENGLISH: And concerning the angels he says: "He makes his angels spirits, and those who work for him, a fire of flame."
QUENYA: And concerning the angels he says: "He makes his angels spirits, and those who work for him, a fire of flame."

ENGLISH: But concerning the Son: "God is your throne forever and ever, and your kingdom's staff is a staff of uprightness" .
QUENYA: But concerning the Son: "God is your throne forever and ever, and your kingdom's staff is a staff of uprightness" .

ENGLISH: You have loved righteousness, and you have hated lawlessness.
QUENYA: You have loved righteousness, and you have hated lawlessness.

ENGLISH: Therefore God, your Deity, has annointed you with oil, more than your companions."
QUENYA: Therefore God, your Deity, has annointed you with oil, more than your companions."

ENGLISH: And, "In the beginning, o Lord, you founded earth, and heaven is an artifact of your hands.
QUENYA: And, "In the beginning, o Lord, you founded earth, and heaven is an artifact of your hands.

ENGLISH: They will pass away, but you remain; and they will both wear out like a cloak,
QUENYA: They will pass away, but you remain; and they will both wear out like a cloak,

ENGLISH: and like a raiment you will roll them up, like a cloak, and they will be changed. But you are the same, and your years will not stop."
QUENYA: and like a raiment you will roll them up, like a cloak, and they will be changed. But you are the same, and your years will not stop."

ENGLISH: But concerning whom among angels has he ever said: "Sit by my right hand until I place your enemies as a support for your feet."
QUENYA: But concerning whom among angels has he ever said: "Sit by my right hand until I place your enemies as a support for your feet."

ENGLISH: Are they all among them servant-spirits, sent to serve those that will be heirs of salvation?
QUENYA: Are they all among them servant-spirits, sent to serve those that will be heirs of salvation?

ENGLISH: For this reason it is necessary to profoundly heed that we have heard, to stop us from ever drifting away.
QUENYA: For this reason it is necessary to profoundly heed that we have heard, to stop us from ever drifting away.

ENGLISH: For if the word spoken through angels has been true, and every crime and failing to heed a commandment received a just punishment,
QUENYA: For if the word spoken through angels has been true, and every crime and failing to heed a commandment received a just punishment,

ENGLISH: how will we flee if we have failed to heed a salvation so great? In the beginning it was spoken by our Lord, and it was established for ourselves by that heard him,
QUENYA: how will we flee if we have failed to heed a salvation so great? In the beginning it was spoken by our Lord, and it was established for ourselves by that heard him,

ENGLISH: when also God witnessed by means of signs and wonders and mighty doings and by distributions of holy spirit, as his will was.
QUENYA: when also God witnessed by means of signs and wonders and mighty doings and by distributions of holy spirit, as his will was.

ENGLISH: For not under angels he has put the world that is going to come, of which we are speaking.
QUENYA: For not under angels he has put the world that is going to come, of which we are speaking.

ENGLISH: But in a place someone has witnessed, saying: "What is man, for you to recall him, or a son or man, for you to heed him?
QUENYA: But in a place someone has witnessed, saying: "What is man, for you to recall him, or a son or man, for you to heed him?

ENGLISH: You have placed him a little under angels, you gave him a crown of glory and of honor; and you put him over the works of your hands.
QUENYA: You have placed him a little under angels, you gave him a crown of glory and of honor; and you put him over the works of your hands.

ENGLISH: All things you have put under his feet. For when God put all things under him, there is nothing that he allowed to be beyond his power. Now we still do not see all things put under him .
QUENYA: All things you have put under his feet. For when God put all things under him, there is nothing that he allowed to be beyond his power. Now we still do not see all things put under him .

ENGLISH: But we do look at Jesus, who was made a little under angels, having a crown of glory and honor after he went through death, for him to taste death for every person, by God's grace.
QUENYA: But we do look at Jesus, who was made a little under angels, having a crown of glory and honor after he went through death, for him to taste death for every person, by God's grace.

ENGLISH: It seemed good to him for whom all things exist and through whom everything exists, when he was bringing many sons to glory, to make the Chief of their salvation perfect through suffering.
QUENYA: It seemed good to him for whom all things exist and through whom everything exists, when he was bringing many sons to glory, to make the Chief of their salvation perfect through suffering.

ENGLISH: And that hallows and that are hallowed all come from One, and for this reason he is not ashamed about calling them brothers,
QUENYA: And that hallows and that are hallowed all come from One, and for this reason he is not ashamed about calling them brothers,

ENGLISH: as he says: "I shall preach your name to my brothers; in the midst of the congregation I shall praise you with song."
QUENYA: as he says: "I shall preach your name to my brothers; in the midst of the congregation I shall praise you with song."

ENGLISH: And again: "I shall put my name on him." And again: "Behold, I and the children that God has given me!"
QUENYA: And again: "I shall put my name on him." And again: "Behold, I and the children that God has given me!"

ENGLISH: Since the children have part in flesh and blood, he as well received a part in them , by death undoing that had the power to cause death, that is, the Devil,
QUENYA: Since the children have part in flesh and blood, he as well received a part in them , by death undoing that had the power to cause death, that is, the Devil,

ENGLISH: and delivering all that by fear of death were slaves in their entire life.
QUENYA: and delivering all that by fear of death were slaves in their entire life.

ENGLISH: For he does not help angels, but Abraham's kin he helps.
QUENYA: For he does not help angels, but Abraham's kin he helps.

ENGLISH: Therefore it was necessary for him to be like his brothers in all things, for him to be a merciful and faithful chief priest, to sacrifice guilt-offerings about the sins of the people.
QUENYA: Therefore it was necessary for him to be like his brothers in all things, for him to be a merciful and faithful chief priest, to sacrifice guilt-offerings about the sins of the people.

ENGLISH: And since he has had sufferings when he was tested, he can help that are tested.
QUENYA: And since he has had sufferings when he was tested, he can help that are tested.

ENGLISH: Therefore, holy brothers who have a part in the calling to heaven, give heed to the apostle and chief priest that we confess – Jesus.
QUENYA: Therefore, holy brothers who have a part in the calling to heaven, give heed to the apostle and chief priest that we confess – Jesus.

ENGLISH: He was faithful to the one who made him so, as was also Moses in all the house of that Person.
QUENYA: He was faithful to the one who made him so, as was also Moses in all the house of that Person.

ENGLISH: For he is counted worthy of a glory greater than that of Moses, since who has built a house has an honor greater that which the house has.
QUENYA: For he is counted worthy of a glory greater than that of Moses, since who has built a house has an honor greater that which the house has.

ENGLISH: For every house is built by someone, but who has built all things is God.
QUENYA: For every house is built by someone, but who has built all things is God.

ENGLISH: For Moses as a servant was faithful in all the house of that Person, as a witness of things of which one was to speak afterwards,
QUENYA: For Moses as a servant was faithful in all the house of that Person, as a witness of things of which one was to speak afterwards,

ENGLISH: but Jesus was faithful as Son in the house of that Person.
QUENYA: but Jesus was faithful as Son in the house of that Person.

ENGLISH: Therefore, as the Holy Spirit says: "Today if you listen to his voice,
QUENYA: Therefore, as the Holy Spirit says: "Today if you listen to his voice,

ENGLISH: do not make your heart hard, as when people caused bitter anger on the day of test in the wilderness,
QUENYA: do not make your heart hard, as when people caused bitter anger on the day of test in the wilderness,

ENGLISH: when your father tempted me with a test, after they saw my works for forty years.
QUENYA: when your father tempted me with a test, after they saw my works for forty years.

ENGLISH: Therefore I loathed this generation and said: Always they stray in their heart, and they have not known my ways.
QUENYA: Therefore I loathed this generation and said: Always they stray in their heart, and they have not known my ways.

ENGLISH: Thus I spoke an oath in my heart: They shall not come into my rest!"
QUENYA: Thus I spoke an oath in my heart: They shall not come into my rest!"

ENGLISH: Watch yourselves, my brothers, to stop anyone among you from having a wicked heart without faith, causing you to abandon the living God.
QUENYA: Watch yourselves, my brothers, to stop anyone among you from having a wicked heart without faith, causing you to abandon the living God.

ENGLISH: But encourage one another, every day while there is still that which one calls "today", to stop anyone among you from being made hard by the temptation of sin.
QUENYA: But encourage one another, every day while there is still that which one calls "today", to stop anyone among you from being made hard by the temptation of sin.

ENGLISH: For we have had a part with the Christ. All we need is that we keep until the end the foundation that we had in the beginning.
QUENYA: For we have had a part with the Christ. All we need is that we keep until the end the foundation that we had in the beginning.

ENGLISH: When is said: "Today, if you listen to his voice, do not make your heart hard, as when people caused bitter anger"
QUENYA: When is said: "Today, if you listen to his voice, do not make your heart hard, as when people caused bitter anger"

ENGLISH: – who were the people that listened, and yet caused bitter anger? Were the one that did so not all that went out of Egypt, led by Moses?
QUENYA: – who were the people that listened, and yet caused bitter anger? Were the one that did so not all that went out of Egypt, led by Moses?

ENGLISH: Furthermore, whom did God loathe throughout forty years? Were they not the ones that sinned, the people whose corpses fell in the desert?
QUENYA: Furthermore, whom did God loathe throughout forty years? Were they not the ones that sinned, the people whose corpses fell in the desert?

ENGLISH: The people to whom by oath he refused to come into his peace, who were they, if not that failed to heed his commands?
QUENYA: The people to whom by oath he refused to come into his peace, who were they, if not that failed to heed his commands?

ENGLISH: Thus we see that they might not come in because of lack of faith.
QUENYA: Thus we see that they might not come in because of lack of faith.

ENGLISH: Therefore, since a promise remains about coming into his rest, let us fear, for it seems that among you there are some that have fallen short of it.
QUENYA: Therefore, since a promise remains about coming into his rest, let us fear, for it seems that among you there are some that have fallen short of it.

ENGLISH: For the gospel was brought to us and to them alike, but the word that they heard did nothing beneficial for them, for they were not united by faith with the ones that listened.
QUENYA: For the gospel was brought to us and to them alike, but the word that they heard did nothing beneficial for them, for they were not united by faith with the ones that listened.

ENGLISH: For we that have believed indeed come into the rest, just as he has said: "This oath I gave in my anger: They shall not come into my rest" – though his works were completed from the founding of the world.
QUENYA: For we that have believed indeed come into the rest, just as he has said: "This oath I gave in my anger: They shall not come into my rest" – though his works were completed from the founding of the world.

ENGLISH: For in place he has said about the seventh day: "And God rested on the seventh day from all his works",
QUENYA: For in place he has said about the seventh day: "And God rested on the seventh day from all his works",

ENGLISH: and again in this place: "They shall not come into my peace."
QUENYA: and again in this place: "They shall not come into my peace."

ENGLISH: Therefore, since are still some people that will come into it, and the ones that received the gospel in the beginning did not come into it because of failing to heed his commands,
QUENYA: Therefore, since are still some people that will come into it, and the ones that received the gospel in the beginning did not come into it because of failing to heed his commands,

ENGLISH: again he indicates a day, by saying after a long time in David's song: "Today" – as he said formerly – "Today, if you hear his voice, do not make your heart hard!"
QUENYA: again he indicates a day, by saying after a long time in David's song: "Today" – as he said formerly – "Today, if you hear his voice, do not make your heart hard!"

ENGLISH: For if Joshua led them to a place of rest, God would not speak thereafter about another day.
QUENYA: For if Joshua led them to a place of rest, God would not speak thereafter about another day.

ENGLISH: Indeed there will still be a sabbath-rest for God's people.
QUENYA: Indeed there will still be a sabbath-rest for God's people.

ENGLISH: For who has come into God's rest, has also rested from his works, as God did from his own.
QUENYA: For who has come into God's rest, has also rested from his works, as God did from his own.

ENGLISH: Therefore, let us do everything that we can to come into that rest, to stop anyone from falling in the same manner: by failing to heed the commands.
QUENYA: Therefore, let us do everything that we can to come into that rest, to stop anyone from falling in the same manner: by failing to heed the commands.

ENGLISH: For God's word is alive and carries power, and it is sharper than any double-edged sword, piercing until it divides soul and spirit, bones and marrow, and can perceive the heart's thoughts and ideas.
QUENYA: For God's word is alive and carries power, and it is sharper than any double-edged sword, piercing until it divides soul and spirit, bones and marrow, and can perceive the heart's thoughts and ideas.

ENGLISH: For there is not creature that is not seen by him, but all things are naked and open to his eyes, he to whom it is necessary for us to answer.
QUENYA: For there is not creature that is not seen by him, but all things are naked and open to his eyes, he to whom it is necessary for us to answer.

ENGLISH: Therefore, seeing that we have a mighty chief priest who has gone through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God, let us keep our confession .
QUENYA: Therefore, seeing that we have a mighty chief priest who has gone through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God, let us keep our confession .

ENGLISH: For we have as a chief priest, not a person who does not know to have sympathy when we are weak, but a person who has ben tested in every manner as are we, but without sin.
QUENYA: For we have as a chief priest, not a person who does not know to have sympathy when we are weak, but a person who has ben tested in every manner as are we, but without sin.

ENGLISH: Therefore may we come to the throne of grace having courage, to receive mercy and to find a grace helping us in our time of need.
QUENYA: Therefore may we come to the throne of grace having courage, to receive mercy and to find a grace helping us in our time of need.

ENGLISH: For every chief priest taken from among men is put on behalf of men over God's things, to sacrifice gifts and sacrifices concerning sins.
QUENYA: For every chief priest taken from among men is put on behalf of men over God's things, to sacrifice gifts and sacrifices concerning sins.

ENGLISH: He knows to behave gently to who lack knowledge and are errant, since he as well always perceives his own weak state,
QUENYA: He knows to behave gently to who lack knowledge and are errant, since he as well always perceives his own weak state,

ENGLISH: and just as he makes sacrifices on behalf of the people, so it is necessary for him to make sacrifices on behalf of himself – concerning sin.
QUENYA: and just as he makes sacrifices on behalf of the people, so it is necessary for him to make sacrifices on behalf of himself – concerning sin.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, a person does not receive this glory by his own doing , but solely when he is called by God, as was also Aaron.
QUENYA: Furthermore, a person does not receive this glory by his own doing , but solely when he is called by God, as was also Aaron.

ENGLISH: Thus also the Christ did not glorify himself, as if he made himself a chief priest. who did so was who said about him: "You are my son; I today begat you."
QUENYA: Thus also the Christ did not glorify himself, as if he made himself a chief priest. who did so was who said about him: "You are my son; I today begat you."

ENGLISH: In the same manner he says also in another place: "You are a priest forever, in the manner of Melchizedek."
QUENYA: In the same manner he says also in another place: "You are a priest forever, in the manner of Melchizedek."

ENGLISH: In the days of his flesh Jesus sent prayers and petitions to who could save him from death, with strong cries and tears, and he was heard for his awe for God.
QUENYA: In the days of his flesh Jesus sent prayers and petitions to who could save him from death, with strong cries and tears, and he was heard for his awe for God.

ENGLISH: Though he was Son, he learnt to be obedient by the things that he suffered.
QUENYA: Though he was Son, he learnt to be obedient by the things that he suffered.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, after he was made perfect, he was who distributes eternal salvation to all that heed his commands.
QUENYA: Furthermore, after he was made perfect, he was who distributes eternal salvation to all that heed his commands.

ENGLISH: For he was summoned by God, to be a chief priest, in the manner of Melchizedek.
QUENYA: For he was summoned by God, to be a chief priest, in the manner of Melchizedek.

ENGLISH: Concerning him we have many things to say – and making you understand them is difficult, since your hearing has been made slow.
QUENYA: Concerning him we have many things to say – and making you understand them is difficult, since your hearing has been made slow.

ENGLISH: And though now you did well if you were teachers, for you it is necessary that someone teaches you again the first things of God's word. You have need of milk, not of firm food,
QUENYA: And though now you did well if you were teachers, for you it is necessary that someone teaches you again the first things of God's word. You have need of milk, not of firm food,

ENGLISH: and everyone who drinks of milk is not skilled about the word of righteousness, for he is a child.
QUENYA: and everyone who drinks of milk is not skilled about the word of righteousness, for he is a child.

ENGLISH: But firm food is for who are fully grown, for who by use taught their perceptions how to separate good from evil.
QUENYA: But firm food is for who are fully grown, for who by use taught their perceptions how to separate good from evil.

ENGLISH: Therefore, after passing from the first things in the teaching of Christ, let us seek the full understanding, not again establishing a foundation about repentance from dead works and faith in God,
QUENYA: Therefore, after passing from the first things in the teaching of Christ, let us seek the full understanding, not again establishing a foundation about repentance from dead works and faith in God,

ENGLISH: the teaching about baptisms and the putting of hands, the resurrection of dead ones and everlasting judgement.
QUENYA: the teaching about baptisms and the putting of hands, the resurrection of dead ones and everlasting judgement.

ENGLISH: And that we shall do, if God allows.
QUENYA: And that we shall do, if God allows.

ENGLISH: For if people at one time have received the light and have tasted the gift from heaven and have had a measure of Holy Spirit,
QUENYA: For if people at one time have received the light and have tasted the gift from heaven and have had a measure of Holy Spirit,

ENGLISH: and have tasted God's good word and the powers of the coming Arda ,
QUENYA: and have tasted God's good word and the powers of the coming Arda ,

ENGLISH: but have fallen away, then one cannot renew their repentance, for they crucify again the Son of God for themselves and shame him.
QUENYA: but have fallen away, then one cannot renew their repentance, for they crucify again the Son of God for themselves and shame him.

ENGLISH: For the ground that drinks the rain that frequently falls upon it, and bears plants that are good for the cultivators, receives a blessing from God.
QUENYA: For the ground that drinks the rain that frequently falls upon it, and bears plants that are good for the cultivators, receives a blessing from God.

ENGLISH: But if it bears thorns and thistles, it is counted as nothing and near to being cursed, and in the end it is burnt.
QUENYA: But if it bears thorns and thistles, it is counted as nothing and near to being cursed, and in the end it is burnt.

ENGLISH: Though we spoke to you thus, beloved ones, concerning you we are sure of the better things that lead to salvation.
QUENYA: Though we spoke to you thus, beloved ones, concerning you we are sure of the better things that lead to salvation.

ENGLISH: For God is not unjust, failing to recall your labour and the love of his name that you showed as servants for the holy ones, as still you are.
QUENYA: For God is not unjust, failing to recall your labour and the love of his name that you showed as servants for the holy ones, as still you are.

ENGLISH: For we wish that everyone among you will show a burning spirit to have the full surety until the end.
QUENYA: For we wish that everyone among you will show a burning spirit to have the full surety until the end.

ENGLISH: Thus you will not be slow, but will do like they do who by faith and patience are hears to the promises.
QUENYA: Thus you will not be slow, but will do like they do who by faith and patience are hears to the promises.

ENGLISH: For when God made his promise to Abraham, he gave his promise by himself, since there did not exist anyone greater by whom it it was possible for him to give it.
QUENYA: For when God made his promise to Abraham, he gave his promise by himself, since there did not exist anyone greater by whom it it was possible for him to give it.

ENGLISH: And thus, after Abraham showed patience, he received this promise.
QUENYA: And thus, after Abraham showed patience, he received this promise.

ENGLISH: For men give their oaths by who is greater, and their oath is the end of every dispute, since they are obliged by it.
QUENYA: For men give their oaths by who is greater, and their oath is the end of every dispute, since they are obliged by it.

ENGLISH: In this manner God, when he wanted to show to the heirs of the promise how unchangeable his decision was, made himself obliged to them.
QUENYA: In this manner God, when he wanted to show to the heirs of the promise how unchangeable his decision was, made himself obliged to them.

ENGLISH: Thus, by two things that cannot change and concerning which God cannot lie, you that have escaped to the refuge can have great urgency to keep the hope put before us.
QUENYA: Thus, by two things that cannot change and concerning which God cannot lie, you that have escaped to the refuge can have great urgency to keep the hope put before us.

ENGLISH: This hope we have as an anchor for the soul, stable and firm, and it reaches beyond the veil,
QUENYA: This hope we have as an anchor for the soul, stable and firm, and it reaches beyond the veil,

ENGLISH: to the place into which Jesus went and opened the way for us, he who has been made a chief priest forever, by the manner of Melchizedek.
QUENYA: to the place into which Jesus went and opened the way for us, he who has been made a chief priest forever, by the manner of Melchizedek.

ENGLISH: This Melchizedek, king of Salem, priest of the Highest God, met Abraham when he returned from the victory over the kings and blessed him.
QUENYA: This Melchizedek, king of Salem, priest of the Highest God, met Abraham when he returned from the victory over the kings and blessed him.

ENGLISH: To him Abraham gave a tenth of all things. First he is, as his name indicates, king of righteousness, and then also king of Salem, that is, king of peace.
QUENYA: To him Abraham gave a tenth of all things. First he is, as his name indicates, king of righteousness, and then also king of Salem, that is, king of peace.

ENGLISH: He is without father or mother and lacks a genealogy , and he does not have beginning of days or end of life. Thus he is a picture of the Son of God, remaining as priest forever.
QUENYA: He is without father or mother and lacks a genealogy , and he does not have beginning of days or end of life. Thus he is a picture of the Son of God, remaining as priest forever.

ENGLISH: Heed well how great he is, this man to whom Abraham, the patriarch , gave a tenth of the best goods seized in the war.
QUENYA: Heed well how great he is, this man to whom Abraham, the patriarch , gave a tenth of the best goods seized in the war.

ENGLISH: True, the men in the descent from Levi that receive the priesthood have a command in the Law about taking tithes from the people, that is, rom their own brothers, though they as well are Abraham's kin.
QUENYA: True, the men in the descent from Levi that receive the priesthood have a command in the Law about taking tithes from the people, that is, rom their own brothers, though they as well are Abraham's kin.

ENGLISH: But this man, whose descent does not come from them, took tithes from Abraham and blessed who had the promises.
QUENYA: But this man, whose descent does not come from them, took tithes from Abraham and blessed who had the promises.

ENGLISH: Beyond every dispute, the smaller is blessed by the greater.
QUENYA: Beyond every dispute, the smaller is blessed by the greater.

ENGLISH: And in the first affair, men that are dying receive tithes, but in the second affair: a person who has the witness that he is living.
QUENYA: And in the first affair, men that are dying receive tithes, but in the second affair: a person who has the witness that he is living.

ENGLISH: And, if I may so speak, through Abraham also Levi who receives tithes has paid tithes,
QUENYA: And, if I may so speak, through Abraham also Levi who receives tithes has paid tithes,

ENGLISH: for he still existed in his father's loin when Melchizedek met him.
QUENYA: for he still existed in his father's loin when Melchizedek met him.

ENGLISH: If one indeed receives a perfect state through the priesthood of Levites – for that was a part when the Law was given to the people – how was there still a need that would arise another priest, after the manner of Melchizedek and not said to be after Aaron's manner?
QUENYA: If one indeed receives a perfect state through the priesthood of Levites – for that was a part when the Law was given to the people – how was there still a need that would arise another priest, after the manner of Melchizedek and not said to be after Aaron's manner?

ENGLISH: For the man of whom these things are said was born in another tribe, from which nobody has served at the altar.
QUENYA: For the man of whom these things are said was born in another tribe, from which nobody has served at the altar.

ENGLISH: For as everybody knows, our Lord came from the tribe of Juda , and Moses said nothing about priests from that tribe.
QUENYA: For as everybody knows, our Lord came from the tribe of Juda , and Moses said nothing about priests from that tribe.

ENGLISH: And is still more easily visible that arises another priest, similiar to Melchizedek,
QUENYA: And is still more easily visible that arises another priest, similiar to Melchizedek,

ENGLISH: who is made so, not by the law of a commandment that lies upon flesh, but by the power of an indesctructible life.
QUENYA: who is made so, not by the law of a commandment that lies upon flesh, but by the power of an indesctructible life.

ENGLISH: For in witness is said: "You are a priest forever, in the manner of Melchizedek."
QUENYA: For in witness is said: "You are a priest forever, in the manner of Melchizedek."

ENGLISH: Thus the earlier commandment is put away, for it is weak and is not beneficial.
QUENYA: Thus the earlier commandment is put away, for it is weak and is not beneficial.

ENGLISH: For the Law made nothing perfect, but the bringing of a better hope did so: the hope by which we come near to God.
QUENYA: For the Law made nothing perfect, but the bringing of a better hope did so: the hope by which we come near to God.

ENGLISH: That did not happen without an oath.
QUENYA: That did not happen without an oath.

ENGLISH: For indeed there are others that have been made priests without a promise, but there is one having a promise given by the One who said about him: "The Lord has given his promise, and he will not change his choice: You are a priest forever."
QUENYA: For indeed there are others that have been made priests without a promise, but there is one having a promise given by the One who said about him: "The Lord has given his promise, and he will not change his choice: You are a priest forever."

ENGLISH: Thus for a covenant that better Jesus has been given as security.
QUENYA: Thus for a covenant that better Jesus has been given as security.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, it was necessary for numerous ones to be priests, since death stopped them from remaining,
QUENYA: Furthermore, it was necessary for numerous ones to be priests, since death stopped them from remaining,

ENGLISH: but he, since he has a remaining and eternal life, has his priesthood without successors.
QUENYA: but he, since he has a remaining and eternal life, has his priesthood without successors.

ENGLISH: Therefore it is possible for him also to completely save who come to God through him, since he is always alive, to petition for them.
QUENYA: Therefore it is possible for him also to completely save who come to God through him, since he is always alive, to petition for them.

ENGLISH: For such a chief priest was beneficial for us: holy, without evil, undefiled, separated from sinners, and made higher than heaven.
QUENYA: For such a chief priest was beneficial for us: holy, without evil, undefiled, separated from sinners, and made higher than heaven.

ENGLISH: It is not necessary for him every day, as those chief priests did, to sacrifice sacrifices: first concerning his own sins and then concerning the since of the people (for that he did a single time when he sacrificed himself),
QUENYA: It is not necessary for him every day, as those chief priests did, to sacrifice sacrifices: first concerning his own sins and then concerning the since of the people (for that he did a single time when he sacrificed himself),

ENGLISH: and the Law appoints men as chief priests though they are weak, but the word of the promise that came after the Law appoints a Son, who is made perfect forever.
QUENYA: and the Law appoints men as chief priests though they are weak, but the word of the promise that came after the Law appoints a Son, who is made perfect forever.

ENGLISH: The sum of the things said is this: We have such a chief prist, and he has sat down at the right side of the throne of the heavenly Majesty,
QUENYA: The sum of the things said is this: We have such a chief prist, and he has sat down at the right side of the throne of the heavenly Majesty,

ENGLISH: as a servant of the holy place and the true tent, which the Lord has erected, and not a man.
QUENYA: as a servant of the holy place and the true tent, which the Lord has erected, and not a man.

ENGLISH: For every chief priest is appointed to sacrifice gifts and sacrifices alike, and it was necessary also for this person to have a thing to sacrifice.
QUENYA: For every chief priest is appointed to sacrifice gifts and sacrifices alike, and it was necessary also for this person to have a thing to sacrifice.

ENGLISH: If he existed now on earth, he was not a priest, for there are those that sacrifice gifts by the Law.
QUENYA: If he existed now on earth, he was not a priest, for there are those that sacrifice gifts by the Law.

ENGLISH: But they serve as a type and a shadow of the heavenly things, just as Moses, when he was to make the tent, received the divine command. And he says: "Take heed that you do all things according to the image shown to you on the mountain."
QUENYA: But they serve as a type and a shadow of the heavenly things, just as Moses, when he was to make the tent, received the divine command. And he says: "Take heed that you do all things according to the image shown to you on the mountain."

ENGLISH: But now Jesus has received a more splendid position as servant , for thus he is an intermediary of a covenant which in a similar manner is better, founded upon better promises.
QUENYA: But now Jesus has received a more splendid position as servant , for thus he is an intermediary of a covenant which in a similar manner is better, founded upon better promises.

ENGLISH: For if the first coventant was perfect, nobody were going to seek a place for a second one,
QUENYA: For if the first coventant was perfect, nobody were going to seek a place for a second one,

ENGLISH: for he indeed perceives guilt when he says: "Behold! The days will come, says the Lord, when I shall make a new covenant with the house of Israel and the house of Juda ,
QUENYA: for he indeed perceives guilt when he says: "Behold! The days will come, says the Lord, when I shall make a new covenant with the house of Israel and the house of Juda ,

ENGLISH: not like the covenant that I made with their fathers on the day that I took their hand and led them out of Egypt. For they did not remain in my covenant, and they are not important to me more, says the Lord.
QUENYA: not like the covenant that I made with their fathers on the day that I took their hand and led them out of Egypt. For they did not remain in my covenant, and they are not important to me more, says the Lord.

ENGLISH: For this is the covenant that I shall make with the house of Israel after those days, says the Lord: I shall put my laws in their minds, and in their hearts I shall write them. And I shall be their God, and they shall be my people.
