QUENYA: Then it says: “I will return to my house from which I moved,” and coming to it, it finds the house empty, but clean and adorned.

ENGLISH: Then it goes away and brings with itself seven other spirits, more wicked than itself, and after going inside they dwell there, and that man's final state is worse than the first! So it will be also for this wicked generation!”
QUENYA: Then it goes away and brings with itself seven other spirits, more wicked than itself, and after going inside they dwell there, and that man's final state is worse than the first! So it will be also for this wicked generation!”

ENGLISH: As he was still speaking to the crowds, look! his mother and his brothers stood on the outside and wished to speak with him.
QUENYA: As he was still speaking to the crowds, look! his mother and his brothers stood on the outside and wished to speak with him.

ENGLISH: And someone said to him: “Behold! Your mother and your brothers are standing on the outside, wishing to speak with you!”
QUENYA: And someone said to him: “Behold! Your mother and your brothers are standing on the outside, wishing to speak with you!”

ENGLISH: In answer he said to who spoke to him: “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?”
QUENYA: In answer he said to who spoke to him: “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?”

ENGLISH: And reaching out with his hand towards his disciples he said: “Behold my mother and my brothers!
QUENYA: And reaching out with his hand towards his disciples he said: “Behold my mother and my brothers!

ENGLISH: Anyone who does the will of my father who is in heaven, he is my brother and sister and mother!”
QUENYA: Anyone who does the will of my father who is in heaven, he is my brother and sister and mother!”

ENGLISH: On that day Jesus, after he went from the house, was sitting beside the sea,
QUENYA: On that day Jesus, after he went from the house, was sitting beside the sea,

ENGLISH: and great crowds gathered to him. Therefore he went into a boat and sat down, while the entire crowd was standing on the beach.
QUENYA: and great crowds gathered to him. Therefore he went into a boat and sat down, while the entire crowd was standing on the beach.

ENGLISH: Then he spoke to them many things in comparisons, saying: “Look! A sower went out to sow.
QUENYA: Then he spoke to them many things in comparisons, saying: “Look! A sower went out to sow.

ENGLISH: As he was sowing some seems fell beside the road, and the birds came and ate them.
QUENYA: As he was sowing some seems fell beside the road, and the birds came and ate them.

ENGLISH: Others fell upon the rock, where they did not have deep soil, and they came up quickly, for lacking deep soil.
QUENYA: Others fell upon the rock, where they did not have deep soil, and they came up quickly, for lacking deep soil.

ENGLISH: But when the Sun came up, they were scorched, and for lacking root they withered.
QUENYA: But when the Sun came up, they were scorched, and for lacking root they withered.

ENGLISH: Others fell among the thorns, and the thorns came up and quoked them.
QUENYA: Others fell among the thorns, and the thorns came up and quoked them.

ENGLISH: But others fell upon the good soil and made fruit – one, a hundred added measures, another, sixty, another, thirty.
QUENYA: But others fell upon the good soil and made fruit – one, a hundred added measures, another, sixty, another, thirty.

ENGLISH: Who has ears, may he be hearing!
QUENYA: Who has ears, may he be hearing!

ENGLISH: And the disciples came to him and said: “What is your reason for speaking to them in comparisons?”
QUENYA: And the disciples came to him and said: “What is your reason for speaking to them in comparisons?”

ENGLISH: In reply he said: “To you it is given to understand the secrets of the kingdom of heaven, but to those people it is not given.
QUENYA: In reply he said: “To you it is given to understand the secrets of the kingdom of heaven, but to those people it is not given.

ENGLISH: For who has, more will be given to him, and he shall receive abundance – but who does not have, also what he has will be taken from him.
QUENYA: For who has, more will be given to him, and he shall receive abundance – but who does not have, also what he has will be taken from him.

ENGLISH: Therefore I speak to them in comparisons, since looking they will not see, and hearing they will not perceive or understand,
QUENYA: Therefore I speak to them in comparisons, since looking they will not see, and hearing they will not perceive or understand,

ENGLISH: and concerning them Isaiah's prophecy is made true: 'By hearing they will hear, but they do not understand, and by looking they will look, but they will not see.
QUENYA: and concerning them Isaiah's prophecy is made true: 'By hearing they will hear, but they do not understand, and by looking they will look, but they will not see.

ENGLISH: For this people's heart has been made fat, and with their ears they hear without reply, and they have shut their eyes; thus they will not ever see with their eyes or hear with their ears and understand with their heart and find repentence, for me to heal them!”
QUENYA: For this people's heart has been made fat, and with their ears they hear without reply, and they have shut their eyes; thus they will not ever see with their eyes or hear with their ears and understand with their heart and find repentence, for me to heal them!”

ENGLISH: But happy are your eyes, for they look, and your ears, for they hear.
QUENYA: But happy are your eyes, for they look, and your ears, for they hear.

ENGLISH: And truly I say to you: Numerous prophets and righteous one wanted to see that you are looking at, but they did not see them, and hear the things that you hear, but they did not hear them.
QUENYA: And truly I say to you: Numerous prophets and righteous one wanted to see that you are looking at, but they did not see them, and hear the things that you hear, but they did not hear them.

ENGLISH: Therefore, you hear the comparison about the sower:
QUENYA: Therefore, you hear the comparison about the sower:

ENGLISH: When anyone hears the word of the kingdom but does not understand it, the Wicked One comes and snatches away what has been sown in his heart; this is which was sown by the road.
QUENYA: When anyone hears the word of the kingdom but does not understand it, the Wicked One comes and snatches away what has been sown in his heart; this is which was sown by the road.

ENGLISH: And that was sown upon the rock, that is who hears the word and receives it in joy.
QUENYA: And that was sown upon the rock, that is who hears the word and receives it in joy.

ENGLISH: And yet he does not have root in himself but remains for a time, but when tribulation or persecution happens because of the word, he falls away in the same moment.
QUENYA: And yet he does not have root in himself but remains for a time, but when tribulation or persecution happens because of the word, he falls away in the same moment.

ENGLISH: And that was sown among the thorns, this is who is hearing the word, but the concerns of this age and the temptation of riches choke the word, and it is without fruit.
QUENYA: And that was sown among the thorns, this is who is hearing the word, but the concerns of this age and the temptation of riches choke the word, and it is without fruit.

ENGLISH: And who was sown on the good earth, this is who is hearing the word and understands it, who indeed bears fruit and makes added measures – this person, a hundred, another, sixty, another, thirty.
QUENYA: And who was sown on the good earth, this is who is hearing the word and understands it, who indeed bears fruit and makes added measures – this person, a hundred, another, sixty, another, thirty.

ENGLISH: Another comparison he put before them, saying: “The kingdom of heaven is like a man who sowed good seed in his field.
QUENYA: Another comparison he put before them, saying: “The kingdom of heaven is like a man who sowed good seed in his field.

ENGLISH: When people were asleep, his enemy came and sowed worthless plants among the grain, and went away.
QUENYA: When people were asleep, his enemy came and sowed worthless plants among the grain, and went away.

ENGLISH: When the leaf sprouted and made fruit, then also the worthless plants came up.
QUENYA: When the leaf sprouted and made fruit, then also the worthless plants came up.

ENGLISH: Therefore the householder's slaves came and said to him: “Lord, did you not sow good seed in your field? From where does it have worthless plants?”
QUENYA: Therefore the householder's slaves came and said to him: “Lord, did you not sow good seed in your field? From where does it have worthless plants?”

ENGLISH: He said to them: “An enemy, a man, has done this thing!” They said to him: “Do you want that we will go to gather them?”
QUENYA: He said to them: “An enemy, a man, has done this thing!” They said to him: “Do you want that we will go to gather them?”

ENGLISH: He said: “No; or maybe you will pull up the grain with the worthless plants.
QUENYA: He said: “No; or maybe you will pull up the grain with the worthless plants.

ENGLISH: Let both grow until the harvest, and when the harvest shall come, I will say to the ones that will reap: First gather the worthless plants and bind them into bunches to be burnt; then go to gather the grain into my barn!”
QUENYA: Let both grow until the harvest, and when the harvest shall come, I will say to the ones that will reap: First gather the worthless plants and bind them into bunches to be burnt; then go to gather the grain into my barn!”

ENGLISH: Another comparison he put before them, saying: “The kingdom of heaven is like a seed of mustard, which a man took and planted in his field.
QUENYA: Another comparison he put before them, saying: “The kingdom of heaven is like a seed of mustard, which a man took and planted in his field.

ENGLISH: That is the smallest of all seeds, but having grown it is the biggest of the vegetables and has been made a tree, and so heaven's birds came and find rest in its branches!”
QUENYA: That is the smallest of all seeds, but having grown it is the biggest of the vegetables and has been made a tree, and so heaven's birds came and find rest in its branches!”

ENGLISH: Another comparison he said to them: “The kingdom of heaven is like leaven, which a woman took and hid in three big measures of flour, until everything was raised!”
QUENYA: Another comparison he said to them: “The kingdom of heaven is like leaven, which a woman took and hid in three big measures of flour, until everything was raised!”

ENGLISH: All these things Jesus said to the crowds in comparisons, and without a comparison he did not speak to them,
QUENYA: All these things Jesus said to the crowds in comparisons, and without a comparison he did not speak to them,

ENGLISH: to make true which was said through the Prophet who said: “I will open my mouth in comparisons; I will make known things hidden from the foundation!”
QUENYA: to make true which was said through the Prophet who said: “I will open my mouth in comparisons; I will make known things hidden from the foundation!”

ENGLISH: Then, after sending the crowds away, he went into the boat. And his disciples came to him and said: “Let us understand the comparison about the worthless plants in the field!”
QUENYA: Then, after sending the crowds away, he went into the boat. And his disciples came to him and said: “Let us understand the comparison about the worthless plants in the field!”

ENGLISH: In answer he said: “ who sows the good seed is the Son of Man;
QUENYA: In answer he said: “ who sows the good seed is the Son of Man;

ENGLISH: the field is the world, and the good seed, they are the sons of the kingdom, but the worthless plands are the sons of the Wicked One.
QUENYA: the field is the world, and the good seed, they are the sons of the kingdom, but the worthless plands are the sons of the Wicked One.

ENGLISH: The enemy who sowed them is the Devil. The harvest is the end of the age, the reapers are angels.
QUENYA: The enemy who sowed them is the Devil. The harvest is the end of the age, the reapers are angels.

ENGLISH: Therefore, as when the worthless plants are gathered and burnt by fire, so it will be at the conclusion of the age:
QUENYA: Therefore, as when the worthless plants are gathered and burnt by fire, so it will be at the conclusion of the age:

ENGLISH: The Son of Man will send his angles, and they will gather out of his kingdom all things that cause people to fall and the people that break the law,
QUENYA: The Son of Man will send his angles, and they will gather out of his kingdom all things that cause people to fall and the people that break the law,

ENGLISH: and they will thrown them into the oven of fire. There will be their tears and their grinding of teeth.
QUENYA: and they will thrown them into the oven of fire. There will be their tears and their grinding of teeth.

ENGLISH: Then the righteous ones will shine like the Sun, in their Father's kingdom. who has hears, let him be hearing!
QUENYA: Then the righteous ones will shine like the Sun, in their Father's kingdom. who has hears, let him be hearing!

ENGLISH: The kingdom of heaven is like a treasure hidden in the field, which a man found and hid, and for his joy he goes away and sells the things that he has, and trades to himself that field.
QUENYA: The kingdom of heaven is like a treasure hidden in the field, which a man found and hid, and for his joy he goes away and sells the things that he has, and trades to himself that field.

ENGLISH: Again the kingdom of heaven is like a tradesman seeking good pearls:
QUENYA: Again the kingdom of heaven is like a tradesman seeking good pearls:

ENGLISH: After finding one pearl that was most precious, he went away and sold everything that he had and traded it to himself.
QUENYA: After finding one pearl that was most precious, he went away and sold everything that he had and traded it to himself.

ENGLISH: Again the kingdom of heaven is like a net, thrown into the sea and gathering fishes of every kind.
QUENYA: Again the kingdom of heaven is like a net, thrown into the sea and gathering fishes of every kind.

ENGLISH: When it was full, they pulled it up onto the beach and sat down and gathered the good ones into vessels, but the worthless ones they threw away.
QUENYA: When it was full, they pulled it up onto the beach and sat down and gathered the good ones into vessels, but the worthless ones they threw away.

ENGLISH: Thus it will be at the conclusion of the age: The angels will go forth and will separate the wicked from the righteous,
QUENYA: Thus it will be at the conclusion of the age: The angels will go forth and will separate the wicked from the righteous,

ENGLISH: and they will throw them into the fiery oven. There will be their tears and their grinding of teeth.
QUENYA: and they will throw them into the fiery oven. There will be their tears and their grinding of teeth.

ENGLISH: Do you understand all these things?” They said to him: “Yes!”
QUENYA: Do you understand all these things?” They said to him: “Yes!”

ENGLISH: Then he said to them: “Therefore every scribe, instructed about the kingdom of heaven, is like a man, a householder, who brings out from his treasure things new and old!”
QUENYA: Then he said to them: “Therefore every scribe, instructed about the kingdom of heaven, is like a man, a householder, who brings out from his treasure things new and old!”

ENGLISH: And then, after Jesus completed these comparisons, he crossed land from there.
QUENYA: And then, after Jesus completed these comparisons, he crossed land from there.

ENGLISH: And when he came to his home territory, he instructed them in their synagogue. Thus they were filled with wonder and said: “From where did this man receive this wisdom and these mighty deeds?
QUENYA: And when he came to his home territory, he instructed them in their synagogue. Thus they were filled with wonder and said: “From where did this man receive this wisdom and these mighty deeds?

ENGLISH: Is this not the carpenter's son? Is his mother not Mary, and his brothers Jacob and Joseph and Simon and Juda?
QUENYA: Is this not the carpenter's son? Is his mother not Mary, and his brothers Jacob and Joseph and Simon and Juda?

ENGLISH: And his sisters, are they not all with us? Where, then, did this man receive all these things?”
QUENYA: And his sisters, are they not all with us? Where, then, did this man receive all these things?”

ENGLISH: Therefore they were angry with him. But Jesus said to them: “A prophet does not lack honor except in his home territory and in his house!”
QUENYA: Therefore they were angry with him. But Jesus said to them: “A prophet does not lack honor except in his home territory and in his house!”

ENGLISH: And he did not do numerous mighty deeds there, since they lacked faith.
QUENYA: And he did not do numerous mighty deeds there, since they lacked faith.

ENGLISH: At that time Herod the Farthing-ruler heard the story about Jesus,
QUENYA: At that time Herod the Farthing-ruler heard the story about Jesus,

ENGLISH: and he said to his servants: “This is John the Baptist. He has been raised from the dead, and therefore the mighty deeds happen by him!”
QUENYA: and he said to his servants: “This is John the Baptist. He has been raised from the dead, and therefore the mighty deeds happen by him!”

ENGLISH: For Herod formerly took John and bound him and put him in jail, by reason of Herodias, the wife of Filip his brother.
QUENYA: For Herod formerly took John and bound him and put him in jail, by reason of Herodias, the wife of Filip his brother.

ENGLISH: For John said to him: “You are not allowed to have her!”
QUENYA: For John said to him: “You are not allowed to have her!”

ENGLISH: But though he wanted to kill him, he feared the crowd, for they thought about him as a prophet.
QUENYA: But though he wanted to kill him, he feared the crowd, for they thought about him as a prophet.

ENGLISH: But when they were festive on Herod's birthday, Herodias' daughter danced on it and gave Herod a joy so great
QUENYA: But when they were festive on Herod's birthday, Herodias' daughter danced on it and gave Herod a joy so great

ENGLISH: that he spoke a promise to her: He was going to give her anything that she was going to request.
QUENYA: that he spoke a promise to her: He was going to give her anything that she was going to request.

ENGLISH: Then, instructed by her mother, she said: “Give me here on a plate John the Baptist's head!”
QUENYA: Then, instructed by her mother, she said: “Give me here on a plate John the Baptist's head!”

ENGLISH: Though that caused him grief, the king commanded that one was to give it to the maiden,
QUENYA: Though that caused him grief, the king commanded that one was to give it to the maiden,

ENGLISH: and he sent and cut off John's head in the prison.
QUENYA: and he sent and cut off John's head in the prison.

ENGLISH: And his head was brought on a platter and given to the maiden, and she brought it to her mother.
QUENYA: And his head was brought on a platter and given to the maiden, and she brought it to her mother.

ENGLISH: And his disciples came and took away the corpse and brought him to a grave, and they came and told Jesus.
QUENYA: And his disciples came and took away the corpse and brought him to a grave, and they came and told Jesus.

ENGLISH: When he heard it, Jesus went away from there in a boat, to a lonely place, to be alone; but the crowds heard it and followed him on foot from the cities.
QUENYA: When he heard it, Jesus went away from there in a boat, to a lonely place, to be alone; but the crowds heard it and followed him on foot from the cities.

ENGLISH: And when he came he saw a huge crowd, and his heart went out to them, and he healed their sick ones.
QUENYA: And when he came he saw a huge crowd, and his heart went out to them, and he healed their sick ones.

ENGLISH: But when evening fell, his diciples came to him and said: “The place is lonely, and the hour is late even now; send the crowds away, for them to to into the villages to trade to themselves food!”
QUENYA: But when evening fell, his diciples came to him and said: “The place is lonely, and the hour is late even now; send the crowds away, for them to to into the villages to trade to themselves food!”

ENGLISH: But Jesus said to them: “They do not have need of going away. You give them food to eat!”
QUENYA: But Jesus said to them: “They do not have need of going away. You give them food to eat!”

ENGLISH: They said to him: “We have nothing here except five breads and two fishes!”
QUENYA: They said to him: “We have nothing here except five breads and two fishes!”

ENGLISH: He said: “Bring them here to me!”
QUENYA: He said: “Bring them here to me!”

ENGLISH: Then he commanded the crowds that they were to lie down upon the grass, and he took the five breads and two fishes, and looking up towards heaven he spoke a blessing. And after breaking the breads he distributed them to the disciples, and the disciples to the crowds.
QUENYA: Then he commanded the crowds that they were to lie down upon the grass, and he took the five breads and two fishes, and looking up towards heaven he spoke a blessing. And after breaking the breads he distributed them to the disciples, and the disciples to the crowds.

ENGLISH: And all ate and were filled, and they took up the remaining pieces: twelve baskets full.
QUENYA: And all ate and were filled, and they took up the remaining pieces: twelve baskets full.

ENGLISH: But those who ate were around five thousand men, except for the women and children.
QUENYA: But those who ate were around five thousand men, except for the women and children.

ENGLISH: Then, quickly, he compelled his disiples to go into the boat and go before him to the other shore, while he sent the crowds away.
QUENYA: Then, quickly, he compelled his disiples to go into the boat and go before him to the other shore, while he sent the crowds away.

ENGLISH: And after he sent the crowds away, he went up into the mountain to a lonely place, to pray. When evening came, he was alone there.
QUENYA: And after he sent the crowds away, he went up into the mountain to a lonely place, to pray. When evening came, he was alone there.

ENGLISH: Now the boat was many hundred yards from land, being tormented by the waves, for they had the wind to their face.
QUENYA: Now the boat was many hundred yards from land, being tormented by the waves, for they had the wind to their face.

ENGLISH: But in the fourth watch of the night he came to them, walking on the sea.
QUENYA: But in the fourth watch of the night he came to them, walking on the sea.

ENGLISH: When they saw him, they were being troubled, saying: “That is a ghost!” And for their fear they cried .
QUENYA: When they saw him, they were being troubled, saying: “That is a ghost!” And for their fear they cried .

ENGLISH: But in the same moment Jesus said to them: “Courage! It is I! Do not be afraid!”
QUENYA: But in the same moment Jesus said to them: “Courage! It is I! Do not be afraid!”

ENGLISH: Peter answered him: “Lord, if that is you, command me that I am to come to you across the waters!”
QUENYA: Peter answered him: “Lord, if that is you, command me that I am to come to you across the waters!”

ENGLISH: He said: “Come!”
QUENYA: He said: “Come!”

ENGLISH: Then Peter, going away from the boat, walked across the waters and came to Jesus.
QUENYA: Then Peter, going away from the boat, walked across the waters and came to Jesus.

ENGLISH: But when he saw the storm, he was terrified, and when the water started to swallow him, he cried: “Lord, save me!”
QUENYA: But when he saw the storm, he was terrified, and when the water started to swallow him, he cried: “Lord, save me!”

ENGLISH: In the same moment Jesus reached out with his hand and seized him, and he said to him: “Man of little faith, how is that your faith was unsteady?”
QUENYA: In the same moment Jesus reached out with his hand and seized him, and he said to him: “Man of little faith, how is that your faith was unsteady?”

ENGLISH: And after they went into the boat, the storm ceased.
QUENYA: And after they went into the boat, the storm ceased.

ENGLISH: Then the people in the boat bowed before him, saying: “Truly you are God's Son!” And they crossed over and came to land in Gennesaret.
QUENYA: Then the people in the boat bowed before him, saying: “Truly you are God's Son!” And they crossed over and came to land in Gennesaret.

ENGLISH: When the men of that place saw who he was, they sent into the entire surrounding country, and people brought to him all that were sick.
QUENYA: When the men of that place saw who he was, they sent into the entire surrounding country, and people brought to him all that were sick.

ENGLISH: And they prayed to him that they might only touch the rim of his cloak, and all that touched it received full health.
QUENYA: And they prayed to him that they might only touch the rim of his cloak, and all that touched it received full health.

ENGLISH: Then came to Jesus from Jerusalem some Pharisees and scribes, saying:
QUENYA: Then came to Jesus from Jerusalem some Pharisees and scribes, saying:

ENGLISH: “How is that your disciples break the custom received from the elders? For they do not wash their hands before they eat food!”
QUENYA: “How is that your disciples break the custom received from the elders? For they do not wash their hands before they eat food!”

ENGLISH: In answer he said to them: “How is that you break God's command because of your custom?
QUENYA: In answer he said to them: “How is that you break God's command because of your custom?

ENGLISH: For God said: 'Give glory to your father and to your mother', and: 'Anyone who speaks evil about father or mother, will without fail die.'
QUENYA: For God said: 'Give glory to your father and to your mother', and: 'Anyone who speaks evil about father or mother, will without fail die.'

ENGLISH: But you say: 'Anyone who says to his father or to his mother: 'Anything useful that you were to receive from me, is a gift to God ' –
QUENYA: But you say: 'Anyone who says to his father or to his mother: 'Anything useful that you were to receive from me, is a gift to God ' –

ENGLISH: it is necessary for him that he does not give glory to his father or to his mother at all.
QUENYA: it is necessary for him that he does not give glory to his father or to his mother at all.

ENGLISH: Hypocrites, Isaiah spoke well as a prophet concerning you, when he said: This people give me glory with their lips , but their heart is far from me.
QUENYA: Hypocrites, Isaiah spoke well as a prophet concerning you, when he said: This people give me glory with their lips , but their heart is far from me.

ENGLISH: Emptily they worship me, teaching Men's teachings!”
QUENYA: Emptily they worship me, teaching Men's teachings!”

ENGLISH: And he summoned the crowd and said to them: “Listen and understand!
QUENYA: And he summoned the crowd and said to them: “Listen and understand!

ENGLISH: not which comes inside through a person's mouth soils a man, but which comes out from his mouth is which soils a man.
QUENYA: not which comes inside through a person's mouth soils a man, but which comes out from his mouth is which soils a man.

ENGLISH: Then the disciples came and said to him: “Do you know that when the Pharisees heard the word, they were angry?”
QUENYA: Then the disciples came and said to him: “Do you know that when the Pharisees heard the word, they were angry?”

ENGLISH: In answer he said: “Every plant that my heavenly Father did not plant, will be pulled up with its roots.
QUENYA: In answer he said: “Every plant that my heavenly Father did not plant, will be pulled up with its roots.

ENGLISH: Let them be! Blind leavers they are. But if a blind person leads a blind person, both will fall into a pit!”
QUENYA: Let them be! Blind leavers they are. But if a blind person leads a blind person, both will fall into a pit!”

ENGLISH: In answer Peter said to him: “Give us insight about the comparison!”
QUENYA: In answer Peter said to him: “Give us insight about the comparison!”

ENGLISH: Then he said: “Do you as well fail to understand?
QUENYA: Then he said: “Do you as well fail to understand?

QUENYA: Do you know know that which comes in through the mouth, goes into the entrails and passes into the sewer?

ENGLISH: But what comes out from the mouth come out from the heart, and they soil a man!”
QUENYA: But what comes out from the mouth come out from the heart, and they soil a man!”

ENGLISH: And out of the heart come evil thoughts, killings, marriage-breaking, fornication, thefts, lying testimonies, blasphemies.
QUENYA: And out of the heart come evil thoughts, killings, marriage-breaking, fornication, thefts, lying testimonies, blasphemies.

ENGLISH: They are that soil a man, but if a man eats food with unwashed hands, that does not soil him!”
QUENYA: They are that soil a man, but if a man eats food with unwashed hands, that does not soil him!”

QUENYA: Passing from there, Jesus now went away into the regions of Tyre and Sidon.

ENGLISH: And behold! a Canaanite woman from those countries came out and cried, saying: “Have mercy on me, Son of David! My daughter is badly possessed by a demon!”
QUENYA: And behold! a Canaanite woman from those countries came out and cried, saying: “Have mercy on me, Son of David! My daughter is badly possessed by a demon!”

ENGLISH: But he did not answer her a word. And his disciples came to him and petitioned of him, saying: “Send her away, for she is crying behind us!”
QUENYA: But he did not answer her a word. And his disciples came to him and petitioned of him, saying: “Send her away, for she is crying behind us!”

ENGLISH: In answer he said: “I was not sent to anyone except to the lost sheep from the house of Israel!”
QUENYA: In answer he said: “I was not sent to anyone except to the lost sheep from the house of Israel!”

ENGLISH: When the woman came, she bowed before him, saying: “Lord, help me!”
QUENYA: When the woman came, she bowed before him, saying: “Lord, help me!”

ENGLISH: In answer he said: “It is not proper, taking the children's bread and throwing it to the dogs!”
QUENYA: In answer he said: “It is not proper, taking the children's bread and throwing it to the dogs!”

ENGLISH: She said: “Yes, Lord, but the dogs eat the crumbs that fall from the table of their lords !”
QUENYA: She said: “Yes, Lord, but the dogs eat the crumbs that fall from the table of their lords !”

ENGLISH: Then Jesus answered her: “O woman, your faith is great; may it happen to you as you have believed!” And the daughter was healed from that hour.
QUENYA: Then Jesus answered her: “O woman, your faith is great; may it happen to you as you have believed!” And the daughter was healed from that hour.

ENGLISH: Crossing country from there, Jesus came near to the Sea of Galilee, and after going up into a mountain he sat down there.
QUENYA: Crossing country from there, Jesus came near to the Sea of Galilee, and after going up into a mountain he sat down there.

ENGLISH: Then great crowds came to him, bringing some that were lame, maimed , blind, dumb, and ailing in many other ways,
QUENYA: Then great crowds came to him, bringing some that were lame, maimed , blind, dumb, and ailing in many other ways,

ENGLISH: and so the crowd was full of wonder when they saw the dumb ones speak or the lame walk and the blind see, and they gave glory to the God of Israel.
QUENYA: and so the crowd was full of wonder when they saw the dumb ones speak or the lame walk and the blind see, and they gave glory to the God of Israel.

ENGLISH: But Jesus summoned his disciples to himself and said: “My heart goes out to the crowd, for now they have remained with me for three days, and they have nothing to eat; and I do not want to send them away without eating. Maybe they will be too tired on the road!”
QUENYA: But Jesus summoned his disciples to himself and said: “My heart goes out to the crowd, for now they have remained with me for three days, and they have nothing to eat; and I do not want to send them away without eating. Maybe they will be too tired on the road!”

ENGLISH: But his disciples said to him: “From where, in this lonely place, are we to get sufficient bread for a crowd that is so big?”
QUENYA: But his disciples said to him: “From where, in this lonely place, are we to get sufficient bread for a crowd that is so big?”

ENGLISH: And Jesus said to them: “What number of breads do you have?” They said: “Seven, and a few fishes!”
QUENYA: And Jesus said to them: “What number of breads do you have?” They said: “Seven, and a few fishes!”

ENGLISH: Then, after he commanded the crowd that they were to lie down on the ground,
QUENYA: Then, after he commanded the crowd that they were to lie down on the ground,

ENGLISH: he took the seven breads and, after giving thanks, he broke them and distributed them to the disciples, and the disciples to the crowds.
QUENYA: he took the seven breads and, after giving thanks, he broke them and distributed them to the disciples, and the disciples to the crowds.

ENGLISH: And all ate and were filled, and they gathered the remaining pieces: seven full baskets.
QUENYA: And all ate and were filled, and they gathered the remaining pieces: seven full baskets.

ENGLISH: And yet those who ate were four thousand men, except for the women and children.
QUENYA: And yet those who ate were four thousand men, except for the women and children.

ENGLISH: And after sending the crowds away, he went into the boat and came to the regions of Magadan.
QUENYA: And after sending the crowds away, he went into the boat and came to the regions of Magadan.

ENGLISH: And the Pharisees and Sadducees came to him, and to test him they asked of him that he would show them a sign from heaven.
QUENYA: And the Pharisees and Sadducees came to him, and to test him they asked of him that he would show them a sign from heaven.

ENGLISH: In answer he said to them:
QUENYA: In answer he said to them:

ENGLISH: “An evil and unfaithful generation is seeking a sign, but a sign will not be given them, except Jonah's sign!” And he went off from them and went away.
QUENYA: “An evil and unfaithful generation is seeking a sign, but a sign will not be given them, except Jonah's sign!” And he went off from them and went away.

ENGLISH: Now the disciples crossed over to the other side, and they did not remember to bring bread.
QUENYA: Now the disciples crossed over to the other side, and they did not remember to bring bread.

ENGLISH: Jesus said to them: “Take heed and watch out concerning the leaven of the Pharisees and the Sadducees!”
QUENYA: Jesus said to them: “Take heed and watch out concerning the leaven of the Pharisees and the Sadducees!”

ENGLISH: They spoke about this among themselves, saying: “We did not bring breads!”
QUENYA: They spoke about this among themselves, saying: “We did not bring breads!”

ENGLISH: Knowing that, Jesus said: “How is it that you speak among yourselves about lacking breads?
QUENYA: Knowing that, Jesus said: “How is it that you speak among yourselves about lacking breads?

ENGLISH: Do you still not understand, and do you not recall the five breads for the five thousand, and the number of baskets that you took up?
QUENYA: Do you still not understand, and do you not recall the five breads for the five thousand, and the number of baskets that you took up?

ENGLISH: Or the seven breads for the four thousand, and the number of baskets that you took up?
QUENYA: Or the seven breads for the four thousand, and the number of baskets that you took up?

ENGLISH: How, then, is you do not understand that I did not speak to you about breads? But watch out concerning the leaven of the Pharisees and the Sadducees!”
QUENYA: How, then, is you do not understand that I did not speak to you about breads? But watch out concerning the leaven of the Pharisees and the Sadducees!”

ENGLISH: Then they understood that he said to them that they were to watch out, not concerning the leaven of breads, but concerning the teaching of the Pharisees and Sadducees.
QUENYA: Then they understood that he said to them that they were to watch out, not concerning the leaven of breads, but concerning the teaching of the Pharisees and Sadducees.

ENGLISH: After Jesus came to the regions of Caesarea Philippi, he asked his disciples: “Who do people say that the Son of Man is?”
QUENYA: After Jesus came to the regions of Caesarea Philippi, he asked his disciples: “Who do people say that the Son of Man is?”

ENGLISH: They said: “People say: John the Baptist, others: Eliah, others: Jeremiah or one of the Prophets.
QUENYA: They said: “People say: John the Baptist, others: Eliah, others: Jeremiah or one of the Prophets.

ENGLISH: He said to them: “But you, who do you say that I am?”
QUENYA: He said to them: “But you, who do you say that I am?”

ENGLISH: In answer Peter said to him: “You are the Christ, the son of the living God!”
QUENYA: In answer Peter said to him: “You are the Christ, the son of the living God!”

ENGLISH: Jesus answered him: “Happy you are, Simon Bar-Jonah, for flesh and blood did not reveal it to you, but my heavenly Father.
QUENYA: Jesus answered him: “Happy you are, Simon Bar-Jonah, for flesh and blood did not reveal it to you, but my heavenly Father.

ENGLISH: And I say to you: You Peter, and on this rock I will build my congregation, and the gates of Mandos will not overpower it.
QUENYA: And I say to you: You Peter, and on this rock I will build my congregation, and the gates of Mandos will not overpower it.

ENGLISH: I will give you the keys of the kingdom of heaven, and everything that you will bind on earth will be bound in heaven, and everything that you loose on earth will be loosened in heaven!”
QUENYA: I will give you the keys of the kingdom of heaven, and everything that you will bind on earth will be bound in heaven, and everything that you loose on earth will be loosened in heaven!”

ENGLISH: Then he firmly commanded the disciples that they were not going to say to anyone that he was the Christ.
QUENYA: Then he firmly commanded the disciples that they were not going to say to anyone that he was the Christ.

ENGLISH: Then from that time Jesus began to show to his disciples that it was necessary for him to go to Jerusalem and to suffer many things from the elders and scribes, and to be slain, and on the third day to be raised.
QUENYA: Then from that time Jesus began to show to his disciples that it was necessary for him to go to Jerusalem and to suffer many things from the elders and scribes, and to be slain, and on the third day to be raised.

ENGLISH: But Peter brought him aside and started to speak firmly to him, saying: “Be kind to yourself, Lord! It will by no means be so to you!”
QUENYA: But Peter brought him aside and started to speak firmly to him, saying: “Be kind to yourself, Lord! It will by no means be so to you!”

ENGLISH: But he turned and said to Peter: “Begone behind me, Satan! You want to cause me to fall, for you think, not God's thoughts, but those of men!”
QUENYA: But he turned and said to Peter: “Begone behind me, Satan! You want to cause me to fall, for you think, not God's thoughts, but those of men!”

ENGLISH: Then Jesus said to his disciples: “If anyone wishes to come after me, may he deny himself and lift up his cross and follow me.
QUENYA: Then Jesus said to his disciples: “If anyone wishes to come after me, may he deny himself and lift up his cross and follow me.

ENGLISH: For anyone who desires to save his life, to him it will be lost; but anyone whose life is lost for my sake , will find it.
QUENYA: For anyone who desires to save his life, to him it will be lost; but anyone whose life is lost for my sake , will find it.

ENGLISH: For if a man receives the whole world, but his life is lost, how is that beneficial to him?
QUENYA: For if a man receives the whole world, but his life is lost, how is that beneficial to him?

ENGLISH: For the Son of Man will come in his Father's glory with his angels, and then he will reward everyone according to his behavior.
QUENYA: For the Son of Man will come in his Father's glory with his angels, and then he will reward everyone according to his behavior.

ENGLISH: Truly I say to you that there are some people that are standing here that by no means will taste death before they see the Son of Man coming in his kingdom!”
QUENYA: Truly I say to you that there are some people that are standing here that by no means will taste death before they see the Son of Man coming in his kingdom!”

ENGLISH: Six days thereafter Jesus brought Peter and Jacob and John his brother, and led them up into a lofty mountain, they alone.
QUENYA: Six days thereafter Jesus brought Peter and Jacob and John his brother, and led them up into a lofty mountain, they alone.

ENGLISH: And he was changed before them, and his face shone like the sun, and his clothes were radiant as light.
QUENYA: And he was changed before them, and his face shone like the sun, and his clothes were radiant as light.

ENGLISH: And behold! Moses and Eliah showed themselves to them, speaking with him.
QUENYA: And behold! Moses and Eliah showed themselves to them, speaking with him.

ENGLISH: But Peter spoke and said to Jesus: “Lord, is good that we are here. If you wish, I will erect here three tents: one for you and one for Moses and one for Elijah!”
QUENYA: But Peter spoke and said to Jesus: “Lord, is good that we are here. If you wish, I will erect here three tents: one for you and one for Moses and one for Elijah!”

ENGLISH: While the words were still in his mouth, behold! a bright cloud overshadowed them, and there was a voice out of the cloud that said: “This is my son, the beloved, with whom I am pleased; listen to him!”
QUENYA: While the words were still in his mouth, behold! a bright cloud overshadowed them, and there was a voice out of the cloud that said: “This is my son, the beloved, with whom I am pleased; listen to him!”

ENGLISH: Hearing this, the disiciples fell on their face and were extremely afraid.
QUENYA: Hearing this, the disiciples fell on their face and were extremely afraid.

ENGLISH: Then Jesus came near to them, and touching them he said: “Rise, and do not fear!”
QUENYA: Then Jesus came near to them, and touching them he said: “Rise, and do not fear!”

ENGLISH: When they raised their eyes, they saw no one except Jesus himself.
QUENYA: When they raised their eyes, they saw no one except Jesus himself.

ENGLISH: On their way down from the mountain, Jesus commanded them, saying: “Do not tell anyone about the sigth before the Son of man has been raised from the dead!”
QUENYA: On their way down from the mountain, Jesus commanded them, saying: “Do not tell anyone about the sigth before the Son of man has been raised from the dead!”

ENGLISH: But the disciples asked: “Then how is that the scribes say that Elijah by necessity will come first?”
QUENYA: But the disciples asked: “Then how is that the scribes say that Elijah by necessity will come first?”

ENGLISH: In answer he said: “Elijah will indeed come and will renew all things.
QUENYA: In answer he said: “Elijah will indeed come and will renew all things.

ENGLISH: But I say to you that Elijah has come even now, and they did not understand who he was, but did to him as they wished. In the same manner the Son of Man will suffer at their hands.”
QUENYA: But I say to you that Elijah has come even now, and they did not understand who he was, but did to him as they wished. In the same manner the Son of Man will suffer at their hands.”

ENGLISH: Then the disciples understood that he spoke to them about John the Baptist.
QUENYA: Then the disciples understood that he spoke to them about John the Baptist.

ENGLISH: And when they came to the crowd, a man came to him, falling to his knees before him
QUENYA: And when they came to the crowd, a man came to him, falling to his knees before him

ENGLISH: and saying: “Lord, have mercy on my son, for he is moon-sick and ailing, and he falls frequently into the fire and frequently into the water,
QUENYA: and saying: “Lord, have mercy on my son, for he is moon-sick and ailing, and he falls frequently into the fire and frequently into the water,

ENGLISH: and I brought him to your disciples, but they could not heal him!”
QUENYA: and I brought him to your disciples, but they could not heal him!”

ENGLISH: In answer Jesus said: “Unfaithful and twisted generation, how long is it necessary for me to remain with you? How long is it necessary for me to bear you? Bring him to me!”
QUENYA: In answer Jesus said: “Unfaithful and twisted generation, how long is it necessary for me to remain with you? How long is it necessary for me to bear you? Bring him to me!”

ENGLISH: Then Jesus spoke firmly to it, and the demon came out of him, and the boy was healed from that hour.
QUENYA: Then Jesus spoke firmly to it, and the demon came out of him, and the boy was healed from that hour.

ENGLISH: Thereafter the disciples came privately to Jesus and said: “How is that we could not throw it out?”
QUENYA: Thereafter the disciples came privately to Jesus and said: “How is that we could not throw it out?”

ENGLISH: He said to them: “Because of your small faith. For truly I say to you: If you have faith like a seed of mustard, you will say to this mountain: Move form here to there, and it will move, and nothing will be impossible to you.
QUENYA: He said to them: “Because of your small faith. For truly I say to you: If you have faith like a seed of mustard, you will say to this mountain: Move form here to there, and it will move, and nothing will be impossible to you.

ENGLISH: When they were gathered in Galilee Jesus said to them: “The Son of Man will be betrayed into the hands of men,
QUENYA: When they were gathered in Galilee Jesus said to them: “The Son of Man will be betrayed into the hands of men,

ENGLISH: and they will kill him, and on the third day he will be raised!” Therefore they had deep grief.
QUENYA: and they will kill him, and on the third day he will be raised!” Therefore they had deep grief.

ENGLISH: When they came to Capernaum, the men collecting the two dracmas came to Peter and said: “Does not your teacher pay the two dracmas?”
QUENYA: When they came to Capernaum, the men collecting the two dracmas came to Peter and said: “Does not your teacher pay the two dracmas?”

ENGLISH: He said: “He does.” But when he went into the house, before he could speak, Jesus said: “What do you think, Simon? From whom do the kings of earth receive tax or tribute? From their sons or from foreigners?”
QUENYA: He said: “He does.” But when he went into the house, before he could speak, Jesus said: “What do you think, Simon? From whom do the kings of earth receive tax or tribute? From their sons or from foreigners?”

ENGLISH: When he said: “From the foreigners,” Jesus said to him: “Then the sons are indeed free.
QUENYA: When he said: “From the foreigners,” Jesus said to him: “Then the sons are indeed free.

ENGLISH: But that we will not make them angry, you go to the sea, throw a hook, and take the first fish coming up – and when you open its mouth, you will find a stater. Take that and give it to them for me and for you!”
QUENYA: But that we will not make them angry, you go to the sea, throw a hook, and take the first fish coming up – and when you open its mouth, you will find a stater. Take that and give it to them for me and for you!”

ENGLISH: At that time the disciples came near to Jesus and said: “Who really is the greatest in the kingdom of heaven?”
QUENYA: At that time the disciples came near to Jesus and said: “Who really is the greatest in the kingdom of heaven?”

ENGLISH: And after he called a small child to himself, he caused it to stand in the middle
QUENYA: And after he called a small child to himself, he caused it to stand in the middle

ENGLISH: and said: “Truly I say to you: If you do not find repentance and are like small children, you will by no means come into the kingdom of heaven.
QUENYA: and said: “Truly I say to you: If you do not find repentance and are like small children, you will by no means come into the kingdom of heaven.

ENGLISH: Therefore, anyone who makes himself lowly like this chind, he is the greatest in the kingdom of heaven;
QUENYA: Therefore, anyone who makes himself lowly like this chind, he is the greatest in the kingdom of heaven;

ENGLISH: and anyone who receives a single such child in my name, receives me.
QUENYA: and anyone who receives a single such child in my name, receives me.

ENGLISH: But anyone who causes to fall one among these who believe in me – to him it is more beneficial if a millstone was put around his neck, and he was drowned in the deep sea.
QUENYA: But anyone who causes to fall one among these who believe in me – to him it is more beneficial if a millstone was put around his neck, and he was drowned in the deep sea.

ENGLISH: Woe to the world for its temptations! For the temptations will by necessity come, but woe to the man by whom the temptation comes!
QUENYA: Woe to the world for its temptations! For the temptations will by necessity come, but woe to the man by whom the temptation comes!

ENGLISH: But if your hand or your foot is causing your fall, cut it off and throw it from you! To go lame or maimed into life is to you better than being thrown having two hands or two feet into the eternal fire!
QUENYA: But if your hand or your foot is causing your fall, cut it off and throw it from you! To go lame or maimed into life is to you better than being thrown having two hands or two feet into the eternal fire!

ENGLISH: And if your eye is causing your fall, tear it out and throw it from you! To go into life having a single eye is to you better than being thrown having two eyes into the fiery Gehenna!
QUENYA: And if your eye is causing your fall, tear it out and throw it from you! To go into life having a single eye is to you better than being thrown having two eyes into the fiery Gehenna!

ENGLISH: See that you do not despise anyone among these little ones! For I say to you that their angels in heaven always look at my heavenly Father's face.
QUENYA: See that you do not despise anyone among these little ones! For I say to you that their angels in heaven always look at my heavenly Father's face.

ENGLISH: For the Son of Man has come to save that which was lost.
QUENYA: For the Son of Man has come to save that which was lost.

ENGLISH: What do you think? If a man has a hundred sheep, and one among them strays, does he not go away from the ninti-nine on the mountains, and he goes to seek the straying sheep?
QUENYA: What do you think? If a man has a hundred sheep, and one among them strays, does he not go away from the ninti-nine on the mountains, and he goes to seek the straying sheep?

ENGLISH: And if he does find it – truly I say to you, about that shep he has a joy greater than which he has about the ninety-nine that have not strayed.
QUENYA: And if he does find it – truly I say to you, about that shep he has a joy greater than which he has about the ninety-nine that have not strayed.

ENGLISH: In the same manner, my heavenly Father's will is not that a single among these little ones will be lost.
QUENYA: In the same manner, my heavenly Father's will is not that a single among these little ones will be lost.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, if your brother sins, go and rebuke him between you and he alone. If he listens to you, you have gained your brother.
QUENYA: Furthermore, if your brother sins, go and rebuke him between you and he alone. If he listens to you, you have gained your brother.

ENGLISH: But if he does not listen, bring with you one or two others, for by the mouth of two or three witnesses every affair shall be established.
QUENYA: But if he does not listen, bring with you one or two others, for by the mouth of two or three witnesses every affair shall be established.

ENGLISH: If he does not listen to them , speak to the congregation. If he fails to listen to the congregation as well, he is to be to you as a person of the nations or as a tax collector.
QUENYA: If he does not listen to them , speak to the congregation. If he fails to listen to the congregation as well, he is to be to you as a person of the nations or as a tax collector.

ENGLISH: Truly I say to you, everything that you bind on earth shall be bound in heaven, and everything that you loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven.
QUENYA: Truly I say to you, everything that you bind on earth shall be bound in heaven, and everything that you loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven.

ENGLISH: Again I truly say to you: If two among you are of one mind on earth to request something, that will happen for them by my heavenly Father. For where two or thre are gathered in my name, there I am in their midst.
QUENYA: Again I truly say to you: If two among you are of one mind on earth to request something, that will happen for them by my heavenly Father. For where two or thre are gathered in my name, there I am in their midst.

ENGLISH: Then Peter came and said to them: “Lord, what is number of times when my brother may sin against me and I am to forgive him? As far as seven times?” Jesus said to him: “I say to you, not as far as seven times, but as far as seventy times seven!
QUENYA: Then Peter came and said to them: “Lord, what is number of times when my brother may sin against me and I am to forgive him? As far as seven times?” Jesus said to him: “I say to you, not as far as seven times, but as far as seventy times seven!

ENGLISH: Therefore the kingdom of heaven is like a man, a king, who wished to have a reckoning with his thralls.
QUENYA: Therefore the kingdom of heaven is like a man, a king, who wished to have a reckoning with his thralls.

ENGLISH: When he started the reckoning, a person having a debt of ten thousand talents was brought to him.
QUENYA: When he started the reckoning, a person having a debt of ten thousand talents was brought to him.

ENGLISH: Since he did not have enough to pay him, his lord commanded that one was to sell him, with his wife and his children, and everything that he had, in order to pay the debt.
QUENYA: Since he did not have enough to pay him, his lord commanded that one was to sell him, with his wife and his children, and everything that he had, in order to pay the debt.

ENGLISH: Therefore the thrall fell down and bowed before him, saying: “Have patience with me , and I will pay back everything to you!”
QUENYA: Therefore the thrall fell down and bowed before him, saying: “Have patience with me , and I will pay back everything to you!”

ENGLISH: Being touched to his heart, the lord of that thrall released him and forgave his debt.
QUENYA: Being touched to his heart, the lord of that thrall released him and forgave his debt.

ENGLISH: But that slave went out and found a person of the other slaves, who had to him a debt of a hundred denarii. And seizing him, he began to choke him, saying: “Pay me your debt!”
QUENYA: But that slave went out and found a person of the other slaves, who had to him a debt of a hundred denarii. And seizing him, he began to choke him, saying: “Pay me your debt!”

ENGLISH: Then the other slave fell down and made request of him, saying: “Have patience with me, and I will pay you!”
QUENYA: Then the other slave fell down and made request of him, saying: “Have patience with me, and I will pay you!”

ENGLISH: But he did not want to, but he went and threw him into prison until he would pay his debt.
QUENYA: But he did not want to, but he went and threw him into prison until he would pay his debt.

ENGLISH: Therefore, when the other slaves saw which happened, they had deep grief, and they went and told to their lord everything that had happened.
QUENYA: Therefore, when the other slaves saw which happened, they had deep grief, and they went and told to their lord everything that had happened.

ENGLISH: Then his lord summoned him and said to him: “Wicked slave, your entire debt I forgave you, when you asked of me!
QUENYA: Then his lord summoned him and said to him: “Wicked slave, your entire debt I forgave you, when you asked of me!

ENGLISH: Would you not then do well if you as well would have mercy on the other slave who was with you, as I gave you mercy?”
QUENYA: Would you not then do well if you as well would have mercy on the other slave who was with you, as I gave you mercy?”

ENGLISH: And being angry, his lord gave him over to the jailers, until he was going to pay his entire debt.
QUENYA: And being angry, his lord gave him over to the jailers, until he was going to pay his entire debt.

ENGLISH: In the same manner my heavenly Father will also do to you if you do not everyone forgive his brother from your heart!”
QUENYA: In the same manner my heavenly Father will also do to you if you do not everyone forgive his brother from your heart!”

ENGLISH: And after Jesus completed all these words he went away from Galilee and came to the regions of Judea, beyond the Jordan.
QUENYA: And after Jesus completed all these words he went away from Galilee and came to the regions of Judea, beyond the Jordan.

ENGLISH: And great crowds followed him, and he healed them there.
QUENYA: And great crowds followed him, and he healed them there.

ENGLISH: And some Pharisees came to him to test him, saying: “May a man divorce his wife for every reason?”
QUENYA: And some Pharisees came to him to test him, saying: “May a man divorce his wife for every reason?”

ENGLISH: In answer he said: “Did you not read that who created them, from the beginning made them male and female
QUENYA: In answer he said: “Did you not read that who created them, from the beginning made them male and female

ENGLISH: and said: For this reason a man will abandon his father and his mother and will stick to his wife, and they will be one flesh – ?
QUENYA: and said: For this reason a man will abandon his father and his mother and will stick to his wife, and they will be one flesh – ?

ENGLISH: Thus they are no more two, but one flesh. Therefore, which God has put under one yoke, do not let man separate!”
QUENYA: Thus they are no more two, but one flesh. Therefore, which God has put under one yoke, do not let man separate!”

ENGLISH: They said to him: “Then how is that Moses commanded that one is to give her a writing of divoce and is to put her away?”
QUENYA: They said to him: “Then how is that Moses commanded that one is to give her a writing of divoce and is to put her away?”

ENGLISH: He said to them: “Because of your hard heart Moses allowed that you may divorce your wifes, but it was not so from the beginning.
QUENYA: He said to them: “Because of your hard heart Moses allowed that you may divorce your wifes, but it was not so from the beginning.

ENGLISH: And I say to you: Anyone who divorces his wife except because of fornication, and gets married to another, breaks marriage!”
QUENYA: And I say to you: Anyone who divorces his wife except because of fornication, and gets married to another, breaks marriage!”

ENGLISH: The disciples said to him: “If it is so concerning husband and wife, marriage is not beneficial!”
QUENYA: The disciples said to him: “If it is so concerning husband and wife, marriage is not beneficial!”

ENGLISH: He said to them: “All cannot receive the saying, but only that have the gift.
QUENYA: He said to them: “All cannot receive the saying, but only that have the gift.

ENGLISH: For there are some eunuchs that were born so from their mother's womb, and there are some eunuchs that were made eunuchs by men, and there are eunuchs that have have made themselves eunuchs for the good of the kingdom of heaven. Let that can receive it, receive it!”
QUENYA: For there are some eunuchs that were born so from their mother's womb, and there are some eunuchs that were made eunuchs by men, and there are eunuchs that have have made themselves eunuchs for the good of the kingdom of heaven. Let that can receive it, receive it!”

ENGLISH: Then children were being brought to him, for him to put his hands on them and for him to pray for them, but the disciples rebuked them.
QUENYA: Then children were being brought to him, for him to put his hands on them and for him to pray for them, but the disciples rebuked them.

ENGLISH: But Jesus said: “Let the children come, and do not stop them from coming to me, for the kingdom of heaven is for suchlike ones!”
QUENYA: But Jesus said: “Let the children come, and do not stop them from coming to me, for the kingdom of heaven is for suchlike ones!”

ENGLISH: And he put his hands on them and went away from there.
QUENYA: And he put his hands on them and went away from there.

ENGLISH: And behold, one came to him and said: “Teacher, what is the good that it is necessary for me to do, in order to receive eternal life?”
QUENYA: And behold, one came to him and said: “Teacher, what is the good that it is necessary for me to do, in order to receive eternal life?”

ENGLISH: He said to him: “How is that you are asking me about goodness? There exists one whois good. But if you want to go into life, keep the commandments!”
QUENYA: He said to him: “How is that you are asking me about goodness? There exists one whois good. But if you want to go into life, keep the commandments!”

ENGLISH: He said to him: “What are they?” Jesus answered: “You shall not kill, you shall not steal, you shall not speak a lying witness,
QUENYA: He said to him: “What are they?” Jesus answered: “You shall not kill, you shall not steal, you shall not speak a lying witness,

ENGLISH: you shall give glory to your father and to your mother, and love your neighbour as yourself!”
QUENYA: you shall give glory to your father and to your mother, and love your neighbour as yourself!”

ENGLISH: The young man said to him: “I have kept all these commandments; what do I still lack?”
QUENYA: The young man said to him: “I have kept all these commandments; what do I still lack?”

ENGLISH: Jesus said to him: “If you want to be perfect, go and sell your goods and give them to the poor, and you will receive a treasure in heaven; then come and follow me!”
QUENYA: Jesus said to him: “If you want to be perfect, go and sell your goods and give them to the poor, and you will receive a treasure in heaven; then come and follow me!”

ENGLISH: When the young man heard that, he went away in grief, for he had numerous goods.
QUENYA: When the young man heard that, he went away in grief, for he had numerous goods.

ENGLISH: But Jesus said to his disciples: “Truly I say to you that it will be difficult for a rich person to come into the kingdom of heaven.
QUENYA: But Jesus said to his disciples: “Truly I say to you that it will be difficult for a rich person to come into the kingdom of heaven.

ENGLISH: Again I say to you: For a camel to go through a needle's eye is easier than coming into God's kingdom for a rich person.
QUENYA: Again I say to you: For a camel to go through a needle's eye is easier than coming into God's kingdom for a rich person.

ENGLISH: When the disciples heart that, they wre filled with great wonder, saying: “Who can be saved?”
QUENYA: When the disciples heart that, they wre filled with great wonder, saying: “Who can be saved?”

ENGLISH: Looking at them, Jesus said: “To men it is impossible, but to God all things are possible!”
QUENYA: Looking at them, Jesus said: “To men it is impossible, but to God all things are possible!”

ENGLISH: Then Peter spoke, saying: “Behold, we have abandoned everything and have followed you. What, really, will there be for us?”
QUENYA: Then Peter spoke, saying: “Behold, we have abandoned everything and have followed you. What, really, will there be for us?”

ENGLISH: Jesus said to them: “Truly I say to you: In the resurrection, when the Son of Man shall sit down upon his glorious throne, you that have followed me will also sit on twelve thrones, judging Israel's twelve tribes.
QUENYA: Jesus said to them: “Truly I say to you: In the resurrection, when the Son of Man shall sit down upon his glorious throne, you that have followed me will also sit on twelve thrones, judging Israel's twelve tribes.

ENGLISH: And everyone who has gone away from houses or brothers or sisters or fields by reason of my name, will receive many times more and will be heir to eternal life.
QUENYA: And everyone who has gone away from houses or brothers or sisters or fields by reason of my name, will receive many times more and will be heir to eternal life.

ENGLISH: But numerous ones that are first will be last, and the last, first.
QUENYA: But numerous ones that are first will be last, and the last, first.

ENGLISH: For the kingdom of heaven is like a man, an householder, who went out early to find workers that he could pay for them to work in his garden of vines .
QUENYA: For the kingdom of heaven is like a man, an householder, who went out early to find workers that he could pay for them to work in his garden of vines .

ENGLISH: After making an agreement with the workers about one denarius for the day, he sent them into his garden.
QUENYA: After making an agreement with the workers about one denarius for the day, he sent them into his garden.

ENGLISH: He also went out around the third hour and saw some others stand without work in the market-place,
QUENYA: He also went out around the third hour and saw some others stand without work in the market-place,

ENGLISH: and he said to them as well: “You as well, go into the garden, and I shall give you what is just!”
QUENYA: and he said to them as well: “You as well, go into the garden, and I shall give you what is just!”

ENGLISH: And they went. Again he went out around the sixth and the ninth hour, and he did the same thing.
QUENYA: And they went. Again he went out around the sixth and the ninth hour, and he did the same thing.

ENGLISH: But around the eleventh hour he went out and found some others standing, and he said to them: “How is that you are standing here the whole day without working?”
QUENYA: But around the eleventh hour he went out and found some others standing, and he said to them: “How is that you are standing here the whole day without working?”

ENGLISH: They said to him: “Because nobody has made an agreement with us about working!” He said to them: “Go to the garden of vines, you as well!”
QUENYA: They said to him: “Because nobody has made an agreement with us about working!” He said to them: “Go to the garden of vines, you as well!”

ENGLISH: When evening came, the master of the garden said to his overseer: Call the workers and pay them their payment, from the last ones to the first ones!
QUENYA: When evening came, the master of the garden said to his overseer: Call the workers and pay them their payment, from the last ones to the first ones!

ENGLISH: When the men of the eleventh hour came, everyone among them received a denarius.
QUENYA: When the men of the eleventh hour came, everyone among them received a denarius.

ENGLISH: Therefore, when the first ones came, they supposed that they were going to receive more, but everyone among them also received one denarius.
QUENYA: Therefore, when the first ones came, they supposed that they were going to receive more, but everyone among them also received one denarius.

ENGLISH: After receiving it they grumbled against the garden-master
QUENYA: After receiving it they grumbled against the garden-master

ENGLISH: and said: These last ones have worked a single hour, and yet you give them the same that you give to us that have carried the burden of the day and the heat!
QUENYA: and said: These last ones have worked a single hour, and yet you give them the same that you give to us that have carried the burden of the day and the heat!

ENGLISH: But in answer to one among them he said: 'Fellow, I have done nothing unrighteous to you! You assented when I said that I was going to give you one denarius, no?
QUENYA: But in answer to one among them he said: 'Fellow, I have done nothing unrighteous to you! You assented when I said that I was going to give you one denarius, no?

ENGLISH: Take what is yours and go! I want to give this this last one the same that I give to you.
QUENYA: Take what is yours and go! I want to give this this last one the same that I give to you.

ENGLISH: May I not do what I want to my own things? Or is your eye wicked since I am good?Thus the last ones will be first, and the first ones last!”
QUENYA: May I not do what I want to my own things? Or is your eye wicked since I am good?Thus the last ones will be first, and the first ones last!”

ENGLISH: Now, before he went up to Jerusalem, Jesus led the twelve disciples to a private place and said to them:
QUENYA: Now, before he went up to Jerusalem, Jesus led the twelve disciples to a private place and said to them:

ENGLISH: “Behold! We will go up to Jerusalem, and the Son of Man will be given over to the chief priests and the scribes, and they will judge him worthy of death
QUENYA: “Behold! We will go up to Jerusalem, and the Son of Man will be given over to the chief priests and the scribes, and they will judge him worthy of death

ENGLISH: and will give him over to the nations, for them to behave towards him with scorn and for them to flay him and for them to crucify him, and on the third day he will be raised!”
QUENYA: and will give him over to the nations, for them to behave towards him with scorn and for them to flay him and for them to crucify him, and on the third day he will be raised!”

ENGLISH: Then the mother of the sons of Zebedee came to him with her sons, bowing before him and requesting something of him.
QUENYA: Then the mother of the sons of Zebedee came to him with her sons, bowing before him and requesting something of him.

ENGLISH: Jesus said to her: “What do you want?” She said to him: “Say that these two sons of mine will sit, one by your right hand and one by your left hand, in your kingdom!”
QUENYA: Jesus said to her: “What do you want?” She said to him: “Say that these two sons of mine will sit, one by your right hand and one by your left hand, in your kingdom!”

ENGLISH: In answer Jesus said: “You do not know what you request! Are you able to drink the cup that I will drink?” They said to him: “We are able!”
QUENYA: In answer Jesus said: “You do not know what you request! Are you able to drink the cup that I will drink?” They said to him: “We are able!”

ENGLISH: He said to them: “You will indeed drink my cup, but sitting by my right hand and my left hand is not a gift I may give; that is for those that are prepared by my Father!”
QUENYA: He said to them: “You will indeed drink my cup, but sitting by my right hand and my left hand is not a gift I may give; that is for those that are prepared by my Father!”

ENGLISH: When the ten others heard about this, they were angry with the two brothers.
QUENYA: When the ten others heard about this, they were angry with the two brothers.

ENGLISH: But Jesus called them to himself and said: “You know the rulers of the nations rule them, and their mighty ones have power over them.
QUENYA: But Jesus called them to himself and said: “You know the rulers of the nations rule them, and their mighty ones have power over them.

ENGLISH: But it is not so among you, but who wants to be great among you, for him it is necessary to be your slave
QUENYA: But it is not so among you, but who wants to be great among you, for him it is necessary to be your slave

ENGLISH: – like also the Son of Man did not come to be served, but in order to serve and to give his life as a ransom in exchange of many!”
QUENYA: – like also the Son of Man did not come to be served, but in order to serve and to give his life as a ransom in exchange of many!”

ENGLISH: Now, when they went out of Jericho a great crowd followed him.
QUENYA: Now, when they went out of Jericho a great crowd followed him.

ENGLISH: And behold! two blind men were sitting by the road. When they heard that Jesus was the person passing by, they cried saying: “Lord, have mercy on us, Son of David!”
QUENYA: And behold! two blind men were sitting by the road. When they heard that Jesus was the person passing by, they cried saying: “Lord, have mercy on us, Son of David!”

ENGLISH: But the crowd spoke firmly to them, for them to be silent; and yet they cried the more: “Lord, have mercy on us, Son of David!”
QUENYA: But the crowd spoke firmly to them, for them to be silent; and yet they cried the more: “Lord, have mercy on us, Son of David!”

ENGLISH: And Jesus stopped, called them and said: “What do you wish that I will do for you?”
QUENYA: And Jesus stopped, called them and said: “What do you wish that I will do for you?”

ENGLISH: They said to him: “Lord, may our eyes be opened!”
QUENYA: They said to him: “Lord, may our eyes be opened!”

ENGLISH: Being touched to his heart, Jesus touched their eyes – and in the same moment it was possible for them to see, and they followed him.
QUENYA: Being touched to his heart, Jesus touched their eyes – and in the same moment it was possible for them to see, and they followed him.

ENGLISH: When they came near to Jerusalem and came to Bethphage to the Mount of Olives, then Jesus sent forth two disciples, saying to them: “Go into the city that lies before you, and quickly you will find a donkey bound, and a colt with it; loose them and lead them to me.
QUENYA: When they came near to Jerusalem and came to Bethphage to the Mount of Olives, then Jesus sent forth two disciples, saying to them: “Go into the city that lies before you, and quickly you will find a donkey bound, and a colt with it; loose them and lead them to me.

ENGLISH: And if somebody says anything to you, say: The Lord has need of them . Then, in the same moment, he will send them!”
QUENYA: And if somebody says anything to you, say: The Lord has need of them . Then, in the same moment, he will send them!”

ENGLISH: This thing happened to make true the word which the prophet spoke:
QUENYA: This thing happened to make true the word which the prophet spoke:

ENGLISH: “Tell the daughter of Zion: Behold, your king is coming to you, lowly and sitting on a donkey and on a cold, offspring of a beast of burden!”
QUENYA: “Tell the daughter of Zion: Behold, your king is coming to you, lowly and sitting on a donkey and on a cold, offspring of a beast of burden!”

ENGLISH: Thus the disciples went and did as Jesus commanded them.
QUENYA: Thus the disciples went and did as Jesus commanded them.

ENGLISH: And they brought the donkey and its colt, and they put on them their cloaks, and he sat upon them.
QUENYA: And they brought the donkey and its colt, and they put on them their cloaks, and he sat upon them.

ENGLISH: The greater part of the crown spread out their cloaks on the road, while others cut off branches from the trees and spread them out in the road.
QUENYA: The greater part of the crown spread out their cloaks on the road, while others cut off branches from the trees and spread them out in the road.

ENGLISH: And the crowds that went before him and the ones that followed cried: “Hosanna for the son of David! Blessed is who is coming in the Lord's name! Hosanna in the highest places!”
QUENYA: And the crowds that went before him and the ones that followed cried: “Hosanna for the son of David! Blessed is who is coming in the Lord's name! Hosanna in the highest places!”

ENGLISH: And when he went into Jerusalem, the entire city was exited, saying: “Who is this person?”
QUENYA: And when he went into Jerusalem, the entire city was exited, saying: “Who is this person?”

ENGLISH: But the crowds answered: “This is Jesus the Prophet, from Nazareth in Galilee!”
QUENYA: But the crowds answered: “This is Jesus the Prophet, from Nazareth in Galilee!”

ENGLISH: And Jesus went into the temple, and he threw out all that sold and bought in the temple, and the tables of the money-changers he overturned, and the chairs of that sold the doves.
QUENYA: And Jesus went into the temple, and he threw out all that sold and bought in the temple, and the tables of the money-changers he overturned, and the chairs of that sold the doves.

ENGLISH: And he said to them: “It is written: My house will be called a house of prayer – but you have made it a cave of robbers!”
QUENYA: And he said to them: “It is written: My house will be called a house of prayer – but you have made it a cave of robbers!”

ENGLISH: Furthermore, blind and lame people came to him in the temple, and he healed them.
QUENYA: Furthermore, blind and lame people came to him in the temple, and he healed them.

ENGLISH: When the chief priests and the scribes saw the wonders that he did and the boys crying in the temple: “Hosianna to the Son of David,” they were angry
QUENYA: When the chief priests and the scribes saw the wonders that he did and the boys crying in the temple: “Hosianna to the Son of David,” they were angry

ENGLISH: and said to him: “Are you hearing what they are saying?” Jesus said to them: “Yes! Did you not ever read this: From the mouth of babes and babies you have prepared praise – ?
QUENYA: and said to him: “Are you hearing what they are saying?” Jesus said to them: “Yes! Did you not ever read this: From the mouth of babes and babies you have prepared praise – ?

ENGLISH: And he went away from them and went out of the city and remained there through the night.
QUENYA: And he went away from them and went out of the city and remained there through the night.

ENGLISH: Returning to the temple early, he was hungry.
QUENYA: Returning to the temple early, he was hungry.

ENGLISH: And he saw a fig tree beside the road and went to it, but he found nothing on it except only some leaves, and he said to it: “May nobody ever receive fruit from you!” And in the same moment the fig tree withered.
QUENYA: And he saw a fig tree beside the road and went to it, but he found nothing on it except only some leaves, and he said to it: “May nobody ever receive fruit from you!” And in the same moment the fig tree withered.

ENGLISH: But when the disciples saw that, they were in wonder, saying: “How did the fig tree wither in a single moment?”
QUENYA: But when the disciples saw that, they were in wonder, saying: “How did the fig tree wither in a single moment?”

ENGLISH: In answer Jesus said to them: “Truly I say to you: If you have faith and are not uncertain, you will not do only what I did to the fig tree, but also if you say to this mountain: Be lifted and thrown into the sea!, that will happen.
QUENYA: In answer Jesus said to them: “Truly I say to you: If you have faith and are not uncertain, you will not do only what I did to the fig tree, but also if you say to this mountain: Be lifted and thrown into the sea!, that will happen.

ENGLISH: And all the things that you request in prayer, having faith, you will receive!”
QUENYA: And all the things that you request in prayer, having faith, you will receive!”

ENGLISH: Now after he went into the temple, the chief priests and the elders among the people came to him while he was teaching the crowd and said: “What is the authority by which you do these things? And who gave you this authority?”
QUENYA: Now after he went into the temple, the chief priests and the elders among the people came to him while he was teaching the crowd and said: “What is the authority by which you do these things? And who gave you this authority?”

ENGLISH: In answer Jesus said to them: “I as well will ask you about one thing. If you tell me, I too will tell you about the authority with which I do these things.
QUENYA: In answer Jesus said to them: “I as well will ask you about one thing. If you tell me, I too will tell you about the authority with which I do these things.
