QUENYA: And Joseph took the body and wrapped it in pure linen,

ENGLISH: and he put it in a new tomb, which beforehand he made as an artifical cave in the rock. After he rolled a stone to before the door of the tomb he went off.
QUENYA: and he put it in a new tomb, which beforehand he made as an artifical cave in the rock. After he rolled a stone to before the door of the tomb he went off.

ENGLISH: But Mary Magdalene and the other Mary were still there, sitting before the tomb.
QUENYA: But Mary Magdalene and the other Mary were still there, sitting before the tomb.

ENGLISH: On the following day, which was after the Preparation, the chief priests and the Pharisees gathered before Pilate,
QUENYA: On the following day, which was after the Preparation, the chief priests and the Pharisees gathered before Pilate,

ENGLISH: saying: “Lord, we have recalled which this man of lies said when he was still alive: 'After three days I shall be raised again.'
QUENYA: saying: “Lord, we have recalled which this man of lies said when he was still alive: 'After three days I shall be raised again.'

ENGLISH: Therefore give the order, and the tomb will be protected until the third day, to stop his disciples from coming and stealing him and saying to the people: 'He was raised from the dead!', and the last error will be worse than the first!”
QUENYA: Therefore give the order, and the tomb will be protected until the third day, to stop his disciples from coming and stealing him and saying to the people: 'He was raised from the dead!', and the last error will be worse than the first!”

ENGLISH: Pilate said to them: “You have guards. Go and make it as safe as you know!”
QUENYA: Pilate said to them: “You have guards. Go and make it as safe as you know!”

ENGLISH: They went and made the tomb safe by sealing the stone and by putting the guards there.
QUENYA: They went and made the tomb safe by sealing the stone and by putting the guards there.

ENGLISH: After the day of rest, at dawn on the first day of the week, Mary Magdalene and the other Mary to see the tomb.
QUENYA: After the day of rest, at dawn on the first day of the week, Mary Magdalene and the other Mary to see the tomb.

ENGLISH: And behold! there occurred a great earthquake, for the angel of the Lord came down from heaven and put away the stone, and he sat on it.
QUENYA: And behold! there occurred a great earthquake, for the angel of the Lord came down from heaven and put away the stone, and he sat on it.

ENGLISH: His appearance was like lightening , and his garments were snow-white.
QUENYA: His appearance was like lightening , and his garments were snow-white.

ENGLISH: For the fear of him the guards shook and were like dead.
QUENYA: For the fear of him the guards shook and were like dead.

ENGLISH: But the angel said to the women: “Do not fear, for I know that you are seeking Jesus, who was crucified.
QUENYA: But the angel said to the women: “Do not fear, for I know that you are seeking Jesus, who was crucified.

ENGLISH: He is not here, for he has been raised, as he said. Come, see the place where he lay!
QUENYA: He is not here, for he has been raised, as he said. Come, see the place where he lay!

ENGLISH: And go with speed and tell his disciples that he has been raised from the dead, and behold! he is going before you into Galilee; there you will see him. Behold, I have told you !”
QUENYA: And go with speed and tell his disciples that he has been raised from the dead, and behold! he is going before you into Galilee; there you will see him. Behold, I have told you !”

ENGLISH: And quickly going away from the grave, having fear and great joy, they ran to tell that to the disciples.
QUENYA: And quickly going away from the grave, having fear and great joy, they ran to tell that to the disciples.

ENGLISH: And behold! Jesus met them and said: “Good day!” . They came to him and seized his feet and fell down before him.
QUENYA: And behold! Jesus met them and said: “Good day!” . They came to him and seized his feet and fell down before him.

ENGLISH: Then Jesus said to them: “Do not be afraid! Go, tell my brothers, for them to go into Galilee, and there they will see me!”
QUENYA: Then Jesus said to them: “Do not be afraid! Go, tell my brothers, for them to go into Galilee, and there they will see me!”

ENGLISH: But after they went, behold, some of the guards went into the city and told the chief prist about everything that had happened.
QUENYA: But after they went, behold, some of the guards went into the city and told the chief prist about everything that had happened.

ENGLISH: And at a meeting with the elders they made consideration, and they gave a sufficient number of silver-pieces to the soldiers
QUENYA: And at a meeting with the elders they made consideration, and they gave a sufficient number of silver-pieces to the soldiers

ENGLISH: and said: “Say: 'His disciples came in the night and stole him while we were asleep.'
QUENYA: and said: “Say: 'His disciples came in the night and stole him while we were asleep.'

ENGLISH: And if this comes to the ears of the governor, we shall speak to him, and you do not be afraid!”
QUENYA: And if this comes to the ears of the governor, we shall speak to him, and you do not be afraid!”

ENGLISH: And they took the silver-pieces and did as they were instructed, and this saying has been spread among Jews until this day.
QUENYA: And they took the silver-pieces and did as they were instructed, and this saying has been spread among Jews until this day.

ENGLISH: But the eleven disciples went into Galilee, to the mountain where Jesus said that he was going to meet them,
QUENYA: But the eleven disciples went into Galilee, to the mountain where Jesus said that he was going to meet them,

ENGLISH: and when they saw him, they fell down before him, but some among them were not firm in the faith.
QUENYA: and when they saw him, they fell down before him, but some among them were not firm in the faith.

ENGLISH: And Jesus went to them and spoke to them, saying: “All lordship has been given me in heaven and earth.
QUENYA: And Jesus went to them and spoke to them, saying: “All lordship has been given me in heaven and earth.

ENGLISH: Therefore go and make all nations disciples, baptizing them in the name of the Father and the Son and the Holy Spirit,
QUENYA: Therefore go and make all nations disciples, baptizing them in the name of the Father and the Son and the Holy Spirit,

ENGLISH: teaching them to do all the things that I commanded you. And behold, I am with you all the days until the end of the age!”
QUENYA: teaching them to do all the things that I commanded you. And behold, I am with you all the days until the end of the age!”

ENGLISH: Paul, in prison for Jesus Christ, and Timothy our brother, to Philemon our beloved, who works with us,
QUENYA: Paul, in prison for Jesus Christ, and Timothy our brother, to Philemon our beloved, who works with us,

ENGLISH: and Apphia our sister who is a soldier with us, and to the congregation that is in your house: May you have mercy and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
QUENYA: and Apphia our sister who is a soldier with us, and to the congregation that is in your house: May you have mercy and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

ENGLISH: I always thank my God when I speak about you in my prayers,
QUENYA: I always thank my God when I speak about you in my prayers,

ENGLISH: since I am hearing about your love and your faith which you have for Jesus Christ and for all the holy ones,
QUENYA: since I am hearing about your love and your faith which you have for Jesus Christ and for all the holy ones,

ENGLISH: so that you give to others a part in your faith, by the knowledge of every god thing that we have in Christ.
QUENYA: so that you give to others a part in your faith, by the knowledge of every god thing that we have in Christ.

ENGLISH: And I received joy and comfort by your love, for the warm feelings of the holy ones are renewed by means of you, brother.
QUENYA: And I received joy and comfort by your love, for the warm feelings of the holy ones are renewed by means of you, brother.

ENGLISH: For this reason, though I have great courage in Christ to give you a command about what is proper,
QUENYA: For this reason, though I have great courage in Christ to give you a command about what is proper,

ENGLISH: I sooner wish to urge you by love, being what I am: Paul, an elder, now also in prison for Christ.
QUENYA: I sooner wish to urge you by love, being what I am: Paul, an elder, now also in prison for Christ.

ENGLISH: I urge you about my child which I begat in my chains: Onesimus,
QUENYA: I urge you about my child which I begat in my chains: Onesimus,

ENGLISH: formerly without use for you, but now being of use to you and me alike.
QUENYA: formerly without use for you, but now being of use to you and me alike.

ENGLISH: Him I make return to you, that is, my own heart.
QUENYA: Him I make return to you, that is, my own heart.

ENGLISH: I wished to keep him with me, for him to be a servant for me in your place, in the chains that I bear for the gospel.
QUENYA: I wished to keep him with me, for him to be a servant for me in your place, in the chains that I bear for the gospel.

ENGLISH: But without your permission I do not want to do anything, and thus your good deed will not be by compulsion, but by your own free choise.
QUENYA: But without your permission I do not want to do anything, and thus your good deed will not be by compulsion, but by your own free choise.

ENGLISH: Maybe for this reason he was taken from you for a short time, for you to receive him back forever,
QUENYA: Maybe for this reason he was taken from you for a short time, for you to receive him back forever,

ENGLISH: no more as a slave but as more than a slave, as a beloved brother, above everything to me, but how much more to you, in the flesh and in the Lord alike.
QUENYA: no more as a slave but as more than a slave, as a beloved brother, above everything to me, but how much more to you, in the flesh and in the Lord alike.

ENGLISH: Therefore, if you think about me as having a share with you, receive him as if you were going to receive me.
QUENYA: Therefore, if you think about me as having a share with you, receive him as if you were going to receive me.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, if he has done anything wrong or has a debt to you, count that against me.
QUENYA: Furthermore, if he has done anything wrong or has a debt to you, count that against me.

ENGLISH: I Paul am writing with my own hand: I will pay – not to tell you that your debt to me is your own person.
QUENYA: I Paul am writing with my own hand: I will pay – not to tell you that your debt to me is your own person.

ENGLISH: Yes, brother: may I have gain from you in the Lord. You renew my warm feelings in Christ.
QUENYA: Yes, brother: may I have gain from you in the Lord. You renew my warm feelings in Christ.

ENGLISH: Being sure that you will do as I want I am writing to you, knowing that you will do more as well, beyond which I write.
QUENYA: Being sure that you will do as I want I am writing to you, knowing that you will do more as well, beyond which I write.

ENGLISH: But at the same time prepare for me a place to dwell, for my hope is that by your prayers I shall be released to you.
QUENYA: But at the same time prepare for me a place to dwell, for my hope is that by your prayers I shall be released to you.

ENGLISH: Epaphras, who is in prison with me in Jesus Christ, greets you ;
QUENYA: Epaphras, who is in prison with me in Jesus Christ, greets you ;

ENGLISH: also Mark, Aristarchus, Demas, Luke – who labour with me.
QUENYA: also Mark, Aristarchus, Demas, Luke – who labour with me.

ENGLISH: May the grace of the Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit!
QUENYA: May the grace of the Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit!

ENGLISH: Paul and Timothy, thralls of Jesus Christ, to all the holy ones in Jesus Chrsit that are in Philippi, and to overseers and congregation servants:
QUENYA: Paul and Timothy, thralls of Jesus Christ, to all the holy ones in Jesus Chrsit that are in Philippi, and to overseers and congregation servants:

ENGLISH: May you have grace and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
QUENYA: May you have grace and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

ENGLISH: I give thanks to my God whenever I recall you.
QUENYA: I give thanks to my God whenever I recall you.

ENGLISH: Always, in every petition of mine for all among you, I make petition in joy
QUENYA: Always, in every petition of mine for all among you, I make petition in joy

ENGLISH: because of the part that you have in making the gospel known, from the first day until this moment.
QUENYA: because of the part that you have in making the gospel known, from the first day until this moment.

ENGLISH: For I am certain about this thing, that he who began a good work in you will also complete it, until the day of Jesus Christ.
QUENYA: For I am certain about this thing, that he who began a good work in you will also complete it, until the day of Jesus Christ.

ENGLISH: I do well by thinking so about you all, since I have you in my heart, you that all have a part with me in the grace – by my fetters, and alike by the defending and establishing of the gospel.
QUENYA: I do well by thinking so about you all, since I have you in my heart, you that all have a part with me in the grace – by my fetters, and alike by the defending and establishing of the gospel.

ENGLISH: For God is my witness that I long for you all, with the heart of Jesus Christ.
QUENYA: For God is my witness that I long for you all, with the heart of Jesus Christ.

ENGLISH: And for this thing I am praying: that your love will still be more and more abundant, by knowledge and by keenness of perception,
QUENYA: And for this thing I am praying: that your love will still be more and more abundant, by knowledge and by keenness of perception,

ENGLISH: allowing you to test the important things, for you to be without stain and not causing others to fall, until the day of the Christ.
QUENYA: allowing you to test the important things, for you to be without stain and not causing others to fall, until the day of the Christ.

ENGLISH: You will be filled with just fruit, which is by Jesus Christ, to the glory and the praise of God.
QUENYA: You will be filled with just fruit, which is by Jesus Christ, to the glory and the praise of God.

ENGLISH: Now I wish that you are to know, brothers, that my condition has caused the gospel to go forward more than stopping it,
QUENYA: Now I wish that you are to know, brothers, that my condition has caused the gospel to go forward more than stopping it,

ENGLISH: and so my fetters have been made known in Christ to the entire fortress and to all the others.
QUENYA: and so my fetters have been made known in Christ to the entire fortress and to all the others.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, the greater number of the brothers in the Lord, that have received courage by my chains, more extensively dare to speak the word without fear.
QUENYA: Furthermore, the greater number of the brothers in the Lord, that have received courage by my chains, more extensively dare to speak the word without fear.

ENGLISH: Indeed there are some that make Christ known out of envy and quarrelling, but others also sincerely.
QUENYA: Indeed there are some that make Christ known out of envy and quarrelling, but others also sincerely.

ENGLISH: They make the Christ known out of love, for they know that I have been put here to protect the gospel.
QUENYA: They make the Christ known out of love, for they know that I have been put here to protect the gospel.

ENGLISH: But the others do it since they want the strife, not for pure reasons, for they suppose that they will cause tribulation against me in my fetters.
QUENYA: But the others do it since they want the strife, not for pure reasons, for they suppose that they will cause tribulation against me in my fetters.

ENGLISH: Then what? – except that in every manner, with hidden thoughts or in truth, the Christ is made known, and therefore I am happy. Indeed I shall be happy again,
QUENYA: Then what? – except that in every manner, with hidden thoughts or in truth, the Christ is made known, and therefore I am happy. Indeed I shall be happy again,

ENGLISH: for I know that so I shall get salvation, by your supplication and by receiving the spirit of Jesus Christ,
QUENYA: for I know that so I shall get salvation, by your supplication and by receiving the spirit of Jesus Christ,

ENGLISH: according to my great longing and my hope that I shall be humbled in nothing, but in all boldness the Christ shall be praised by means of my body – as always before, so also now, in life or in death.
QUENYA: according to my great longing and my hope that I shall be humbled in nothing, but in all boldness the Christ shall be praised by means of my body – as always before, so also now, in life or in death.

ENGLISH: For to me life is Christ, and dying, to receive more.
QUENYA: For to me life is Christ, and dying, to receive more.

ENGLISH: But if remaining in life means that I can do work that bears fruit, I do not know what I am to choose.
QUENYA: But if remaining in life means that I can do work that bears fruit, I do not know what I am to choose.

ENGLISH: I am drawn between the two: I wish to go away from here and be with Christ, for that is much better.
QUENYA: I am drawn between the two: I wish to go away from here and be with Christ, for that is much better.

ENGLISH: But is a greater need that I shall remain in the flesh, for your good.
QUENYA: But is a greater need that I shall remain in the flesh, for your good.

ENGLISH: For being certain about this, I know that I shall remain and keep dwelling with all of you, for you to go forwards and for you to have the joy which the faith gives.
QUENYA: For being certain about this, I know that I shall remain and keep dwelling with all of you, for you to go forwards and for you to have the joy which the faith gives.

ENGLISH: Thus it will be possible for you to praise yourselves in Jesus Christ in an abundant manner – concerning me, by my being with you again.
QUENYA: Thus it will be possible for you to praise yourselves in Jesus Christ in an abundant manner – concerning me, by my being with you again.

ENGLISH: Solely behave in a manner worthy of the gospel about the Christ! Thus, not heeding if I come to see you or if I am away, it will be possible for me to hear about your condition,, that you stand firm in one spirit, fighting person by person for the faith of the gospel,
QUENYA: Solely behave in a manner worthy of the gospel about the Christ! Thus, not heeding if I come to see you or if I am away, it will be possible for me to hear about your condition,, that you stand firm in one spirit, fighting person by person for the faith of the gospel,

ENGLISH: in nothing terrified by that stand against you. That is to them a sign of undoing, but to you, of salvation. Also this sign comes from God.
QUENYA: in nothing terrified by that stand against you. That is to them a sign of undoing, but to you, of salvation. Also this sign comes from God.

ENGLISH: For to you was given, on behalf of Christ, not solely to believe in him, but also to suffer on behalf of him.
QUENYA: For to you was given, on behalf of Christ, not solely to believe in him, but also to suffer on behalf of him.

ENGLISH: For you have the same war that you saw that I had, and as you now are hearing that I still have.
QUENYA: For you have the same war that you saw that I had, and as you now are hearing that I still have.

ENGLISH: Therefore, if is encouragement in Christ, if is comfort of love, if is a sharing of spirit, if are mercy and compassion,
QUENYA: Therefore, if is encouragement in Christ, if is comfort of love, if is a sharing of spirit, if are mercy and compassion,

ENGLISH: make my joy full by being of one mind, having the same love, being one in soul, having the same thoughts,
QUENYA: make my joy full by being of one mind, having the same love, being one in soul, having the same thoughts,

ENGLISH: doing nothing because of wishing strife or empty glory, but with a lowly mind counting one another greater than yourselves,
QUENYA: doing nothing because of wishing strife or empty glory, but with a lowly mind counting one another greater than yourselves,

ENGLISH: heeding not your own matters alone, but also the matters of the others.
QUENYA: heeding not your own matters alone, but also the matters of the others.

ENGLISH: Have the same mind that also existed in Christ Jesus!
QUENYA: Have the same mind that also existed in Christ Jesus!

ENGLISH: He, being in God's form, did not count being like God a thing that he was going to seize.
QUENYA: He, being in God's form, did not count being like God a thing that he was going to seize.

ENGLISH: On the contrary, he made himself empty and took a thrall's form and was made like a man.
QUENYA: On the contrary, he made himself empty and took a thrall's form and was made like a man.

ENGLISH: And when he found himself in a man's form, he humbled himself and was obedient until death, indeed death on the cross.
QUENYA: And when he found himself in a man's form, he humbled himself and was obedient until death, indeed death on the cross.

ENGLISH: Therefore God also made him supreme and gave him the name over all names,
QUENYA: Therefore God also made him supreme and gave him the name over all names,

ENGLISH: to cause to bend every knee, of who are in heaven and of that are on earth and of who are under the ground,
QUENYA: to cause to bend every knee, of who are in heaven and of that are on earth and of who are under the ground,

ENGLISH: and to cause every tongue to say openly that Jesus Christ is Lord, for the glory of God the Father.
QUENYA: and to cause every tongue to say openly that Jesus Christ is Lord, for the glory of God the Father.

ENGLISH: Thus, my beloved, as you have always been obedient, not solely when I was there but now much more when I am away, thus work for your salvation in fear and shivering,
QUENYA: Thus, my beloved, as you have always been obedient, not solely when I was there but now much more when I am away, thus work for your salvation in fear and shivering,

ENGLISH: for God is who works in you as he thinks well, causing you to wish and to work alike.
QUENYA: for God is who works in you as he thinks well, causing you to wish and to work alike.

ENGLISH: Do everything without complaints and quarrelings,
QUENYA: Do everything without complaints and quarrelings,

ENGLISH: for you to be without stain and clean, God's children among the perverse and twisted people of your time. Among them you shine as light-bearers in the world,
QUENYA: for you to be without stain and clean, God's children among the perverse and twisted people of your time. Among them you shine as light-bearers in the world,

ENGLISH: keeping the word of life. Therefore I will praise myself on the day of Christ, that I have not run for nothing or I have toiled for nothing.
QUENYA: keeping the word of life. Therefore I will praise myself on the day of Christ, that I have not run for nothing or I have toiled for nothing.

ENGLISH: But also if I am poured out upon the sacrifice and upon the ministry of your faith, I am happy and I have joy with all among you.
QUENYA: But also if I am poured out upon the sacrifice and upon the ministry of your faith, I am happy and I have joy with all among you.

ENGLISH: In the same manner, be happy and have joy with me, you as well!
QUENYA: In the same manner, be happy and have joy with me, you as well!

ENGLISH: For I have the hope by the Lord Jesus that soon I will send Timothy to you; thus I as well will have the joy of knowing the things that concern you.
QUENYA: For I have the hope by the Lord Jesus that soon I will send Timothy to you; thus I as well will have the joy of knowing the things that concern you.

ENGLISH: For I do not have another with the same inclination , one who sincerely will watch your matters.
QUENYA: For I do not have another with the same inclination , one who sincerely will watch your matters.

ENGLISH: For all the others seek their own matters, not those of Jesus Christ.
QUENYA: For all the others seek their own matters, not those of Jesus Christ.

ENGLISH: But you know how he showed his steadfastness – that like a child with father he laboured with me for the gospel.
QUENYA: But you know how he showed his steadfastness – that like a child with father he laboured with me for the gospel.

ENGLISH: Therefore I have the hope that I will send this man, as soon as I have seen how my matters stand.
QUENYA: Therefore I have the hope that I will send this man, as soon as I have seen how my matters stand.

ENGLISH: Indeed I am certain in the Lord that I as well will come soon.
QUENYA: Indeed I am certain in the Lord that I as well will come soon.

ENGLISH: But I believe there is a need that I send you Epaphroditus, my brother who works and figths with me, but your sent-forth man and a servant for my need.
QUENYA: But I believe there is a need that I send you Epaphroditus, my brother who works and figths with me, but your sent-forth man and a servant for my need.

ENGLISH: For he longs to see you all, and he has had grief since you heard that he was sick.
QUENYA: For he longs to see you all, and he has had grief since you heard that he was sick.

ENGLISH: For indeed he was sick, near to death, but God had mercy on him, indeed not on him alone, but also on me, not wishing that I was to have grief on grief.
QUENYA: For indeed he was sick, near to death, but God had mercy on him, indeed not on him alone, but also on me, not wishing that I was to have grief on grief.

ENGLISH: Therefore I send him that more soon, for you to meet him and for you to have joy, and thus I will have less grief.
QUENYA: Therefore I send him that more soon, for you to meet him and for you to have joy, and thus I will have less grief.

ENGLISH: Therefore receive him in the Lord, in all joy, and let such men be precious to you,
QUENYA: Therefore receive him in the Lord, in all joy, and let such men be precious to you,

ENGLISH: for by reason of the work of the Lord he came near to death, putting his life in danger to do the ministry which you were prevented from giving me.
QUENYA: for by reason of the work of the Lord he came near to death, putting his life in danger to do the ministry which you were prevented from giving me.

ENGLISH: Finally, my brothers: Have joy in the Lord! To write the same things to you is not difficult for me, but to you it is a safety.
QUENYA: Finally, my brothers: Have joy in the Lord! To write the same things to you is not difficult for me, but to you it is a safety.

ENGLISH: Watch yourselves for the dogs, watch yourselves for those that work evil, watch yourselves for who cut the flesh.
QUENYA: Watch yourselves for the dogs, watch yourselves for those that work evil, watch yourselves for who cut the flesh.

ENGLISH: For we are the true circumcision, that by God's spirit are servants, and praise ourselves by Jesus Christ, not believing we have our security by the flesh,
QUENYA: For we are the true circumcision, that by God's spirit are servants, and praise ourselves by Jesus Christ, not believing we have our security by the flesh,

ENGLISH: though I indeed have reasons for believing that I have security also by the flesh.
QUENYA: though I indeed have reasons for believing that I have security also by the flesh.

ENGLISH: If anyone believes that he has security in the flesh, I have more:
QUENYA: If anyone believes that he has security in the flesh, I have more:

ENGLISH: Circumcized on the eighth day, born into Israel, of the tribe of Benjamin, a Hebrew of Hebrews, concerning the Law: a Pharisee,
QUENYA: Circumcized on the eighth day, born into Israel, of the tribe of Benjamin, a Hebrew of Hebrews, concerning the Law: a Pharisee,

ENGLISH: concerning burning faith: persecuting the congregation, concerning the righteousness that is by Law: a person who was perfect.
QUENYA: concerning burning faith: persecuting the congregation, concerning the righteousness that is by Law: a person who was perfect.

ENGLISH: But the things that were to me gain, those I have counted as loss , by reason of the Christ.
QUENYA: But the things that were to me gain, those I have counted as loss , by reason of the Christ.

ENGLISH: But indeed I count all things as loss, by the supreme preciousness of the knowledge about Jesus Christ my Lord. By reason of him I have also let all things be lost to me, and I think about them as refuse , for my gaining Christ
QUENYA: But indeed I count all things as loss, by the supreme preciousness of the knowledge about Jesus Christ my Lord. By reason of him I have also let all things be lost to me, and I think about them as refuse , for my gaining Christ

ENGLISH: and for being found in him, not by my own righteousness, that which comes by the Law, but by which exists by faith in Christ, the rigtheousness which comes from God by the faith,
QUENYA: and for being found in him, not by my own righteousness, that which comes by the Law, but by which exists by faith in Christ, the rigtheousness which comes from God by the faith,

ENGLISH: for me to know him and the power of his resurrection and have a part in his sufferings, being shaped by his death
QUENYA: for me to know him and the power of his resurrection and have a part in his sufferings, being shaped by his death

ENGLISH: – to see if is a way by which it is possible for me to reach to the resurrection from dead.
QUENYA: – to see if is a way by which it is possible for me to reach to the resurrection from dead.

ENGLISH: Not that I have received it even now, or that even now I have been made perfect – but I I am pursuing to see if I can seize that for which I am also seized by Christ Jesus.
QUENYA: Not that I have received it even now, or that even now I have been made perfect – but I I am pursuing to see if I can seize that for which I am also seized by Christ Jesus.

ENGLISH: Brothers, I do not believe concerning myself that I have now seized it, but one thing I do: Putting out of my mind that lie behind me and reaching towards that are before me
QUENYA: Brothers, I do not believe concerning myself that I have now seized it, but one thing I do: Putting out of my mind that lie behind me and reaching towards that are before me

ENGLISH: I am pursuing the goal, seeking the reward – God's calling to on high by Christ Jesus.
QUENYA: I am pursuing the goal, seeking the reward – God's calling to on high by Christ Jesus.

ENGLISH: Therefore, we that are ready, let us have this matter in mind, and if you have another thing in your thoughts, God will reveal to you also this matter.
QUENYA: Therefore, we that are ready, let us have this matter in mind, and if you have another thing in your thoughts, God will reveal to you also this matter.

ENGLISH: But after coming thus far, let us walk forward in the same path.
QUENYA: But after coming thus far, let us walk forward in the same path.

ENGLISH: Follow me in my path, brothers, and heed that walk in a manner following the example that you have in us.
QUENYA: Follow me in my path, brothers, and heed that walk in a manner following the example that you have in us.

ENGLISH: For are numerous ones – I spoke about them frequently, but now I am speaking about them with grief – that walk as enemies of the cross of the Christ.
QUENYA: For are numerous ones – I spoke about them frequently, but now I am speaking about them with grief – that walk as enemies of the cross of the Christ.

ENGLISH: Their end will be undoing and their god is their belly, and their glory is their own humiliation , for they have their mind on the things on earth.
QUENYA: Their end will be undoing and their god is their belly, and their glory is their own humiliation , for they have their mind on the things on earth.

ENGLISH: As for us, our country exists in heaven, from where we also wait for a Savior, the Lord Jesus Christ,
QUENYA: As for us, our country exists in heaven, from where we also wait for a Savior, the Lord Jesus Christ,

ENGLISH: who will remake our lowly body to be like his glorious body, with his power with which he can also put everything under himself.
QUENYA: who will remake our lowly body to be like his glorious body, with his power with which he can also put everything under himself.

ENGLISH: Therefore, my brothers beloved and longed-for, my joy and my crown – thus stand firm by the Lord, beloved ones!
QUENYA: Therefore, my brothers beloved and longed-for, my joy and my crown – thus stand firm by the Lord, beloved ones!

ENGLISH: Euodia I exhort and Syntece I exhort: Be of one mind, in the Lord!
QUENYA: Euodia I exhort and Syntece I exhort: Be of one mind, in the Lord!

ENGLISH: Indeed I ask also of you, trusty fellow who works with me under the yoke, help them that have toiled with me for the gospel, together with Clement and also the others that work with me, whose names are in the Book of Life.
QUENYA: Indeed I ask also of you, trusty fellow who works with me under the yoke, help them that have toiled with me for the gospel, together with Clement and also the others that work with me, whose names are in the Book of Life.

ENGLISH: Always be happy in the Lord. Again I will say: Be happy!
QUENYA: Always be happy in the Lord. Again I will say: Be happy!

ENGLISH: Let your gentleness be known to all men. The Lord is near.
QUENYA: Let your gentleness be known to all men. The Lord is near.

ENGLISH: Let nothing disturb you, but in everything, by prayer and by supplication with thanksgiving, make your requests known to God,
QUENYA: Let nothing disturb you, but in everything, by prayer and by supplication with thanksgiving, make your requests known to God,

ENGLISH: and God's peace, which surpasses every thought, will watch your heart and your mind by Jesus Christ.
QUENYA: and God's peace, which surpasses every thought, will watch your heart and your mind by Jesus Christ.

ENGLISH: Finally, brothers: All things that are true, all that are serious , all that are just, all that are pure, all that are desirable, all of which one speaks well, every goodness and everything being worthy of praise – think about them!
QUENYA: Finally, brothers: All things that are true, all that are serious , all that are just, all that are pure, all that are desirable, all of which one speaks well, every goodness and everything being worthy of praise – think about them!

ENGLISH: which you learnt and you received and you heard and you saw by means of me, do them, and the God of peace will be with you.
QUENYA: which you learnt and you received and you heard and you saw by means of me, do them, and the God of peace will be with you.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, I have great joy in the Lord that now in the end you have renewed your thinking about me, to whom indeed you gave thought, but was nothing that you could do.
QUENYA: Furthermore, I have great joy in the Lord that now in the end you have renewed your thinking about me, to whom indeed you gave thought, but was nothing that you could do.

ENGLISH: Not that I am talking about lack, for I have learnt to let which I have suffice for me.
QUENYA: Not that I am talking about lack, for I have learnt to let which I have suffice for me.

ENGLISH: Indeed I know how to suffer lack, indeed I know how to have abundance. In everything and all conditions I have learnt the secret – how to be full and how to be hungry alike, how to have abundance and how to suffer lack.
QUENYA: Indeed I know how to suffer lack, indeed I know how to have abundance. In everything and all conditions I have learnt the secret – how to be full and how to be hungry alike, how to have abundance and how to suffer lack.

ENGLISH: For all things I have strength, by who gives me strength .
QUENYA: For all things I have strength, by who gives me strength .

ENGLISH: And yet you did well by having a part with me in my tribulation.
QUENYA: And yet you did well by having a part with me in my tribulation.

ENGLISH: Indeed you know, Philippians, that when the gospel first came to you – when I went away from Macedonia – was not a single congregation that had a part with me concerning giving and receiving, except you alone.
QUENYA: Indeed you know, Philippians, that when the gospel first came to you – when I went away from Macedonia – was not a single congregation that had a part with me concerning giving and receiving, except you alone.

ENGLISH: For also in Thessalonica, one time and two times alike, you sent to me for my need.
QUENYA: For also in Thessalonica, one time and two times alike, you sent to me for my need.

ENGLISH: Not that I am seeking the gift, but indeed I am seeking the fruit that will be counted to you.
QUENYA: Not that I am seeking the gift, but indeed I am seeking the fruit that will be counted to you.

ENGLISH: But I have everything and have abundance. I have been filled after I received from Epafroditus the things from you, a fragrant smell, a desirable sacrifice, pleasing to God.
QUENYA: But I have everything and have abundance. I have been filled after I received from Epafroditus the things from you, a fragrant smell, a desirable sacrifice, pleasing to God.

ENGLISH: And my God will fill your every need with his riches in glory, by Jesus Christ.
QUENYA: And my God will fill your every need with his riches in glory, by Jesus Christ.

ENGLISH: To our God and our Father be the glory forever and ever! Amen.
QUENYA: To our God and our Father be the glory forever and ever! Amen.

ENGLISH: Greet every holy one in Jesus Christ. The brothers that are with me greet you.
QUENYA: Greet every holy one in Jesus Christ. The brothers that are with me greet you.

ENGLISH: All the holy ones, but above all who are in the house of the High King, greet you!
QUENYA: All the holy ones, but above all who are in the house of the High King, greet you!

ENGLISH: May the grace of the Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit!
QUENYA: May the grace of the Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit!

ENGLISH: The revelation of Jesus Christ, which God gave to him, to show to his servants that soon will happen. He sent his angel and made it known in signs to John his servant,
QUENYA: The revelation of Jesus Christ, which God gave to him, to show to his servants that soon will happen. He sent his angel and made it known in signs to John his servant,

ENGLISH: who witnessed about the word of God and the witness about Jesus Christ, everything that he saw.
QUENYA: who witnessed about the word of God and the witness about Jesus Christ, everything that he saw.

ENGLISH: Happy is the one who reads aloud, and happy are who hear the words of the prediction and who heed that are written in it, for the time is near.
QUENYA: Happy is the one who reads aloud, and happy are who hear the words of the prediction and who heed that are written in it, for the time is near.

ENGLISH: John to the seven congregations in Asia: Grace and peace to you from who is and who was and who shall come, and from the seven spirits that are before his throne,
QUENYA: John to the seven congregations in Asia: Grace and peace to you from who is and who was and who shall come, and from the seven spirits that are before his throne,

ENGLISH: and from Jesus Christ, the Faithful Witness, the Firstborn out of the Dead, and the Ruler of kings of earth. To who loves us and who has freed us from our sins with his own blood
QUENYA: and from Jesus Christ, the Faithful Witness, the Firstborn out of the Dead, and the Ruler of kings of earth. To who loves us and who has freed us from our sins with his own blood

ENGLISH: – and made us a kingdom, priests for his God and his Father – be to him the glory and the power forever! Amen!
QUENYA: – and made us a kingdom, priests for his God and his Father – be to him the glory and the power forever! Amen!

ENGLISH: Behold! He is coming with the clouds, and every eye shall see him, also those who pierced him; and all tribes of earth shall beat themselves in grief because of him. Yes, amen!
QUENYA: Behold! He is coming with the clouds, and every eye shall see him, also those who pierced him; and all tribes of earth shall beat themselves in grief because of him. Yes, amen!

ENGLISH: “I am Tinco and Úre ”, says the Lórd God, “ who is and who was and who shall come, the Almighty.”
QUENYA: “I am Tinco and Úre ”, says the Lórd God, “ who is and who was and who shall come, the Almighty.”

ENGLISH: I John, your brother who has a share with you in the tribulation and the kingdom and the faithfulness in Jesus, was on the island called Patmos because of speaking about God and because of witnessing about Jesus.
QUENYA: I John, your brother who has a share with you in the tribulation and the kingdom and the faithfulness in Jesus, was on the island called Patmos because of speaking about God and because of witnessing about Jesus.

ENGLISH: On the day of the Lord I was in spirit, and I heard behind me a mighty voice like from a trumpet,
QUENYA: On the day of the Lord I was in spirit, and I heard behind me a mighty voice like from a trumpet,

ENGLISH: saying: “Write which you see in a book and send it to the seven congregations, in Ephesus and Smyrna and Pergamum and Thyatira and Sardis and Philadelphia and Laodicea.”
QUENYA: saying: “Write which you see in a book and send it to the seven congregations, in Ephesus and Smyrna and Pergamum and Thyatira and Sardis and Philadelphia and Laodicea.”

ENGLISH: I turned to see whose voice spoke to me, and after turning I saw seven lampstands of gold,
QUENYA: I turned to see whose voice spoke to me, and after turning I saw seven lampstands of gold,

ENGLISH: and in the midst of the lampstands one like a son of man, clad in a robe that reached to his feet and having a golden belt bound about the chest.
QUENYA: and in the midst of the lampstands one like a son of man, clad in a robe that reached to his feet and having a golden belt bound about the chest.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, his head and his hair were white like white wool, like snow, and his eyes like a fiery flame.
QUENYA: Furthermore, his head and his hair were white like white wool, like snow, and his eyes like a fiery flame.

ENGLISH: His feet were like gold-colored copper, glowing in an oven , and his voice was like the sound of many waters.
QUENYA: His feet were like gold-colored copper, glowing in an oven , and his voice was like the sound of many waters.

ENGLISH: In his right hand he had seven stars; out of his mouth went a sharp, two-edged longsword having two edges. His face shone as when the Sun shines in its power.
QUENYA: In his right hand he had seven stars; out of his mouth went a sharp, two-edged longsword having two edges. His face shone as when the Sun shines in its power.

ENGLISH: When I saw him I fell like dead before his feet. He put his right hand on me and said: “Do not fear! I am the First and the Last
QUENYA: When I saw him I fell like dead before his feet. He put his right hand on me and said: “Do not fear! I am the First and the Last

ENGLISH: and the living; and I was dead, but behold! I am alive forever and ever, and I have the keys to death and to Mandos .
QUENYA: and the living; and I was dead, but behold! I am alive forever and ever, and I have the keys to death and to Mandos .

ENGLISH: Therefore write that you have seen, that are now and that shall happen after this alike.
QUENYA: Therefore write that you have seen, that are now and that shall happen after this alike.

ENGLISH: About the secret of the seven stars that you saw in my right hand, and of the seven lampstands: the seven stars are angels of the seven congregations, and the seven lampstands are the seven congregations.”
QUENYA: About the secret of the seven stars that you saw in my right hand, and of the seven lampstands: the seven stars are angels of the seven congregations, and the seven lampstands are the seven congregations.”

ENGLISH: I know your deeds and your labour and your faithfulness, and that you cannot bear evil people, and that you have tried who say that they are apostles, but are not, and you have found that they lie.
QUENYA: I know your deeds and your labour and your faithfulness, and that you cannot bear evil people, and that you have tried who say that they are apostles, but are not, and you have found that they lie.

ENGLISH: Also endurance you have, and you have been steadfast for my name, and you have not become tired.
QUENYA: Also endurance you have, and you have been steadfast for my name, and you have not become tired.

ENGLISH: And yet I have against you that you have forsaken the love that you had in the beginning.
QUENYA: And yet I have against you that you have forsaken the love that you had in the beginning.

ENGLISH: Therefore remember which you have fallen from, and find repentance and do the first deeds. If you do not, I am coming to you, and I shall take away your lampstand from its place, if you do not find repentance.
QUENYA: Therefore remember which you have fallen from, and find repentance and do the first deeds. If you do not, I am coming to you, and I shall take away your lampstand from its place, if you do not find repentance.

ENGLISH: And yet you do have this, that you hate the doings of the Nicolaitans, which also I loathe.
QUENYA: And yet you do have this, that you hate the doings of the Nicolaitans, which also I loathe.

ENGLISH: May who has an ear hear which the Spirit says to the congregations: To who conquers I shall give to eat from the Tree of Life, which is in the garden of God.
QUENYA: May who has an ear hear which the Spirit says to the congregations: To who conquers I shall give to eat from the Tree of Life, which is in the garden of God.

ENGLISH: And to the angel of the congregation in Smyrna write: This says the First and the Last, who was dead and came back to life:
QUENYA: And to the angel of the congregation in Smyrna write: This says the First and the Last, who was dead and came back to life:

ENGLISH: I know your tribulation and your poverty – but you are rich – and the mockery of who call themselves Jews, and yet they are not, but are Satan’s synagogue:
QUENYA: I know your tribulation and your poverty – but you are rich – and the mockery of who call themselves Jews, and yet they are not, but are Satan’s synagogue:

ENGLISH: Do not fear the torments that now will come upon you. Look! The Devil will now throw some among you into prison, for you to be wholly tested, and that you will have tribulation for ten days . Be faithful until death, and I shall give you the crown of life.
QUENYA: Do not fear the torments that now will come upon you. Look! The Devil will now throw some among you into prison, for you to be wholly tested, and that you will have tribulation for ten days . Be faithful until death, and I shall give you the crown of life.

ENGLISH: May he who has an hear which the Spirit says to the congregations: who has victory will by no means be harmed by the second death.
QUENYA: May he who has an hear which the Spirit says to the congregations: who has victory will by no means be harmed by the second death.

ENGLISH: And to the angel of the congregation in Pergamum write: This says who has the sharp longsword having two edges:
QUENYA: And to the angel of the congregation in Pergamum write: This says who has the sharp longsword having two edges:

ENGLISH: I know where you dwell, in which the throne of Satan is; and yet you are keeping my name. You did not deny your faith in me also in the days of Antipas my faithful witness, who was slain by your side, where Satan dwells.
QUENYA: I know where you dwell, in which the throne of Satan is; and yet you are keeping my name. You did not deny your faith in me also in the days of Antipas my faithful witness, who was slain by your side, where Satan dwells.

ENGLISH: And yet I hold a few matters against you, that there are with you who keep the teaching of Balaam, who taught Balak to put a stumbling block before the sons of Israel, and so they ate that were sacrificed to idols and fornicated.
QUENYA: And yet I hold a few matters against you, that there are with you who keep the teaching of Balaam, who taught Balak to put a stumbling block before the sons of Israel, and so they ate that were sacrificed to idols and fornicated.

ENGLISH: Thus there are also with you who keep the teaching of the Nicolaitans.
QUENYA: Thus there are also with you who keep the teaching of the Nicolaitans.

ENGLISH: Therefore find repentance! If you do not, I will come to you soon, and I will fight against them with the sword of my mouth.
QUENYA: Therefore find repentance! If you do not, I will come to you soon, and I will fight against them with the sword of my mouth.

ENGLISH: May he who has an ear hear which the Spirit says to the congregations: To who conquers I shall give of the hidden mán , and I shall give him a white stone, and on the stone a new name not known to anyone, except who receives it.
QUENYA: May he who has an ear hear which the Spirit says to the congregations: To who conquers I shall give of the hidden mán , and I shall give him a white stone, and on the stone a new name not known to anyone, except who receives it.

ENGLISH: And to the angel of the congregation in Thyatira write: This says the Son of God, who has his eyes like a fiery flame, and his feet like copper:
QUENYA: And to the angel of the congregation in Thyatira write: This says the Son of God, who has his eyes like a fiery flame, and his feet like copper:

ENGLISH: I know your deeds and your love and your faith and your service and your faithfulness, and your newest deeds are more than the first ones.
QUENYA: I know your deeds and your love and your faith and your service and your faithfulness, and your newest deeds are more than the first ones.

ENGLISH: And yet I hold against you that you do not stop the woman Jezebel, who calls herself a prophet , and teaches and causes to err my servants into doing fornication, and to eat things sacrificed to idols.
QUENYA: And yet I hold against you that you do not stop the woman Jezebel, who calls herself a prophet , and teaches and causes to err my servants into doing fornication, and to eat things sacrificed to idols.

ENGLISH: I gave her time to find repentance, but she does not want to seek repentance for her fornication.
QUENYA: I gave her time to find repentance, but she does not want to seek repentance for her fornication.

ENGLISH: Look! I throw her into bed, and who fornicate with her into a great tribulation, if they do find repentance concerning her deeds.
QUENYA: Look! I throw her into bed, and who fornicate with her into a great tribulation, if they do find repentance concerning her deeds.

ENGLISH: And her children I will let death take, to cause all the congregations to know that I am who searches minds and hearts, and I shall give to everyone among you according as your deeds are.
QUENYA: And her children I will let death take, to cause all the congregations to know that I am who searches minds and hearts, and I shall give to everyone among you according as your deeds are.

ENGLISH: But I say to the others among you in Thyatira, to all who do not have this teaching and have not known ‘the deep things of Satan’, as they say: I do not put on you other burden.
QUENYA: But I say to the others among you in Thyatira, to all who do not have this teaching and have not known ‘the deep things of Satan’, as they say: I do not put on you other burden.

ENGLISH: And yet, keep what you have, until I shall come.
QUENYA: And yet, keep what you have, until I shall come.

ENGLISH: And who conquers and heeds my deeds until the end, to him I shall give him lordship over nations.
QUENYA: And who conquers and heeds my deeds until the end, to him I shall give him lordship over nations.

ENGLISH: He shall rule them with an iron rod, for them to be broken into pieces like earthen vessels – the same lordship that I have received from my Father.
QUENYA: He shall rule them with an iron rod, for them to be broken into pieces like earthen vessels – the same lordship that I have received from my Father.

ENGLISH: And I shall give him the morning star.
QUENYA: And I shall give him the morning star.

ENGLISH: May who has an ear hear what the Spirit says to the congregations!”
QUENYA: May who has an ear hear what the Spirit says to the congregations!”

ENGLISH: Become awake and strengthen the things remaining that are near to death, for I have not found your deeds completed before my God.
QUENYA: Become awake and strengthen the things remaining that are near to death, for I have not found your deeds completed before my God.

ENGLISH: Therefore recall how you have received and how you heard, and keep it, and find repentance! If you do not become awake, I shall come like a thief, and you will by no means know the hour in which I shall come upon you.
QUENYA: Therefore recall how you have received and how you heard, and keep it, and find repentance! If you do not become awake, I shall come like a thief, and you will by no means know the hour in which I shall come upon you.

ENGLISH: And yet you do have a few names in Sardis who have not stained their clothes, and they shall walk with me in white, for they are worthy.
QUENYA: And yet you do have a few names in Sardis who have not stained their clothes, and they shall walk with me in white, for they are worthy.

ENGLISH: who has victory will thus be clad in white clothes, and I shall by no means take away his name from the Book of Life, but I shall make known that his name is acknowledged by me before my Father and before his angels .
QUENYA: who has victory will thus be clad in white clothes, and I shall by no means take away his name from the Book of Life, but I shall make known that his name is acknowledged by me before my Father and before his angels .

ENGLISH: May who has a hear which the Spirit says to the congregations!
QUENYA: May who has a hear which the Spirit says to the congregations!

ENGLISH: And to the angel of the congregation in Philadelphia write: This says who is holy, who is true, who has David’s key, who opens in a manner stopping anyone from closing, and closes in a manner stopping anyone from opening:
QUENYA: And to the angel of the congregation in Philadelphia write: This says who is holy, who is true, who has David’s key, who opens in a manner stopping anyone from closing, and closes in a manner stopping anyone from opening:

ENGLISH: I know your deeds – behold! I have placed before you an opened door, which nobody can close. For you have little might, but you kept my word and did not deny my name.
QUENYA: I know your deeds – behold! I have placed before you an opened door, which nobody can close. For you have little might, but you kept my word and did not deny my name.

ENGLISH: Behold! The people from the synagogue of Satan, who call themselves Jews and yet are not, but are lying – behold! I shall cause them to come and fall down before your feet, and I shall make them know that I have loved you.
QUENYA: Behold! The people from the synagogue of Satan, who call themselves Jews and yet are not, but are lying – behold! I shall cause them to come and fall down before your feet, and I shall make them know that I have loved you.

ENGLISH: Because you have kept the word of my faithfulness, I too will keep you from the hour of trial that shall come upon the whole world, to test those who dwell on earth.
QUENYA: Because you have kept the word of my faithfulness, I too will keep you from the hour of trial that shall come upon the whole world, to test those who dwell on earth.

ENGLISH: I will come soon. Keep which you have, to stop anyone from taking your crown.
QUENYA: I will come soon. Keep which you have, to stop anyone from taking your crown.

ENGLISH: who conquers I shall make a pillar in the temple of my God, and by no means will he ever go out, and I will write upon him the name of my God and the name of the city of my God, the new Jerusalem that comes down from heaven from my God, and also my own new name.
QUENYA: who conquers I shall make a pillar in the temple of my God, and by no means will he ever go out, and I will write upon him the name of my God and the name of the city of my God, the new Jerusalem that comes down from heaven from my God, and also my own new name.

ENGLISH: May who has an ear hear which the Spirit says to the congregations!
QUENYA: May who has an ear hear which the Spirit says to the congregations!

ENGLISH: And to the angel of the congregation in Laodicea write: Thus says the Amen, the faithful and true Witness, Beginning of creation of God:
QUENYA: And to the angel of the congregation in Laodicea write: Thus says the Amen, the faithful and true Witness, Beginning of creation of God:

ENGLISH: I know your deeds, that you are not cold or hot. Would that you were cold or hot!
QUENYA: I know your deeds, that you are not cold or hot. Would that you were cold or hot!

ENGLISH: Therefore, since you are lukewarm, and not hot or cold, I shall vomit you out of my mouth.
QUENYA: Therefore, since you are lukewarm, and not hot or cold, I shall vomit you out of my mouth.

ENGLISH: Since you say: “I am rich, I am wealthy; I have need of nothing” – but you do not know that you are miserable and lamentable and destitute and blind and naked –
QUENYA: Since you say: “I am rich, I am wealthy; I have need of nothing” – but you do not know that you are miserable and lamentable and destitute and blind and naked –

ENGLISH: I say to you that you do well if you buy from me gold purified by fire, for you to be rich, and white garments, for you to be clad and to stop the humiliation of your nakedness from being shown, and salve to put on your eyes, for you to see.
QUENYA: I say to you that you do well if you buy from me gold purified by fire, for you to be rich, and white garments, for you to be clad and to stop the humiliation of your nakedness from being shown, and salve to put on your eyes, for you to see.

ENGLISH: To all that I love I give rebuke and chastisement. Therefore behave sincerely, and find repentance!
QUENYA: To all that I love I give rebuke and chastisement. Therefore behave sincerely, and find repentance!

ENGLISH: Behold! I am standing before the door, knocking. If anyone hears my voice and opens the door, I shall come into his house, and I shall eat the evening meal with him and he with me.
QUENYA: Behold! I am standing before the door, knocking. If anyone hears my voice and opens the door, I shall come into his house, and I shall eat the evening meal with him and he with me.

ENGLISH: To who conquers I shall give to sit down with me on my throne, like I conquered and sat down with my Father on his throne.
QUENYA: To who conquers I shall give to sit down with me on my throne, like I conquered and sat down with my Father on his throne.

ENGLISH: May who has an ear hear which the Spirit says to the congregations!”
QUENYA: May who has an ear hear which the Spirit says to the congregations!”

ENGLISH: After this I saw, and behold! a door opened in heaven. And the first voice that I heard speak with me was like the sound of a trumpet, and it said: “Come up hither, and I shall show you that will soon happen.”
QUENYA: After this I saw, and behold! a door opened in heaven. And the first voice that I heard speak with me was like the sound of a trumpet, and it said: “Come up hither, and I shall show you that will soon happen.”

ENGLISH: In the same moment I came under the power of the Spirit, and behold! there was a throne in heaven, and One sat on the throne.
QUENYA: In the same moment I came under the power of the Spirit, and behold! there was a throne in heaven, and One sat on the throne.

ENGLISH: The appearance of who is sitting there is like jasper and carneol, and around the throne there is a rainbow, like an emerald in appearance.
QUENYA: The appearance of who is sitting there is like jasper and carneol, and around the throne there is a rainbow, like an emerald in appearance.

ENGLISH: And around the throne there are four twenty thrones, and on the thrones are sitting four twenty elders having white raiments, and thrones of gold on their head.
QUENYA: And around the throne there are four twenty thrones, and on the thrones are sitting four twenty elders having white raiments, and thrones of gold on their head.

ENGLISH: And out of the throne are coming flashes and voices and thunders, and there are seven lamps burning before the throne, which are the seven spirits of God.
QUENYA: And out of the throne are coming flashes and voices and thunders, and there are seven lamps burning before the throne, which are the seven spirits of God.

ENGLISH: And before the throne there is that seems like a lake of glass.
QUENYA: And before the throne there is that seems like a lake of glass.

ENGLISH: In the middle where the throne stands, around the throne are four living creatures , full of eyes before and behind:
QUENYA: In the middle where the throne stands, around the throne are four living creatures , full of eyes before and behind:

ENGLISH: the first living creature is like a lion, the second like an ox, the third has a face like a man’s, and the fourth is like a flying eagle.
QUENYA: the first living creature is like a lion, the second like an ox, the third has a face like a man’s, and the fourth is like a flying eagle.

ENGLISH: Every one of the four living creatures had six wings, and each living creature is full of eyes around his entire body and inside . Rest they do not have, at day and and night saying: “Holy, holy, holy is the Lord God Almighty, who is and who was and who shall come!”
QUENYA: Every one of the four living creatures had six wings, and each living creature is full of eyes around his entire body and inside . Rest they do not have, at day and and night saying: “Holy, holy, holy is the Lord God Almighty, who is and who was and who shall come!”

ENGLISH: And every time that the living creatures give glory and praise and thank to who is sitting on the throne, who lives forever and ever,
QUENYA: And every time that the living creatures give glory and praise and thank to who is sitting on the throne, who lives forever and ever,

ENGLISH: the four twenty elders fall down before who is sitting on the throne and worship who lives forever and ever, and they throw their crones before the throne, saying:
QUENYA: the four twenty elders fall down before who is sitting on the throne and worship who lives forever and ever, and they throw their crones before the throne, saying:

ENGLISH: “You are worthy, our Lord and our God, of receiving the glory and the honor and the power, for you created all things, and by your will they existed and were created.”
QUENYA: “You are worthy, our Lord and our God, of receiving the glory and the honor and the power, for you created all things, and by your will they existed and were created.”

ENGLISH: And I saw in the right hand of who sat on the throne a book written on the inside and on the outside, sealed with seven seals.
QUENYA: And I saw in the right hand of who sat on the throne a book written on the inside and on the outside, sealed with seven seals.

ENGLISH: And I saw a strong angel who cried out with a mighty voice: “Who is worthy of opening the book and of breaking its seals?”
QUENYA: And I saw a strong angel who cried out with a mighty voice: “Who is worthy of opening the book and of breaking its seals?”

ENGLISH: But nobody in heaven or on earth or under earth might open the book or look into it.
QUENYA: But nobody in heaven or on earth or under earth might open the book or look into it.

ENGLISH: And I was overcome by a great wailing, for nobody was found worthy of opening the book or of looking into it.
QUENYA: And I was overcome by a great wailing, for nobody was found worthy of opening the book or of looking into it.

ENGLISH: But one of the elders says to me: “Do not be wailing! Look! The Lion who is of the tribe of Judah, David’s root, has conquered and may open the book and its seven seals.”
QUENYA: But one of the elders says to me: “Do not be wailing! Look! The Lion who is of the tribe of Judah, David’s root, has conquered and may open the book and its seven seals.”

ENGLISH: And I saw standing in midst of the throne and the four living creatures, and in midst of the elders, a lamb that had the appearance of being slain , having seven horns and seven eyes, which are God’s seven spirits, the ones sent into the entire earth.
QUENYA: And I saw standing in midst of the throne and the four living creatures, and in midst of the elders, a lamb that had the appearance of being slain , having seven horns and seven eyes, which are God’s seven spirits, the ones sent into the entire earth.

ENGLISH: And it went and took the book out of the right hand of who sat on the throne.
QUENYA: And it went and took the book out of the right hand of who sat on the throne.

ENGLISH: And when it took the book, the four living creatures and the four twenty elders fell down before the Lamb, every one having a harp and bowls of gold that were full of incense – which is the prayers of the holy ones.
QUENYA: And when it took the book, the four living creatures and the four twenty elders fell down before the Lamb, every one having a harp and bowls of gold that were full of incense – which is the prayers of the holy ones.

ENGLISH: And they sing a new song, saying: “You are worthy of taking the book and of opening its seals, for you were slain, and with your blood you have redeemed people for God out of every tribe and tongue and nation.
QUENYA: And they sing a new song, saying: “You are worthy of taking the book and of opening its seals, for you were slain, and with your blood you have redeemed people for God out of every tribe and tongue and nation.

ENGLISH: You have made them a kingdom and priests for our God, and they shall rule on earth.”
QUENYA: You have made them a kingdom and priests for our God, and they shall rule on earth.”

ENGLISH: And I saw, and I heard a voice of numerous angels around the throne and the living creatures and the elders, and their number was like myriads of myriads and thousands of thousands,
QUENYA: And I saw, and I heard a voice of numerous angels around the throne and the living creatures and the elders, and their number was like myriads of myriads and thousands of thousands,

ENGLISH: saying with a mighty voice: “The Lamb that was slain is worthy of receiving the power and wealth and wisdom and strength and honor and glory and blessing.”
QUENYA: saying with a mighty voice: “The Lamb that was slain is worthy of receiving the power and wealth and wisdom and strength and honor and glory and blessing.”

ENGLISH: And every creature that exists in heaven and earth and under earth and in the sea, and all the things in them, I heard say: “To who is sitting on the throne and to the Lamb be the blessing and the honor and the might forever and ever.”
QUENYA: And every creature that exists in heaven and earth and under earth and in the sea, and all the things in them, I heard say: “To who is sitting on the throne and to the Lamb be the blessing and the honor and the might forever and ever.”

ENGLISH: And the four living creatures said: “So be it!”, and the elders fell down and worshiped.
QUENYA: And the four living creatures said: “So be it!”, and the elders fell down and worshiped.

ENGLISH: And I saw when the Lamb opened one of the seven seals, and I heard one of the four living creatures say with a voice like thunders: “Come!”
QUENYA: And I saw when the Lamb opened one of the seven seals, and I heard one of the four living creatures say with a voice like thunders: “Come!”

ENGLISH: And I saw, and look! a white horse, and who sat upon it had a bow; and a crown was given to him, and he went forth conquering and to conquer.
QUENYA: And I saw, and look! a white horse, and who sat upon it had a bow; and a crown was given to him, and he went forth conquering and to conquer.

ENGLISH: And when he opened the second seal, I heard the second living creature say: “Come!”
QUENYA: And when he opened the second seal, I heard the second living creature say: “Come!”

ENGLISH: And another came out, a fiery-red horse; and to who sat on it was given to take peace away from earth, for them to slay one another; and a huge sword was given to him.
QUENYA: And another came out, a fiery-red horse; and to who sat on it was given to take peace away from earth, for them to slay one another; and a huge sword was given to him.

ENGLISH: And when he opened the third seal, I heard the third living creature say: “Come!” And I saw, and look! a black horse, and who sat on it had a pair of scales in his hands.
QUENYA: And when he opened the third seal, I heard the third living creature say: “Come!” And I saw, and look! a black horse, and who sat on it had a pair of scales in his hands.

ENGLISH: And I heard that was like a voice in the midst of the four living creatures say: “A measure of grain for a day’s wages, and three measures of barley for a day’s wages, and do not harm the oil and the wine.”
QUENYA: And I heard that was like a voice in the midst of the four living creatures say: “A measure of grain for a day’s wages, and three measures of barley for a day’s wages, and do not harm the oil and the wine.”

ENGLISH: And when he opened the fourth seal, I heard the voice of the fourth living creature say: “Come!”
QUENYA: And when he opened the fourth seal, I heard the voice of the fourth living creature say: “Come!”

ENGLISH: And I saw, and behold! a pale horse, and who sat on it had the name Death, and Mandos followed him. And authority was given them over one fourth of earth, in order to slay with a long sword and with famine and with deadly disease and with the beasts of earth.
QUENYA: And I saw, and behold! a pale horse, and who sat on it had the name Death, and Mandos followed him. And authority was given them over one fourth of earth, in order to slay with a long sword and with famine and with deadly disease and with the beasts of earth.

ENGLISH: And when he opened the fifth seal, I saw under the altar the souls of those slain by reason of God’s word and of the witness that they had.
QUENYA: And when he opened the fifth seal, I saw under the altar the souls of those slain by reason of God’s word and of the witness that they had.

ENGLISH: And they cried with a mighty voice, saying: “How long, holy and true Sovereign, will you not pass judgment and avenge our blood on those who dwell on earth?”
QUENYA: And they cried with a mighty voice, saying: “How long, holy and true Sovereign, will you not pass judgment and avenge our blood on those who dwell on earth?”

ENGLISH: And a white robe was given to everyone among them; and was said to them that it was necessary for them to be still for yet a little while, until the number was filled also of their fellow servants and of their brothers, who were going to be slain like themselves.
QUENYA: And a white robe was given to everyone among them; and was said to them that it was necessary for them to be still for yet a little while, until the number was filled also of their fellow servants and of their brothers, who were going to be slain like themselves.

ENGLISH: And I saw when he opened the sixth seal, and a great earthquake occurred, and the Sun changed black like a sack-cloth of hair, and the whole Moon became like blood,
QUENYA: And I saw when he opened the sixth seal, and a great earthquake occurred, and the Sun changed black like a sack-cloth of hair, and the whole Moon became like blood,

ENGLISH: and the stars of heaven fell to earth, as when the unripe figs fall from a fig-tree being shaken by a mighty wind.
QUENYA: and the stars of heaven fell to earth, as when the unripe figs fall from a fig-tree being shaken by a mighty wind.

ENGLISH: And heaven passed away like a scroll being rolled up, and every mountain and island moved from where they were.
QUENYA: And heaven passed away like a scroll being rolled up, and every mountain and island moved from where they were.

ENGLISH: And the kings of earth and the mighty and the commanders and the rich and the strong and every thrall and every free person hid themselves in the caves and among the rocks of the mountains.
QUENYA: And the kings of earth and the mighty and the commanders and the rich and the strong and every thrall and every free person hid themselves in the caves and among the rocks of the mountains.

ENGLISH: And they are saying to the mountains and to the rocks: “Fall upon us and hide us from who is sitting on the throne and from the wrath of the Lamb,
QUENYA: And they are saying to the mountains and to the rocks: “Fall upon us and hide us from who is sitting on the throne and from the wrath of the Lamb,

ENGLISH: for the great day of their wrath has come, and who can stand?”
QUENYA: for the great day of their wrath has come, and who can stand?”

ENGLISH: Thereafter I saw four angels standing in the four corners of earth, holding back the four winds of earth, to stop wind from blowing on earth or at sea or at every tree.
QUENYA: Thereafter I saw four angels standing in the four corners of earth, holding back the four winds of earth, to stop wind from blowing on earth or at sea or at every tree.

ENGLISH: And I saw another angel rising from the sunrise, having the seal of the Living God, and he cried with a mighty voice to the four angels to whom was permitted to harm earth and sea,
QUENYA: And I saw another angel rising from the sunrise, having the seal of the Living God, and he cried with a mighty voice to the four angels to whom was permitted to harm earth and sea,

ENGLISH: saying: “Do not harm earth or sea or the trees, before we have sealed the servants of our God on their foreheads.”
QUENYA: saying: “Do not harm earth or sea or the trees, before we have sealed the servants of our God on their foreheads.”

ENGLISH: And I heard the number of the sealed ones, four and forty and a hundred thousands , sealed out of every tribe of the Children of Israel:
QUENYA: And I heard the number of the sealed ones, four and forty and a hundred thousands , sealed out of every tribe of the Children of Israel:

ENGLISH: Out of the tribe of Juda twelve thousand sealed ones, out of the tribe of Reuben twelve thousands, out of the tribe of Gad twelve thousands,
QUENYA: Out of the tribe of Juda twelve thousand sealed ones, out of the tribe of Reuben twelve thousands, out of the tribe of Gad twelve thousands,

ENGLISH: out of the tribe of Asher twelve thousands, out of the tribe of Naphtali twelve thousands, out of the tribe of Manasseh twelve thousands;
QUENYA: out of the tribe of Asher twelve thousands, out of the tribe of Naphtali twelve thousands, out of the tribe of Manasseh twelve thousands;

ENGLISH: out of the tribe of Simeon twelve thousands, out of the tribe of Levi twelve thousands, out of the tribe of Issacar twelve thousands,
QUENYA: out of the tribe of Simeon twelve thousands, out of the tribe of Levi twelve thousands, out of the tribe of Issacar twelve thousands,

ENGLISH: out of the tribe of Zebulun twelve thousands, out of the tribe of Joseph twelve thousands, out of the tribe of Benjamin twelve thousand sealed ones.
QUENYA: out of the tribe of Zebulun twelve thousands, out of the tribe of Joseph twelve thousands, out of the tribe of Benjamin twelve thousand sealed ones.

ENGLISH: After this I saw, and behold! a huge crowd that nobody knows how to count, out of all nations and tribes and peoples and tongues, standing before the throne and before the Lamb, clad in white robes; and there were branches of palms in their hands.
QUENYA: After this I saw, and behold! a huge crowd that nobody knows how to count, out of all nations and tribes and peoples and tongues, standing before the throne and before the Lamb, clad in white robes; and there were branches of palms in their hands.

ENGLISH: And they cried with a mighty voice, saying: “Salvation comes from our God, who is sitting on the throne, and from the Lamb.”
QUENYA: And they cried with a mighty voice, saying: “Salvation comes from our God, who is sitting on the throne, and from the Lamb.”

ENGLISH: And all the angels stood around the throne and the elders and the four living creatures, and they fell upon their face before the throne and worshiped God,
QUENYA: And all the angels stood around the throne and the elders and the four living creatures, and they fell upon their face before the throne and worshiped God,

ENGLISH: saying: “Amen! The blessing and the glory and the wisdom and the thanksgiving and the honor and the power be to our God, forever and ever! Amen!”
QUENYA: saying: “Amen! The blessing and the glory and the wisdom and the thanksgiving and the honor and the power be to our God, forever and ever! Amen!”

ENGLISH: Then one of the elders spoke to me, saying: “Who are these people that are clad in white robes, and where have they come from?”
QUENYA: Then one of the elders spoke to me, saying: “Who are these people that are clad in white robes, and where have they come from?”

ENGLISH: I said to him: “My lord, you know!” And he told me: “These people are who come out of the great tribulation, and they have cleansed their robes and made them white in the blood of the Lamb.
QUENYA: I said to him: “My lord, you know!” And he told me: “These people are who come out of the great tribulation, and they have cleansed their robes and made them white in the blood of the Lamb.

ENGLISH: Therefore they are before the throne of God, and they serve him day and night in his temple, and who is sitting on the throne shall place his tent over them.
QUENYA: Therefore they are before the throne of God, and they serve him day and night in his temple, and who is sitting on the throne shall place his tent over them.

ENGLISH: They shall not be hungry or thirsty again; the sun shall not strike them, or burning heat.
QUENYA: They shall not be hungry or thirsty again; the sun shall not strike them, or burning heat.

ENGLISH: For the Lamb in midst of the throne shall be their shepherd, and he shall lead them to springs of living water, and God shall take away every tear from their eyes.”
QUENYA: For the Lamb in midst of the throne shall be their shepherd, and he shall lead them to springs of living water, and God shall take away every tear from their eyes.”

ENGLISH: When the Lamb opened the seventh seal there was silence in heaven around half of an hour.
QUENYA: When the Lamb opened the seventh seal there was silence in heaven around half of an hour.

ENGLISH: Then I saw the seven angels that stand before God, and seven trumpets were given to them.
QUENYA: Then I saw the seven angels that stand before God, and seven trumpets were given to them.

ENGLISH: And another angel, who had an incense vessel of gold, came and stood beside the altar, and a great measure of incense was given to him, to make a blend with the prayers of all the holy ones, on the altar of gold before the throne.
QUENYA: And another angel, who had an incense vessel of gold, came and stood beside the altar, and a great measure of incense was given to him, to make a blend with the prayers of all the holy ones, on the altar of gold before the throne.

ENGLISH: And from the angel’s hand, before God, the smoke from the incense rose with the prayers of the holy ones.
QUENYA: And from the angel’s hand, before God, the smoke from the incense rose with the prayers of the holy ones.
