ENGLISH: Then the angel took the incense vessel and filled it with fire from the altar. And he threw it upon earth; and there were thunders and voices and flashes and a shaking of the earth.
QUENYA: Then the angel took the incense vessel and filled it with fire from the altar. And he threw it upon earth; and there were thunders and voices and flashes and a shaking of the earth.

ENGLISH: Now the seven angels that had the seven trumpets prepared to sound them.
QUENYA: Now the seven angels that had the seven trumpets prepared to sound them.

ENGLISH: The first angel sounded his trumpet, and there followed hail and fire in a blend with blood, and it was hurled to earth; and a third of earth was burnt, and a third of the trees were burned, and all green grass was burnt.
QUENYA: The first angel sounded his trumpet, and there followed hail and fire in a blend with blood, and it was hurled to earth; and a third of earth was burnt, and a third of the trees were burned, and all green grass was burnt.

ENGLISH: The second angel sounded his trumpet, and a thing like a great mountain, burning with fire, was thrown into sea;
QUENYA: The second angel sounded his trumpet, and a thing like a great mountain, burning with fire, was thrown into sea;

ENGLISH: and a third of sea became blood, a third part of the creatures in sea died, the that had life; and a third of the ships were destroyed .
QUENYA: and a third of sea became blood, a third part of the creatures in sea died, the that had life; and a third of the ships were destroyed .

ENGLISH: The third angel sounded his trumpet, and a huge star fell from heaven, burning like a lamp, and it fell on the third part of the rivers and springs of water.
QUENYA: The third angel sounded his trumpet, and a huge star fell from heaven, burning like a lamp, and it fell on the third part of the rivers and springs of water.

ENGLISH: The star’s name is Wormwood. A third part of the waters became wormwood, and many people died of the water, for it was made bitter.
QUENYA: The star’s name is Wormwood. A third part of the waters became wormwood, and many people died of the water, for it was made bitter.

ENGLISH: The fourth angel sounded his trumpet, and a third part of Sun was smitten , and a third of Moon, and a third of the stars. Thus a third of their light became darkness; was no light for a third of the day, or for a third of the night.
QUENYA: The fourth angel sounded his trumpet, and a third part of Sun was smitten , and a third of Moon, and a third of the stars. Thus a third of their light became darkness; was no light for a third of the day, or for a third of the night.

ENGLISH: And I saw, and I heard an eagle cry with a mighty voice while it was flying in the midst of heaven: “Woe, woe, woe for those who dwell on earth, because of the remaining trumpet-sounds from the three angels that will now sound their trumpet!”
QUENYA: And I saw, and I heard an eagle cry with a mighty voice while it was flying in the midst of heaven: “Woe, woe, woe for those who dwell on earth, because of the remaining trumpet-sounds from the three angels that will now sound their trumpet!”

ENGLISH: And the fifth angel sounded his trumpet, and I saw a star fallen from heaven to earth, and the key to the pit of the abyss was given to him.
QUENYA: And the fifth angel sounded his trumpet, and I saw a star fallen from heaven to earth, and the key to the pit of the abyss was given to him.

ENGLISH: He opened the pit of the abyss, and smoke rose as from a huge oven, and sun and the air became dark by the smoke from the pit.
QUENYA: He opened the pit of the abyss, and smoke rose as from a huge oven, and sun and the air became dark by the smoke from the pit.

ENGLISH: And out of the smoke came grasshoppers upon earth, and authority like the authority of the scorpions on earth was given to them.
QUENYA: And out of the smoke came grasshoppers upon earth, and authority like the authority of the scorpions on earth was given to them.

ENGLISH: was said to them that they were not to harm the grass of earth or every green plant or a single tree, but only the people not having the seal of God on their forehead.
QUENYA: was said to them that they were not to harm the grass of earth or every green plant or a single tree, but only the people not having the seal of God on their forehead.

ENGLISH: was given to them to torment them for five months, but not to kill them, and their torment was like the torment of a scorpion, when it stings somebody.
QUENYA: was given to them to torment them for five months, but not to kill them, and their torment was like the torment of a scorpion, when it stings somebody.

ENGLISH: And in those days people shall seek death, but they shall by no means find it; they shall long to die, but death shall escape from them.
QUENYA: And in those days people shall seek death, but they shall by no means find it; they shall long to die, but death shall escape from them.

ENGLISH: The appearance of the grasshoppers was like horses prepared for war; and on their head were that looked like crowns of gold; their face was like men’s face,
QUENYA: The appearance of the grasshoppers was like horses prepared for war; and on their head were that looked like crowns of gold; their face was like men’s face,

ENGLISH: and they had hair like women’s hair, and their teeth were like lions’ teeth;
QUENYA: and they had hair like women’s hair, and their teeth were like lions’ teeth;

ENGLISH: they had breast-plates like breast-plates of iron, and the sound of their wings was like the sound of many chariots with horses that are running to war.
QUENYA: they had breast-plates like breast-plates of iron, and the sound of their wings was like the sound of many chariots with horses that are running to war.

ENGLISH: They had a tail with a sting like scorpions have, and their power to harm people for five months is in their tails.
QUENYA: They had a tail with a sting like scorpions have, and their power to harm people for five months is in their tails.

ENGLISH: As a king ruling them is to them the angel of the abyss; his name in Hebrew is Abaddon, and in Greek he has the name Apollyon.
QUENYA: As a king ruling them is to them the angel of the abyss; his name in Hebrew is Abaddon, and in Greek he has the name Apollyon.

ENGLISH: The first woe has passed. Behold! will come two woes more after this.
QUENYA: The first woe has passed. Behold! will come two woes more after this.

ENGLISH: The sixth angel sounded his trumpet, and I heard a voice from the four horns on the altar of gold before God
QUENYA: The sixth angel sounded his trumpet, and I heard a voice from the four horns on the altar of gold before God

ENGLISH: say to the sixth angel, he who had the trumpet: “Release the four angels that are bound by the great river Euphrates!”
QUENYA: say to the sixth angel, he who had the trumpet: “Release the four angels that are bound by the great river Euphrates!”

ENGLISH: And the four angels were released, who were prepared for the hour, for the day, for the month and for the year, to kill one third of Men.
QUENYA: And the four angels were released, who were prepared for the hour, for the day, for the month and for the year, to kill one third of Men.

ENGLISH: The number of the riders in their army was twenty thousands times ten thousand; I heard their number.
QUENYA: The number of the riders in their army was twenty thousands times ten thousand; I heard their number.

ENGLISH: And so I beheld the horses and those who sat on them in the vision: the riders bore breastplates with the colour of fire and of sapphire and of sulphur, and the head of the horses was like the head of lions, and fire and smoke and sulphur went out of their mouth.
QUENYA: And so I beheld the horses and those who sat on them in the vision: the riders bore breastplates with the colour of fire and of sapphire and of sulphur, and the head of the horses was like the head of lions, and fire and smoke and sulphur went out of their mouth.

ENGLISH: By these three plagues one third of Men was slain, by the fire and by the smoke and by the sulphur that went out of their mouth.
QUENYA: By these three plagues one third of Men was slain, by the fire and by the smoke and by the sulphur that went out of their mouth.

ENGLISH: For the power of the horses is in their mouth and in their tail; their tail was like a serpent, having a head, and by means of it they wound .
QUENYA: For the power of the horses is in their mouth and in their tail; their tail was like a serpent, having a head, and by means of it they wound .

ENGLISH: The remaining part of Men, who were not killed by these plagues, did not find repentance concerning the deeds of their hands or cease to worship demons and idols of gold and of silver and of copper and of stone and of wood, that cannot see or hear or walk;
QUENYA: The remaining part of Men, who were not killed by these plagues, did not find repentance concerning the deeds of their hands or cease to worship demons and idols of gold and of silver and of copper and of stone and of wood, that cannot see or hear or walk;

ENGLISH: furthermore; they did not find repentance concerning their murders or their sorcery or their fornication or their thefts.
QUENYA: furthermore; they did not find repentance concerning their murders or their sorcery or their fornication or their thefts.

ENGLISH: And I saw another strong angel come down from heaven, clad in a cloud and having a rainbow over his head, and his face is like Sun, and his feet like pillars of fire.
QUENYA: And I saw another strong angel come down from heaven, clad in a cloud and having a rainbow over his head, and his face is like Sun, and his feet like pillars of fire.

ENGLISH: He had a small, opened book. And he placed his right foot on sea and the left on land,
QUENYA: He had a small, opened book. And he placed his right foot on sea and the left on land,

ENGLISH: and he cried with a mighty voice, as when a lion is roaring. And when he cried , the seven thunders spoke with their own voices.
QUENYA: and he cried with a mighty voice, as when a lion is roaring. And when he cried , the seven thunders spoke with their own voices.

ENGLISH: After the seven thunders spoke, I was going to write, but I heard a voice from heaven that said: “Seal up which the seven thunders have said and do not write them!”
QUENYA: After the seven thunders spoke, I was going to write, but I heard a voice from heaven that said: “Seal up which the seven thunders have said and do not write them!”

ENGLISH: And the angel that I saw standing on sea and land raised his hand to heaven and gave his oath by who lives forever and ever, who created heaven and which is in it, and earth and which is in it, and sea and which is in it: “The time has passed!
QUENYA: And the angel that I saw standing on sea and land raised his hand to heaven and gave his oath by who lives forever and ever, who created heaven and which is in it, and earth and which is in it, and sea and which is in it: “The time has passed!

ENGLISH: But in the days in which the seventh angel shall be heard – when he shall sound his trumpet – then God’s mystery shall be completed, according to the gospel that he gave to his servants, the prophets.”
QUENYA: But in the days in which the seventh angel shall be heard – when he shall sound his trumpet – then God’s mystery shall be completed, according to the gospel that he gave to his servants, the prophets.”

ENGLISH: And the voice that I heard from heaven spoke to me again, saying: “Go, and take the book that is opened from the hand of the angel who is standing on sea and land.”
QUENYA: And the voice that I heard from heaven spoke to me again, saying: “Go, and take the book that is opened from the hand of the angel who is standing on sea and land.”

ENGLISH: And I went to the angel and said to him that he was to give me the little book; and he said to me: “Take it and eat ; it shall be bitter to your belly, but sweet as honey in your mouth.”
QUENYA: And I went to the angel and said to him that he was to give me the little book; and he said to me: “Take it and eat ; it shall be bitter to your belly, but sweet as honey in your mouth.”

ENGLISH: And I took the little book from the angel’s hand and ate it; it was sweet as honey in my mouth, but after I ate it my belly became bitter.
QUENYA: And I took the little book from the angel’s hand and ate it; it was sweet as honey in my mouth, but after I ate it my belly became bitter.

ENGLISH: And was said to me: “You must again speak like a prophet, about peoples and nations and tongues, and many kings.”
QUENYA: And was said to me: “You must again speak like a prophet, about peoples and nations and tongues, and many kings.”

ENGLISH: And a rod like a staff was given to me, and one said: “Rise and measure the temple of God and the altar and those who worship in it,
QUENYA: And a rod like a staff was given to me, and one said: “Rise and measure the temple of God and the altar and those who worship in it,

ENGLISH: but leave out the temple’s outer courtyard and do not measure it, for it is given to nations , and they shall trample upon the holy city for two and forty months.
QUENYA: but leave out the temple’s outer courtyard and do not measure it, for it is given to nations , and they shall trample upon the holy city for two and forty months.

ENGLISH: And I shall let my two witnesses speak as prophets for sixty and twelve hundred days, clad in cloth of hair.
QUENYA: And I shall let my two witnesses speak as prophets for sixty and twelve hundred days, clad in cloth of hair.

ENGLISH: They are the two olive trees and the two lampstands that stand before the Lord of earth.
QUENYA: They are the two olive trees and the two lampstands that stand before the Lord of earth.

ENGLISH: If anyone wants to harm them, fire goes out of their mouth and devours their enemies, and if anyone wants to harm them, he shall be slain thus.
QUENYA: If anyone wants to harm them, fire goes out of their mouth and devours their enemies, and if anyone wants to harm them, he shall be slain thus.

ENGLISH: They have the authority to shut up heaven, to stop rain from falling in the days that they are speaking as prophets, and they have authority over the waters, in order to turn them into blood and to strike earth with every plague, whenever they wish.
QUENYA: They have the authority to shut up heaven, to stop rain from falling in the days that they are speaking as prophets, and they have authority over the waters, in order to turn them into blood and to strike earth with every plague, whenever they wish.

ENGLISH: And when they have completed their witnessing, the beast that rises from the abyss will make war upon them , and it will conquer them and slay them.
QUENYA: And when they have completed their witnessing, the beast that rises from the abyss will make war upon them , and it will conquer them and slay them.

ENGLISH: And their corpses shall lie in the broad street in the huge city that in the manner of spirit is called Sodom and Egypt, where also their Lord was crucified.
QUENYA: And their corpses shall lie in the broad street in the huge city that in the manner of spirit is called Sodom and Egypt, where also their Lord was crucified.

ENGLISH: Persons of the peoples and tribes and tongues and nations shall look upon their corpses for three and a half days, and they do not permit that their corpses are put in a grave.
QUENYA: Persons of the peoples and tribes and tongues and nations shall look upon their corpses for three and a half days, and they do not permit that their corpses are put in a grave.

ENGLISH: And those who dwell on earth have joy concerning them and are happy, and they shall send gifts to one another, for these two prophets tormented those who dwell on earth.
QUENYA: And those who dwell on earth have joy concerning them and are happy, and they shall send gifts to one another, for these two prophets tormented those who dwell on earth.

ENGLISH: But after the three and a half days life-spirit from God came into them, and they rose on their feet, and great fear fell upon those who looked at them.
QUENYA: But after the three and a half days life-spirit from God came into them, and they rose on their feet, and great fear fell upon those who looked at them.

ENGLISH: And they heard a mighty voice out of heaven say to them: “Come up here!” And they went into heaven in the cloud, and their enemies saw them.
QUENYA: And they heard a mighty voice out of heaven say to them: “Come up here!” And they went into heaven in the cloud, and their enemies saw them.

ENGLISH: And at that time was a great earthquake, and one tenth of the city collapsed, and seven thousand people were killed by the earthquake, and who remained were terrified and gave glory to God of heaven.
QUENYA: And at that time was a great earthquake, and one tenth of the city collapsed, and seven thousand people were killed by the earthquake, and who remained were terrified and gave glory to God of heaven.

ENGLISH: The second woe has passed. Behold! the third woe shall come soon.
QUENYA: The second woe has passed. Behold! the third woe shall come soon.

ENGLISH: And the seventh angel sounded his trumpet. And mighty voices were being heard in heaven, saying: “The kingdom of the world has become our Lord’s and his Christ’s, and he will rule forever and ever.”
QUENYA: And the seventh angel sounded his trumpet. And mighty voices were being heard in heaven, saying: “The kingdom of the world has become our Lord’s and his Christ’s, and he will rule forever and ever.”

ENGLISH: And the four and twenty elders that sat before God on their thrones fell on their faces and worshipped God,
QUENYA: And the four and twenty elders that sat before God on their thrones fell on their faces and worshipped God,

ENGLISH: saying: “We thank you, Lord God, the Almighty, who is and who was, for you have taken your great power and rule as king.
QUENYA: saying: “We thank you, Lord God, the Almighty, who is and who was, for you have taken your great power and rule as king.

ENGLISH: But nations were wrathful, and your own wrath came, and the time for judging the dead and for giving reward to your servants the prophets, and to the holy ones and to those who fear your name, to the small and the great, and for destroying who destroy earth.
QUENYA: But nations were wrathful, and your own wrath came, and the time for judging the dead and for giving reward to your servants the prophets, and to the holy ones and to those who fear your name, to the small and the great, and for destroying who destroy earth.

ENGLISH: And God’s temple that is in heaven was opened, and the ark of his covenant was being seen in his temple. And were flashes and voices and thunders and an earthquake and great hail.
QUENYA: And God’s temple that is in heaven was opened, and the ark of his covenant was being seen in his temple. And were flashes and voices and thunders and an earthquake and great hail.

ENGLISH: And a great sign was being seen in heaven, a woman clad in Sun, and Moon was under her feet, and on her head was a crown of twelve stars.
QUENYA: And a great sign was being seen in heaven, a woman clad in Sun, and Moon was under her feet, and on her head was a crown of twelve stars.

ENGLISH: She was heavy with child, and she cries in her pains and in her agony to bear .
QUENYA: She was heavy with child, and she cries in her pains and in her agony to bear .

ENGLISH: And another sign was seen in heaven, and behold! a huge fiery-red dragon, having seven heads and ten horns, and on its heads it has seven diadems.
QUENYA: And another sign was seen in heaven, and behold! a huge fiery-red dragon, having seven heads and ten horns, and on its heads it has seven diadems.

ENGLISH: Its tail drags one third of the stars of heaven, and it throws them down upon earth. And the dragon stood before the woman who was ready to bear , for it to devour her child when she would bear .
QUENYA: Its tail drags one third of the stars of heaven, and it throws them down upon earth. And the dragon stood before the woman who was ready to bear , for it to devour her child when she would bear .

ENGLISH: And she bore a son, a boy, who shall rule all nations with an iron rod. And her child was seized away to God and to his throne.
QUENYA: And she bore a son, a boy, who shall rule all nations with an iron rod. And her child was seized away to God and to his throne.

ENGLISH: And the woman escaped into the wilderness, where she has a place prepared by God, for them to give her her needs there for sixty and twelve hundred days.
QUENYA: And the woman escaped into the wilderness, where she has a place prepared by God, for them to give her her needs there for sixty and twelve hundred days.

ENGLISH: And a war occurred in heaven: Michael and his angels fought against the dragon, and the dragon and its angels fought,
QUENYA: And a war occurred in heaven: Michael and his angels fought against the dragon, and the dragon and its angels fought,

ENGLISH: but he did not conquer, and for them no place was found in heaven anymore .
QUENYA: but he did not conquer, and for them no place was found in heaven anymore .

ENGLISH: And the great dragon was thrown down, the ancient serpent, who is called the Devil and Satan, who causes entire world to err – he was thrown down upon earth, and his angels were thrown down with him.
QUENYA: And the great dragon was thrown down, the ancient serpent, who is called the Devil and Satan, who causes entire world to err – he was thrown down upon earth, and his angels were thrown down with him.

ENGLISH: And I heard a mighty voice from heaven say: “Now the salvation and the power and the kingdom of our God and the lordship of his Christ have come, for the accuser of our brothers is thrown down, who spoke evil against them day and night before our God!
QUENYA: And I heard a mighty voice from heaven say: “Now the salvation and the power and the kingdom of our God and the lordship of his Christ have come, for the accuser of our brothers is thrown down, who spoke evil against them day and night before our God!

ENGLISH: And they conquered him by the blood of the Lamb and by the word of their witness, and their lives were not to them so dear that they refused to see death.
QUENYA: And they conquered him by the blood of the Lamb and by the word of their witness, and their lives were not to them so dear that they refused to see death.

ENGLISH: Therefore be happy, o heaven and who dwell in it! Alas for earth and sea! For the Devil has come down to you , having great wrath, knowing that his time is short.”
QUENYA: Therefore be happy, o heaven and who dwell in it! Alas for earth and sea! For the Devil has come down to you , having great wrath, knowing that his time is short.”

ENGLISH: And when the dragon saw that it was thrown down upon earth, it pursued the woman who bore the boy.
QUENYA: And when the dragon saw that it was thrown down upon earth, it pursued the woman who bore the boy.

ENGLISH: But the two wings of the great eagle were given to the woman, for her to be able to fly into the wilderness to her place; there she receives her needs for a time and times and half of a time, far from the face of the serpent.
QUENYA: But the two wings of the great eagle were given to the woman, for her to be able to fly into the wilderness to her place; there she receives her needs for a time and times and half of a time, far from the face of the serpent.

ENGLISH: And the serpent sent water like a river from its mouth after the woman, to carry her away by the river.
QUENYA: And the serpent sent water like a river from its mouth after the woman, to carry her away by the river.

ENGLISH: But earth helped the woman, and earth opened its mouth and swallowed the river that the dragon vomited from its mouth.
QUENYA: But earth helped the woman, and earth opened its mouth and swallowed the river that the dragon vomited from its mouth.

ENGLISH: And the dragon was wroth with the woman, and went away to make war on who remained of her seed, who keep the commandments of God and have the witness about Jesus.
QUENYA: And the dragon was wroth with the woman, and went away to make war on who remained of her seed, who keep the commandments of God and have the witness about Jesus.

ENGLISH: And it stood on the sand by sea.And I saw a beast rising out of sea, having ten horns and seven heads, and on its horns it has ten diadems, and on its heads are names of mockery of God.
QUENYA: And it stood on the sand by sea.And I saw a beast rising out of sea, having ten horns and seven heads, and on its horns it has ten diadems, and on its heads are names of mockery of God.

ENGLISH: And the beast that I saw was like a leopard, but its feet were like a bear’s feet, and its mouth was like a lion’s mouth. And the dragon gave it its power and its throne and great authority .
QUENYA: And the beast that I saw was like a leopard, but its feet were like a bear’s feet, and its mouth was like a lion’s mouth. And the dragon gave it its power and its throne and great authority .

ENGLISH: The appearance of one of its heads was as if it was wounded to death, but its death-wound was healed, and the entire earth followed the beast in wonder.
QUENYA: The appearance of one of its heads was as if it was wounded to death, but its death-wound was healed, and the entire earth followed the beast in wonder.

ENGLISH: And they worshiped the dragon since it gave the authority to the beast, and they worshiped the beast saying: “Who is like the beast, and who can fight against it?”
QUENYA: And they worshiped the dragon since it gave the authority to the beast, and they worshiped the beast saying: “Who is like the beast, and who can fight against it?”

ENGLISH: And was given to it a mouth speaking great things and mockeries against God, and it received authority to do what it wants for two and forty months.
QUENYA: And was given to it a mouth speaking great things and mockeries against God, and it received authority to do what it wants for two and forty months.

ENGLISH: And it opened its mouth in mockeries against God, to speak mockeries against his name and against his abode, and of who dwell in heaven.
QUENYA: And it opened its mouth in mockeries against God, to speak mockeries against his name and against his abode, and of who dwell in heaven.

ENGLISH: And was given to it to make war on the holy ones and to conquer them, and it received authority over every tribe and people and tongue and nation.
QUENYA: And was given to it to make war on the holy ones and to conquer them, and it received authority over every tribe and people and tongue and nation.

ENGLISH: And all who dwell on earth will worship it, they whose names are not written in the Book of Live of the Lamb who was killed from the founding of the world.
QUENYA: And all who dwell on earth will worship it, they whose names are not written in the Book of Live of the Lamb who was killed from the founding of the world.

ENGLISH: Anyone having an ear, may he hear!
QUENYA: Anyone having an ear, may he hear!

ENGLISH: If a person is for prison, into prison he goes. If a person will kill by sword, he will be killed by sword . Here is need of faithfulness and of faith of the holy ones.
QUENYA: If a person is for prison, into prison he goes. If a person will kill by sword, he will be killed by sword . Here is need of faithfulness and of faith of the holy ones.

ENGLISH: And I saw another beast, that rose out of earth, and it had two horns like a lamb, but it spoke as a dragon.
QUENYA: And I saw another beast, that rose out of earth, and it had two horns like a lamb, but it spoke as a dragon.

ENGLISH: It wields the entire authority of the first beast before its eyes. It causes earth and who dwell in it to worship the first beast, whose death-wound was healed.
QUENYA: It wields the entire authority of the first beast before its eyes. It causes earth and who dwell in it to worship the first beast, whose death-wound was healed.

ENGLISH: And it does great signs; also fire it causes to fall down out of heaven to earth before eyes of men.
QUENYA: And it does great signs; also fire it causes to fall down out of heaven to earth before eyes of men.

ENGLISH: And it causes to err who dwell on earth, by the signs that it is allowed to do before the eyes of the beast. It says to who dwell on earth that they are to make image of the beast, who received the wound of a sword and came back to life.
QUENYA: And it causes to err who dwell on earth, by the signs that it is allowed to do before the eyes of the beast. It says to who dwell on earth that they are to make image of the beast, who received the wound of a sword and came back to life.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, was granted to it to give breath to the beast’s image, causing the beast's image to talk, and also causing to be slain all who refused to worship the beast's image.
QUENYA: Furthermore, was granted to it to give breath to the beast’s image, causing the beast's image to talk, and also causing to be slain all who refused to worship the beast's image.

ENGLISH: And it causes all, the small and the great, the rich and the poor, and the free and the thralls, to receive a mark on their right hand or on their forehead,
QUENYA: And it causes all, the small and the great, the rich and the poor, and the free and the thralls, to receive a mark on their right hand or on their forehead,

ENGLISH: and nobody was allowed to trade or sell except a person having the mark – the beast’s name or the number of its name.
QUENYA: and nobody was allowed to trade or sell except a person having the mark – the beast’s name or the number of its name.

ENGLISH: Here is need of wisdom: Let the intelligent one calculate the beast’s number, for it is a man’s number, and its name is six and sixty and six hundreds .
QUENYA: Here is need of wisdom: Let the intelligent one calculate the beast’s number, for it is a man’s number, and its name is six and sixty and six hundreds .

ENGLISH: And I saw, and behold! the Lamb was standing on Mount Sion, and with it four and forty and a hundred thousands that have his name and the name of his Father written on their forehead.
QUENYA: And I saw, and behold! the Lamb was standing on Mount Sion, and with it four and forty and a hundred thousands that have his name and the name of his Father written on their forehead.

ENGLISH: And I heard a sound out of heaven, like the sound of many waters and like the sound of great thunder; and the sound that I heard was like harpers that play on their harps.
QUENYA: And I heard a sound out of heaven, like the sound of many waters and like the sound of great thunder; and the sound that I heard was like harpers that play on their harps.

ENGLISH: And they sing a new song before the throne and before the four living creatures and the elders, and it was not possible for anyone to learn that song except the four and forty and hundred thousands, that are bought from earth.
QUENYA: And they sing a new song before the throne and before the four living creatures and the elders, and it was not possible for anyone to learn that song except the four and forty and hundred thousands, that are bought from earth.

ENGLISH: They are that have not defiled themselves with women, for they are virgins. They are that follow the Lamb every place it goes. They are bought from among Men as first fruits for God and for the Lamb,
QUENYA: They are that have not defiled themselves with women, for they are virgins. They are that follow the Lamb every place it goes. They are bought from among Men as first fruits for God and for the Lamb,

ENGLISH: and lie was not found in their mouth; they are without spot.
QUENYA: and lie was not found in their mouth; they are without spot.

ENGLISH: And I saw another angel fly in midst of heaven, having had an eternal gospel, for him to make it known to who dwell on earth, and to every nation and tribe and tongue and people,
QUENYA: And I saw another angel fly in midst of heaven, having had an eternal gospel, for him to make it known to who dwell on earth, and to every nation and tribe and tongue and people,

ENGLISH: saying with a mighty voice: “Fear God and give him glory, for the hour of his judgment has come, and worship who made heaven and earth and sea and springs of water.”
QUENYA: saying with a mighty voice: “Fear God and give him glory, for the hour of his judgment has come, and worship who made heaven and earth and sea and springs of water.”

ENGLISH: And another, a second angel, followed saying: “She has fallen! Babylon the Great has fallen, who caused all nations to drink of the wine of the wrath of her fornication!”
QUENYA: And another, a second angel, followed saying: “She has fallen! Babylon the Great has fallen, who caused all nations to drink of the wine of the wrath of her fornication!”

ENGLISH: And another angel, a third, followed them, saying in a mighty voice: “If anyone worships the beast and its image, and receives the mark on his forehead or on his hand,
QUENYA: And another angel, a third, followed them, saying in a mighty voice: “If anyone worships the beast and its image, and receives the mark on his forehead or on his hand,

ENGLISH: he shall also drink from the vine of the anger of God that is being poured pure into the cup of his wrath, and he shall be tormented by fire and sulfur before the holy angels and before the Lamb.
QUENYA: he shall also drink from the vine of the anger of God that is being poured pure into the cup of his wrath, and he shall be tormented by fire and sulfur before the holy angels and before the Lamb.

ENGLISH: And the smoke of their torment rises up forever and ever, and day and night they do not have rest, those who worship the beast and its image, and anyone who receives the mark of its name.
QUENYA: And the smoke of their torment rises up forever and ever, and day and night they do not have rest, those who worship the beast and its image, and anyone who receives the mark of its name.

ENGLISH: Here is need of the faithfulness of the holy ones, those who keep the commandments of God and the faith of Jesus.”
QUENYA: Here is need of the faithfulness of the holy ones, those who keep the commandments of God and the faith of Jesus.”

ENGLISH: And I heard a voice from heaven say: “Write: Happy are the dead who die in the Lord, from now . Yes, the Spirit says, let them rest from their labors, for their deeds follow them.”
QUENYA: And I heard a voice from heaven say: “Write: Happy are the dead who die in the Lord, from now . Yes, the Spirit says, let them rest from their labors, for their deeds follow them.”

ENGLISH: And I saw, and behold: a white cloud, and on the cloud a person like a son of man sat, having a crown of gold on his head and a sharp sickle in his hand.
QUENYA: And I saw, and behold: a white cloud, and on the cloud a person like a son of man sat, having a crown of gold on his head and a sharp sickle in his hand.

ENGLISH: And another angel went forth from the temple, crying with a mighty voice to who sat on the cloud: “Put your sickle in and reap, for the time of harvest has come, and the harvest of earth is ripe.”
QUENYA: And another angel went forth from the temple, crying with a mighty voice to who sat on the cloud: “Put your sickle in and reap, for the time of harvest has come, and the harvest of earth is ripe.”

ENGLISH: And who sat on the cloud sent his sickle over the earth, and earth was reaped.
QUENYA: And who sat on the cloud sent his sickle over the earth, and earth was reaped.

ENGLISH: And another angel went forth from the temple that is in heaven, he too having a sharp sickle.
QUENYA: And another angel went forth from the temple that is in heaven, he too having a sharp sickle.

ENGLISH: And another angel went forth from the altar, who had authority over the fire. And he cried with a mighty voice to who had the sharp sickle, saying: “Put in your sharp sickle and gather the clusters of the wine of earth, for its grapes are ripe.”
QUENYA: And another angel went forth from the altar, who had authority over the fire. And he cried with a mighty voice to who had the sharp sickle, saying: “Put in your sharp sickle and gather the clusters of the wine of earth, for its grapes are ripe.”

ENGLISH: And the angel used his sickle on earth and gathered the fruit of the vine of earth, and threw it into the great wine-press of the wrath of God.
QUENYA: And the angel used his sickle on earth and gathered the fruit of the vine of earth, and threw it into the great wine-press of the wrath of God.

ENGLISH: Outside of the city the wine-press was trodden, and blood poured from the wine-press as high as the bridles of the horses, six hundred and a thousand furlongs away from it.
QUENYA: Outside of the city the wine-press was trodden, and blood poured from the wine-press as high as the bridles of the horses, six hundred and a thousand furlongs away from it.

ENGLISH: And I saw another sign in heaven, great and wonderful: seven angels having seven plagues, the last ones, for by them God’s anger is finished.
QUENYA: And I saw another sign in heaven, great and wonderful: seven angels having seven plagues, the last ones, for by them God’s anger is finished.

ENGLISH: And I saw a thing like a lake of glass, in a blend with fire, and who had conquered the beast and its image and the number of its name stood next to the lake of glass, having harps of God.
QUENYA: And I saw a thing like a lake of glass, in a blend with fire, and who had conquered the beast and its image and the number of its name stood next to the lake of glass, having harps of God.

ENGLISH: And they sing the song of Moses, God’s servant, and the song of the Lamb, saying: “Great and wonderful are your works , Lord God, the Almighty. Just and true are your ways, King of nations.
QUENYA: And they sing the song of Moses, God’s servant, and the song of the Lamb, saying: “Great and wonderful are your works , Lord God, the Almighty. Just and true are your ways, King of nations.

ENGLISH: Who shall not fear you, o Lord, and give glory to your name? For you alone are holy. For all nations shall come and worship before you, for your righteous judgments have been revealed.”
QUENYA: Who shall not fear you, o Lord, and give glory to your name? For you alone are holy. For all nations shall come and worship before you, for your righteous judgments have been revealed.”

ENGLISH: And after these things I saw, and the sanctuary of the Tent of Witness was opened in heaven,
QUENYA: And after these things I saw, and the sanctuary of the Tent of Witness was opened in heaven,

ENGLISH: and the seven angels having the seven plagues went forth from the sanctuary, clad in pure, bright linen and bound about their breast with golden girdles.
QUENYA: and the seven angels having the seven plagues went forth from the sanctuary, clad in pure, bright linen and bound about their breast with golden girdles.

ENGLISH: And one of the four living cratures gave the seven angels seven bowls of gold that were full of the anger of God, who lives forever and ever.
QUENYA: And one of the four living cratures gave the seven angels seven bowls of gold that were full of the anger of God, who lives forever and ever.

ENGLISH: And the sanctuary was filled with smoke, by the glory of God and by his power, and nobody could come into the sanctuary until the seven plagues of the seven angels were finished.
QUENYA: And the sanctuary was filled with smoke, by the glory of God and by his power, and nobody could come into the sanctuary until the seven plagues of the seven angels were finished.

ENGLISH: And I heard a mighty voice from the sanctuary say to the seven angels: “Go and pour the seven bowls of the anger of God into earth!”
QUENYA: And I heard a mighty voice from the sanctuary say to the seven angels: “Go and pour the seven bowls of the anger of God into earth!”

ENGLISH: And the first went forth and poured his bowl into earth. And came foul and painful ulcers on the men who had the mark of the beast and worshipped its image.
QUENYA: And the first went forth and poured his bowl into earth. And came foul and painful ulcers on the men who had the mark of the beast and worshipped its image.

ENGLISH: And the second poured his bowl into earth. And it became blood like the blood from a corpse, and every living creature died, who were on earth.
QUENYA: And the second poured his bowl into earth. And it became blood like the blood from a corpse, and every living creature died, who were on earth.

ENGLISH: And the third poured his bowl into the rivers and the springs of water, and they became blood.
QUENYA: And the third poured his bowl into the rivers and the springs of water, and they became blood.

ENGLISH: And I heard the angel of the waters say: “Righteous you are, who is and who was, the holy , for so you have passed judgment!
QUENYA: And I heard the angel of the waters say: “Righteous you are, who is and who was, the holy , for so you have passed judgment!

ENGLISH: For they poured blood of holy ones and of prophets, and you have given them blood to drink. They are worthy!”
QUENYA: For they poured blood of holy ones and of prophets, and you have given them blood to drink. They are worthy!”

ENGLISH: And I heard the altar say: “Yes, Lord God, the Almighty, true and righteous are your judgments!”
QUENYA: And I heard the altar say: “Yes, Lord God, the Almighty, true and righteous are your judgments!”

ENGLISH: And the fourth poured his bowl upon the Sun, and was given to the Sun to burn men with fire.
QUENYA: And the fourth poured his bowl upon the Sun, and was given to the Sun to burn men with fire.

ENGLISH: And men were being burned by a great heat, but they cursed the name of God, who had authority over these plagues, and they did not find repentance so as to give him glory.
QUENYA: And men were being burned by a great heat, but they cursed the name of God, who had authority over these plagues, and they did not find repentance so as to give him glory.

ENGLISH: And the fifth poured his bowl upon the throne of the beast. And its kingdom was in darkness, and people gnawed their tongue because of the pain,
QUENYA: And the fifth poured his bowl upon the throne of the beast. And its kingdom was in darkness, and people gnawed their tongue because of the pain,

ENGLISH: but God of heaven they cursed because of their pain and their ulcers, and they did not find repentance concerning their works.
QUENYA: but God of heaven they cursed because of their pain and their ulcers, and they did not find repentance concerning their works.

ENGLISH: And the sixth poured his bowl into the great river Euphrates , and its water became dry, to prepare the way for the kings from sunrise.
QUENYA: And the sixth poured his bowl into the great river Euphrates , and its water became dry, to prepare the way for the kings from sunrise.

ENGLISH: And I saw three unclean spirits, like frogs, who came out of the mouth of the dragon, and out of the mouth of the beast, and out of the mouth of the false prophet.
QUENYA: And I saw three unclean spirits, like frogs, who came out of the mouth of the dragon, and out of the mouth of the beast, and out of the mouth of the false prophet.

ENGLISH: For they are demon spirits that do signs, and they go forth to the kings of all the world, to gather them for the war on the great day of God Almighty.
QUENYA: For they are demon spirits that do signs, and they go forth to the kings of all the world, to gather them for the war on the great day of God Almighty.

ENGLISH: – “Behold! I am coming like a thief! Happy is who keeps himself awake and keeps his garments, that he will not have to walk naked and people will see his humiliation!” –
QUENYA: – “Behold! I am coming like a thief! Happy is who keeps himself awake and keeps his garments, that he will not have to walk naked and people will see his humiliation!” –

ENGLISH: And they gathered them in the place which in Hebrew is called Armageddon.
QUENYA: And they gathered them in the place which in Hebrew is called Armageddon.

ENGLISH: And the seventh poured his bowl upon air. And a mighty voice came forth from the sanctuary, from the altar, saying: “It has happened!”
QUENYA: And the seventh poured his bowl upon air. And a mighty voice came forth from the sanctuary, from the altar, saying: “It has happened!”

ENGLISH: And there were flashes and voices and thunders, and there occurred an earthquake so great that has not occurred a thing of this sort while men have been dwelling on earth – an earthquake so extensive or so great.
QUENYA: And there were flashes and voices and thunders, and there occurred an earthquake so great that has not occurred a thing of this sort while men have been dwelling on earth – an earthquake so extensive or so great.

ENGLISH: And the huge city was split into three parts, and the cities of the nations collapsed. God recalled Babylon the Great, and he gave her the cup of the anger of his wrath.
QUENYA: And the huge city was split into three parts, and the cities of the nations collapsed. God recalled Babylon the Great, and he gave her the cup of the anger of his wrath.

ENGLISH: Every island fled, and mountains were no more found.
QUENYA: Every island fled, and mountains were no more found.

ENGLISH: Stones of hail, great as talents, fell down from heaven upon the people. But people cursed God because of the plague of hail, for the plague was terrible.
QUENYA: Stones of hail, great as talents, fell down from heaven upon the people. But people cursed God because of the plague of hail, for the plague was terrible.

ENGLISH: And one of the seven angels that had the seven bowls came and spoke with me, saying: “Come, I will show you the judging of the great harlot who is sitting over many waters,
QUENYA: And one of the seven angels that had the seven bowls came and spoke with me, saying: “Come, I will show you the judging of the great harlot who is sitting over many waters,

ENGLISH: with whom kings of earth committed fornication, and those who dwell on earth became drunk by the wine of her fornication.”
QUENYA: with whom kings of earth committed fornication, and those who dwell on earth became drunk by the wine of her fornication.”

ENGLISH: And he carried me away in the Spirit into the wilderness. And I saw a woman sitting on a scarlet beast full of names that were a mockery of God, having seven heads and ten horns.
QUENYA: And he carried me away in the Spirit into the wilderness. And I saw a woman sitting on a scarlet beast full of names that were a mockery of God, having seven heads and ten horns.

ENGLISH: The woman's garments were purple and scarlet, and she was adorned with gold and jewels and pearls, and in her hand she had a cup of gold full of foul things and the unclean things of her fornication.
QUENYA: The woman's garments were purple and scarlet, and she was adorned with gold and jewels and pearls, and in her hand she had a cup of gold full of foul things and the unclean things of her fornication.

ENGLISH: And on her forehead was written a name, a mystery: “Babylon the Great, mother of harlots and the foul things of earth.”
QUENYA: And on her forehead was written a name, a mystery: “Babylon the Great, mother of harlots and the foul things of earth.”

ENGLISH: And I saw that the woman was drunk with the blood of the holy ones and with the blood of the witnesses of Jesus.
QUENYA: And I saw that the woman was drunk with the blood of the holy ones and with the blood of the witnesses of Jesus.

ENGLISH: When I saw her I was in great wonder.
QUENYA: When I saw her I was in great wonder.

ENGLISH: But the angel said to me: “How that you are in wonder? I will tell you the mystery of the woman and of the beast carrying her and having the seven horns and the ten heads:
QUENYA: But the angel said to me: “How that you are in wonder? I will tell you the mystery of the woman and of the beast carrying her and having the seven horns and the ten heads:

ENGLISH: The beast that you saw was, but is not, and yet it shall rise out of the abyss and go away into destruction. Those who dwell on earth, whose names are not written in the Book of Life from the foundation of the world, will be filled with wonder when they see how the beast was, but is not, and yet shall come again.
QUENYA: The beast that you saw was, but is not, and yet it shall rise out of the abyss and go away into destruction. Those who dwell on earth, whose names are not written in the Book of Life from the foundation of the world, will be filled with wonder when they see how the beast was, but is not, and yet shall come again.

ENGLISH: Here is need for intelligence with wisdom: The seven heads are seven mountains, and on them the woman is sitting.
QUENYA: Here is need for intelligence with wisdom: The seven heads are seven mountains, and on them the woman is sitting.

ENGLISH: And there are seven kings: five have fallen, one is now, and the other still has not come, and when he shall come, he will remain a short time.
QUENYA: And there are seven kings: five have fallen, one is now, and the other still has not come, and when he shall come, he will remain a short time.

ENGLISH: And the beast that was but is not, it is also an eighth king; he comes from the seven and goes away into destruction.
QUENYA: And the beast that was but is not, it is also an eighth king; he comes from the seven and goes away into destruction.

ENGLISH: And the ten horns that you saw are ten kings, that still have not received a kingdom, but they do indeed receive authority as kings for a single hour with the beast.
QUENYA: And the ten horns that you saw are ten kings, that still have not received a kingdom, but they do indeed receive authority as kings for a single hour with the beast.

ENGLISH: They have the same thought and give their power and their authority to the beast.
QUENYA: They have the same thought and give their power and their authority to the beast.

ENGLISH: They will fight against the Lamb, but since he is Lord of lords and King of Kings, the Lamb will conquer them, with the called and the chosen and the faithful.”
QUENYA: They will fight against the Lamb, but since he is Lord of lords and King of Kings, the Lamb will conquer them, with the called and the chosen and the faithful.”

ENGLISH: And he says to me: “The waters that you saw, on which the harlot is sitting, are peoples and throngs and nations and tongues.
QUENYA: And he says to me: “The waters that you saw, on which the harlot is sitting, are peoples and throngs and nations and tongues.

ENGLISH: And the ten horns that you saw, and the beast – they will hate the harlot and shall make her empty and naked, and her flesh they will eat, and her they will burn with fire.
QUENYA: And the ten horns that you saw, and the beast – they will hate the harlot and shall make her empty and naked, and her flesh they will eat, and her they will burn with fire.

ENGLISH: For God put in their hearts to do his will, for them to do a single thought and for them to give their kingdom to the beast, until God’s words are accomplished .
QUENYA: For God put in their hearts to do his will, for them to do a single thought and for them to give their kingdom to the beast, until God’s words are accomplished .

ENGLISH: And the woman whom you saw is the great city, that has a kingdom over the kings of earth.”
QUENYA: And the woman whom you saw is the great city, that has a kingdom over the kings of earth.”

ENGLISH: After these things I saw another angel come down from heaven, having great authority , and earth was being illuminated by his glory.
QUENYA: After these things I saw another angel come down from heaven, having great authority , and earth was being illuminated by his glory.

ENGLISH: And he cried with a strong voice: “She has fallen! Babylon the Great has fallen, and she has become a haunt of demons and a prison of every unclean bird, and a prison of every unclean and hated beast!
QUENYA: And he cried with a strong voice: “She has fallen! Babylon the Great has fallen, and she has become a haunt of demons and a prison of every unclean bird, and a prison of every unclean and hated beast!

ENGLISH: For of the wine of anger of her fornication all nations have drunk, and the kings of earth committed fornication with her, and the tradesmen of earth became rich by the power of her abundance without bonds!”
QUENYA: For of the wine of anger of her fornication all nations have drunk, and the kings of earth committed fornication with her, and the tradesmen of earth became rich by the power of her abundance without bonds!”

ENGLISH: And I heard another voice from heaven say: “Go out from her, my people, to stop yourselves from having part with her in her sins and from receiving of her plagues.
QUENYA: And I heard another voice from heaven say: “Go out from her, my people, to stop yourselves from having part with her in her sins and from receiving of her plagues.

ENGLISH: For the heap of her sins reaches to heaven, and God has recalled her unrighteous deeds.
QUENYA: For the heap of her sins reaches to heaven, and God has recalled her unrighteous deeds.

ENGLISH: Give back to her as she gave back, and do to her double of that she has done! Into the cup into which she poured , pour a double measure for her!
QUENYA: Give back to her as she gave back, and do to her double of that she has done! Into the cup into which she poured , pour a double measure for her!

ENGLISH: As she gave glory to herself and dwelt in abundance without bounds, so give her torment and grief! For in her heart she says: “I sit a queen, and my husband has not died from me, and I will not ever know grief.”
QUENYA: As she gave glory to herself and dwelt in abundance without bounds, so give her torment and grief! For in her heart she says: “I sit a queen, and my husband has not died from me, and I will not ever know grief.”

ENGLISH: Therefore her plagues will come in a single day, death and grief and hunger, and she will be burnt with fire, for strong is the Lord God who has judged her!
QUENYA: Therefore her plagues will come in a single day, death and grief and hunger, and she will be burnt with fire, for strong is the Lord God who has judged her!

ENGLISH: And the kings of earth, who committed fornication with her and dwelt with her in abundance without bonds, will be in tears and will beat themselves because of grief for her, when they look at the reek from her burning .
QUENYA: And the kings of earth, who committed fornication with her and dwelt with her in abundance without bonds, will be in tears and will beat themselves because of grief for her, when they look at the reek from her burning .

ENGLISH: They are standing far away in their fear of her torment and are saying: “Woe, woe, o great city, Babylon the strong city, for in a single hour your judgment has come!”
QUENYA: They are standing far away in their fear of her torment and are saying: “Woe, woe, o great city, Babylon the strong city, for in a single hour your judgment has come!”

ENGLISH: And the tradesmen of earth are in tears and lament her, for now there is nobody to whom they can sell their goods,
QUENYA: And the tradesmen of earth are in tears and lament her, for now there is nobody to whom they can sell their goods,

ENGLISH: goods like gold and silver and jewels and fine linen and purple and silk and scarlet, and every fragrant wood and every vessel of ivory and every vessel of most precious wood and copper and iron and marble,
QUENYA: goods like gold and silver and jewels and fine linen and purple and silk and scarlet, and every fragrant wood and every vessel of ivory and every vessel of most precious wood and copper and iron and marble,

ENGLISH: and cinnamon and amomum and frankincense and wine and olive oil and fine floor and grain and cows and sheep, and horses and wagons and slaves – living persons.
QUENYA: and cinnamon and amomum and frankincense and wine and olive oil and fine floor and grain and cows and sheep, and horses and wagons and slaves – living persons.

ENGLISH: Indeed the good fruit that was your soul's desire has passed away from you, and all the dainty things and the beautiful things are lost to you, and one will not ever find them again.
QUENYA: Indeed the good fruit that was your soul's desire has passed away from you, and all the dainty things and the beautiful things are lost to you, and one will not ever find them again.

ENGLISH: The tradesmen trading these things, who were made rich from her, will stand far away in their fear of her torment and will be in tears and shall have grief,
QUENYA: The tradesmen trading these things, who were made rich from her, will stand far away in their fear of her torment and will be in tears and shall have grief,

ENGLISH: saying: ‘Woe, woe – the great city, clad in linen and purple and scarlet, and adorned with gold and jewel and pearl,
QUENYA: saying: ‘Woe, woe – the great city, clad in linen and purple and scarlet, and adorned with gold and jewel and pearl,

ENGLISH: for in a single hour riches so great were destroyed!’
QUENYA: for in a single hour riches so great were destroyed!’

ENGLISH: And every captain and everyone who travels by ship, and mariners and all who work at sea, stood far away
QUENYA: And every captain and everyone who travels by ship, and mariners and all who work at sea, stood far away

ENGLISH: and cried when they looked at the reek from her burning and said: ‘Who among cities is like the great city?’
QUENYA: and cried when they looked at the reek from her burning and said: ‘Who among cities is like the great city?’

ENGLISH: And they threw dust upon their head and cried in tears and grief, and said: ‘Woe, woe – the great city, where all who have ships at sea became rich by her great wealth, for in a single hour she was destroyed!’
QUENYA: And they threw dust upon their head and cried in tears and grief, and said: ‘Woe, woe – the great city, where all who have ships at sea became rich by her great wealth, for in a single hour she was destroyed!’

ENGLISH: Be glad because of her, o heaven and the holy ones and the apostles and the prophets, for because of you God has pronounced judgment against her!”
QUENYA: Be glad because of her, o heaven and the holy ones and the apostles and the prophets, for because of you God has pronounced judgment against her!”

ENGLISH: And a strong angel lifted up a huge mill-stone and threw it into sea, saying: “Thus, quickly, Babylon the Great will be thrown down, and she will not ever be found again.
QUENYA: And a strong angel lifted up a huge mill-stone and threw it into sea, saying: “Thus, quickly, Babylon the Great will be thrown down, and she will not ever be found again.

ENGLISH: And the sound of harpers and singers and flutists and trumpeters will by no means be heard in you more, and craftsmen of all crafts will by no means be found in you more, and the sound from a mill-stone will by no means heard in you more,
QUENYA: And the sound of harpers and singers and flutists and trumpeters will by no means be heard in you more, and craftsmen of all crafts will by no means be found in you more, and the sound from a mill-stone will by no means heard in you more,

ENGLISH: and light of a lamp will by no means shine in you more; for your tradesmen were the prominent men of earth, and by your sorcery all nations were caused to err.
QUENYA: and light of a lamp will by no means shine in you more; for your tradesmen were the prominent men of earth, and by your sorcery all nations were caused to err.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, in her was found the blood of prophets and holy ones and of all who were killed in earth.”
QUENYA: Furthermore, in her was found the blood of prophets and holy ones and of all who were killed in earth.”

ENGLISH: After these things I heard that was like a mighty voice of a huge multitude in heaven. They said: “Hallelujah! The salvation and the glory and the power are our God’s,
QUENYA: After these things I heard that was like a mighty voice of a huge multitude in heaven. They said: “Hallelujah! The salvation and the glory and the power are our God’s,

ENGLISH: for true and just are his judgments! For he has judged the great harlot who marred the earth with her fornication, and God has avenged his servants’ blood out of her hand.
QUENYA: for true and just are his judgments! For he has judged the great harlot who marred the earth with her fornication, and God has avenged his servants’ blood out of her hand.

ENGLISH: And the second time they said: “Hallelujah! And the reek from her rises up forever and ever!”
QUENYA: And the second time they said: “Hallelujah! And the reek from her rises up forever and ever!”

ENGLISH: And the four and twenty elders and the four living creatures fell down and worshiped God who was sitting on the throne, and said: “Amen! Hallelujah!”
QUENYA: And the four and twenty elders and the four living creatures fell down and worshiped God who was sitting on the throne, and said: “Amen! Hallelujah!”

ENGLISH: And a voice came from the throne, saying: “Praise our God, all his servants who fear him, the small and the great!”
QUENYA: And a voice came from the throne, saying: “Praise our God, all his servants who fear him, the small and the great!”

ENGLISH: And I heard that was like a voice of a huge multitude and like sound of many waters and like the sound of strong thunders, saying: “Hallelujah, for the Lord our God has been made king, the Almighty!
QUENYA: And I heard that was like a voice of a huge multitude and like sound of many waters and like the sound of strong thunders, saying: “Hallelujah, for the Lord our God has been made king, the Almighty!

ENGLISH: Let us be happy and have joy, and let us give him the glory, for the wedding of the Lamb has come, and his wife has prepared herself.
QUENYA: Let us be happy and have joy, and let us give him the glory, for the wedding of the Lamb has come, and his wife has prepared herself.

ENGLISH: And was given her to be clad in bright, pure linen, for the linen is the righteous deeds of the holy ones.”
QUENYA: And was given her to be clad in bright, pure linen, for the linen is the righteous deeds of the holy ones.”

ENGLISH: And he tells me: “Write: Happy who are invited to the feast of the wedding of the Lamb!” Furthermore, he said to me: “These are the true words of God.”
QUENYA: And he tells me: “Write: Happy who are invited to the feast of the wedding of the Lamb!” Furthermore, he said to me: “These are the true words of God.”

ENGLISH: And I fell down before his feet to worship him. But he says to me: “Take heed! Do not do ! I am solely a servant with you and your brothers, who have the witness of Jesus! God you are to worship!” For the witness of Jesus is the spirit of the prophecy.
QUENYA: And I fell down before his feet to worship him. But he says to me: “Take heed! Do not do ! I am solely a servant with you and your brothers, who have the witness of Jesus! God you are to worship!” For the witness of Jesus is the spirit of the prophecy.

ENGLISH: And I saw heaven opened, and behold! a white horse. And who sat on it was called Faithful and True, and he judges and he fights in righteousness.
QUENYA: And I saw heaven opened, and behold! a white horse. And who sat on it was called Faithful and True, and he judges and he fights in righteousness.

ENGLISH: His eyes are like burning fire, and on his head are many diadems. He has a name written that nobody knows except he alone.
QUENYA: His eyes are like burning fire, and on his head are many diadems. He has a name written that nobody knows except he alone.

ENGLISH: He is clad in a cloak dipped in blood, and the name by which he is called is God’s Word.
QUENYA: He is clad in a cloak dipped in blood, and the name by which he is called is God’s Word.

ENGLISH: Heaven’s armies followed him on white horses and clad in white and pure linen.
QUENYA: Heaven’s armies followed him on white horses and clad in white and pure linen.

ENGLISH: And from his mouth goes a sharp longsword, with which he will strike nations, and he will rule them with an iron rod. He treads the wine-press of the anger of the wrath of God Almighty.
QUENYA: And from his mouth goes a sharp longsword, with which he will strike nations, and he will rule them with an iron rod. He treads the wine-press of the anger of the wrath of God Almighty.

ENGLISH: And on his cloak, on his thigh, he has a name written: King of Kings and Lord of Lords.
QUENYA: And on his cloak, on his thigh, he has a name written: King of Kings and Lord of Lords.

ENGLISH: And I saw an angel standing in the Sun, and he cried in a mighty voice and said to all birds who fly in the midst of heaven: “Come, gather for God’s great feast,
QUENYA: And I saw an angel standing in the Sun, and he cried in a mighty voice and said to all birds who fly in the midst of heaven: “Come, gather for God’s great feast,

ENGLISH: to eat flesh of kings, flesh of commanders and flesh of strong men, flesh of horses and of who sat on them, the flesh of all, of rich ones and of slaves, of small ones and great ones.
QUENYA: to eat flesh of kings, flesh of commanders and flesh of strong men, flesh of horses and of who sat on them, the flesh of all, of rich ones and of slaves, of small ones and great ones.

ENGLISH: And I saw the beast and the kings of earth and their armies gathered to make war upon who sat on the horse and upon his army.
QUENYA: And I saw the beast and the kings of earth and their armies gathered to make war upon who sat on the horse and upon his army.

ENGLISH: And the beast was seized, and with it the false prophet who did the signs before it, by which it caused to err who received the sign of the beast and worshiped its image. They were both thrown alive into the lake of fire that burns with sulphur.
QUENYA: And the beast was seized, and with it the false prophet who did the signs before it, by which it caused to err who received the sign of the beast and worshiped its image. They were both thrown alive into the lake of fire that burns with sulphur.

ENGLISH: The others were killed by the sword that went out of the mouth of who sat upon the horse, and all the birds were filled with their flesh.
QUENYA: The others were killed by the sword that went out of the mouth of who sat upon the horse, and all the birds were filled with their flesh.

ENGLISH: And I saw an angel come down out of heaven having the key to the abyss and a huge chain in his hand.
QUENYA: And I saw an angel come down out of heaven having the key to the abyss and a huge chain in his hand.

ENGLISH: And he took the dragon, the ancient serpent, who is the Devil and Satan, and bound him for a thousand years.
QUENYA: And he took the dragon, the ancient serpent, who is the Devil and Satan, and bound him for a thousand years.

ENGLISH: And he threw him into the abyss and closed it and sealed it over him, to stop him from causing nations to stray before the thousand years were passed. After that he will be freed for a short time.
QUENYA: And he threw him into the abyss and closed it and sealed it over him, to stop him from causing nations to stray before the thousand years were passed. After that he will be freed for a short time.

ENGLISH: And I saw thrones, and were those who sat down on them, and power of judgment was given to them. And I saw the souls of who were slain by axe for witnessing about Jesus and for speaking about God, and of who have not worshipped the beast or its image and have not received the sign on their forehead or their hand. They came to life and ruled with Christ for a thousand years.
QUENYA: And I saw thrones, and were those who sat down on them, and power of judgment was given to them. And I saw the souls of who were slain by axe for witnessing about Jesus and for speaking about God, and of who have not worshipped the beast or its image and have not received the sign on their forehead or their hand. They came to life and ruled with Christ for a thousand years.

ENGLISH: The others of the dead did not come to life before the thousand years were passed. This is the first resurrection.
QUENYA: The others of the dead did not come to life before the thousand years were passed. This is the first resurrection.

ENGLISH: Happy and holy is who has a part in the first resurrection. Over them the second death does not have authority, but they shall be priests of God and Christ, and they shall rule with him through the thousand years.
QUENYA: Happy and holy is who has a part in the first resurrection. Over them the second death does not have authority, but they shall be priests of God and Christ, and they shall rule with him through the thousand years.

ENGLISH: When the thousand years have passed, Satan will be freed from his prison.
QUENYA: When the thousand years have passed, Satan will be freed from his prison.

ENGLISH: He will go forth to cause to err the nations in the four corners of earth, Gog and Magog, to gather them for the war, countless like the sand of sea.
QUENYA: He will go forth to cause to err the nations in the four corners of earth, Gog and Magog, to gather them for the war, countless like the sand of sea.

ENGLISH: They went up over the broad earth and surrounded the camp of the holy ones and the beloved city. But fire came down from heaven and consumed them.
QUENYA: They went up over the broad earth and surrounded the camp of the holy ones and the beloved city. But fire came down from heaven and consumed them.

ENGLISH: And the Devil who caused them to err was thrown into the lake of fire and sulphur, where both the beast and the false prophet were, and they shall be tormented at day and at night forever.
QUENYA: And the Devil who caused them to err was thrown into the lake of fire and sulphur, where both the beast and the false prophet were, and they shall be tormented at day and at night forever.

ENGLISH: And I saw a great white throne and who sat on it. From his face earth and heaven fled away, and place was not found for them .
QUENYA: And I saw a great white throne and who sat on it. From his face earth and heaven fled away, and place was not found for them .

ENGLISH: I saw also dead, the great and the small, standing before the throne, and books were opened. Then was opened another book, which is the Book of Life. And dead were judged by the things written in the books, according to their deeds.
QUENYA: I saw also dead, the great and the small, standing before the throne, and books were opened. Then was opened another book, which is the Book of Life. And dead were judged by the things written in the books, according to their deeds.

ENGLISH: And sea gave back the dead in it, and death and Mandos gave back the dead in them, and they were judged, everyone as his deeds were.
QUENYA: And sea gave back the dead in it, and death and Mandos gave back the dead in them, and they were judged, everyone as his deeds were.

ENGLISH: And death and Mandos were thrown into the lake of fire. This is the second death: the lake of fire.
QUENYA: And death and Mandos were thrown into the lake of fire. This is the second death: the lake of fire.

ENGLISH: And if anyone was not found written in the Book of Life, he was thrown into the lake of fire.
QUENYA: And if anyone was not found written in the Book of Life, he was thrown into the lake of fire.

ENGLISH: And I saw a new heaven and a new earth, for the first heaven and the first earth were gone, and sea was no more.
QUENYA: And I saw a new heaven and a new earth, for the first heaven and the first earth were gone, and sea was no more.

ENGLISH: I saw also the holy city, New Jerusalem, coming down out of heaven, prepared as a bride adorned for her husband.
QUENYA: I saw also the holy city, New Jerusalem, coming down out of heaven, prepared as a bride adorned for her husband.

ENGLISH: And I heard a mighty voice from the throne say: “Behold! The home of God is with Men, and he shall dwell with them, and they shall be his peoples. And God himself shall be with them.
QUENYA: And I heard a mighty voice from the throne say: “Behold! The home of God is with Men, and he shall dwell with them, and they shall be his peoples. And God himself shall be with them.

ENGLISH: He will take away every tear from their eyes, and death will be no more; also grief and outcry and pain will be no more. The former things have passed away.”
QUENYA: He will take away every tear from their eyes, and death will be no more; also grief and outcry and pain will be no more. The former things have passed away.”

ENGLISH: And who sat on the throne said: “Behold! I make all things new!” And he says: “Write, for these words are faithful and true!”
QUENYA: And who sat on the throne said: “Behold! I make all things new!” And he says: “Write, for these words are faithful and true!”

ENGLISH: And he said to me: “It is done! I Tinco and Úre , the beginning and the end. To everyone who is thirsty I will give from the spring of the water of life, for nothing.
QUENYA: And he said to me: “It is done! I Tinco and Úre , the beginning and the end. To everyone who is thirsty I will give from the spring of the water of life, for nothing.

ENGLISH: Anyone who conquers shall be heir to these things; I will be his God, and he will be my son.
QUENYA: Anyone who conquers shall be heir to these things; I will be his God, and he will be my son.

ENGLISH: But the cowards and the unbelieving and the disgusting ones and the murderers and the fornicators and those who practice sorcery and worship idols, and all liars – their portion is in the lake burning with fire and sulfur. This is the second death.”
QUENYA: But the cowards and the unbelieving and the disgusting ones and the murderers and the fornicators and those who practice sorcery and worship idols, and all liars – their portion is in the lake burning with fire and sulfur. This is the second death.”

ENGLISH: One of the seven angels who had the seven bowls full of the seven last plagues came to speak with me and said: “Come! I will show you the bride, the Lamb’s wife.”
QUENYA: One of the seven angels who had the seven bowls full of the seven last plagues came to speak with me and said: “Come! I will show you the bride, the Lamb’s wife.”

ENGLISH: By spirit he carried me away to a huge and tall mountain, and he showed me the holy city Jerusalem coming down out of heaven, from God,
QUENYA: By spirit he carried me away to a huge and tall mountain, and he showed me the holy city Jerusalem coming down out of heaven, from God,

ENGLISH: and having the glory of God. Its radiance was like a most precious jewel, a jasper shining like glass.
QUENYA: and having the glory of God. Its radiance was like a most precious jewel, a jasper shining like glass.

ENGLISH: It had a huge and tall wall and twelve gates, and beside the gates twelve angels, and on the gates were written the names of the twelve tribes of the children of Israel:
QUENYA: It had a huge and tall wall and twelve gates, and beside the gates twelve angels, and on the gates were written the names of the twelve tribes of the children of Israel:

ENGLISH: three gates to East, three gates to North, three gates to south, and three gates to West.
QUENYA: three gates to East, three gates to North, three gates to south, and three gates to West.

ENGLISH: And the city wall has twelve foundation stones, and written on them were the names of the apostles of the Lamb.
QUENYA: And the city wall has twelve foundation stones, and written on them were the names of the apostles of the Lamb.

ENGLISH: And who spoke to me had as a measure a golden rod, for him to be able to measure the city and its gates and its wall.
QUENYA: And who spoke to me had as a measure a golden rod, for him to be able to measure the city and its gates and its wall.

ENGLISH: The city is a square, and it is as long as it is wide. And he measured the city with the rod, twelve thousand furlongs; its length and its width and its height are same.
QUENYA: The city is a square, and it is as long as it is wide. And he measured the city with the rod, twelve thousand furlongs; its length and its width and its height are same.

ENGLISH: He measured also its wall, a hundred and forty-four cubits, by the measure of man, and also an angel’s.
QUENYA: He measured also its wall, a hundred and forty-four cubits, by the measure of man, and also an angel’s.

ENGLISH: The wall was made of jasper, and the city was pure gold, like pure glass.
QUENYA: The wall was made of jasper, and the city was pure gold, like pure glass.

ENGLISH: The foundations of the city wall were adorned with every kind of jewels: The first foundation stone was a jasper, the second sapphire, the third agate, the fourth emerald,
QUENYA: The foundations of the city wall were adorned with every kind of jewels: The first foundation stone was a jasper, the second sapphire, the third agate, the fourth emerald,

ENGLISH: the fifth sardonyx, the sixth sardius, the seventh chrysolite, the eighth beryl, the ninth topaz, the tenth chrysoprase, the eleventh hyacinth, and the twelfth amethyst.
QUENYA: the fifth sardonyx, the sixth sardius, the seventh chrysolite, the eighth beryl, the ninth topaz, the tenth chrysoprase, the eleventh hyacinth, and the twelfth amethyst.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, the twelve gates were twelve pearls; every gate was one pearl. And the street of the city was pure gold, as transparent glass.
QUENYA: Furthermore, the twelve gates were twelve pearls; every gate was one pearl. And the street of the city was pure gold, as transparent glass.

ENGLISH: And I did not see temple in it, for the Lord God Almighty is its temple, and so is the Lamb.
QUENYA: And I did not see temple in it, for the Lord God Almighty is its temple, and so is the Lamb.

ENGLISH: The city does not have need of Sun or Moon to shine upon it, for God’s glory illuminated it, and its lamp was the Lamb.
QUENYA: The city does not have need of Sun or Moon to shine upon it, for God’s glory illuminated it, and its lamp was the Lamb.

ENGLISH: And nations shall walk by the light from the city, and the kings of earth will bring their glory into it.
QUENYA: And nations shall walk by the light from the city, and the kings of earth will bring their glory into it.

ENGLISH: And its gates will by no means be shut at day, for there will not be night there.
QUENYA: And its gates will by no means be shut at day, for there will not be night there.

ENGLISH: And they shall send the glory and honor of the nations into it.
QUENYA: And they shall send the glory and honor of the nations into it.

ENGLISH: But anything unholy and anybody who practices a disgusting thing and a lie will not come into it, but solely who are written in the book of life of the Lamb.
QUENYA: But anything unholy and anybody who practices a disgusting thing and a lie will not come into it, but solely who are written in the book of life of the Lamb.

ENGLISH: And he showed me a river of the water of life, transparent like crystal, flowing out from the throne of God and of the Lamb,
QUENYA: And he showed me a river of the water of life, transparent like crystal, flowing out from the throne of God and of the Lamb,

ENGLISH: in the midst of the broad street in the city. And to the right and to the left of the river was the Tree of Life that bears fruit twelve times, giving its fruit every month. And the leaves of the Tree were for the healing of nations.
QUENYA: in the midst of the broad street in the city. And to the right and to the left of the river was the Tree of Life that bears fruit twelve times, giving its fruit every month. And the leaves of the Tree were for the healing of nations.
