ENGLISH: will no more be a single thing that is cursed. But God’s throne and the Lamb’s will be there, and his servants will serve him.
QUENYA: will no more be a single thing that is cursed. But God’s throne and the Lamb’s will be there, and his servants will serve him.

ENGLISH: They will see his face, and his name will be on their forehead.
QUENYA: They will see his face, and his name will be on their forehead.

ENGLISH: And night will be no more, and they will not have need of light of a lamp or light of Sun, for the Lord God shall illuminate them, and they will rule forever and ever.
QUENYA: And night will be no more, and they will not have need of light of a lamp or light of Sun, for the Lord God shall illuminate them, and they will rule forever and ever.

ENGLISH: And he said to me: “These words are faithful and true. The Lord, the God of the spirits of the prophets, has sent his angel to show his servants things that soon will happen.
QUENYA: And he said to me: “These words are faithful and true. The Lord, the God of the spirits of the prophets, has sent his angel to show his servants things that soon will happen.

ENGLISH: See! I will come soon! Happy is who heeds the words of the prophecy of this book.”
QUENYA: See! I will come soon! Happy is who heeds the words of the prophecy of this book.”

ENGLISH: And I John was who heard and saw these things. And after hearing and seeing, I fell down to worship before feet of the angel who showed me these things.
QUENYA: And I John was who heard and saw these things. And after hearing and seeing, I fell down to worship before feet of the angel who showed me these things.

ENGLISH: But he says to me: “Take heed! Do not do ! I am another servant with you and your brothers who are prophets, and with who heed the words of this book! Worship God!”
QUENYA: But he says to me: “Take heed! Do not do ! I am another servant with you and your brothers who are prophets, and with who heed the words of this book! Worship God!”

ENGLISH: And he says to me: “Do not seal the words of the prophecy of this book, for the time is near.
QUENYA: And he says to me: “Do not seal the words of the prophecy of this book, for the time is near.

ENGLISH: Let who does unrighteousness, do unrighteousness still; and let the dirty one become dirty still; but let the righteous one do righteousness still, and let the holy one become holy still.
QUENYA: Let who does unrighteousness, do unrighteousness still; and let the dirty one become dirty still; but let the righteous one do righteousness still, and let the holy one become holy still.

ENGLISH: Behold! I shall come soon, and what I pay is with me, in order to give back to everyone as his work is.
QUENYA: Behold! I shall come soon, and what I pay is with me, in order to give back to everyone as his work is.

ENGLISH: I Tinco and Úre , the first and the last, the beginning and the end.
QUENYA: I Tinco and Úre , the first and the last, the beginning and the end.

ENGLISH: Happy are who wash their coats, that they may come to the Tree of Live and go into the city through the gates.
QUENYA: Happy are who wash their coats, that they may come to the Tree of Live and go into the city through the gates.

ENGLISH: On the outside are the dogs and those who do magic and the fornicators and the murderers and all who love and practice a lie.
QUENYA: On the outside are the dogs and those who do magic and the fornicators and the murderers and all who love and practice a lie.

ENGLISH: I Jesus sent my angel to witness to you about these things for the congregations. I am David’s root and seed, and the bright morning star.”
QUENYA: I Jesus sent my angel to witness to you about these things for the congregations. I am David’s root and seed, and the bright morning star.”

ENGLISH: The Spirit and the bride are saying: “Come!”And let who hears say: “Come!” And let the thirsty one come; let the one who wishes, take the water of life for nothing.
QUENYA: The Spirit and the bride are saying: “Come!”And let who hears say: “Come!” And let the thirsty one come; let the one who wishes, take the water of life for nothing.

ENGLISH: I witness to everyone who hear the words of the prophecy of this book: If anyone adds to these things, God will add to him the plagues about which is written in this book;
QUENYA: I witness to everyone who hear the words of the prophecy of this book: If anyone adds to these things, God will add to him the plagues about which is written in this book;

ENGLISH: and if anyone takes anything away from the words of the prophecy of this book, God will take away his part in the Tree of Life and the in the holy city, about which is written in this book.
QUENYA: and if anyone takes anything away from the words of the prophecy of this book, God will take away his part in the Tree of Life and the in the holy city, about which is written in this book.

ENGLISH: who bears witness about these things says: “Yes, I shall come soon!” Amen! Come, O Lord Jesus!
QUENYA: who bears witness about these things says: “Yes, I shall come soon!” Amen! Come, O Lord Jesus!

ENGLISH: May the grace of the Lord Jesus Christ be with the holy ones!
QUENYA: May the grace of the Lord Jesus Christ be with the holy ones!

ENGLISH: Paul, thrall of Jesus Christ, called to be apostle, set aside for God's gospel,
QUENYA: Paul, thrall of Jesus Christ, called to be apostle, set aside for God's gospel,

ENGLISH: of which he gave promise beforehand through his prophets in the holy scriptures,
QUENYA: of which he gave promise beforehand through his prophets in the holy scriptures,

ENGLISH: concerning his Son, who arose from David's seed by the flesh,
QUENYA: concerning his Son, who arose from David's seed by the flesh,

ENGLISH: but who was set as the mighty Son of God by the Spirit of holiness, by a raising from dead – Jesus Christ our Lord,
QUENYA: but who was set as the mighty Son of God by the Spirit of holiness, by a raising from dead – Jesus Christ our Lord,

ENGLISH: through whom we received grace and a place as apostle, to create heeding of the fath among all the nations concerning his name;
QUENYA: through whom we received grace and a place as apostle, to create heeding of the fath among all the nations concerning his name;

ENGLISH: among whom you are called ones of Jesus Christ –
QUENYA: among whom you are called ones of Jesus Christ –

ENGLISH: to all that are in Rome as God's beloved, called to be holy ones: May you have grace and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
QUENYA: to all that are in Rome as God's beloved, called to be holy ones: May you have grace and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

ENGLISH: Firstly I give thanks to my God through Jesus Christ concerning all among you, for one talks about your faith in the entire world.
QUENYA: Firstly I give thanks to my God through Jesus Christ concerning all among you, for one talks about your faith in the entire world.

ENGLISH: For God, to whom I am a servant with my spirit concerning the gospel of his Son, is my witness about how I without cease name you always in my prayers,
QUENYA: For God, to whom I am a servant with my spirit concerning the gospel of his Son, is my witness about how I without cease name you always in my prayers,

ENGLISH: petitioning that finally, it will be possible for me to come to you, by God's will.
QUENYA: petitioning that finally, it will be possible for me to come to you, by God's will.

ENGLISH: For I long to see you, to give you a gift of spirit for you to be firm,
QUENYA: For I long to see you, to give you a gift of spirit for you to be firm,

ENGLISH: or that we exchange comfort, each by the faith of the other, your faith and my faith alike.
QUENYA: or that we exchange comfort, each by the faith of the other, your faith and my faith alike.

ENGLISH: But my brothers, I do not wish that you are to lack the knowledge that I wanted to come to you on numerous occasions – but I have been hindered until know – to receive a measure of fruit also among you, as among the other non-Jews.
QUENYA: But my brothers, I do not wish that you are to lack the knowledge that I wanted to come to you on numerous occasions – but I have been hindered until know – to receive a measure of fruit also among you, as among the other non-Jews.

ENGLISH: To Greeks and to Barbarians alike, to wise ones and to fools I am a debtor.
QUENYA: To Greeks and to Barbarians alike, to wise ones and to fools I am a debtor.

ENGLISH: Therefore I burn to make known the gospel also to you who are in Rome.
QUENYA: Therefore I burn to make known the gospel also to you who are in Rome.

ENGLISH: For I am not humiliated concerning the gospel, for it is God's power to save everyone who believes, the Jew firstly, then the Greek.
QUENYA: For I am not humiliated concerning the gospel, for it is God's power to save everyone who believes, the Jew firstly, then the Greek.

ENGLISH: For in it God's righteousness is being revealed by faith and into faith, as is written: “But the righteous – by faith he shall have life.”
QUENYA: For in it God's righteousness is being revealed by faith and into faith, as is written: “But the righteous – by faith he shall have life.”

ENGLISH: For God's wrath is being revealed from heaven against all godlessness and unrighteousness of men that keep the truth down in an unrighteous manner,
QUENYA: For God's wrath is being revealed from heaven against all godlessness and unrighteousness of men that keep the truth down in an unrighteous manner,

ENGLISH: for which one can know about God is made known among them, for God made it known to them.
QUENYA: for which one can know about God is made known among them, for God made it known to them.

ENGLISH: For his invisible true-being is easily seen from the creation of the world, for they are being perceived by the things made, also his eternal power and divinity. Therefore they cannot defend themselves,
QUENYA: For his invisible true-being is easily seen from the creation of the world, for they are being perceived by the things made, also his eternal power and divinity. Therefore they cannot defend themselves,

ENGLISH: for though they knew God, they did not give him the glory or thanksgiving to which he is worthy as Deity, but their thoughts became empty and darkness filled their unintelligent heart.
QUENYA: for though they knew God, they did not give him the glory or thanksgiving to which he is worthy as Deity, but their thoughts became empty and darkness filled their unintelligent heart.

ENGLISH: Though they said about themselves that they were wise, they became fools
QUENYA: Though they said about themselves that they were wise, they became fools

ENGLISH: and turned God Immortal's glory into something like the image of mortal man – and of birds and of beasts and of creeping creatures.
QUENYA: and turned God Immortal's glory into something like the image of mortal man – and of birds and of beasts and of creeping creatures.

ENGLISH: Therefore God gave them over, as the desires of their heart were, to uncleanness that caused the glory of their body to go be lost among themselves,
QUENYA: Therefore God gave them over, as the desires of their heart were, to uncleanness that caused the glory of their body to go be lost among themselves,

ENGLISH: they that exchanged God's truth for the lie, and worshiped which was created above who created, who is being blessed forever. Amen!
QUENYA: they that exchanged God's truth for the lie, and worshiped which was created above who created, who is being blessed forever. Amen!

ENGLISH: Therefore God gave them over to improper lusts, for the women among them exchanged the manner of their nature for a manner beside nature,
QUENYA: Therefore God gave them over to improper lusts, for the women among them exchanged the manner of their nature for a manner beside nature,

ENGLISH: and so also the men forsook nature's use of the woman and were kindled with their lust one for the other, men with men, doing what is perverse, and receiving in themselves the reward that they were worthy of because of their error.
QUENYA: and so also the men forsook nature's use of the woman and were kindled with their lust one for the other, men with men, doing what is perverse, and receiving in themselves the reward that they were worthy of because of their error.

ENGLISH: And since is not good in their eyes to have knowledge about God, God gave them over to a worthless mind, for them to do immoral things,
QUENYA: And since is not good in their eyes to have knowledge about God, God gave them over to a worthless mind, for them to do immoral things,

ENGLISH: for they were filled will all unrighteousness, wickedness, greed, evil – people full of envy, of murder, of strife, of deceit, of a wicked disposition – whispering,
QUENYA: for they were filled will all unrighteousness, wickedness, greed, evil – people full of envy, of murder, of strife, of deceit, of a wicked disposition – whispering,

ENGLISH: speaking evil about others, hating God, violent, haughty, praising themselves, inventing evil things, not heeding parents ,
QUENYA: speaking evil about others, hating God, violent, haughty, praising themselves, inventing evil things, not heeding parents ,

ENGLISH: without understanding, breaking their word, unloving, without mercy.
QUENYA: without understanding, breaking their word, unloving, without mercy.

ENGLISH: Though they know God's decree – that those who do such things are worthy of death – not only do they do them, but they also give their support to those that do them.
QUENYA: Though they know God's decree – that those who do such things are worthy of death – not only do they do them, but they also give their support to those that do them.

ENGLISH: Therefore you do not have reason to give, every person that judges. For by the thing with which you judge another, you judge yourself evil, since you who judge do the same things.
QUENYA: Therefore you do not have reason to give, every person that judges. For by the thing with which you judge another, you judge yourself evil, since you who judge do the same things.

ENGLISH: But we know, as the truth is, that God's judgement falls upon that do such things.
QUENYA: But we know, as the truth is, that God's judgement falls upon that do such things.

ENGLISH: But do you suppose, O man who judges that do such things though you too do them, that you will escape God's judgment?
QUENYA: But do you suppose, O man who judges that do such things though you too do them, that you will escape God's judgment?

ENGLISH: Or do you despise the abundance of his gentleness and his forbearance and his patience, since you do not know that God's friendliness is trying to lead you to repentance?
QUENYA: Or do you despise the abundance of his gentleness and his forbearance and his patience, since you do not know that God's friendliness is trying to lead you to repentance?

ENGLISH: But by your stubbornness and by a heart without repentance you gather for yourself anger on the day of anger, when God's righteous judgements will be revealed.
QUENYA: But by your stubbornness and by a heart without repentance you gather for yourself anger on the day of anger, when God's righteous judgements will be revealed.

ENGLISH: And he will give to everyone as his deeds are:
QUENYA: And he will give to everyone as his deeds are:

ENGLISH: eternal life to that seek glory and honor and an immortal state, by steadfastness in a good work,
QUENYA: eternal life to that seek glory and honor and an immortal state, by steadfastness in a good work,

ENGLISH: but to that love strife and do not follow the truth, but follow unrighteousness, will be anger and wrath,
QUENYA: but to that love strife and do not follow the truth, but follow unrighteousness, will be anger and wrath,

ENGLISH: persecution and tribulation, upon the soul of every person that does evil, of the Jew first and also that of the Greek;
QUENYA: persecution and tribulation, upon the soul of every person that does evil, of the Jew first and also that of the Greek;

ENGLISH: but glory and honor and peace to everyone that does good, to the Jew firstly and also to the Greek.
QUENYA: but glory and honor and peace to everyone that does good, to the Jew firstly and also to the Greek.

ENGLISH: For God does not heed faces .
QUENYA: For God does not heed faces .

ENGLISH: For those that sinned without law will also be undone without law, but all that sinned under law will be judged by law.
QUENYA: For those that sinned without law will also be undone without law, but all that sinned under law will be judged by law.

ENGLISH: For that hear law are not the just ones before God, but the ones that do law will be made just.
QUENYA: For that hear law are not the just ones before God, but the ones that do law will be made just.

ENGLISH: For whenever non-Jews that do not have law by nature do that the law says, these people, though they do not have law, are a law to themselves.
QUENYA: For whenever non-Jews that do not have law by nature do that the law says, these people, though they do not have law, are a law to themselves.

ENGLISH: They show that they have the matters of the law written in their heart, when their conscience witnesses with them and, in their own thoughts, their heart/conscience tells them that they carry guilt or perhaps lack guilt
QUENYA: They show that they have the matters of the law written in their heart, when their conscience witnesses with them and, in their own thoughts, their heart/conscience tells them that they carry guilt or perhaps lack guilt

ENGLISH: – on the day that God judges the secrets of men by the gospel which I have made known, through Jesus Christ.
QUENYA: – on the day that God judges the secrets of men by the gospel which I have made known, through Jesus Christ.

ENGLISH: But if you, who are called Jew and rest upon law and praise yourself in God,
QUENYA: But if you, who are called Jew and rest upon law and praise yourself in God,

ENGLISH: and you know his will and it is possible for you to judge what is good since you have received instruction out of the Law,
QUENYA: and you know his will and it is possible for you to judge what is good since you have received instruction out of the Law,

ENGLISH: and you are sure that you are leading the blind, a light to that are in darkness,
QUENYA: and you are sure that you are leading the blind, a light to that are in darkness,

ENGLISH: instructing those lack understanding, a teacher of babes, having the shape of knowledge and of the truth in the Law –
QUENYA: instructing those lack understanding, a teacher of babes, having the shape of knowledge and of the truth in the Law –

ENGLISH: you who instruct others, do you not instruct yourself? You who instruct: “Do not steal,” do you steal?
QUENYA: you who instruct others, do you not instruct yourself? You who instruct: “Do not steal,” do you steal?

ENGLISH: You who say: “Do not break marriage,” do you break marriage? You who say that you abhor idols, do you steal from temples?
QUENYA: You who say: “Do not break marriage,” do you break marriage? You who say that you abhor idols, do you steal from temples?

ENGLISH: You who praise yourself by the Law, do you by your breaking of the Law sully God's glory?
QUENYA: You who praise yourself by the Law, do you by your breaking of the Law sully God's glory?

ENGLISH: For as has been written: “Because of you God's name is being blasphemed among the nations.”
QUENYA: For as has been written: “Because of you God's name is being blasphemed among the nations.”

ENGLISH: Indeed circumcision is beneficial if you abide by the Law; but if you break the Law, your circumcision has become lack of circumcision.
QUENYA: Indeed circumcision is beneficial if you abide by the Law; but if you break the Law, your circumcision has become lack of circumcision.

ENGLISH: If, then, a person who is not circumcised keeps the Law's just commandments, will his lack of circumcision not be counted as circumcision?
QUENYA: If, then, a person who is not circumcised keeps the Law's just commandments, will his lack of circumcision not be counted as circumcision?

ENGLISH: For the uncircumcised person who is so by nature, will by adhering to the law judge you who have the written scripture and the circumcision and yet have broken the Law.
QUENYA: For the uncircumcised person who is so by nature, will by adhering to the law judge you who have the written scripture and the circumcision and yet have broken the Law.

ENGLISH: For he is not Jew who is so on the outside; furthermore, circumcision is not that which exists on the outside, in the flesh.
QUENYA: For he is not Jew who is so on the outside; furthermore, circumcision is not that which exists on the outside, in the flesh.

ENGLISH: But he is a Jew who is so on the inside, and his circumcision is that of the heart, by spirit and not by the letter. Such a person has his praise, not from men, but from God.
QUENYA: But he is a Jew who is so on the inside, and his circumcision is that of the heart, by spirit and not by the letter. Such a person has his praise, not from men, but from God.

ENGLISH: What, then, is better for the Jew, or what beneficial about the circumcision?
QUENYA: What, then, is better for the Jew, or what beneficial about the circumcision?

ENGLISH: Numerous things, in every manner. Firstly God's words were placed in their keeping.
QUENYA: Numerous things, in every manner. Firstly God's words were placed in their keeping.

ENGLISH: Then what? If some persons among them failed to believe, does their lack of belief perhaps make God's faithfulness without power?
QUENYA: Then what? If some persons among them failed to believe, does their lack of belief perhaps make God's faithfulness without power?

ENGLISH: By no means! But may God be found faithful, though every man will be found a liar, for is written: “In order to show that you will be made just by your words and you will have victory when you are judged.”
QUENYA: By no means! But may God be found faithful, though every man will be found a liar, for is written: “In order to show that you will be made just by your words and you will have victory when you are judged.”

ENGLISH: But if our unrighteousness highlights God's righteousness , what are we to say? Surely God is not unrighteous when he shows his wrath? I am speaking like a man.
QUENYA: But if our unrighteousness highlights God's righteousness , what are we to say? Surely God is not unrighteous when he shows his wrath? I am speaking like a man.

ENGLISH: By no means! In what other manner will God judge the world?
QUENYA: By no means! In what other manner will God judge the world?

ENGLISH: And yet, if by my lie God's truth has become more prominent, to his glory, how is that I am still being judged as a sinner?
QUENYA: And yet, if by my lie God's truth has become more prominent, to his glory, how is that I am still being judged as a sinner?

ENGLISH: What is to stop us from saying: “Let us to evil things, to bring the good things!” Thusly some blaspheme about us, saying that we do speak so, but such people will receive their just judgment!
QUENYA: What is to stop us from saying: “Let us to evil things, to bring the good things!” Thusly some blaspheme about us, saying that we do speak so, but such people will receive their just judgment!

ENGLISH: Then what? Are we in a better place ? Not at all! For beforehand we have said about Jews and Greeks alike that all among them are under sin,
QUENYA: Then what? Are we in a better place ? Not at all! For beforehand we have said about Jews and Greeks alike that all among them are under sin,

ENGLISH: as is written: “ does not exist just man, not one;
QUENYA: as is written: “ does not exist just man, not one;

ENGLISH: is nobody that has insight, is nobody that seeks God, not a single person.
QUENYA: is nobody that has insight, is nobody that seeks God, not a single person.

ENGLISH: All have strayed, all together have become worthless , is nobody that does kindness, not a single person.
QUENYA: All have strayed, all together have become worthless , is nobody that does kindness, not a single person.

ENGLISH: Their throat is an open grave; with their tongue they have lied. Venom of snakes is behind their lips ,
QUENYA: Their throat is an open grave; with their tongue they have lied. Venom of snakes is behind their lips ,

ENGLISH: and their mouth is full of cursing and of bitterness.
QUENYA: and their mouth is full of cursing and of bitterness.

ENGLISH: Their feet are swift to pour out blood.
QUENYA: Their feet are swift to pour out blood.

ENGLISH: Ruin and misery are on their ways, and the way of peace they have not known.
QUENYA: Ruin and misery are on their ways, and the way of peace they have not known.

ENGLISH: There is no fear of God before their eyes.”
QUENYA: There is no fear of God before their eyes.”

ENGLISH: We know that everything that the Law says, it says to that are under the Law, to stop every mouth, and the whole world will be culpable to God, for punishment.
QUENYA: We know that everything that the Law says, it says to that are under the Law, to stop every mouth, and the whole world will be culpable to God, for punishment.

ENGLISH: Therefore by deeds of law is no flesh which will be made just before him, for by law comes the knowledge of sin.
QUENYA: Therefore by deeds of law is no flesh which will be made just before him, for by law comes the knowledge of sin.

ENGLISH: But now, without law, God's justness has been shown, as is being witnessed by the Law and the Prophets –
QUENYA: But now, without law, God's justness has been shown, as is being witnessed by the Law and the Prophets –

ENGLISH: God's justness by faith in Jesus Christ, to all that believe. For no one is better than another,
QUENYA: God's justness by faith in Jesus Christ, to all that believe. For no one is better than another,

ENGLISH: since all have sinned and fall short of God's glory.
QUENYA: since all have sinned and fall short of God's glory.

ENGLISH: As a gift, by his grace, they are made just by the ransom in Jesus Christ,
QUENYA: As a gift, by his grace, they are made just by the ransom in Jesus Christ,

ENGLISH: whom God put as a guilt-offering through faith in his blood. Thus he was going to show us his righteousness, by forgiving the sins that happened in the past
QUENYA: whom God put as a guilt-offering through faith in his blood. Thus he was going to show us his righteousness, by forgiving the sins that happened in the past

ENGLISH: while God showed patience, to show his righteousness at the time which is now, to be just also when he pronounces just who is of the faith in Jesus.
QUENYA: while God showed patience, to show his righteousness at the time which is now, to be just also when he pronounces just who is of the faith in Jesus.

ENGLISH: Where, then, is the self-praise? is not place for it. By what law? That of acts? No, but by the law of faith.
QUENYA: Where, then, is the self-praise? is not place for it. By what law? That of acts? No, but by the law of faith.

ENGLISH: For we reckon that man receives righteousness by faith, not by acts of law.
QUENYA: For we reckon that man receives righteousness by faith, not by acts of law.

ENGLISH: Or is God only of the Jews? Is he not also the God of people of the nations? Indeed he is also the God of people of the nations,
QUENYA: Or is God only of the Jews? Is he not also the God of people of the nations? Indeed he is also the God of people of the nations,

ENGLISH: since God is one, who pronounces just the circumcised ones out of faith, and that are not circumcised, by faith.
QUENYA: since God is one, who pronounces just the circumcised ones out of faith, and that are not circumcised, by faith.

ENGLISH: Do we thusly put away law by our faith? By no means, but we establish law!
QUENYA: Do we thusly put away law by our faith? By no means, but we establish law!

ENGLISH: What, then, are we to say about Abraham, our father by the flesh?
QUENYA: What, then, are we to say about Abraham, our father by the flesh?

ENGLISH: For if Abraham was made just by deeds, he would have been able to praise himself, but not before God.
QUENYA: For if Abraham was made just by deeds, he would have been able to praise himself, but not before God.

ENGLISH: For what does the Scripture say? “Abraham believed in the Lord, and that was counted to him as justice.”
QUENYA: For what does the Scripture say? “Abraham believed in the Lord, and that was counted to him as justice.”

ENGLISH: But to that works the reward is counted, not as grace, but as a debt.
QUENYA: But to that works the reward is counted, not as grace, but as a debt.

ENGLISH: But to that does not work, but believes in that makes just the godless one, his faith is counted as righteousness.
QUENYA: But to that does not work, but believes in that makes just the godless one, his faith is counted as righteousness.

ENGLISH: Thus David as well says about the joy of the man to whom God accounts righteousness without deeds:
QUENYA: Thus David as well says about the joy of the man to whom God accounts righteousness without deeds:

ENGLISH: “Happy are the people whose lawless deeds are forgiven and whose sins have been covered;
QUENYA: “Happy are the people whose lawless deeds are forgiven and whose sins have been covered;

ENGLISH: happy the person whose sin the Lord does not heed at all.”
QUENYA: happy the person whose sin the Lord does not heed at all.”

ENGLISH: Did this joy come to circumcised alone, or also to people that are not circumcised? For we say: “To Abraham his faith was counted as righteousness.”
QUENYA: Did this joy come to circumcised alone, or also to people that are not circumcised? For we say: “To Abraham his faith was counted as righteousness.”

ENGLISH: How, then, was it counted to him? When he was circumcised, or while he was not circumcised? Not while he was circumcised, but while he was not circumcised!
QUENYA: How, then, was it counted to him? When he was circumcised, or while he was not circumcised? Not while he was circumcised, but while he was not circumcised!

ENGLISH: For he received a sign, circumcision, as a seal of righteousness by the faith that he had while he still was not circumcised, for him to be father of all that have faith without circumcision, to cause righteousness to be counted to them,
QUENYA: For he received a sign, circumcision, as a seal of righteousness by the faith that he had while he still was not circumcised, for him to be father of all that have faith without circumcision, to cause righteousness to be counted to them,

ENGLISH: and also father of circumcized ones, not only to those that adhere to circumcision, but also to those that follow Abraham our father in the path of faith in which he walked before he was circumcised.
QUENYA: and also father of circumcized ones, not only to those that adhere to circumcision, but also to those that follow Abraham our father in the path of faith in which he walked before he was circumcised.

ENGLISH: For not by the Law Abraham or his seed has the promise about becoming heir to a world, but through the righteousness by faith.
QUENYA: For not by the Law Abraham or his seed has the promise about becoming heir to a world, but through the righteousness by faith.

ENGLISH: For if those that adhere to law are heirs, faith has become empty and the promise has been abandoned.
QUENYA: For if those that adhere to law are heirs, faith has become empty and the promise has been abandoned.

ENGLISH: For the law causes anger, but where does not exist law, also does not exist crime.
QUENYA: For the law causes anger, but where does not exist law, also does not exist crime.

ENGLISH: Thus the promise is by faith, for it to be by grace, to make it firm for all the seed of Abraham, not only that which adheres to the Law, but also that which adheres to Abraham's faith. He is the father of all among us,
QUENYA: Thus the promise is by faith, for it to be by grace, to make it firm for all the seed of Abraham, not only that which adheres to the Law, but also that which adheres to Abraham's faith. He is the father of all among us,

ENGLISH: as has been written: “I have put you father of numerous nations” – before God in whom he believed, who makes the dead alive and calls the things that do not exist as if they existed.
QUENYA: as has been written: “I have put you father of numerous nations” – before God in whom he believed, who makes the dead alive and calls the things that do not exist as if they existed.

ENGLISH: Beyond hope by hope he had faith of being father of numerous nations, as was said: “So your seed will be.”
QUENYA: Beyond hope by hope he had faith of being father of numerous nations, as was said: “So your seed will be.”

ENGLISH: And though his faith did not fade, he noticed his own body, which was like dead when he was close to a hundred years, and he also perceived how dead Sarah's womb was.
QUENYA: And though his faith did not fade, he noticed his own body, which was like dead when he was close to a hundred years, and he also perceived how dead Sarah's womb was.

ENGLISH: But by God's promise he did not falter in lack of faith, but he was made mighty by his faith,
QUENYA: But by God's promise he did not falter in lack of faith, but he was made mighty by his faith,

ENGLISH: and he was certain that he who gave the promise also had the power to do as he said.
QUENYA: and he was certain that he who gave the promise also had the power to do as he said.

ENGLISH: Therefore that was “counted to him as righteousness”.
QUENYA: Therefore that was “counted to him as righteousness”.

ENGLISH: It was not written about him alone that that was counted to him,
QUENYA: It was not written about him alone that that was counted to him,

ENGLISH: but also about us. It will be counted to us – to the people who believe in him that raised Jesus our Lord from dead.
QUENYA: but also about us. It will be counted to us – to the people who believe in him that raised Jesus our Lord from dead.

ENGLISH: He was given over because of our crimes and was raised for us to be pronounced just.
QUENYA: He was given over because of our crimes and was raised for us to be pronounced just.

ENGLISH: Therefore, since we have been pronounced just by faith, may we have peace with God, by Jesus Christ our Lord.
QUENYA: Therefore, since we have been pronounced just by faith, may we have peace with God, by Jesus Christ our Lord.

ENGLISH: Through him we also have a gate of faith leading to the grace in which we now stand; and may we praise ourselves as concerns the hope of the glory of God.
QUENYA: Through him we also have a gate of faith leading to the grace in which we now stand; and may we praise ourselves as concerns the hope of the glory of God.

ENGLISH: Indeed not only that, but may we also praise ourselves concerning the persecutions, knowing that persecution gives endurance,
QUENYA: Indeed not only that, but may we also praise ourselves concerning the persecutions, knowing that persecution gives endurance,

ENGLISH: endurance leads to a tested condition, and a tested condition gives hope.
QUENYA: endurance leads to a tested condition, and a tested condition gives hope.

ENGLISH: And the hope will not fail, for God's love has been poured out into our heart by the Holy Spirit that was given to us.
QUENYA: And the hope will not fail, for God's love has been poured out into our heart by the Holy Spirit that was given to us.

ENGLISH: For indeed Christ, when we were still weak, died for godless men when the time came.
QUENYA: For indeed Christ, when we were still weak, died for godless men when the time came.

ENGLISH: For one does not quickly choose to die even for a person who is just – or maybe one indeed dares to die for a person who is good.
QUENYA: For one does not quickly choose to die even for a person who is just – or maybe one indeed dares to die for a person who is good.

ENGLISH: But God shows us his love in this manner, that while we were still sinners, Christ died for us.
QUENYA: But God shows us his love in this manner, that while we were still sinners, Christ died for us.

ENGLISH: Since we have been made righteous by his blood, that much more we shall be saved by him from the wrath.
QUENYA: Since we have been made righteous by his blood, that much more we shall be saved by him from the wrath.

ENGLISH: For if, when we were enemies, peace was established between us and God by the death of his Son, that much more we shall be saved by his life now that we have peace with him.
QUENYA: For if, when we were enemies, peace was established between us and God by the death of his Son, that much more we shall be saved by his life now that we have peace with him.

ENGLISH: And not just that, but we also bless ourselves in God, through Jesus Christ our Lord, through whom peace has now been established for us.
QUENYA: And not just that, but we also bless ourselves in God, through Jesus Christ our Lord, through whom peace has now been established for us.

ENGLISH: For sin existed in the world before the Law, but sin is not counted against anyone when does not exist law.
QUENYA: For sin existed in the world before the Law, but sin is not counted against anyone when does not exist law.

ENGLISH: And yet death had power from Adam until Moses, also over the ones that did not sin in the manner of the crime of Adam, who is an image of that was going to come.
QUENYA: And yet death had power from Adam until Moses, also over the ones that did not sin in the manner of the crime of Adam, who is an image of that was going to come.

ENGLISH: But the matter of the crime is not like the matter of the gift. For though numerous ones died by one person's crime, the grace of God and the gift by the grace of one person – Jesus Christ – were much more abundant to numerous ones.
QUENYA: But the matter of the crime is not like the matter of the gift. For though numerous ones died by one person's crime, the grace of God and the gift by the grace of one person – Jesus Christ – were much more abundant to numerous ones.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, matter of the gift is not like the matter of that sinned. For the doom following a single crime brought a judgement of guilt, but the gift following many crimes leads to being made just.
QUENYA: Furthermore, matter of the gift is not like the matter of that sinned. For the doom following a single crime brought a judgement of guilt, but the gift following many crimes leads to being made just.

ENGLISH: For if by the one person's crime death had power by him, much more that receive the abundance of his grace and the gift of righteousness will rule through that one person – Jesus Christ.
QUENYA: For if by the one person's crime death had power by him, much more that receive the abundance of his grace and the gift of righteousness will rule through that one person – Jesus Christ.

ENGLISH: For as by one crime all men were judged evil, in the same manner by one righteous deed all men are said just, to life.
QUENYA: For as by one crime all men were judged evil, in the same manner by one righteous deed all men are said just, to life.

ENGLISH: For like numerous ones were made sinners since a single man broke the commands, so numerous ones are also made just since a single person heeded them.
QUENYA: For like numerous ones were made sinners since a single man broke the commands, so numerous ones are also made just since a single person heeded them.

ENGLISH: But the Law came to make crime abundant. However, where sin was abundant, grace was still more abundant.
QUENYA: But the Law came to make crime abundant. However, where sin was abundant, grace was still more abundant.

ENGLISH: The purpose was that as sin ruled by death, so grace was going to rule by righteousness, bringing eternal life by Jesus Christ our Lord.
QUENYA: The purpose was that as sin ruled by death, so grace was going to rule by righteousness, bringing eternal life by Jesus Christ our Lord.

ENGLISH: What, then, are we to say? Are we to remain in sin, to make grace abundant?
QUENYA: What, then, are we to say? Are we to remain in sin, to make grace abundant?

ENGLISH: By no means! We that died concerning sin, how will we still live in it?
QUENYA: By no means! We that died concerning sin, how will we still live in it?

ENGLISH: Or do you not know that all among us that were baptized into Christ Jesus were baptized into his death?
QUENYA: Or do you not know that all among us that were baptized into Christ Jesus were baptized into his death?

ENGLISH: Therefore we were put in a grave with him by his baptism. Thus, like also the Christ was raised from dead by the glory of the Father, also we were going to walk in a new life.
QUENYA: Therefore we were put in a grave with him by his baptism. Thus, like also the Christ was raised from dead by the glory of the Father, also we were going to walk in a new life.

ENGLISH: And if we have come together with him in a death like his death, we shall also be with him in a resurrection like his resurrection.
QUENYA: And if we have come together with him in a death like his death, we shall also be with him in a resurrection like his resurrection.

ENGLISH: For we know that our old man was crucified with him, to put away the body of sin, to stop us from being thralls under sin.
QUENYA: For we know that our old man was crucified with him, to put away the body of sin, to stop us from being thralls under sin.

ENGLISH: For who has died has been freed from sin.
QUENYA: For who has died has been freed from sin.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, if we have died with Christ, we believe that we will also live with him.
QUENYA: Furthermore, if we have died with Christ, we believe that we will also live with him.

ENGLISH: For we know that now, when the Christ has been raised from dead, he does not die again; death does not more have power over him.
QUENYA: For we know that now, when the Christ has been raised from dead, he does not die again; death does not more have power over him.

ENGLISH: For the death that he died, he died concerning sin a single time and forever, but the life that he lives, he lives for God.
QUENYA: For the death that he died, he died concerning sin a single time and forever, but the life that he lives, he lives for God.

ENGLISH: In the same manner also you: count yourselves as dead to sin, but as living to God, in Christ Jesus.
QUENYA: In the same manner also you: count yourselves as dead to sin, but as living to God, in Christ Jesus.

ENGLISH: Therefore do not let sin rule your mortal body, for you to behave by its desires.
QUENYA: Therefore do not let sin rule your mortal body, for you to behave by its desires.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, do not give your members to sin as weapons of unrighteousness, but give yourselves to God as the living ones from dead, also your members to God as weapons of righteousness.
QUENYA: Furthermore, do not give your members to sin as weapons of unrighteousness, but give yourselves to God as the living ones from dead, also your members to God as weapons of righteousness.

ENGLISH: For sin will not rule you, for you are not under law, but under grace.
QUENYA: For sin will not rule you, for you are not under law, but under grace.

ENGLISH: What follows? Are we to sin, since we are not under law, but under grace? By no means!
QUENYA: What follows? Are we to sin, since we are not under law, but under grace? By no means!

ENGLISH: Do you not know that if you give yourselves to anyone as thralls, to do what he says, you are his thralls since you do what he says – perhaps thralls of sin, leading to death, perhaps thralls of obedience , leading to righteousness.
QUENYA: Do you not know that if you give yourselves to anyone as thralls, to do what he says, you are his thralls since you do what he says – perhaps thralls of sin, leading to death, perhaps thralls of obedience , leading to righteousness.

ENGLISH: But thanks be to God: You were thralls of sin, but you sincerely heeded the kind of instruction to which you were given over.
QUENYA: But thanks be to God: You were thralls of sin, but you sincerely heeded the kind of instruction to which you were given over.

ENGLISH: After you were freed from sin, you became thralls of righteousness.
QUENYA: After you were freed from sin, you became thralls of righteousness.

ENGLISH: I speak to you in the manner of Men, since your flesh is weak. For like you made your body-parts thralls of uncleanness and lawbreaking, which led to more lawbreaking, now set your body-parts as thralls of righteousness, which will lead to holiness.
QUENYA: I speak to you in the manner of Men, since your flesh is weak. For like you made your body-parts thralls of uncleanness and lawbreaking, which led to more lawbreaking, now set your body-parts as thralls of righteousness, which will lead to holiness.

ENGLISH: For when you were thralls of sin, you were free concerning righteousness.
QUENYA: For when you were thralls of sin, you were free concerning righteousness.

ENGLISH: But what was the fruit that you then had? Things of which you are now humiliated , for the end of those things is death!
QUENYA: But what was the fruit that you then had? Things of which you are now humiliated , for the end of those things is death!

ENGLISH: But now, since you were freed from sin but have become servants to God, you have your fruit leading to holiness, and the end will be eternal wife.
QUENYA: But now, since you were freed from sin but have become servants to God, you have your fruit leading to holiness, and the end will be eternal wife.

ENGLISH: For what sin pays is death, but God's gift is eternal life, in Christ Jesus our Lord.
QUENYA: For what sin pays is death, but God's gift is eternal life, in Christ Jesus our Lord.

ENGLISH: Or do you not know, my brothers – for I speak to that know law – that the Law rules as lord over a man though the entire time that he lives?
QUENYA: Or do you not know, my brothers – for I speak to that know law – that the Law rules as lord over a man though the entire time that he lives?

ENGLISH: For a woman who has gotten married to a man is bound to her husband while the man is alive, but if her husband dies, the woman is freed from the law of the husband.
QUENYA: For a woman who has gotten married to a man is bound to her husband while the man is alive, but if her husband dies, the woman is freed from the law of the husband.

ENGLISH: Thus, then, while her husband is alive, one was going to say that the woman has broken marriage if she gave herself to another man. But if her husband dies, she is free from the law, and she does not break marriage if she gets married to another man.
QUENYA: Thus, then, while her husband is alive, one was going to say that the woman has broken marriage if she gave herself to another man. But if her husband dies, she is free from the law, and she does not break marriage if she gets married to another man.

ENGLISH: Thus, my brothers, you as well became dead to the Law by the body of Christ, for you to be another's, he who was raised from dead, for us to bear fruit to God.
QUENYA: Thus, my brothers, you as well became dead to the Law by the body of Christ, for you to be another's, he who was raised from dead, for us to bear fruit to God.

ENGLISH: For when we were in the flesh, the lusts of sin which were being strirred by the Law worked in our body-parts, causing us to bear fruit to death.
QUENYA: For when we were in the flesh, the lusts of sin which were being strirred by the Law worked in our body-parts, causing us to bear fruit to death.

ENGLISH: But now we have been freed from the Law, since we have died from that with which we were bound, for us to be servants in a new manner, by the spirit, and not in the old manner, by letters.
QUENYA: But now we have been freed from the Law, since we have died from that with which we were bound, for us to be servants in a new manner, by the spirit, and not in the old manner, by letters.

ENGLISH: What, then, are we to say? The Law is sin? By no means! But sin I did not know if not by the Law. For greed I did not now if the Law did not say: “Do not be greedy!”
QUENYA: What, then, are we to say? The Law is sin? By no means! But sin I did not know if not by the Law. For greed I did not now if the Law did not say: “Do not be greedy!”

ENGLISH: But sin, having an opportunity by the commandment, created in me greed of every kind, for away from law sin was dead.
QUENYA: But sin, having an opportunity by the commandment, created in me greed of every kind, for away from law sin was dead.

ENGLISH: Indeed was a time in which I was alive away from law, but when the commandment came, sin returned to life, but I died.
QUENYA: Indeed was a time in which I was alive away from law, but when the commandment came, sin returned to life, but I died.

ENGLISH: For the commandment which was for life, that I found was for death.
QUENYA: For the commandment which was for life, that I found was for death.

ENGLISH: For sin, when it received an opportunity by the commandment, seduced me and killed me by it.
QUENYA: For sin, when it received an opportunity by the commandment, seduced me and killed me by it.

ENGLISH: Therefore the Law is holy, and the commandment holy and righteous and good.
QUENYA: Therefore the Law is holy, and the commandment holy and righteous and good.

ENGLISH: Did that which was good cause death to me? By no means! But sin did so, causing death in me by which is good, to reveal what sin really is , and for it to be sinful beyond measure by the commandment.
QUENYA: Did that which was good cause death to me? By no means! But sin did so, causing death in me by which is good, to reveal what sin really is , and for it to be sinful beyond measure by the commandment.

ENGLISH: For as we know, the Law is of the Spirit, but I am of the flesh, sold under sin.
QUENYA: For as we know, the Law is of the Spirit, but I am of the flesh, sold under sin.

ENGLISH: For what I work I do not understand. For which I wish, that I do not do, but which I hate, that is what I do.
QUENYA: For what I work I do not understand. For which I wish, that I do not do, but which I hate, that is what I do.

ENGLISH: But if which I do not want is what I do, I assent with the Law that is it good.
QUENYA: But if which I do not want is what I do, I assent with the Law that is it good.

ENGLISH: But now who works it is no more I, but sin which dwells in me.
QUENYA: But now who works it is no more I, but sin which dwells in me.

ENGLISH: For I know that in me, that is, in my flesh, dwells nothing good; for it is possible for me to desire, but it is not possible for me to work which is good.
QUENYA: For I know that in me, that is, in my flesh, dwells nothing good; for it is possible for me to desire, but it is not possible for me to work which is good.

ENGLISH: For the good that I want I do not do, but the evil that I do not want, that I do.
QUENYA: For the good that I want I do not do, but the evil that I do not want, that I do.

ENGLISH: But if which I do not want is what I do, who does it is no more I, but sin dwelling in me.
QUENYA: But if which I do not want is what I do, who does it is no more I, but sin dwelling in me.

ENGLISH: This I find that exists this law: When I wish to do what is proper, evil lies near to me.
QUENYA: This I find that exists this law: When I wish to do what is proper, evil lies near to me.

ENGLISH: Indeed I have joy in God's Law by my inner man,
QUENYA: Indeed I have joy in God's Law by my inner man,

ENGLISH: but I see in my body-parts another law making war against my mind and making me a slave to the law of sin which exists in my body-parts.
QUENYA: but I see in my body-parts another law making war against my mind and making me a slave to the law of sin which exists in my body-parts.

ENGLISH: Miserable man that I am! Who will save me from this body of death?
QUENYA: Miserable man that I am! Who will save me from this body of death?

ENGLISH: Thanks to God through Jesus Christ our Lord! Indeed I am a slave of the law of God by my mind, but by my flesh, of the law of sin.
QUENYA: Thanks to God through Jesus Christ our Lord! Indeed I am a slave of the law of God by my mind, but by my flesh, of the law of sin.

ENGLISH: Thus that are in Christ Jesus will not be judged evil.
QUENYA: Thus that are in Christ Jesus will not be judged evil.

ENGLISH: For the law of the spirit which gives life in Christ Jesus has freed you from the law of sin and of death.
QUENYA: For the law of the spirit which gives life in Christ Jesus has freed you from the law of sin and of death.

ENGLISH: For what the Law could not do, since it was weak by the flesh, God did by sending his own Son in which was similar to sinful flesh, and concerning sin. He judged sin evil in the flesh.
QUENYA: For what the Law could not do, since it was weak by the flesh, God did by sending his own Son in which was similar to sinful flesh, and concerning sin. He judged sin evil in the flesh.

ENGLISH: Thus the just command of the Law could become real in us that walk, not by the flesh, but by the Holy Spirit.
QUENYA: Thus the just command of the Law could become real in us that walk, not by the flesh, but by the Holy Spirit.

ENGLISH: For that are of the flesh heed the matters of the flesh, but that are of the spirit, the matters of the spirit.
QUENYA: For that are of the flesh heed the matters of the flesh, but that are of the spirit, the matters of the spirit.

ENGLISH: To heed the flesh brings death, but to heed the spirit brings life and peace,
QUENYA: To heed the flesh brings death, but to heed the spirit brings life and peace,

ENGLISH: for who heeds the flesh is hostile to God, for the flesh does not bow to God's law; indeed that is not possible for it.
QUENYA: for who heeds the flesh is hostile to God, for the flesh does not bow to God's law; indeed that is not possible for it.

ENGLISH: Therefore that are in the flesh are not able to please God.
QUENYA: Therefore that are in the flesh are not able to please God.

ENGLISH: But you are not in the flesh, but in the spirit, if God's spirit dwells in you. But if anyone does not have the Christ's spirit, he is not his .
QUENYA: But you are not in the flesh, but in the spirit, if God's spirit dwells in you. But if anyone does not have the Christ's spirit, he is not his .

ENGLISH: But if the Christ exists in you, the body is indeed dead, by sin, but the spirit is life, by justness.
QUENYA: But if the Christ exists in you, the body is indeed dead, by sin, but the spirit is life, by justness.

ENGLISH: If the spirit of that raised Jesus from dead dwells in you, who raised Christ Jesus the dead will also made your mortal bodies alive, by his spirit that dwells in you.
QUENYA: If the spirit of that raised Jesus from dead dwells in you, who raised Christ Jesus the dead will also made your mortal bodies alive, by his spirit that dwells in you.

ENGLISH: Therefore, brothers, we are indeed debtors, but not to the flesh, in order to live by the flesh.
QUENYA: Therefore, brothers, we are indeed debtors, but not to the flesh, in order to live by the flesh.

ENGLISH: For if you live by the flesh, you will die, but if by the spirit you kill the deeds of your body,, you will live.
QUENYA: For if you live by the flesh, you will die, but if by the spirit you kill the deeds of your body,, you will live.

ENGLISH: For all that are being led by God's spirit, they are God's sons.
QUENYA: For all that are being led by God's spirit, they are God's sons.

ENGLISH: For you did not receive a thrall's spirit, again causing fear, but you received a spirit of being chosen as sons, the spirit by which we cry: “Abba, Father!”
QUENYA: For you did not receive a thrall's spirit, again causing fear, but you received a spirit of being chosen as sons, the spirit by which we cry: “Abba, Father!”

ENGLISH: The spirit itself is a witness with our spirit that we are God's children.
QUENYA: The spirit itself is a witness with our spirit that we are God's children.

ENGLISH: And if we are children, we are also heirs – indeed God's heirs, and heirs with the Christ, if we suffer with him, for us to receive also glory with him.
QUENYA: And if we are children, we are also heirs – indeed God's heirs, and heirs with the Christ, if we suffer with him, for us to receive also glory with him.

ENGLISH: Therefore I count the sufferings of this time as nothing compared to the glory that will be revealed in us.
QUENYA: Therefore I count the sufferings of this time as nothing compared to the glory that will be revealed in us.

ENGLISH: For with a burning desire Creation looks forward to the revealing of God's sons.
QUENYA: For with a burning desire Creation looks forward to the revealing of God's sons.

ENGLISH: For Creation was put under an useless state, not by its own will but by who put it under that, although having a hope:
QUENYA: For Creation was put under an useless state, not by its own will but by who put it under that, although having a hope:

ENGLISH: that also creation itself will be freed from being a thrall of corruption into the glorious freedom of God's children.
QUENYA: that also creation itself will be freed from being a thrall of corruption into the glorious freedom of God's children.

ENGLISH: For we know how the entire creation is groaning together and is in pain together until now.
QUENYA: For we know how the entire creation is groaning together and is in pain together until now.

ENGLISH: Not only that, but also we who have the first fruit – that is, the Spirit – we groan in ourselves, when we look forward to being chosen as sons – the release from our body by ransom.
QUENYA: Not only that, but also we who have the first fruit – that is, the Spirit – we groan in ourselves, when we look forward to being chosen as sons – the release from our body by ransom.

ENGLISH: For we were saved in this hope; but a hope that one sees is not hope, for when a person sees a thing, how does he have hope for it?
QUENYA: For we were saved in this hope; but a hope that one sees is not hope, for when a person sees a thing, how does he have hope for it?

ENGLISH: But if we have hope for that which we do not see, we are looking forward to it with endurance.
QUENYA: But if we have hope for that which we do not see, we are looking forward to it with endurance.

ENGLISH: In the same manner the Spirit also helps us when we are weak. We do not know what we would do well by requesting it, but the Spirit itself petitions for us, with unutterable words.
QUENYA: In the same manner the Spirit also helps us when we are weak. We do not know what we would do well by requesting it, but the Spirit itself petitions for us, with unutterable words.

ENGLISH: But he who searches the hearts know what the thought of the Spirit is, since by God's will it makes request for the holy ones.
QUENYA: But he who searches the hearts know what the thought of the Spirit is, since by God's will it makes request for the holy ones.

ENGLISH: We know that God causes all things to work together for who love God, for their good – the that are called for his purpose.
QUENYA: We know that God causes all things to work together for who love God, for their good – the that are called for his purpose.

ENGLISH: For the ones that he knew beforhand he also chose beforehand, for them to be fashioned according to the image of his Son, making him the first-born among numerous brothers;
QUENYA: For the ones that he knew beforhand he also chose beforehand, for them to be fashioned according to the image of his Son, making him the first-born among numerous brothers;

ENGLISH: but the ones that he chose beforehand, he also called, and the ones that he called, he also made righteous, and those that he made righteous, he also made glorious.
QUENYA: but the ones that he chose beforehand, he also called, and the ones that he called, he also made righteous, and those that he made righteous, he also made glorious.

ENGLISH: What, then, am I to say about these things? If God is with us, who will stand against us?
QUENYA: What, then, am I to say about these things? If God is with us, who will stand against us?

ENGLISH: who did not have mercy even his own Son but gave him over for the good of all among us, how is that he will not give us all other things?
QUENYA: who did not have mercy even his own Son but gave him over for the good of all among us, how is that he will not give us all other things?

ENGLISH: Who will speak evil against that God as chosen? God is who has spoken them just;
QUENYA: Who will speak evil against that God as chosen? God is who has spoken them just;

ENGLISH: who is that judge them evil? Christ Jesus is who died, or better, he is who was raised from the dead, who is at God's right hand, who also makes petition for us.
QUENYA: who is that judge them evil? Christ Jesus is who died, or better, he is who was raised from the dead, who is at God's right hand, who also makes petition for us.

ENGLISH: Who will take us away from the love of the Christ? Will tribulation or pressure or persecution or famine or nakedness or danger or sword do so?
QUENYA: Who will take us away from the love of the Christ? Will tribulation or pressure or persecution or famine or nakedness or danger or sword do so?

ENGLISH: As has been written: “Because of you we are being slain throughout the whole day; we have been counted as sheep for slaughter.”
QUENYA: As has been written: “Because of you we are being slain throughout the whole day; we have been counted as sheep for slaughter.”

ENGLISH: But in all these things we have the victory, by that loved us.
QUENYA: But in all these things we have the victory, by that loved us.

ENGLISH: For I am sure that nothing – death or life or angels or lordships, or that are now or that will come, or powers,
QUENYA: For I am sure that nothing – death or life or angels or lordships, or that are now or that will come, or powers,

ENGLISH: or depth or every other created thing – will be able to take us away from God's love which is in Christ Jesus our Lord.
QUENYA: or depth or every other created thing – will be able to take us away from God's love which is in Christ Jesus our Lord.

ENGLISH: The truth I am telling in Christ – I am not lying, since my conscience is my witness with me, in the Holy Spirit –
QUENYA: The truth I am telling in Christ – I am not lying, since my conscience is my witness with me, in the Holy Spirit –

ENGLISH: that I have a great grief and a lingering pain in my heart.
QUENYA: that I have a great grief and a lingering pain in my heart.

ENGLISH: For it is possible for me to wish that I were cut off as accursed from the Christ for the good of my brothers, my kin by the flesh,
QUENYA: For it is possible for me to wish that I were cut off as accursed from the Christ for the good of my brothers, my kin by the flesh,

ENGLISH: who are Israelites, who were chosen as children and have the glory and the covenants and the giving of the Law and the service and the promises,
QUENYA: who are Israelites, who were chosen as children and have the glory and the covenants and the giving of the Law and the service and the promises,

ENGLISH: they that have the fathers and from whom the Christ has his descent by the flesh. May God, who is above all, be blessed forever! Amen!
QUENYA: they that have the fathers and from whom the Christ has his descent by the flesh. May God, who is above all, be blessed forever! Amen!

ENGLISH: But the matter is not as if God's word has failed. For not all that have their descent from Israel are truly Israel.
QUENYA: But the matter is not as if God's word has failed. For not all that have their descent from Israel are truly Israel.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, all among them are not children by being Abraham's seed, but: “What will be called your seed will come through Isaac.”
QUENYA: Furthermore, all among them are not children by being Abraham's seed, but: “What will be called your seed will come through Isaac.”

ENGLISH: That is, the children in the flesh are not truly God's children, but the children that exist by the promise are being counted as the seed.
QUENYA: That is, the children in the flesh are not truly God's children, but the children that exist by the promise are being counted as the seed.

ENGLISH: For the word of promise was thus: “At this time I shall return, and will be a son with Sarah.”
QUENYA: For the word of promise was thus: “At this time I shall return, and will be a son with Sarah.”

ENGLISH: And yet not only in that matter: The same happened when Rebecca begat twins by the same man, Isaac our father.
QUENYA: And yet not only in that matter: The same happened when Rebecca begat twins by the same man, Isaac our father.

ENGLISH: For when they still were not born, and before they did good or evil – to make God's purpose concerning the choice depend, not on deeds, but on who calls –
QUENYA: For when they still were not born, and before they did good or evil – to make God's purpose concerning the choice depend, not on deeds, but on who calls –

ENGLISH: it was said to her: “The oldest will be a thrall to the youngest.”
QUENYA: it was said to her: “The oldest will be a thrall to the youngest.”

ENGLISH: Just as is written: “I loved Jacob, but Esau I hated.”
QUENYA: Just as is written: “I loved Jacob, but Esau I hated.”

ENGLISH: Then what are we to say? Is there unrighteousness with God? By no means!
QUENYA: Then what are we to say? Is there unrighteousness with God? By no means!

ENGLISH: For he says to Moses: “I will have mercy on whom I shall have mercy, and I will show sympathy to whom I shall show sympathy.”
QUENYA: For he says to Moses: “I will have mercy on whom I shall have mercy, and I will show sympathy to whom I shall show sympathy.”

ENGLISH: Therefore the matter hangs, not on who wishes or on that runs, but on Gods who shows mercy.
QUENYA: Therefore the matter hangs, not on who wishes or on that runs, but on Gods who shows mercy.

ENGLISH: For the Scripture says to Pharaoh:“For this purpose I have allowed you to remain, that in you I will show my power, and to make my name known on the entire earth.”
QUENYA: For the Scripture says to Pharaoh:“For this purpose I have allowed you to remain, that in you I will show my power, and to make my name known on the entire earth.”

ENGLISH: Thus he indeed shows mercy on he shows mercy, but whom he wishes he makes hard.
QUENYA: Thus he indeed shows mercy on he shows mercy, but whom he wishes he makes hard.

ENGLISH: Therefore you will say to me: “How is that he still says that anyone has guilt? For who has been able to stand against his will?”
QUENYA: Therefore you will say to me: “How is that he still says that anyone has guilt? For who has been able to stand against his will?”

ENGLISH: O man – who, then, are you who answers back to God? Surely that which has been formed will not say to that has formed it: “What is your reason for making me so?”
QUENYA: O man – who, then, are you who answers back to God? Surely that which has been formed will not say to that has formed it: “What is your reason for making me so?”

ENGLISH: Or does the potter not have power over the earth to make from the same lump a vessel for a glorious purpose, and another for a purpose that is not glorious?
QUENYA: Or does the potter not have power over the earth to make from the same lump a vessel for a glorious purpose, and another for a purpose that is not glorious?

ENGLISH: But suppose that God, though he has the power to show his wrath and to make his power known, with great patience allowed the vessels of wrath to remain, those that are made to be destroyed,
QUENYA: But suppose that God, though he has the power to show his wrath and to make his power known, with great patience allowed the vessels of wrath to remain, those that are made to be destroyed,

ENGLISH: in order to make known his abundant glory to the vessels of mercy, that he beforehand prepared for glory –
QUENYA: in order to make known his abundant glory to the vessels of mercy, that he beforehand prepared for glory –

ENGLISH: we whom he called not from the Jews alone, but also out of the nations.
QUENYA: we whom he called not from the Jews alone, but also out of the nations.

ENGLISH: That is as he says in Hosea: “ that are not my people I will call my people, and who was not beloved, the beloved;
QUENYA: That is as he says in Hosea: “ that are not my people I will call my people, and who was not beloved, the beloved;

ENGLISH: and in the place where was said to them: 'You are not my people', there they will be called 'sons of the living God'.”
QUENYA: and in the place where was said to them: 'You are not my people', there they will be called 'sons of the living God'.”

ENGLISH: For Isaiah cries about Israel: “Though the number of the Children of Israel is like the sand of the sea, only a small remaining part will be saved.
QUENYA: For Isaiah cries about Israel: “Though the number of the Children of Israel is like the sand of the sea, only a small remaining part will be saved.

ENGLISH: For the Lord will do an accounting on earth, completing it and cutting it short.”
QUENYA: For the Lord will do an accounting on earth, completing it and cutting it short.”

ENGLISH: Furthermore, as Isaiah said beforehand: “If the Lord Sebaoth did not allow a seed to remain for us, we became like Sodom, and we were like Gomorrah.”
QUENYA: Furthermore, as Isaiah said beforehand: “If the Lord Sebaoth did not allow a seed to remain for us, we became like Sodom, and we were like Gomorrah.”

ENGLISH: Then what are we to say? Non-Jews, through they did not pursue righteousness, have found righteousness – the righteousness that comes by faith.
QUENYA: Then what are we to say? Non-Jews, through they did not pursue righteousness, have found righteousness – the righteousness that comes by faith.

ENGLISH: But Israel, though they pursued a law of righteousness, failed to reach the that law.
QUENYA: But Israel, though they pursued a law of righteousness, failed to reach the that law.

ENGLISH: How so? For the reason that they pursued it, not by faith, but as by deeds. They stumbled by the rock of slipping, as is written: “Behold, I put in Zion a stone of slipping and a rock of falling, but who believes in it will not be humilated.”
QUENYA: How so? For the reason that they pursued it, not by faith, but as by deeds. They stumbled by the rock of slipping, as is written: “Behold, I put in Zion a stone of slipping and a rock of falling, but who believes in it will not be humilated.”

ENGLISH: Brothers, the desire of my heart and my petition for them to God is that they will be saved.
QUENYA: Brothers, the desire of my heart and my petition for them to God is that they will be saved.

ENGLISH: For I am a witness to them that they have a burning spirit for God, but not by knowledge.
QUENYA: For I am a witness to them that they have a burning spirit for God, but not by knowledge.

ENGLISH: For since they do not know God's righteousness, but try to establish their own, they did not subject themselves to God's righteousness.
QUENYA: For since they do not know God's righteousness, but try to establish their own, they did not subject themselves to God's righteousness.

ENGLISH: For Christ is the end of the Law, for the purpose that everyone who believes will be pronounced just.
QUENYA: For Christ is the end of the Law, for the purpose that everyone who believes will be pronounced just.

ENGLISH: For Moses writes concerning the righteousness that comes by the Law: “The man who has done it will live by it.”
QUENYA: For Moses writes concerning the righteousness that comes by the Law: “The man who has done it will live by it.”

ENGLISH: But the righteousness that comes from believing speaks so: “Do not say in your heart: Who will go up into heaven?” – that is, to bring the Christ down –
QUENYA: But the righteousness that comes from believing speaks so: “Do not say in your heart: Who will go up into heaven?” – that is, to bring the Christ down –

ENGLISH: “or: Who will descend into the abyss?” – that is, to bring Christ up from dead.
QUENYA: “or: Who will descend into the abyss?” – that is, to bring Christ up from dead.

ENGLISH: But what does it say? “The word is near to you, in your mouth and in your heart” – that is, the word about the faith, which we make known.
QUENYA: But what does it say? “The word is near to you, in your mouth and in your heart” – that is, the word about the faith, which we make known.

ENGLISH: For if with your mouth you indicate your belief that Jesus is Lord, and you believe in your heart that God raised him out of dead, you will be saved.
QUENYA: For if with your mouth you indicate your belief that Jesus is Lord, and you believe in your heart that God raised him out of dead, you will be saved.

ENGLISH: For with the heart one believes, which brings righteousness; by the mouth one indicates what one believes, which brings salvation.
QUENYA: For with the heart one believes, which brings righteousness; by the mouth one indicates what one believes, which brings salvation.

ENGLISH: For the Scripture says: “ who has hope in him will not be humiliated.”
QUENYA: For the Scripture says: “ who has hope in him will not be humiliated.”

ENGLISH: For the matter is not one for the Jew and another for the Greek,, but is the same Lord over all, who is rich towards all that call upon him.
QUENYA: For the matter is not one for the Jew and another for the Greek,, but is the same Lord over all, who is rich towards all that call upon him.

ENGLISH: For “everyone who calls on the Lord's name will be saved”.
QUENYA: For “everyone who calls on the Lord's name will be saved”.

ENGLISH: But how will they call to him in whom they do not believe? And how will they believe in him about whom they have not heard? And how will they hear if they lack anyone that makes known the gospel?
QUENYA: But how will they call to him in whom they do not believe? And how will they believe in him about whom they have not heard? And how will they hear if they lack anyone that makes known the gospel?

ENGLISH: And how will they make it known if they are not sent? As is written: “How beautiful are the feel of that bring good news about good things!”
QUENYA: And how will they make it known if they are not sent? As is written: “How beautiful are the feel of that bring good news about good things!”

ENGLISH: But all among them did not follow the gospel. For Isaiah says: “Lord, who believed that which people heard from us?”
QUENYA: But all among them did not follow the gospel. For Isaiah says: “Lord, who believed that which people heard from us?”

ENGLISH: Thus believing comes from that which one hears, and that which one hears comes by the speaking about Christ.
QUENYA: Thus believing comes from that which one hears, and that which one hears comes by the speaking about Christ.

ENGLISH: And yet I ask: Have they indeed not heard? Indeed “into all the earth their sound went forth, and their sayings to the ends of the world.”
QUENYA: And yet I ask: Have they indeed not heard? Indeed “into all the earth their sound went forth, and their sayings to the ends of the world.”

ENGLISH: But I ask: Did Israel not understand? Firstly Moses said: “I cause envy among you by what is not a nation; I cause you to have wrath by an unintelligent nation.”
QUENYA: But I ask: Did Israel not understand? Firstly Moses said: “I cause envy among you by what is not a nation; I cause you to have wrath by an unintelligent nation.”

ENGLISH: But Isaiah is very bold and says: “I was found by that did not seek me; I was made known to that did not ask about me.”
QUENYA: But Isaiah is very bold and says: “I was found by that did not seek me; I was made known to that did not ask about me.”

ENGLISH: But concering Israel he says: “Through the entire day I have spread out my hands towards a people disobedient and contrary .”
QUENYA: But concering Israel he says: “Through the entire day I have spread out my hands towards a people disobedient and contrary .”

ENGLISH: I ask, then: Surely God has not abandoned his people? By no means! For also I am a man of Israel, of Abraham's seed, of the kin of Benjamin.
QUENYA: I ask, then: Surely God has not abandoned his people? By no means! For also I am a man of Israel, of Abraham's seed, of the kin of Benjamin.

ENGLISH: Eru did not reject his people, which beforehand he knew . Do you not know what the Scripture says about Eliah, when he makes petition to God for Israel?
QUENYA: Eru did not reject his people, which beforehand he knew . Do you not know what the Scripture says about Eliah, when he makes petition to God for Israel?

ENGLISH: “Lord, they have slain your prophets , they have torn down your altars, and I alone remains, and they are seeking my life.”
QUENYA: “Lord, they have slain your prophets , they have torn down your altars, and I alone remains, and they are seeking my life.”

ENGLISH: But what does the Word of God say to him? “I have let seven thousand men remain for me, that have not bent their knee to Baal.”
QUENYA: But what does the Word of God say to him? “I have let seven thousand men remain for me, that have not bent their knee to Baal.”

ENGLISH: In this manner, therefore, also in this time is a remaining part, by the choice of God's grace.
QUENYA: In this manner, therefore, also in this time is a remaining part, by the choice of God's grace.

ENGLISH: If it is grace, it is not by works more; if not, the grace is not more grace.
QUENYA: If it is grace, it is not by works more; if not, the grace is not more grace.

ENGLISH: What then? which Israel is seeking, that it has not got, but the chosen ones have got it. The perception of the others became blunt,
QUENYA: What then? which Israel is seeking, that it has not got, but the chosen ones have got it. The perception of the others became blunt,

ENGLISH: just as has been written: “God has given them a spirit of deep sleep, eyes that do not see and ears that do not hear, until this day.”
QUENYA: just as has been written: “God has given them a spirit of deep sleep, eyes that do not see and ears that do not hear, until this day.”

ENGLISH: Furthermore, David said: “May their table be for them a snare and an entrapping and a reason to fall and a revenge;
QUENYA: Furthermore, David said: “May their table be for them a snare and an entrapping and a reason to fall and a revenge;

ENGLISH: may their eyes be made dark for them to fail to see, and always make their back bent!”
QUENYA: may their eyes be made dark for them to fail to see, and always make their back bent!”

ENGLISH: Therefore I ask: Did they slip to fall completely? By no means! But by their slipping is salvation for the nations, to cause envy among them.
QUENYA: Therefore I ask: Did they slip to fall completely? By no means! But by their slipping is salvation for the nations, to cause envy among them.

ENGLISH: Now when their slipping brings riches to the world, and their being deprived brings riches to the nations, how much more will their full number do so!
QUENYA: Now when their slipping brings riches to the world, and their being deprived brings riches to the nations, how much more will their full number do so!

ENGLISH: Now I am speaking to you, the non-Jews: Being what I am, indeed the apostle of the nations, I praise my ministry ,
QUENYA: Now I am speaking to you, the non-Jews: Being what I am, indeed the apostle of the nations, I praise my ministry ,

ENGLISH: if is a manner by which I can cause envy among that are of my flesh and save some among them.
QUENYA: if is a manner by which I can cause envy among that are of my flesh and save some among them.
