ENGLISH: For if their being thrown away brings reconciliation to the world, what will their being received bring, if not life from the dead?
QUENYA: For if their being thrown away brings reconciliation to the world, what will their being received bring, if not life from the dead?

ENGLISH: Furthermore, if the first portion is hallowed, then the whole dough is holy. And if the root is holy, so are the branches.
QUENYA: Furthermore, if the first portion is hallowed, then the whole dough is holy. And if the root is holy, so are the branches.

ENGLISH: But if some branches were broken off, but you, though you are a wild olive tree, was put into the tree among them and received a part in the fat of the root of the olive tree,
QUENYA: But if some branches were broken off, but you, though you are a wild olive tree, was put into the tree among them and received a part in the fat of the root of the olive tree,

ENGLISH: do not praise yourself over the branches! But if you praise yourself over them, recall that you do not carry the root, but the root carries you.
QUENYA: do not praise yourself over the branches! But if you praise yourself over them, recall that you do not carry the root, but the root carries you.

ENGLISH: Then you will say: “Some branches were broken off for me to be put into the tree.”
QUENYA: Then you will say: “Some branches were broken off for me to be put into the tree.”

ENGLISH: Well: By lack of faith they were broken off, but you stand by faith. Do not have lofty ideas, but fear!
QUENYA: Well: By lack of faith they were broken off, but you stand by faith. Do not have lofty ideas, but fear!

ENGLISH: For if God did not allow the branches that were there by their nature to remain, in the same manner he will not allow you to remain.
QUENYA: For if God did not allow the branches that were there by their nature to remain, in the same manner he will not allow you to remain.

ENGLISH: Behold, then, God's goodness and harshness: Towards that fell is harshness, but towards you is God's goodness, if you remain in his goodness; if not, you all well will be cut off.
QUENYA: Behold, then, God's goodness and harshness: Towards that fell is harshness, but towards you is God's goodness, if you remain in his goodness; if not, you all well will be cut off.

ENGLISH: They as well, if they do not remain in their lack of faith, will be put into the tree, for God can put them there.
QUENYA: They as well, if they do not remain in their lack of faith, will be put into the tree, for God can put them there.

ENGLISH: For if you were cut off from an olive tree which by nature is wild, and contrary to nature you were put into the olive tree in the garden, how much more easy will it be for that by nature have their place there to be put into their own olive tree!
QUENYA: For if you were cut off from an olive tree which by nature is wild, and contrary to nature you were put into the olive tree in the garden, how much more easy will it be for that by nature have their place there to be put into their own olive tree!

ENGLISH: For I do not wish that you, brothers, are to lack knowledge about this secret, to stop you from being wise in your own eyes: is a part of Israel whose perceptions have become blunt until the full time when the fullness of the nations shall come in.
QUENYA: For I do not wish that you, brothers, are to lack knowledge about this secret, to stop you from being wise in your own eyes: is a part of Israel whose perceptions have become blunt until the full time when the fullness of the nations shall come in.

ENGLISH: And thus all of Israel shall be saved, as has been written: “The Savior shall come from Zion and will turn away godlessness from Jacob.
QUENYA: And thus all of Israel shall be saved, as has been written: “The Savior shall come from Zion and will turn away godlessness from Jacob.

ENGLISH: And this is my covenant with them, when I put their sins away.”
QUENYA: And this is my covenant with them, when I put their sins away.”

ENGLISH: Concerning the gospel they are enemies by reason of you, but concerning the choosing they are beloved, by reason of their fathers.
QUENYA: Concerning the gospel they are enemies by reason of you, but concerning the choosing they are beloved, by reason of their fathers.

ENGLISH: For God's gifts and calling are not things about which he will have second thoughts.
QUENYA: For God's gifts and calling are not things about which he will have second thoughts.

ENGLISH: For as you in the past broke God's commands, but now have received mercy by their disobedience ,
QUENYA: For as you in the past broke God's commands, but now have received mercy by their disobedience ,

ENGLISH: so they as well have broken the commands, which caused you to receive mercy, that they as well will receive mercy.
QUENYA: so they as well have broken the commands, which caused you to receive mercy, that they as well will receive mercy.

ENGLISH: For God has shut them all up in disobedience, to have mercy on all among them.
QUENYA: For God has shut them all up in disobedience, to have mercy on all among them.

ENGLISH: Behold how profound are God's riches and wisdom and knowledge are! How unsearchable his judgements, and how impossible to find his paths!
QUENYA: Behold how profound are God's riches and wisdom and knowledge are! How unsearchable his judgements, and how impossible to find his paths!

ENGLISH: For “who knew the Lord's mind, and who instucted him?”
QUENYA: For “who knew the Lord's mind, and who instucted him?”

ENGLISH: Or, “Who first gave to him and will receive a payment back?”
QUENYA: Or, “Who first gave to him and will receive a payment back?”

ENGLISH: For from him and by him and to him are all things! To him be the glory forever! Amen.
QUENYA: For from him and by him and to him are all things! To him be the glory forever! Amen.

ENGLISH: Therefore I urge you by God's compassion, brothers, that you will give your bodies as a living, holy sacrifice, pleasing to God: a service with your understanding,
QUENYA: Therefore I urge you by God's compassion, brothers, that you will give your bodies as a living, holy sacrifice, pleasing to God: a service with your understanding,

ENGLISH: and do not be formed by this age, but be changed by the renewal of your mind, letting you judge what God's will is, the good and pleasing and perfect.
QUENYA: and do not be formed by this age, but be changed by the renewal of your mind, letting you judge what God's will is, the good and pleasing and perfect.

ENGLISH: For by the grace given me I tell everyone among you: Do not think about yourself as higher than what it is necessary for you to think, but think in a manner giving health of mind, everyone as God has given him a measure of faith.
QUENYA: For by the grace given me I tell everyone among you: Do not think about yourself as higher than what it is necessary for you to think, but think in a manner giving health of mind, everyone as God has given him a measure of faith.

ENGLISH: For as we have in one body many body-parts, but the body-parts do not do the same thing,
QUENYA: For as we have in one body many body-parts, but the body-parts do not do the same thing,

ENGLISH: so we, though we are numerous, are one body in Christ, but one to one, one another's body-parts.
QUENYA: so we, though we are numerous, are one body in Christ, but one to one, one another's body-parts.

ENGLISH: We have various gifts by the grace given us. For that has a prophecy it is necessary to use it by the measure of faith set aside to him,
QUENYA: We have various gifts by the grace given us. For that has a prophecy it is necessary to use it by the measure of faith set aside to him,

ENGLISH: to who has a ministry it is necessary to work as a servant, for the teacher it is necessary to teach,
QUENYA: to who has a ministry it is necessary to work as a servant, for the teacher it is necessary to teach,

ENGLISH: or whose work is to urge, for him it is necessary to urge; for who gives it is necessary to give richly, it ifor that stands before the congregation it is necessary to put his heart in his work; to showing mercy it is necessary to do so in joy!
QUENYA: or whose work is to urge, for him it is necessary to urge; for who gives it is necessary to give richly, it ifor that stands before the congregation it is necessary to put his heart in his work; to showing mercy it is necessary to do so in joy!

ENGLISH: love be real! Abhor what is wicked; stick to what is good.
QUENYA: love be real! Abhor what is wicked; stick to what is good.

ENGLISH: your brotherly love for one another be profound! May everyone show the others a respect greater than he asks for!
QUENYA: your brotherly love for one another be profound! May everyone show the others a respect greater than he asks for!

ENGLISH: Do not be slow, abandoning the urgency; be burning in the spirit, be thralls for the Lord!
QUENYA: Do not be slow, abandoning the urgency; be burning in the spirit, be thralls for the Lord!

ENGLISH: Have joy in the hope! Be steadfast in tribulation! Remain in prayer!
QUENYA: Have joy in the hope! Be steadfast in tribulation! Remain in prayer!

ENGLISH: Give a part to the holy ones, as their needs are. Follow the love for strangers!
QUENYA: Give a part to the holy ones, as their needs are. Follow the love for strangers!

ENGLISH: Bless that persecute – bless and do not curse!
QUENYA: Bless that persecute – bless and do not curse!

ENGLISH: Have joy with that have joy; be wailing with the wailing ones.
QUENYA: Have joy with that have joy; be wailing with the wailing ones.

ENGLISH: Be of the same mind, one towards the other; do not wish to be prominent, but be led by the lowly things. Do not become wise in your own eyes!
QUENYA: Be of the same mind, one towards the other; do not wish to be prominent, but be led by the lowly things. Do not become wise in your own eyes!

ENGLISH: Do not give anyone evil for evil! Bring forward boons before all men.
QUENYA: Do not give anyone evil for evil! Bring forward boons before all men.

ENGLISH: If that is possible, keep peace with all men, whenever that is possible for you.
QUENYA: If that is possible, keep peace with all men, whenever that is possible for you.

ENGLISH: Do not take revenge for yourselves, but give room for the wrath, for is written: “Revenge is mine, says the Lord; I shall pay back.”
QUENYA: Do not take revenge for yourselves, but give room for the wrath, for is written: “Revenge is mine, says the Lord; I shall pay back.”

ENGLISH: But “if your enemy is hungry, give him something to eat; if he is thirsty, give him something to drink; for by so doing you gather fiery coals on his head.”
QUENYA: But “if your enemy is hungry, give him something to eat; if he is thirsty, give him something to drink; for by so doing you gather fiery coals on his head.”

ENGLISH: Do not be mastered by evil, but conquer evil by goodness.
QUENYA: Do not be mastered by evil, but conquer evil by goodness.

ENGLISH: May every person subject himself to the higher authorities, for there is not any authority except by God; the authorities that exist have been put there by God.
QUENYA: May every person subject himself to the higher authorities, for there is not any authority except by God; the authorities that exist have been put there by God.

ENGLISH: Therefore who stands against the authority stands against God's arrangement; the ones that have stood against it will receive judgement in themselves.
QUENYA: Therefore who stands against the authority stands against God's arrangement; the ones that have stood against it will receive judgement in themselves.

ENGLISH: For that rule are not a terror to the good deed, but to the evil one. You wish that it will not be necessary for you to fear the authority? Do which is good, and you will receive praise from it,
QUENYA: For that rule are not a terror to the good deed, but to the evil one. You wish that it will not be necessary for you to fear the authority? Do which is good, and you will receive praise from it,

ENGLISH: for it is God's servant for your good. But if you do evil, then fear, for it does not carry the sword without reason. For it is God's agent, an avenging power that brings wrath upon that does evil.
QUENYA: for it is God's servant for your good. But if you do evil, then fear, for it does not carry the sword without reason. For it is God's agent, an avenging power that brings wrath upon that does evil.

ENGLISH: Therefore you have need to subject yourselves under the authority, not only by reason of the wrath, but also by reason of your conscience.
QUENYA: Therefore you have need to subject yourselves under the authority, not only by reason of the wrath, but also by reason of your conscience.

ENGLISH: For that is also the reason for which you pay taxes, for they are God's servants, ever heeding this purpose.
QUENYA: For that is also the reason for which you pay taxes, for they are God's servants, ever heeding this purpose.

ENGLISH: Give to all your debts to them: tax to the one that asks for tax, payment to the one that asks for payment, respect to the one that asks for respect, glory to the one that asks for glory.
QUENYA: Give to all your debts to them: tax to the one that asks for tax, payment to the one that asks for payment, respect to the one that asks for respect, glory to the one that asks for glory.

ENGLISH: Do not have a debt of a single thing to anyone, except to love one another, for who loves his neighbor has fulfilled the law.
QUENYA: Do not have a debt of a single thing to anyone, except to love one another, for who loves his neighbor has fulfilled the law.

ENGLISH: For the commandments: “Do not break marriage, Do not kill, Do not be greedy”, and all other commandments, have their sum in this word: “You are to love your neighbor as yourself.”
QUENYA: For the commandments: “Do not break marriage, Do not kill, Do not be greedy”, and all other commandments, have their sum in this word: “You are to love your neighbor as yourself.”

ENGLISH: Love does not do evil against neighbor; therefore love is the law made true.
QUENYA: Love does not do evil against neighbor; therefore love is the law made true.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, do so since you know what the time is, that even now has come the time for awakening from sleep, for now our salvation is nearer than what it was when we received faith. Therefore let us put away the deeds that are of darkness and let us put upon ourselves the weapons of light.
QUENYA: Furthermore, do so since you know what the time is, that even now has come the time for awakening from sleep, for now our salvation is nearer than what it was when we received faith. Therefore let us put away the deeds that are of darkness and let us put upon ourselves the weapons of light.

ENGLISH: As at day, let us behave well, not in wild parties and drunken bouts , not in fornication and loose conduct, not in quarreling or envy.
QUENYA: As at day, let us behave well, not in wild parties and drunken bouts , not in fornication and loose conduct, not in quarreling or envy.

ENGLISH: But put on yourselves the Lord Jesus Christ, and do not make plans for the desires of the flesh.
QUENYA: But put on yourselves the Lord Jesus Christ, and do not make plans for the desires of the flesh.

ENGLISH: Receive the man that is weak in the faith, but not in order to judge his inner thoughts.
QUENYA: Receive the man that is weak in the faith, but not in order to judge his inner thoughts.

ENGLISH: One person has faith to eat everything, but who is weak eats vegetables.
QUENYA: One person has faith to eat everything, but who is weak eats vegetables.

ENGLISH: that eats is not to despice that does not eat, for who does not eat is not to judge who eats, for God has received him.
QUENYA: that eats is not to despice that does not eat, for who does not eat is not to judge who eats, for God has received him.

ENGLISH: Who you to judge another's servant? For his own lord he stands or he falls. Indeed he shall stand, for the Lord is able to cause him to stand.
QUENYA: Who you to judge another's servant? For his own lord he stands or he falls. Indeed he shall stand, for the Lord is able to cause him to stand.

ENGLISH: One person judges one day as greater than another day; another person judges one day like all other days; may everone be wholly firm in his own mind.
QUENYA: One person judges one day as greater than another day; another person judges one day like all other days; may everone be wholly firm in his own mind.

ENGLISH: who keeps the day, keeps it for the Lord, and who eats, eats for the Lord, since he gives thanks to the Lord; and who does not eat, does not eat for the Lord, and yet he gives thanks to God.
QUENYA: who keeps the day, keeps it for the Lord, and who eats, eats for the Lord, since he gives thanks to the Lord; and who does not eat, does not eat for the Lord, and yet he gives thanks to God.

ENGLISH: Indeed nobody among us lives for himself, and nobody dies for himself,
QUENYA: Indeed nobody among us lives for himself, and nobody dies for himself,

ENGLISH: for if we live, we live for the Lord, and if we die, we die for the Lord. Thus, if we live or we if we die alike, we are the Lord's.
QUENYA: for if we live, we live for the Lord, and if we die, we die for the Lord. Thus, if we live or we if we die alike, we are the Lord's.

ENGLISH: And for this purpose Christ died and came back to life: to be Lord of dead ones and of living ones alike.
QUENYA: And for this purpose Christ died and came back to life: to be Lord of dead ones and of living ones alike.

ENGLISH: But you, what is your reason for judging your brother, or what is your reason for despicing your brother? For all among us will stand before God's seat of judgement,
QUENYA: But you, what is your reason for judging your brother, or what is your reason for despicing your brother? For all among us will stand before God's seat of judgement,

ENGLISH: for is written: “As I live, says the Lord, to be every knee will bend, and every tongue will praise God.”
QUENYA: for is written: “As I live, says the Lord, to be every knee will bend, and every tongue will praise God.”

ENGLISH: Thus everyone among us will give a reckoning of himself to God.
QUENYA: Thus everyone among us will give a reckoning of himself to God.

ENGLISH: Therefore let us not judge one another, but sooner make this your judgement: do not put thing before a brother that causes him to slip or fall.
QUENYA: Therefore let us not judge one another, but sooner make this your judgement: do not put thing before a brother that causes him to slip or fall.

ENGLISH: For I know and have been by the Lord Jesus led to the belief that nothing is defiled in itself, except when a man counts a thing as defiled – to him it is defiled.
QUENYA: For I know and have been by the Lord Jesus led to the belief that nothing is defiled in itself, except when a man counts a thing as defiled – to him it is defiled.

ENGLISH: For if by food your brother has grief, you no more walk by love. Do not by your food undo the person for whom Christ died!
QUENYA: For if by food your brother has grief, you no more walk by love. Do not by your food undo the person for whom Christ died!

ENGLISH: Therefore do not let anyone speak about your goodness with scorn.
QUENYA: Therefore do not let anyone speak about your goodness with scorn.

ENGLISH: For God's kingdom is not eating and drinking, but justice and peace and joy by Holy Spirit.
QUENYA: For God's kingdom is not eating and drinking, but justice and peace and joy by Holy Spirit.

ENGLISH: For who thus is a servant to Christ. pleases God and has been found good by men.
QUENYA: For who thus is a servant to Christ. pleases God and has been found good by men.

ENGLISH: Therefore let us pursue the things that lead to peace and the things that build one another up.
QUENYA: Therefore let us pursue the things that lead to peace and the things that build one another up.

ENGLISH: Do not for food tear down what God has made! All things are indeed clean, but they are evil to a man who perceives it as a fall when he eats.
QUENYA: Do not for food tear down what God has made! All things are indeed clean, but they are evil to a man who perceives it as a fall when he eats.

ENGLISH: is good not to eat flesh or to drink vine or to do anything that causes your brother to fall.
QUENYA: is good not to eat flesh or to drink vine or to do anything that causes your brother to fall.

ENGLISH: The faith that you have, keep it between yourself and God. Happy is the person who does not bring judgement upon himself by which he pronounces good .
QUENYA: The faith that you have, keep it between yourself and God. Happy is the person who does not bring judgement upon himself by which he pronounces good .

ENGLISH: But if his faith is not firm, he is beforehand judged evil if he eats, for he does not eat out of faith. Indeed everything that is not out of faith is sin.
QUENYA: But if his faith is not firm, he is beforehand judged evil if he eats, for he does not eat out of faith. Indeed everything that is not out of faith is sin.

ENGLISH: But the debt of us that are strong is to carry the weak states of that are not strong, and not to please ourselves.
QUENYA: But the debt of us that are strong is to carry the weak states of that are not strong, and not to please ourselves.

ENGLISH: Let everyone among us please our neighbor, building him up.
QUENYA: Let everyone among us please our neighbor, building him up.

ENGLISH: For the Christ as well did not please himself, but as is written: “The harsh words of who spoke harshly to you have fallen upon me.”
QUENYA: For the Christ as well did not please himself, but as is written: “The harsh words of who spoke harshly to you have fallen upon me.”

ENGLISH: For all the things written beforehand were written for our instruction, for us to have hope by the steadfastness and by the comfort from the Scriptures.
QUENYA: For all the things written beforehand were written for our instruction, for us to have hope by the steadfastness and by the comfort from the Scriptures.

ENGLISH: Now may God who gives steadfastness and comfort grant you to have the same state of mind among you that Christ Jesus had,
QUENYA: Now may God who gives steadfastness and comfort grant you to have the same state of mind among you that Christ Jesus had,

ENGLISH: for you to praise with one mouth the God and Father of Jesus Christ our Lord.
QUENYA: for you to praise with one mouth the God and Father of Jesus Christ our Lord.

ENGLISH: Therefore receive one another, as the Christ received us, for the glory of God.
QUENYA: Therefore receive one another, as the Christ received us, for the glory of God.

ENGLISH: For I say that by God's faithfulness the Christ has been a servant to that are circumcised, to make firm the promises to the fathers,
QUENYA: For I say that by God's faithfulness the Christ has been a servant to that are circumcised, to make firm the promises to the fathers,

ENGLISH: causing the nations to praise God by reason of his righteousness. As is written: “Therefore I will confess you among the nations, and to your name I will sing!”
QUENYA: causing the nations to praise God by reason of his righteousness. As is written: “Therefore I will confess you among the nations, and to your name I will sing!”

ENGLISH: And again he says: “Have joy, nations, with his people.”
QUENYA: And again he says: “Have joy, nations, with his people.”

ENGLISH: And again: “Praise the Lord, all nations, and may all the peoples praise him!”
QUENYA: And again: “Praise the Lord, all nations, and may all the peoples praise him!”

ENGLISH: And again Isaiah said: “ will be the root of Jesse, and who rises to rule nations; in him nations will put their hope.”
QUENYA: And again Isaiah said: “ will be the root of Jesse, and who rises to rule nations; in him nations will put their hope.”

ENGLISH: May God who gives hope fill all among you with joy and with peace since you believe, for you to have an abundance of hope, by the power of the Holy Spirit.
QUENYA: May God who gives hope fill all among you with joy and with peace since you believe, for you to have an abundance of hope, by the power of the Holy Spirit.

ENGLISH: Now I as well firmly believe concerning you, my brothers, that you are full of goodness, since you have been filled with all knowledge and know how to instruct one another.
QUENYA: Now I as well firmly believe concerning you, my brothers, that you are full of goodness, since you have been filled with all knowledge and know how to instruct one another.

ENGLISH: But concerning some things I am writing to you in a manner very bold, as if to cause you to remember, by the grace given me from God.
QUENYA: But concerning some things I am writing to you in a manner very bold, as if to cause you to remember, by the grace given me from God.

ENGLISH: Thus I will be Jesus Christ's servant for the nations, working as priest for God's gospel, for the purpose that the nations will be a pleasing sacrifice, hallowed by Holy Spirit.
QUENYA: Thus I will be Jesus Christ's servant for the nations, working as priest for God's gospel, for the purpose that the nations will be a pleasing sacrifice, hallowed by Holy Spirit.

ENGLISH: Therefore I may praise myself in Christ Jesus concerning God's things.
QUENYA: Therefore I may praise myself in Christ Jesus concerning God's things.

ENGLISH: For I do not dare to tell of a single thing except that Christ has done through me, to gain obedience among the nations – by word and by deed
QUENYA: For I do not dare to tell of a single thing except that Christ has done through me, to gain obedience among the nations – by word and by deed

ENGLISH: by the power of signs and portents, by the power of Holy Spirit. And thus, from Jerusalem and in a circuit as far as Illyricum, I have made known the whole gospel about the Christ.
QUENYA: by the power of signs and portents, by the power of Holy Spirit. And thus, from Jerusalem and in a circuit as far as Illyricum, I have made known the whole gospel about the Christ.

ENGLISH: Thus I indeed make my goal that I will not make known the gospel where Christ's name has been spoken before, to stop myself from bulding on another person's foundation.
QUENYA: Thus I indeed make my goal that I will not make known the gospel where Christ's name has been spoken before, to stop myself from bulding on another person's foundation.

ENGLISH: But as is written: “The people to whom he was not made known shall see, and that have not heard will understand.”
QUENYA: But as is written: “The people to whom he was not made known shall see, and that have not heard will understand.”

ENGLISH: Therefore I was frequently impeded from coming to you.
QUENYA: Therefore I was frequently impeded from coming to you.

ENGLISH: But now, since I lack more room in these regions where I can make known the gospel, and since I have longed for many years to come to you,
QUENYA: But now, since I lack more room in these regions where I can make known the gospel, and since I have longed for many years to come to you,

ENGLISH: I have this hope: that when I go to Spain, it will be possible for me to see you when I pass by, and that you will help me to travel thither when I am in measure filled with your company .
QUENYA: I have this hope: that when I go to Spain, it will be possible for me to see you when I pass by, and that you will help me to travel thither when I am in measure filled with your company .

ENGLISH: But now I will go to Jerusalem to be a servant to the holy ones.
QUENYA: But now I will go to Jerusalem to be a servant to the holy ones.

ENGLISH: For that are in Macedonia and Achaia thought well to give a part of their goods to the poor ones in Jerusalem.
QUENYA: For that are in Macedonia and Achaia thought well to give a part of their goods to the poor ones in Jerusalem.

ENGLISH: To do so was indeed good in their eyes, and yet they were debtors to them, for if the nations have a part in their matters of spirit, they also owe to be servants for them with matters of the flesh.
QUENYA: To do so was indeed good in their eyes, and yet they were debtors to them, for if the nations have a part in their matters of spirit, they also owe to be servants for them with matters of the flesh.

ENGLISH: Therefore, after I complete this and have brought these collected goods to them in safety, I will pass through your area on my journey to Spain.
QUENYA: Therefore, after I complete this and have brought these collected goods to them in safety, I will pass through your area on my journey to Spain.

ENGLISH: But I know that when I come, I shall come having a full measure of blessing from Christ.
QUENYA: But I know that when I come, I shall come having a full measure of blessing from Christ.

ENGLISH: Now I urge you, brothers, by our Lord Jesus Christ and by the love of the spirit, that you do all that you can with me in prayers to God for me,
QUENYA: Now I urge you, brothers, by our Lord Jesus Christ and by the love of the spirit, that you do all that you can with me in prayers to God for me,

ENGLISH: for me to be delivered from that do not believe in Judea, and that my service in Jerusalem will be to the liking of the holy ones .
QUENYA: for me to be delivered from that do not believe in Judea, and that my service in Jerusalem will be to the liking of the holy ones .

ENGLISH: Thus, when I come to you with joy, by God's will I will be renewed with you.
QUENYA: Thus, when I come to you with joy, by God's will I will be renewed with you.

ENGLISH: May God that gives peace be will all among you! Amen!
QUENYA: May God that gives peace be will all among you! Amen!

ENGLISH: I give you Phoebe our sister, who is also a deaconess of the congregation in Cenchreae.
QUENYA: I give you Phoebe our sister, who is also a deaconess of the congregation in Cenchreae.

ENGLISH: Receive her in a manner worthy of the holy ones, and help her in every matter in which she has need of you, for she has protected numerous ones, me as well.
QUENYA: Receive her in a manner worthy of the holy ones, and help her in every matter in which she has need of you, for she has protected numerous ones, me as well.

ENGLISH: Greet Prisca and Aquila, who have labored with me in Jesus Christ,
QUENYA: Greet Prisca and Aquila, who have labored with me in Jesus Christ,

ENGLISH: who put their own neck in danger for my life. To the, not I alone but also all the non-Jewish congregations give thanks.
QUENYA: who put their own neck in danger for my life. To the, not I alone but also all the non-Jewish congregations give thanks.

ENGLISH: Furthermore, greet the congregation of their house. Greet Epaenetus my beloved, who is a first fruit to Christ in Asia.
QUENYA: Furthermore, greet the congregation of their house. Greet Epaenetus my beloved, who is a first fruit to Christ in Asia.

ENGLISH: Greet Mary, who has done numerous things for you.
QUENYA: Greet Mary, who has done numerous things for you.

ENGLISH: Greet Andronicus and Junia, who are of my kin and were with me in prison. They have a good name among the apostles, and were in Christ before me.
QUENYA: Greet Andronicus and Junia, who are of my kin and were with me in prison. They have a good name among the apostles, and were in Christ before me.

ENGLISH: Greet Ampliatus, my beloved in Christ.
QUENYA: Greet Ampliatus, my beloved in Christ.

ENGLISH: Greet Urbanus, who has labored with me in Christ, and Stachys my beloved.
QUENYA: Greet Urbanus, who has labored with me in Christ, and Stachys my beloved.

ENGLISH: Greet Apelles, who has been tested in the Lord. Greet the people in the house of Aristobulos.
QUENYA: Greet Apelles, who has been tested in the Lord. Greet the people in the house of Aristobulos.

ENGLISH: Greet Herodion, who is of my kin. Greet the people in the house of Narcissus that are in the Lord.
QUENYA: Greet Herodion, who is of my kin. Greet the people in the house of Narcissus that are in the Lord.

ENGLISH: Greet Tryphaena and Tryphosa, who toil in the Lord. Greet Persis, the beloved one, for she has done many works in the Lord.
QUENYA: Greet Tryphaena and Tryphosa, who toil in the Lord. Greet Persis, the beloved one, for she has done many works in the Lord.

ENGLISH: Greet Ruphus, the chosen one in the Lord, and his mother and mine.
QUENYA: Greet Ruphus, the chosen one in the Lord, and his mother and mine.

ENGLISH: Greet Asyncritus, Phlegon, Hermes, Patrobas, Hermas, and the brothers with then.
QUENYA: Greet Asyncritus, Phlegon, Hermes, Patrobas, Hermas, and the brothers with then.

ENGLISH: Greet Philologus and Julia, Nereus and his sister, and Olympas, and all the holy ones with them.
QUENYA: Greet Philologus and Julia, Nereus and his sister, and Olympas, and all the holy ones with them.

ENGLISH: Greet one another with a holy kiss! All of Christ's congregations greet you!
QUENYA: Greet one another with a holy kiss! All of Christ's congregations greet you!

ENGLISH: Now I urge you, brothers, that you will keep your eye on those that cause splits and slippings from the teaching that you received, and turn yourselves away from them.
QUENYA: Now I urge you, brothers, that you will keep your eye on those that cause splits and slippings from the teaching that you received, and turn yourselves away from them.

ENGLISH: For such people are servants, not to Jesus Christ, but to their own bellies, and with fair words and having honey on their tongue they cause to stray the heart of the innocent ones.
QUENYA: For such people are servants, not to Jesus Christ, but to their own bellies, and with fair words and having honey on their tongue they cause to stray the heart of the innocent ones.

ENGLISH: For your obedience is being noticed by all. Therefore you give me joy. But I wish that you will be wise about that is good, but innocent about what is evil.
QUENYA: For your obedience is being noticed by all. Therefore you give me joy. But I wish that you will be wise about that is good, but innocent about what is evil.

ENGLISH: The God of Peace will soon crush Satan under your feet . May Jesus our Lord's grace be with you!
QUENYA: The God of Peace will soon crush Satan under your feet . May Jesus our Lord's grace be with you!

ENGLISH: Timothy, who labors with me, greets you, and so do Lucius and Jason and Sosipater, that are of my kin.
QUENYA: Timothy, who labors with me, greets you, and so do Lucius and Jason and Sosipater, that are of my kin.

ENGLISH: I, Tertius, who has written this letter, greet you in the Lord.
QUENYA: I, Tertius, who has written this letter, greet you in the Lord.

ENGLISH: Gaius, who has received me and the entire congregation into his house, greets you. Erastus, governor of the city, greets you, and so does Quartus his brother. {
QUENYA: Gaius, who has received me and the entire congregation into his house, greets you. Erastus, governor of the city, greets you, and so does Quartus his brother. {

ENGLISH: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with all among you! Amen!}
QUENYA: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with all among you! Amen!}

ENGLISH: To the One who can keep you firm by the gospel that I brought and by making known Jesus Christ, by the revelation of the mystery that has been kept in silence for eternities,
QUENYA: To the One who can keep you firm by the gospel that I brought and by making known Jesus Christ, by the revelation of the mystery that has been kept in silence for eternities,

ENGLISH: but now has been shown and made known by the writings of the Prophets among all the nations by the command of the Eternal God, to cause the faith to be heeded
QUENYA: but now has been shown and made known by the writings of the Prophets among all the nations by the command of the Eternal God, to cause the faith to be heeded

ENGLISH: – to God, wise alone, be the glory through Jesus Christ forever. Amen!
QUENYA: – to God, wise alone, be the glory through Jesus Christ forever. Amen!

ENGLISH: Paul – God's slave and Jesus Christ's apostle, by the faith of God's chosen ones and by the knowledge of the truth that follows from awe of God,
QUENYA: Paul – God's slave and Jesus Christ's apostle, by the faith of God's chosen ones and by the knowledge of the truth that follows from awe of God,

ENGLISH: by the hope of eternal life about which God, who cannot lie, gave a promise before everlasting times,
QUENYA: by the hope of eternal life about which God, who cannot lie, gave a promise before everlasting times,

ENGLISH: though in his own times he revealed his word by making it known, the work for which I was reserved by the command from God who saves us –
QUENYA: though in his own times he revealed his word by making it known, the work for which I was reserved by the command from God who saves us –

ENGLISH: to Titus , real child in the faith that we together have: Grace and peace from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Savior.
QUENYA: to Titus , real child in the faith that we together have: Grace and peace from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Savior.

ENGLISH: For this reason I made you remain in Crete , for you to make straight the deficient matters and for you to appoint elders in every city, as I commanded you,
QUENYA: For this reason I made you remain in Crete , for you to make straight the deficient matters and for you to appoint elders in every city, as I commanded you,

ENGLISH: if there is anyone beyond suspicion, husband of a single wife, having believing children that are not under suspicion of a wild life or rebellious .
QUENYA: if there is anyone beyond suspicion, husband of a single wife, having believing children that are not under suspicion of a wild life or rebellious .

ENGLISH: For it is necessary that nobody can speak evil about an overseer as God's steward. It is necessary that he is not a person who pleases himself, not quick to anger or given to wine or one who beats or is greedy for unjust gain,
QUENYA: For it is necessary that nobody can speak evil about an overseer as God's steward. It is necessary that he is not a person who pleases himself, not quick to anger or given to wine or one who beats or is greedy for unjust gain,

ENGLISH: but friendly to strangers, a friend of what is good , in health of mind, just, holy, knowing to control himself,
QUENYA: but friendly to strangers, a friend of what is good , in health of mind, just, holy, knowing to control himself,

ENGLISH: firmly keeping the faithful word of his teaching, so that it is possible for him to urge by the beneficial teaching and also rebuke those that speak against him.
QUENYA: firmly keeping the faithful word of his teaching, so that it is possible for him to urge by the beneficial teaching and also rebuke those that speak against him.

ENGLISH: For there are many unruly people, who speak empty things and seduce the mind, above everything who stick to the circumcision.
QUENYA: For there are many unruly people, who speak empty things and seduce the mind, above everything who stick to the circumcision.

ENGLISH: It is necessary to stop their mouth, for these people subvert entire families by teaching what is not proper, in a desire for unjust gain.
QUENYA: It is necessary to stop their mouth, for these people subvert entire families by teaching what is not proper, in a desire for unjust gain.

ENGLISH: One among them, their own prophet, said: "The Cretans always lie, being wild beasts , unemployed bellies."
QUENYA: One among them, their own prophet, said: "The Cretans always lie, being wild beasts , unemployed bellies."

ENGLISH: What he says is true. Therefore rebuke them in a harsh manner, for them to have health in the faith,
QUENYA: What he says is true. Therefore rebuke them in a harsh manner, for them to have health in the faith,

ENGLISH: not heeding Jewish fables and commands of men who turn themselves away from the truth.
QUENYA: not heeding Jewish fables and commands of men who turn themselves away from the truth.

ENGLISH: All things are clean to clean ones, but to people that are defiled and without faith nothing is pure, but their mind and their conscience alike are defiled.
QUENYA: All things are clean to clean ones, but to people that are defiled and without faith nothing is pure, but their mind and their conscience alike are defiled.

ENGLISH: They say that they know God, but by their deeds they deny him, since they are disgusting and rebellious, and concerning every good doing they are turned away .
QUENYA: They say that they know God, but by their deeds they deny him, since they are disgusting and rebellious, and concerning every good doing they are turned away .

ENGLISH: But you, say that are beneficial for healthy teaching.
QUENYA: But you, say that are beneficial for healthy teaching.

ENGLISH: It is necessary for the elder men to be lowly in their habits, serious, in health of mind and of faith and of love and of endurance.
QUENYA: It is necessary for the elder men to be lowly in their habits, serious, in health of mind and of faith and of love and of endurance.

ENGLISH: In a similar manner, it is necessary for the elder women to behave with respect, not speaking evil about others or being slaves of much wine, teaching what is good,
QUENYA: In a similar manner, it is necessary for the elder women to behave with respect, not speaking evil about others or being slaves of much wine, teaching what is good,

ENGLISH: so reminding the young women that it is necessary for them to love their husbands, love their children,
QUENYA: so reminding the young women that it is necessary for them to love their husbands, love their children,

ENGLISH: have health of mind, to be pure, working in the house, be good, subjecting themselves to their husbands – to stop anyone from blashpheming God's word.
QUENYA: have health of mind, to be pure, working in the house, be good, subjecting themselves to their husbands – to stop anyone from blashpheming God's word.

ENGLISH: In the same manner exhort the young men to be sensible,
QUENYA: In the same manner exhort the young men to be sensible,

ENGLISH: in all things showing yourself as an example of good deeds. In your teaching show that you are incorrupt, serious,
QUENYA: in all things showing yourself as an example of good deeds. In your teaching show that you are incorrupt, serious,

ENGLISH: speaking beneficial speech which nobody can despise; thus a hostile person will be ashamed, lacking foul thing that he can say about us.
QUENYA: speaking beneficial speech which nobody can despise; thus a hostile person will be ashamed, lacking foul thing that he can say about us.

ENGLISH: May slaves put themselves under their lords in everything, pleasing them well, not talking back,
QUENYA: May slaves put themselves under their lords in everything, pleasing them well, not talking back,

ENGLISH: not stealing, but showing good faith, thus adorning the teaching of our Savior, God, in all things.
QUENYA: not stealing, but showing good faith, thus adorning the teaching of our Savior, God, in all things.

ENGLISH: For the grace which brings salvation to all men has been revealed,
QUENYA: For the grace which brings salvation to all men has been revealed,

ENGLISH: instructing us to abandon ungodliness and the desires of the world in good health of mind and righteousness and godliness in this age,
QUENYA: instructing us to abandon ungodliness and the desires of the world in good health of mind and righteousness and godliness in this age,

ENGLISH: looking forward to the happy hope and the glorious revelation of the mightly God and of our Saviour, Christ Jesus,
QUENYA: looking forward to the happy hope and the glorious revelation of the mightly God and of our Saviour, Christ Jesus,

ENGLISH: who gave him selve to deliver us from all lawlessness and to purify for himself a people wholly own – a people burning to do good deeds.
QUENYA: who gave him selve to deliver us from all lawlessness and to purify for himself a people wholly own – a people burning to do good deeds.

ENGLISH: Say these things and exhort and rebuke, by your full power. Do not let anyone despise you! TIL HIT
QUENYA: Say these things and exhort and rebuke, by your full power. Do not let anyone despise you! TIL HIT

ENGLISH: You remind them that they are to subject themselves governments and authorities , for them to be ready for every good work.
QUENYA: You remind them that they are to subject themselves governments and authorities , for them to be ready for every good work.

ENGLISH: They are to speak evil about no one, not desiring dispute, being reasonable of mind, behaving gently to all men.
QUENYA: They are to speak evil about no one, not desiring dispute, being reasonable of mind, behaving gently to all men.

ENGLISH: For was a time in which we as well were without understandig, not obedient, made to stray, as slaves of desires and various lusts, remaining in evil and envy – despicable, hating one the other.
QUENYA: For was a time in which we as well were without understandig, not obedient, made to stray, as slaves of desires and various lusts, remaining in evil and envy – despicable, hating one the other.

ENGLISH: But when our Savior's and God's kindness and love of men were revealed
QUENYA: But when our Savior's and God's kindness and love of men were revealed

ENGLISH: – not by just deeds that we did, but by his mercy – he saved us by the bath that make us born again and renewed, by Holy Spirit.
QUENYA: – not by just deeds that we did, but by his mercy – he saved us by the bath that make us born again and renewed, by Holy Spirit.

ENGLISH: He poured an abundant measure of this spirit upon us, through Jesus Christ, our Savior.
QUENYA: He poured an abundant measure of this spirit upon us, through Jesus Christ, our Savior.

ENGLISH: Thus, after being justified by the grace of that One, we can be heirs of hope of eternal life.
QUENYA: Thus, after being justified by the grace of that One, we can be heirs of hope of eternal life.

ENGLISH: Faithful is the word, and these things I wish that you firmly establish; thus that have believed in God can fix their minds on the doing of good works. These things are good and beneficial to men.
QUENYA: Faithful is the word, and these things I wish that you firmly establish; thus that have believed in God can fix their minds on the doing of good works. These things are good and beneficial to men.

ENGLISH: But turn yourself away from foolish inquries and genealogies and quarrelings and disputes about the Law, for such things are without fruit and empty.
QUENYA: But turn yourself away from foolish inquries and genealogies and quarrelings and disputes about the Law, for such things are without fruit and empty.

ENGLISH: Turn away anyone spreading untrue teaching after a first and a second warning,
QUENYA: Turn away anyone spreading untrue teaching after a first and a second warning,

ENGLISH: knowing that such a person has turned himself from the path and is sinning, being judged by himself.
QUENYA: knowing that such a person has turned himself from the path and is sinning, being judged by himself.

ENGLISH: When I send Artemas or Tychicus to you, do everything that you can to come to me in Nicopolis, for there I have decived to remain for the winter.
QUENYA: When I send Artemas or Tychicus to you, do everything that you can to come to me in Nicopolis, for there I have decived to remain for the winter.

ENGLISH: Give Zenas the Lawyer, and Apollo, all their needs for their journey, for them to lack nothing.
QUENYA: Give Zenas the Lawyer, and Apollo, all their needs for their journey, for them to lack nothing.

ENGLISH: But may our own also learn to do good works and fill the pressing needs, so as not to lack fruit.
QUENYA: But may our own also learn to do good works and fill the pressing needs, so as not to lack fruit.

ENGLISH: All that are with me greet you. Greet those who love us by the faith!May the grace of God be with all among you!
QUENYA: All that are with me greet you. Greet those who love us by the faith!May the grace of God be with all among you!
